I'll win next time!
The best way to know how someone really feels is to watch him dance. I learn so much about human emotion by studying the dancers here.
Are you here to see me?
Psst! Hey, you. I've got some good stuff here. Interested?
Just, uh… keep this to yourself, got it?
Oooh ooh ooh!
Oooh ooh ooh!
What do you want?
I call the shots here.
Unless this is extremely important, I'm in no mood to chat.
Did you see a guard get dragged away?
Now that you mention it, there was an especially pitiful-looking soldier… He was dragged off in the direction of $map:52000119$, to the northeast.
I don't have time for small potatoes.
How can I get anything done with these idiots?
It's been too long since Blackstar faced a real challenge. I'd better call a meeting…
I don't know you, so I'll warn you once: Don't cross me.
Looking for quality equipment? I've got stuff you can usually only get in dungeons. Take a look if you're interested.
What are you offering?
Where do you get all of this from?
Is it really good quality stuff?

I'm selling boxes with items from different dungeons. If you mainly explore dungeons to find good equipment, you'll definitely like what I sell. Buy from me, and you don't have to risk your neck exploring dungeons.
What exactly is in these boxes?
Beats me. They've got everything from highly valuable equipment to useless junk. What you get depends on your luck.
Oh, I nearly forgot the most important thing. Every time you open a box, your reward count for the corresponding dungeon decreases.

What a brazen way to ask for all of my trade secrets! Adventurers have all kinds of reasons to explore dungeons, like discovering the rare treasures they contain. I suppose you could call them treasure hunters, and they're good at what they do.
Naturally, some of them do business with merchants like me. Beyond that, all you need to know is that I have my own supply routes.

Good quality? What do you take me for, a cheat? I swear on my reputation as a businessman, I don't know what's inside these boxes any more than you do. If I did, you can bet I'd have priced each box according to its value.
But as you can see, I'm selling them at set low prices. It's not about my capacity for swindling. It's about your luck. So don't blame me if you do get junk from your box.
Sh! You'll give me away!
I didn't come all the way out here for nothing…
A lovely day for some exercise, don't you think? One-two, one-two!
One, two, three, four! Feel that stretch in your joints! Two, two! Three, four!
My back… Maybe I should take five.
The air is so bracing out here! Care to join me?
I, um… I like your hat.
Aren't you a darling? I hear this is the hottest design in $map:02010002$ nowadays! My brother, $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$, picked it up for me.
You're lucky to have such a great brother.
Don't I know it! He always looks out for me, even when he's off in the field. But lately, he hasn't been himself. Not since he had to give up hunting.
Why did $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$ give up hunting?
His wife hates it. She got sick of him coming home with all manner of wounds. Of course I worry about him, too, but this is his calling. A man can't be happy if he can't follow his calling.

Doesn't matter what I think, of course. $npcName:11000167[gender:0]$ agreed to stop hunting and go into business in $map:02000036$. He seems awful miserable to me, but what do I know? I'm just his sister.
Ah now, let me guess… You want to enchant your gear? Let's have a look, then!
How about we change some bonus attributes?
Tell me about your work.

That's not all! Aside from functioning as weaponry or armor, high-grade gear grants special abilities. But there's a catch: These abilities are completely random! If you would prefer gear that better suits your needs, I can help you modify it as you like.

This is a new service we blacksmiths provide, thanks to a breakthrough out of the research center in $map:02000270$. Those eggheads figured out how to refine meteoric ores into these $itemPlural:40100026$ that I can use to change the chemical properties in your gear.

Now, don't get your hopes all the way up. $itemPlural:40100026$ are tricky to work with, so I might not be able to get all the bonuses on your item to exactly what you want. I also need $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100002$, $itemPlural:40100003$, or $itemPlural:40100021$ to work with, and that's up to you to get.
Do you want to change the bonus attributes on your gear? Then pick an item to change! Just remember that it needs to be epic or better armor and accessories at level 50 and above.

So you want to change the bonus attributes on this gear, eh? Sounds good to me! Hey, why the anxious look on your face? If you don't like the new attributes, you can always keep the old ones, and then just try to change them again.
I understand you want to change the bonus attributes on your gear, but I can't help you if you don't have the materials, Silly! Come back when you've got the right stuff, yeah?

Okay, then! See if you like any of these new attributes. You can choose anything you like. If you don't choose anything, then the new attributes will automatically overwrite the old ones. Choose carefully!

How do you feel about the change of attributes? Overjoyed? Devastated? Ready to sue me? I hope not, ha ha! But seriously, if you're not happy, you can always try to change the attributes again. I'll be here. Just bring the materials!
Oh, wow. This gear is a little above my pay grade. Could I help you with anything less advanced?
How about we change some bonus attributes?
Tell me about your work.
Oh! One more thing! I'm sure you know that some high-grade gear grant random special abilities. If you're interested in modifying those abilities, I can help!

This is a brand new service blacksmiths can provide, thanks to a breakthrough at the $map:02000270$ research center. Hehe. They've refined meteoric ores into $itemPlural:40100026$ that can change the chemical properties in gear!

Of course, bonus attributes are hard to rely on since the results are so random. And in addition to $itemPlural:40100026$, you'll also need $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100002$, $itemPlural:40100003$, or $itemPlural:40100021$, depending on the work being done.
Oh! Of course! Just pick an item for me to work on. Remember, I only handle epic and legendary armor and accessories level 50 and above.
Is this the gear you want to change? Okay! Don't worry, if you don't like the new attributes, you can keep the old ones.
I would love to change your bonus attributes for you! I just need the necessary materials, hehe.
What do you think? Do you like the new attributes? Remember, if you don't choose anything, the new attributes will automatically be applied.
If you're not satisfied with the current attributes, you can always try again. Just bring the materials, hehe.
Oh, dear. This gear is a bit advanced for me. Could I help you with a different piece, perhaps?
If you've got scrap metal, we can do business. Otherwise, I got too much on my mind to waste talking to you. Those scoundrels are ruining the neighborhood…
How's business?
Well, let's see. Ralph's goons moved in, took over the yard, and ran off my best workers. What do you think?
My business is in sorry shape thanks to them.
You don't look like the usual beach bums we get around here. What do you want?
Did you remember your books?
Of course you didn't. I don't know what I expected.
How did you find me…?
What do I do now?
Why can't love be simple for once?
I cannot help but sigh… <font color="#909090">She sighs.</font>
Everyone knows I'm the best smith… on this street.

Great artisans are a dime-a-dozen in $map:2000076$. This is the place to be if you aim to make a living at crafting. It makes competition fierce, sure, but that only forces me to push myself harder. And it's kind of inspirational, being around all these people who live for their craft.

Anyway, if you want to strengthen your equipment, come to me. Just remember that you'll need to bring some special materials. You probably know which ones… the $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$ that $map:2000051$ is so famous for.

You can get $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the Dismantle button in your inventory window. As for $itemPlural:40100024$, that comes at a much higher cost. It only comes from dismantling gear that is epic or better.
People compete for $itemPlural:40100023$ in the Personal Arena, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is…

By the way, Elliana got ahold of yet another strange weapon, and she's been begging me to enchant it for her. I told her such flashy, impractical weapons like that can't be enchanted, but she doesn't listen. Why can't she just accept that only items marked as "Can be Enchanted" can, well, be enchanted?

That's not all! Aside from functioning as weaponry or armor, high-grade gear imparts special abilities. But there's a catch: these abilities are completely random! If you would prefer gear that better suits your needs, I can help you modify the gear.

Have you heard about $itemPlural:40100026$? They were invented by those eggheads in $map:02000270$. I hear they're made from real meteors! With a material like that, I can change the bonus attributes on a piece of gear.

It's not some magic bullet, of course. There's no telling what new attribute you'll wind up with. And don't forget, I also need $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100002$, $itemPlural:40100003$, or $itemPlural:40100021$ to go with the $itemPlural:40100026$.
Okay, let's see the gear you want to enchant. I'm warning you now, it has to be marked with "Can be Enchanted."
Hm. It is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

You didn't forget that enchanting gear requires materials, did you? $itemPlural:40100001$ are available for purchase from gear merchants and supply merchants. You can get $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the Dismantle button in your inventory window. As for the $itemPlural:40100024$, that comes at a much higher cost. It only comes from dismantling gear that is epic or better.
Wow! This is legendary! Where did you get it? I see gear from all over the world every day, but nothing like this. This is something truly special.
Whoa, this is a legendary item. I can't compensate you for anything that happens to such a valuable piece, so you need to be willing to assume all risk.
This has never been enchanted, not even once. You'll be very happy when you see how much better I can make it.
You've never tried to enchant this gear? Just wait till you see what I can do with it!
Never-enchanted gear? That's great. It should be really easy to enchant this gear for the first time.

This gear… Have I really failed in enchanting it 100 times? Gee. This hurts my pride. But you know what a blacksmith with real grit would do? Not give up! So let's try it again, this time with more experience and wiser minds, yeah?

But you've already tried to enchant this gear 100 times, and it's been a failure each and every time. You're going to ask me to enchant it no matter what I say, aren't you? Wow, you're stubborner than I am. All right, no guarantees it'll work, but here goes!

Have you really tried and failed to enchant this gear 1,000 times? I can't believe it! I thought I was stubborn, but I have nothing on you. Maybe all of us craftspeople on this street should give you an award for Best Customer.
Hm. It is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

I can't enchant this gear any further. It's so unstable that it could blow up the whole street if I fail. You'll need to find someone with more expertise.

Lumistones are called the last gift of the light. What do you want to know?
When were lumistones discovered?
When were shiny hallowstones discovered?
Lumistones date back to the early history of Maple World. Their tale comes to us from a time when the goddesses of light and darkness coexisted.
These goddesses created the myriad worlds and the creatures that dwelled within. Maple World was their final creation. That's wonderful in its own way, isn't it?

Anyway, the goddess of light wanted to create a perfect world, and so created the Sages to act as guides. Each one received a portion of the goddess's power so they could maintain peace in Maple World.

But the more light the Sages brought into Maple World, the less happy the Goddess of Darkness became. Seeing that Maple World had become unbalanced, she sought to destroy it. Of course, the Goddess of Light was not too happy about this arrangement.

Their disagreement soon led to war. They were equally powerful, but the Goddess of Light had the Sages to call upon. After a long, bloody battle, the Goddess of Darkness was shattered to pieces and dispersed across the land.
Even in victory, the Goddess of Light could not prevent the darkness from tainting Maple World. Wherever the shards of darkness landed, once-peaceful creatures became vicious monsters.
Feeling remorse over the war, the Goddess of Light made the ultimate sacrifice and became shards of light to breathe life back into Maple World.
But first, the Goddess of Light created one last servant: a guardian for Maple World. Empress $npcName:11001969[gender:1]$.
Some of the dust left behind by the Goddess of Light's sacrifice crystallized. The early people of Maple World didn't know what to do with this crystal dust.
Even so, they recognized the crystals' power. When mishandled, these crystals often led to disaster. The general population began to fear them.

Time passed. Finally, the great scholar Amil and his associates took interest in these crystals. They formed a union of researchers called Arkell and took the time to study the remnants of the Goddess of Light.

In his research, Amil found a way to stabilize the energy of the crystals by cutting them into precise shapes. Archmage $npcName:11001573[gender:0]$ helped Amil helped this research along. He even gave lectures about the crystals at $map:52000101$.

With $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$'s support, Amil managed to create a gemstone in the shape of a bead, which he named a lumistone. He's the scholar responsible for all the lumistones we have today. And the rest, as they say, is history.
What an interesting story.
I'm glad you think so! Let me know if you have any more questions.
I have another question.
$itemPlural:20300828$ are used to enchant lumistones, but we don't know much about them. They were left behind by the Sages, and the Sages vanished long ago.

In the early days, nobody knew what to do with $itemPlural:20300828$. Any mage could tell that they contained power, but the power to do what? It was pure happenstance that some scholar mistakenly applied some $itemPlural:20300828$ to a lumistone and found it greatly improved.
How did you become the head librarian?

It was through this scholar's further experiments that we learned $itemPlural:20300828$ could be used to enchant lumistones to incredible levels. Some people go so far as to call these a gift from the goddesses.
Is it possible to make new ones?

There are a few people who know how. My teacher, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, is one such person and he has happily shared his knowledge with the rest of the world. It's a good thing, too, because demand has only grown.

Interestingly enough, $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ knows how to create them from ancient techniques passed down between mages, but knows nothing of the underlying nature or powers involved. Perhaps, one day, someone will find other uses for them. Just the thought of it makes me yearn for the future!
I have another question.
I'm something of an expert on lumistones, so feel free to ask me anything.
Can lumistones be improved?
How do you dismantle a lumistone?
Where can I find lumistone materials?
I have no more questions.

You can upgrade a lumistone up to 5 times. Just open your inventory and press the gemstone button. Of course, you'll need $itemPlural:40500001$, $itemPlural:40500002$, and $itemPlural:40100027$ to do so. The higher tier your lumistone, the more materials you'll need.
To bring a lumistone up to tier 5, you'll need $itemPlural:20300828$ instead of $itemPlural:40100027$. Nobody is quite sure why, but it seems to be a hard rule.

Just so you know, some $itemPlural:40500001$, $itemPlural:40500002$, and $itemPlural:40100027$ will bind to you when you pick them up, while others can be traded between adventurers. You can use either type to improve your lumistones, but the ones that are bound to you will always be used first.
I have another question.

You can dismantle lumistones at the dismantlers here and there in town. Of course, you can also just use the dismantle button in your inventory. Dismantling lumistones is a good way to get $itemPlural:40500001$ and $itemPlural:40500002$.

The dust you get from dismantling lumistones has the same properties as the lumistones themselves. For instance, if a lumistone was bound to you, then the dust you get from dismantling it will also be bound to you.

Am I forgetting anything…? Oh, of course! The higher a lumistone's tier, the more $itemPlural:40500001$ and $itemPlural:40500002$ you will get from dismantling it. Pretty straightforward, don't you think?
I have another question.
Lumistone materials can be found from all sorts of different sources throughout Maple World. Now, this is a lot to take in, so listen carefully.

Lumistones can be found in $itemPlural:20300849$ and $itemPlural:20300850$, which you get as rewards for navigator activities. If you're a good smith, you can also craft $itemPlural:20300846$ at mastery level 5.
You can get $itemPlural:40500001$ and $itemPlural:40500002$ from Adventure/Raid Bonus Boxes, as well as other places. And you know that you can get dust by dismantling lumistones, right?
$itemPlural:40100027$ can be found by dismantling outfits found from hunting, events, or in the premium shop.

You'll get a different number of $itemPlural:40100027$ from the outfit depending on its quality and source. Never just throw away an old expired outfit—throw it in the dismantler and see what you get!

When you reach mastery level 12 in your smithing skill, you'll get 120 $itemPlural:20300828$ as a bonus. You can also get $itemPlural:20300828$ from Adventure/Raid Bonus Boxes and through alchemy crafting.
Just so you know, it takes 9,000 $itemPlural:20300828$ to enchant a lumistone up to tier 5. That's a lot, sure, but the effects of a tier 5 lumistone make it well worth the trouble.
That's too much to take in all at once!
Are you kidding? This is only a fraction of the knowledge you need to become a lumistone expert! Well, if it's too much, just keep studying. You'll get it eventually.
I have another question.
Hmm… I adore history almost as much as I enjoy studying magic. I miss my friends and teachers back in Ellinel, but I'm happy here, surrounded by hundreds of ancient tomes.
What's your favorite subject?
Lumistones, of course! Just saying the name makes my heart flutter. Ah, if only I could roll around in a room full of lumi— Never mind! Forget I said anything!
What makes lumistones different from other gemstones?
Are you serious?! Surely you aren't so ignorant! If you don't understand how precious lumistones are, then allow me to illuminate you. Ask your questions.

Why is the $npc:11003894[gender:0]$ constantly calling meetings? What a chore!

$npcName:11004650$ is a known Casanova of this place! Many Leshies have already been played!

Why did this happen? I want my friend back!

Okay.

If you want to live, go southeast to the Leshy Forest.

Argh…

Hm…

Lalala!
Lalala!

$MyPCName$, $npcName:11001232[gender:1]$ says she misses you.
I'm sorry I didn't stay in touch. I couldn't find the time. Still, it seems you did well enough without me.
No matter $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s reasons or excuses, I will never forgive him for murdering Arazaad.

Has the time finally come time to avenge Arazaad? $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$… I'll make you pay!

I hope everyone's all right.
$npcName:11001229[gender:0]$… Will he ever wake up?
Nice to meet you!
I'm honored to join the Starlight Expedition. The captain of the guard sent me to help $npc:11000076[gender:0]$. I intend to win glory for the guard!
Nice to meet you!

I didn't expect $map:02000023$ to be quite this beautiful. When the boss told me the Green Hoods were joining this mission, I didn't know what to think. I've never been so far from home before… But I promise I won't let you down!
Nice to meet you.

If it weren't for the Archmage and $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, I'd be back home working on my research. I'm still not convinced this mission is worthwhile. At least the name "Starlight Expedition" has a nice ring to it.
I sure hope $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ comes back soon.
I'm surprised $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ doesn't live in a mansion…
One day, I hope I'm rich enough to have a house!
I hear $npcName:11003163[gender:0]$ is one of the most dutiful, most devoted, most loving sons in all of Maple World.
He's a devoted… son?
Yeah! He's always off visiting his sick ma, who lives really far away. When I finally graduate, I'm gonna be a good son, too!
Why wait until then?
If my mom and dad saw me the way I am now, they'd die of shame. Gotta prove myself, first!
This place is dark. And wet. Just the sort of place I'd do crimes if I was a bad guy.
You saved me. Again. Jeez, I can't do anything right…
You'll get the hang of it.
Get a grip.
Y-yeah! Next time, it's my turn to save you!
Y-yes, $male:sir,female:ma'am$. <font size='20'>Aw man…</font>
If I was stronger, you wouldn't have to go through so much trouble. I'm sorry I'm such a burden…
How'd you get to be so strong, $MyPCName$?
The secret is hard work.
What can I say? I was born this good.
Hard work! I can do that. I'll start tomorrow! Or maybe next week…
It's all natural talent? Oh man. I guess there's no hope for me…
I told you! As long as $npcName:11003216[gender:0]$ is alive, $npcName:11000069[gender:1]$ isn't safe.

(Ask if she knows you.)
Of course! You're the hero who saved Maple World many times!
It's an honor to meet you! I'm going to boast to my friends!

Ah. I'm researching the ecology. I'm trying to find the reason why this forest got polluted when it used to be clean and abundant in the past.
It's really unfortunate. It became polluted like this because of the Daemon Army… sigh.

Ahhhh?! You scared me!

But I have no choice if you really want to hear it. Actually… it's because of $npcName:11004572[gender:1]$.
Very…
Very beautiful?! Right?!
I remember when I first saw $npcName:11004572[gender:1]$… She was like an angel that came down from heaven!

I will definitely confess to her. Just you watch!
There's too much dust here. Are you hurt anywhere?
(She looks like a kind person.)
If no, that's a relief. My daughter $npcName:11004573[gender:1]$'s coughing got worse and I'm worried.
She's young but pensive… I just want her to be bright and run around.
Please adore my daughter $npcName:11004573[gender:1]$ if you see her. She has to be happy.
You don't look like you live here… Are you from outside?
I'm jealous… I want to leave this place.
(Ask her why.)
It's because I want to see my mom laugh! She looks really exhausted.
I want to be of help too but… $npcName:11004574[gender:1]$ always treats me as a kid…
Can I help you?

Can I help you?

(Ask how she became a leader.)
(Ask how long they will stay here.)
What do you want?

How could you not know that? How frustrating. Listen up since I'll explain. An information dealer knows everything.
(Ask how they can know everything.)
Next to me is the lovely… I mean, that's a trade secret. Anyways! The information gathered with this trade secret is provided to people that need it. Of course, you need to give me something for it.
Your face tells me you have a question. Ask me anything.
(Ask how it's like living here.)
(Ask about the refugee leader.)
Here? Can't be compared to when I used to live in Tairen. Food tastes bad, house is uncomfortable, and I'm exhausted.
If I have to choose a merit, that would be freedom. There's no need to tremble in fear anymore that we might fall out with $npcName:11004575[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$… I always feel sorry towards $npcName:11004574[gender:1]$. We forced her to become leader when she didn't want to. But if it wasn't for her, we won't be alive right now.
I've been waiting.
I've been waiting.
It's uncertain what will happen in the future.
$MyPCName$, always be on your toes.
The mood is dreary. Oh, you look scared.
The mood is dreary. Oh, you look scared.

We're finally here! Good job, kitten. Once this is over, are we going on a date in Kritias?
We're finally here! Good job, kitten. Once this is over, are we going on a date in Kritias?
I was just joking because you looked really nervous. Are you fine now?

Everything is ready. Let me know if you need anything in particular.

I have a bad feeling. You should be careful too.

Don't get in my way, rookie.

Leave the guiding to me.

Hey, you're not hurt, right? If you push yourself because you're young, you're going to suffer later on.

The atmosphere here is different. I feel somewhat anxious.

When I think of the sacrifices we made so far, I now understand why you won't step back.

This is a frightful place. I'm a little scared to be honest.

Is everyone safe?!

I've been collecting information in Maple World and Kritias but… there was nothing. Looks like I need to turn in my position as the best agent in Shadow Walkers. I'm disappointed in myself for not bringing information helpful to my allies.
I think I'm going to faint from shock.
I think I'm going to faint from shock.

No… this can't be… Then what was it that we just saw?

I'm confused. What was it that we just saw?

It's time to report to the Empress.
This is a temporary barrack, but the inside looks like this? Is there no way to take this to Maple World?

I was surprised by the shocking truth, but I can't be here doing nothing. The Green Hoods are on standby. Let me know if you need us for anything.

I'm already worried on how to report on what happened here.
I'm already worried on how to report on what happened here.
Humanitas will not miss an opportunity that is given.
We will drive out the Daemon Army from Kritias this time.
It was a long journey. Thank you very much for the support until now.
It was a long journey. Thank you very much for the support until now.
I don't feel refreshed.
I don't feel refreshed.
You don't seem that hurt. That's a relief.
You don't seem that hurt. That's a relief.
Heheheh…
We've got to hurry!
Savor the moment.
Sniff…
This is all my doing…
I've never met someone as strong as you.
I can take you to the boss if you're lost.
Lead the way.
Sure thing. Right this way.
This place has really transformed, thanks to you!
We're all serious now. You just wait and see. The boss'll make you pay!
Taking down the boss… You're something else, you know that?
The big guy's been training hard for days now. You really lit a fire under his butt, I'll tell you that.
Get away!
This time, the big guy'll mop the floor with you! No way he'll lose twice.
It won't be so easy next time.
You better get ready. The big guy'll knock your teeth out!
Get away from me. I really don't want to talk to you.
There's no way the big guy will lose to such a weakling.
You better prepare yourself.
You better be ready this time. You'll see what I mean when you go inside. Heheheh…
Why are you staring at me?
I just wanted to see you.
I missed you so much!
Play with me.
There's something I need to tell you.

Y-you did? So did I. Ahem.
Now is not the time for such things!
I'm a little busy right now.

Welcome to a fabulous new world of fashion!

특별한 상품이 당신의 선택을 기다리고 있답니다~
The guild could use your help. You will be compensated!
My tasks are perfectly reasonable, I assure you.
No matter how hard, you can overcome any challenge with teamwork!

Complete this simple task, and you will get guild experience, funds, and some experience for yourself, too! Note that you can't start daily quests until you've been in the guild for a day, and you can't start weekly quests until you've been in the guild for a week.

I encountered Holstatt in the Land of Darkness once. He said that Arazaad had kept a secret from us. That the real legacy of our ancestors was elsewhere.
I don't know if he was lying or not. But if he wasn't, then the old records, which only Arazaad could read, must hold some clue about the secret. Something to point us towards this so-called legacy.
No words can express my gratitude. I only hope that I can repay the empire one day.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ can't keep this up for long. It's only a matter of time before we have our revenge.
This isn't like $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ at all. Wake up!
I'm… a bit flustered. I need some time to collect my thoughts.
I'm… a bit flustered. I need some time to collect my thoughts.
In search of $itemPlural:20000045$, are you?
Do you have any $itemPlural:20000045$ for me?
How do I make the crystal react?
Here you go. The crystal should react to this.
Are you lost? Why are you bothering me?
Take me to $map:52000133$.
Just thought I'd pay you a social visit.
$npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ says you're all right, so fine. Off you go.
All right, then. I hope you're enjoying $map:02000023$.
The ancient records of our history must be handled with care. They teach us many important lessons.
Take the $item:20000045$ to the crystal, then press space.
One $item:20000045$ is enough, I think. You don't need any more.
We must uncover the secret of darkness before it claims any more lives.
Send me to $npcName:11003254[gender:1]$.
Has my magic failed? Impossible!
Hurry it up!
I'm trying! Close your eyes. It'll work for sure this time!
There's something… dark blocking my magic. There's no way to get to Ellinel right now.
What's with the sour face?
Hey! You know why they call me $npc:11001545[gender:0]$?
No clue.

'Cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haha! I can't believe you never heard of me. Anyway, you need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001546[gender:0]$ scowls at you.)</font>
Um… Can I help you?
Go back to your corner and practice. I'm busy.
What do you want?
I've heard stories about you.
The idiots here have big mouths. Well go on, what did they tell you?
They say you're impossibly strong.
Strength is relative. If these idiots think I'm strong, it's only because they've never faced true power.
I know a thing or two about strength.
I see. If you're that confident, maybe you'll present an actual challenge.
Not everyone is so quick to believe me.
This one time, I had a match against this bird-man who was on a journey to test his strength. He didn't look much—heck, he looked weaker than most. Nobody took him seriously.
But when he stepped into that ring, he tore through his opponents like they were made of paper. Even I couldn't do better than draw against him. He taught me not to judge a book by its cover.
You think I'm like that bird guy?
Hah! No, if anything, you're more like me. There's a certain electricity in the air around fighters like you and I. Most people can't even sense it. But the strong can always recognize each other.

Of course, you can also be strong without knowing how to fight. The only way to really know someone is to face them in the ring. I don't know about you, but I'm looking forward to our fight. (The air around him grows heavy and terrifying.)
That's the plan… Can't wait.
You have something to say to me?
The people your thugs took, are they safe?

Who knows? The poor idiots are probably locked up somewhere. They don't respect the first rule of the streets: you give back as much as you take. Blackstar wants to make 'em pay up their fair share, that's all.
Why do you care, anyway? You friends with one of those vagrants?
Their friends asked me to look into their disappearances.

Sticking your nose into matters that don't concern you, eh? That's a special kind of stupid. I'd say they better be paying you a fortune, but any friend of those deadbeats wouldn't have two mesos to rub together.
I'm not in this for the money.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001623[gender:0]$ squints at you in disbelief.)</font> You don't know them and you don't care about getting paid?
You're one of those hero-types. That's fine with me. Go off and get yourself killed. One less idiot to get in my way.
Was there something you wanted to ask me?
Tell me about the champion of $map:63000020$.
$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is the champion and public face of $map:63000020$. Over the course of his career here, he's had 47 wins, zero losses, and one tie.
His fights always end the same way: a single punch and his opponent is out like a light. He's built like a tank and moves like a panther. It's no wonder the crowds love him.
You mentioned a tie.
Yes, he tied. Once. His opponent wasn't even human—it was one of those animal men. He used a very strange technique in the ring. It almost looked like magic.
$map:63000020$ had never seen anything like him, and we haven't again since. Even $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ was impressed.
The challenger left as soon as the match was over, mumbling something about being "pleased with the results of his training." What was his name again…?
I'm looking forward to today's match.
What makes you so sure $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s going to win?
I'm not. Anything can happen in the ring. But I know $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$, and I know that he never fails me.
That's because he's never faced me in the ring.
Is that so? Okay. Let's see if your fists can back up your words.
What is it now?
Did you know about $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$'s plan?
Not that I think you'll believe me, but no, I didn't. Even if I did know, so what? It's not my job to stop him.
Then you're no better than $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$.
Listen. My old man and I don't always see eye to eye, but he built Blackstar from the ground up. You gotta be ruthless to succeed in this town, and he's earned my respect.
Old man… You're $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$'s son?!
I didn't tell you? Must've slipped my mind. $npcName:11001630[gender:0]$, son of $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$, at your service.
Slipped your mind. Sure.
Hey, where's it written that I have to tell every idiot who stumbles in here who my dad is? Now, get out of my face before I get mad.
I'm not done with you.
Me neither. I got a feeling we'll be fighting again real soon. And next time, I'll beat you fair and square. No tricks.
I'll see you in the ring.
Count on it.
Agh… My bones hurt…
It's $male:him,female:her$! The Gray Wolf…
It was… over so fast…
C-can't move…
Gray Wolf…
$male:He,female:She$ wiped the floor with us…
It's going to take forever to clean up this mess!
Sigh. $male:he,female:she$ totally wrecked the place.
Did $male:he,female:she$ really shatter this marble with $male:his,female:her$ bare fists?
Who, or WHAT could take down our guys so easily?
Idiots. Gangsters should be giving beatings, not taking them!
My head…
My everything hurts…
Did I get bad intel…?
He said it was in locker 4…
I'm watching you. Behave.
There's gotta be something I can salvage here.
That part looks usable.
Hmph! These clunkers!
They should have contacted me by now…
They weren't caught, were they?
Ah, that's right! The challenger's name was Junta. And that's everything I know about him.
$MyPCName$님, 반갑습니다. 언젠가 도움을 요청할 일이 생길 것 같군요. 에레브 여제의 가호가 있기를…!

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though… I thought you'd be taller.

시간 여행을 계속 하다 보니 이런 일도 다 있군…
시간의 흐름이란…
콩! 콩콩! 신나는 모험! 설레는 보물!
보물, 넉넉하게 넣었다! 하루에 서른 번!
무슨 일이냐?
$MyPCName$, 명심하거라. 한번 맺은 인연은 돌고 돌아 다시 만나게 되는 법… 아무리 하찮고 다시 보게되지 않을 것 같은 존재 앞에서도 늘 신중하게 행동하거라.
음…
수련에는 끝이 없는 법!

집… 중. 집중… 집중~
……. <font color="#909090">(대답을 할 생각이 없어 보인다.)</font>
하암… 하아암
분명히 여기 어딘가에 있을 텐데….
내 말을 믿지 않는 이들 뿐이었지만… 이젠 나와 함께 설표의 발자취를 찾는 사람이 생겼지. 하지만, 기쁘지만은 않아. …$npcName:11004669[gender:0]$, 저 아이는 행복했으면 좋겠어.
분명히 있을 거야…!
이곳도… 정말 아름답네요. 모래폭풍만큼이나 짙고, 어둡지만… 그래도.
이젠… 물러서지 않아
반드시 찾을 거예요. 모래폭풍 속에서 절 구한 그 아이… 이제는 제가 구하고 싶어요.
너의 방황을, 어찌하면 좋을까.
$npcName:11004671[gender:1]$…
신이시여, 어떻게 해야 할까요
괴로워…
머리가… 아파
아… 조… 르
빛나는 것들은 많아… 하지만 모두 진짜는 아니야.
돌아가고 싶어, 언젠간…
후… 허탕인가.
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001431[gender:0]$$pp:가,이$ 고개를 갸웃 한다.)</font>
언젠간 찾을 수 있겠지
Well what're you staring at? Did'ja have something to tell me, or do you just like the view?
Face me in the ring.
Zero losses?

Ah, yes, I've heard of you. Your methods are a bit unrefined, but you have a sense of determination paralleled by only the greatest Knights. It's too bad, we could use someone like you in the Royal Guard.
Tell me about the Royal Guard.
Who is $npc:11000074[gender:0]$?

I sense your fighting spirit is akin to the rage that fuels us Berserkers. A fire that burns within the soul and cannot be quenched! Some advice from one warrior to another: never let your anger get the better of you on the battlefield, or you might wind up dead.
Tell me about the War Chief.
Tell me about Vayar Mountain.

What could I possibly have to discuss with you? You and I have nothing in common. Are you looking for magical body-building tips or something? We of the arcane arts don't waste our time trying to enhance our physical forms, as we know that the font of our power lies within.
I'm simply pursuing my fullest potential, just like you're doing.

Ultimate potential? Suuuure, I can help. Unleash your "ultimate potential" with my patented brew of enchanted smoothies! They can be yours for the low, low price of 1,200 mesos! Pffft. You sound like you've been roped into some kind of scam.
Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court… nor do we care who you are. Our interests lie in more scholarly pursuits.
What do you care about, then?
Do you know what caused the earthquake?
There's another subject I'd like to ask you about.
$MyPCName$, do you believe in… the Light?
I only believe in what I can see.
The Light shines on everyone, regardless of their belief or lack of belief.
What's the Light ever done for the poor of $map:02000100$?

I believe the ordeals we experience throughout life are ultimately blessings in disguise, arranged by the Light. Hardship happens for a reason. I shall pray for you and everyone else. May the Light's blessing be with you wherever you go.
Let's talk about something else.
I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen your path. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.
Did the earthquake cause a lot of damage?
Who is $npc:11000075[gender:1]$?
Let's change the subject.
$MyPCName$, you remind me of an arrow that's just been loosed from its bow.
How so?
Because… you seem like somebody that never looks back, someone who simply moves forward in spite of uncertainty.
It's too bad you've decided not to join the Green Hoods. Still, we'd greatly appreciate any assistance you're willing to offer punishment to those who bear ill will for the people of these lands.
Tell me about the Green Hoods.
Tell me about the criminals.
Let's talk about something else.
Look at my weapons, $MyPCName$. Heavy Gunners use firearms like these. Amazing, huh?
True warriors rely on more than their weapons.
You don't know what you're talking about. My cannon could blow you to pieces in a single second!
And I could break your cannon in a tenth of a second!
That's ridiculous! You know what, you're just no fun. Get lost.
Hm, you're not a Heavy Gunner, $MyPCName$. You know what that means? You don't know how to have fun!
Tell me about that weapon of yours.
What's there to do around here?
I want to ask you about something else.
Stop bothering me. The only people worth talking to are Thieves, and you're obviously not—wait! You… You're…
You know me?
Of course! You're the Gray Wolf! Everyone in the back alleys of $map:02000100$ knows who you are. I didn't think you'd ever find your way onto the world stage. What made you change your mind?
You've got me mistaken for someone else.
Hm… You're a bad liar. Your eyes give you away. But still, it's interesting to know that major players like you have come out of hiding.
$MyPCName$, I can tell you how to get what you want. Oh, wait… I see now you're not a Thief. Well, then you wouldn't even know what freedom is. Just go along your merry way.
Okay, try me. What's freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
I don't want to talk about this anymore.
You're the famed Gray Wolf. Look, let me give you some advice: watch your back.
Is that a threat?
Think of it as a professional courtesy. Your name has been off and on our hit list for some time now.
Are you going to come after me, then?
Not me, no. I'm not foolish enough to tangle with the Gray Wolf. By the way, I never thought you'd come out of the shadows. That's a fascinating development.
This place is making me uncomfortable. I mean, it's interesting, but it's not what I like.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
Let's change the subject.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
You're really going to try it? Remember, you can't increase your chances of success past 30% using the same gear.

Hey, now. If you want to enchant anything to +11 or better, you're going to need a spare piece of gear or two. Enchantments at this level take a little sacrifice. That said, I hear there's an item out there that will let you enchant without a sacrifice…
Ascendant gear?! Whoa! This is my chance to prove my skills!
You want to try a +10 enchant? Ooookay, but don't say I didn't warn you. The success rate is none too pretty, if you know what I mean.
Hey, +10 is already pretty snazzy. Are you sure you really want to push it?
+10 is decent. Do you really need to enchant this further? You're really gonna go for it, aren't you?
You've been lucky so far. To make it all the way to +11? Psh, I know so many folks who'd love to be in your shoes. But hey, you're the boss.
You're really going to try it? If it fails, you're going to lose all the material items. You get that, right?
+12 is already amazing, but you're pushing even further? You're braver than I am, that's for sure.
Whoa, are you sure you really want to keep pushing? +12 is already amazing!
Whoooooa, you're going for +14? I can't tell if you're a fool or an idiot. Hahaha, but sure, we can give it a shot.

Now let's just take a moment here, calm down, and think about this. Your chances of failure during the next enchantment are dangerously high. It would be absurd to keep going. Don't you realize a failure means you'll have to get the same equipment all over again? Think about this.
No, this is crazy. I'm not going to do it, no matter what you say. I'm a blacksmith, and I hate to see good gear wasted.

You want to try for +15… Have you completely lost your mind? No one with a shred of conscience would try this! To risk harming gear that's already so strong… Please take my advice and be satisfied with this gear as it is… which is fantastic, by the way!

Hello.
Did you miss your best friend?
How are you doing?
The desert is always the same—beautiful and desolate. $MyPCName$, how have you been?
I came running all this way to see you.
Things have been nice and quiet without you to bother me.
Ha… I see. I thought I saw a bright light coming from afar… It lifted my spirits.
Do you miss me?
Are you feeling all right? When I mentioned a bright light from afar, I meant the moon. The moon! Not you.
I'll be sure to visit more often.
Sure, you do that. Who knows? Maybe next time I'll even be waiting for you. <font color="#909090">(In spite of his cool words, there's a warm smile on his lips.)</font>
How nice for you. Leave in peace, then. <font color="#909090">(He sighs and looks away.)</font>
My friend? Who?
Have you forgotten our friendship?
Are you feeling okay?
Ah, of course I remember! You and I are friends now. It was just a little joke.
Keep these jokes up, and I'll stop visiting.
I feel fine. Thank you for your concern, but… I was just playing a little joke on you. Maybe you're too naive for such play…
Keep these jokes up, and I'll stop visiting.
I thought this was what friends do! Now you're making me confused. If visiting me is such a bother, then you don't have to do it, you know.
I'll visit you again soon.

차원문에 대해 묻는다.
$item:30001393$에 대해 묻는다.
아, 그래. $map:63000079$ 언덕 위 차원문 말이지. 아무래도 며칠 전 떨어진 유성의 힘으로 생겨난 것 같아.
보시다시피, 나는 계속 시간 여행 중이야. 하지만 내가 원하는 대로 움직이지 못하고 있었지. 기계가 자꾸 말썽을 부리거든. 항상 기계와 씨름하다가, 내가 모르는 시간과 공간에 뚝 떨어지곤 해.
며칠 전, 개미굴에서 기계를 수리하고 시운전을 하고 있을 때였어. 굴을 빠져나오자마자, 커다란 굉음과 함께 유성우가 쏟아졌지. 난 거기 휘말렸고… 정신을 차려 보니 $map:02000064$에 있었어.
내 기계는 $map:02000064$에 콱 박혀 버렸고, 어느새 어딘가를 향해 이동하는 작은 차원문이 되어 있었지. 길을 따라 넘어가 보니… 그곳은 $map:63000079$라고 했어.
$map:63000079$에도 차원문이 생겨나 있었고, 놀랍게도 그 역시 유성의 영향인 듯 했지. 하지만 $map:63000079$의 사람들은 내가 온 길을 이용할 수 없었어.
아무래도, 이 차원문들은 <font color="#ffd200">먼저 열린 쪽에 있던</font> 존재가 아니면 이용할 수 없는 듯해. 나는 새로운 길을 발견했지만… 또 다른 벽을 맞닥뜨린 것 같은 기분이야.
시간 여행을 하다 보면 이 신비한 빛깔의 돌을 얻곤 해. 나도 이 돌의 정체를 정확하게는 모르겠어. 사실 $item:30001393$이란 이름도 내 멋대로 붙였거든. 놀라운 건, 이 돌이 내 기계와 반응해서 동력원 역할을 하고 있다는 거야.
나는 시간 여행자지만, 내가 원하는 대로 움직일 수 없어. 그래서 항상 해결책을 찾고 있단다. $item:30001393$, 이건 지금의 내게는 꼭 필요한 열쇠와도 같아.
시간 여행을 하면서 $item:30001393$을 모으게 되면 내게 가져다 줘. 네게 도움이 되는 걸, 내가 줄 수도 있을 테니.
다 가지려고 하면 욕심쟁이!
서른 번이면 충분해! 콩콩!
수련에는 끝이 없는 법!
집…집주~웅~
……. <font color="#909090">(수련에 집중하는 건지, 졸고 있는 건지는 잘 모르겠다.)</font>
더욱, 알고 싶다…!
더욱, 알고 싶다…!
이곳에서 뭘 하고 있는지 묻는다.
신성하고 비밀스러운… 설표족. 그들에 대한 연구, 그리고 탐색… 나는 절대 멈출 수 없어.
$npcName:11004669[gender:0]$와의 관계를 물어본다.
어딘가에, 분명 있을 거야
너를 잊지 않아
그리고, 꼭 말해줄 거예요. 넌 외톨이가 아니라고. 옆에서… 힘이 되어 주고 싶다고.
꼭 찾길 바란다고 말해준다.
$npcName:11004668[gender:0]$와의 관계를 물어본다.
고맙습니다. 꼭, 찾을게요. 기다려 줘… $npcName:11004671[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11004668[gender:0]$ 아저씨가 제게 뭔가 숨기고 있다는 건, 알고 있어요. …괜찮아요. 절 위한 거겠죠. 그러니 기다릴 수 있어요.
당신은… 차원을 넘어오셨군요.
인간… 우리 종족의 믿음과, 존재의 이유와는 완전한 반대에 있는 그대들이란 존재.
언젠간, 길을 찾을 수 있을까요…
너는 누구지. 어떻게 이곳에 들어온 거야.
네가 날 부르고 있었나. …아니야, 네가 아니야. 그… 녀석은. 으…
날 그냥 내버려둬. 제발…
나만의 꽃, 너…
길을 찾고 있지. …쿡쿡, 말하면 알아?
미안하다고 사과한다.
아하하, 귀엽긴. 그럼, 수고해.
후후, 그래. 그럼 수고해.
흠…
사람 말 하는 것을 들었다고 한다.
언제 봤대, 그건. …너, 다른 시공에서 넘어왔구나?
어떻게 알았냐고 물어본다.
천 년 묵은 여우라 알았다, 왜?
정말이냐고 묻는다.
그걸 믿냐? …쿡쿡. 됐다. 낚시나 하다 가~

Heh heh heh…
Hi there.
So you're an adventurer? You seem pretty strong. Nice to meet you.
Do you believe in the power of the light?

Eh? You…

…What business do you have with me?

I'd be grateful for the opportunity to speak with a peer…
You seem like you're pretty tough too.
You ever heard of the Gray Wolf? Well you're looking at him! The man, the myth, the legend! What do you mean you've never heard of me…
What a wondrous place.
This place is beautiful. Don't you agree?
Hey! I've seen you around Tria!
I'm Surnuny, Tria's best weapons merchant. I came here to trade.
Something's wrong… My fur's standing on end.
Something's wrong… My fur's standing on end.

To think I'd be stuck here, useless…
I really hope Brother Junta and the expedition members get better soon.
I really hope Brother Junta and the expedition members get better soon.

Go away, you bother me.

I'm so very sorry…
I haven't given up yet.
I will restore my kingdom.

Do you have something to tell me?
Are lapenshards really the cause of all this? Just what are they?

What is it, kid? You want to know about lapenshards?
Ugh, I hate field duty…
It's dangerous outside the blanket, $MyPCName$.
Sigh… How did I end up with that one again? We have unfinished business.
Sigh… This one is useless without me. That's why I'm always busy cleaning up the mess. Can't really say whether or not I like it at this point.
It's not like I want to be here. But I've got a debt to repay.
It's not like I want to be here. But I've got a debt to repay.
Don't worry, I'll protect you.
Don't worry, I'll protect you.
Even though everything's going crazy right now, it's reassuring to have you around.
Even though everything's going crazy right now, it's reassuring to have you around.
Ah, you're here. It's thanks to you that we were all able to find common ground and work as one. Terrun Calibre will do whatever it can to help you with the matter of Madrakan.

I'm so very sorry…

I'll do my best to help the queen.
I'll do my best to help the queen.
It's a long walk to the Frontier Foundation. Why not take a carriage?
It's a long walk to the Frontier Foundation. Why not take a carriage?

Would you like a carriage back to Tria?
Since none of Terrun Calibre elders are in a position to leave the island, I decided to come and help out.

The Green Hoods will do their part to purge the forces of darkness from Maple World.

We are ready to head out at a moment's notice.

My master and the leaders of Terrun Calibre will definitely return. Until then, I'll carry out their will.

The siege on Madrakan was successful, but it cost us a great deal.
The siege on Madrakan was successful, but it cost us a great deal.
Losing the leadership of Terrun Calibre was too great a loss.

The Alemani family will devote all of their resources to aid in the recovery effort.
My other half… You have forged a blood oath. I expect you to aid me til the very end.

I'm sorry about what happened…
Just let us know if there's anything we can do to help.

몽슈슈 호텔은 여러분을 환영합니다!
지배인님이라면 잘 해나가실 수 있을 거야
몽슈슈 호텔은 여러분을 환영합니다!
안녕하세요? 블러디 몽슈슈… 아, 아니지. <font color="#ffd200">몽슈슈 호텔</font>을 찾아 주셔서 감사합니다.
호텔 이름이 바뀐 거냐고 물어본다.
그렇습니다. <font color="#ffd200">사장</font> $npcName:11004290[gender:0]$님이 새로운 출발을 위해 호텔 이름을 바꿀 것을 제안하셨어요. 직원들도 모두 동의했고요.
네, 이제 사장님이시지만 계속 <font color="#ffd200">지배인</font>으로 불러달라고 하셨어요. 손님들과 가까이 만나면서 초심을 유지하실 거라고요. 그러면서, 이제 우리 호텔은 할로윈 축제뿐 아니라 다른 명물들도 만들 수 있도록 노력할 거라고 하셨습니다.
$MyPCName$님, 우리 <font color="#ffd200">몽슈슈 호텔</font>을 기억해 주시고 또 놀러와 주세요!
저기 계신 분이라면 <font color="#ffd200">지배인</font>이신 거 아니냐고 물어본다.
Our minds and bodies follow each other in harmony. Consider, the truly wise speak with wisdom, and also act with wisdom.
Have you been training? Answer carefully.
Mm? Yes?
What is it?
What brings you here?
Where did $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ get off to…?
Halo Mountain…
More questions?
Mm? Yes?
What?
What brings you here?
What is it?
Grr…
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
You've grown strong, my hero. I look forward to hearing more great tales of your exploits.
May the empress favor you always.
Do not betray our empress's trust.
So, it's you.
The empress has placed her faith in you.
Your eyes speak volumes about your character, $MyPCName$. I believe I can trust you. We are depending on you to protect the peace of Maple World.
I look forward to hearing more stories of your heroism.
Please remain steadfast in your efforts to protect peace and justice.
$npcName:25022900$… How could you to me…
An envoy from Humanitas? They sent a young person…
Seems like I was expecting something big while hiding in a humble place like this.
$npcName:25022900$ betrayed me. I cherished him like my child… The day that I went on an expedition with a small force, he lied in ambush and attacked.
$npcName:11004619[gender:0]$ and I barely survived, but $npcName:25022900$ already seized Kharon when we returned.
He announced that I betrayed the group and fled. When he said that he will increase the loot given to everyone, they all went over to his side.
I worked my entire life for this and it all came crashing down for a few more loot.
(Say that you won't listen to more nonsense and ask what he wants.)
In return for giving you inside information on Kharon, guarantee protection for me and $npcName:11004619[gender:0]$. $npcName:25022900$'s troops are still tracking me.
It seems he wants to erase me from this world. Can you do it?
(Say that you loathe $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$, but will decide based on the value of the information for the future of the exiles.)
Good. I'll take it that you agree. The first information is the location of Kharon's base.
It's at $map:52100114$ in $map:02020067$. I'll send the coordinates by HUD.
If the information is useful, guarantee protection for me and $npcName:11004619[gender:0]$. $npcName:11004619[gender:0]$ will inform you of the next rendezvous.
Now get out of my sight, rookie.
$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$, my life is yours.
Are you the envoy sent by Humanitas?
You're late. Are you looking down on the worth of Kharon's leader?
(Say that someone like Kharon's leader who kidnaps exiles is beneath your notice.)
Impudent… How dare you insult $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$…
(Tell him to give you the leader's location before you change your mind.)
We have only one request. In return for providing Humanitas with information, guarantee protection of $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$.
Can you promise that protection will be guaranteed for $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$ if we give you inside information on Kharon?
(Ask why Kharon's leader is under threat.)
I asked if you can guarantee it.
(Say that it depends on the value of the information provided by $npcName:11004618[gender:0]$.)
…$npcName:11004618[gender:0]$ is at $map:52100118$ in $map:02020051$. Contact secretly without getting caught by other Kharon forces.
<font color="#909090">(The lava is eerily silent, but the heat is blistering. There's an inscription on this statue.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The lava is eerily silent, but the heat is blistering. There's an inscription on this statue.)</font>
Fifteen hundred years ago, a great earthquake gave birth to this volcano. The nearby forests were destroyed, and in the hot springs gave rise to a new and exotic ecosystem.
The basaltic lava from the volcano influenced the weapons and ceramics used by the local population. But there's more to the lava than precious metals…
<font color="#909090">(There's a story about the birth of the $npcName:22000005$ that lives within the mountain further down in the inscription…)</font>
Long ago, there was a lava eye named Round Eye. It was the runt of its clutch, and all the other lava eyes teased it for its size.

One summer, it dived into the lava river under Hotottot Mountain to try to prove that it was strong, but it was swept away in the lava flow. Rather than help Round Eye out of the river, the other lava eyes mocked their stunted sibling.
Round Eye couldn't take it anymore. It closed its eye and let the lava flow carry it away. "Nobody will miss me," it told itself…
As it drifted away, it prayed that one day it would be reborn as a big, powerful lava eye someday…
Round Eye wasn't seen for a long time after that. Soon, the other lava eyes began to realize that it was gone for good, and there was much fiery weeping at the $map:02000039$.
Then, one day, a gout of lava gushed forth from the mountain, followed by an earth-shattering roar.
The $npcName:22000005$ emerged from the chasm, shocking the rest of the lava eyes. And yet, this monster seemed somehow familiar to them… It was Round Eye!
Overjoyed, the other lava eyes asked it how it had survived. Hahoi, the guardian spirit of the $map:02000039$, had heard Round Eyes' prayer and shown pity.
From that day forth, Round Eye and its fellow lava eyes lived happily on the $map:02000039$, working together to lift each other up.
<font color="#909090">(This fountain is built directly into the $map:02000046$. A steady supply of molten lava gushes from its basin.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This fountain is built directly into the $map:02000046$. A steady supply of molten lava gushes from its basin.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A field journal's been left next to the fountain. It has Silver Wolf's name on it.)
For generations, we believed $map:02000046$ was a natural formation. However, I'm beginning to think otherwise…
While scouting out the area, I noticed that the lava flows in a precise circular path. I scouted out the nearby cave systems, and I can find no source of the lava underground.
This must be the work of powerful magic. If that's the case, then whoever did this must be trying to protect something within the Hourglass.
I still don't know why the lava is circling the mountain, but whatever the reason, I'm sure it's important. And perhaps valuable…
There's a lost temple that was used as a tomb for the great chieftains in ages past. Could this actually be the site of that temple? And how does one get inside…?
<font color="#909090">(This big, beautiful sculpture spans the lake at $map:02000038$. There's a plaque bearing an inscription on top.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This big, beautiful sculpture spans the lake at $map:02000038$. There's a plaque bearing an inscription on top.)</font>

The "Rainbow Bridge" is the final work of Mandy, the genius architect responsible for the design of numerous famous buildings. Its purpose, and the significance of its design may never be known, as construction didn't start until after her death.
The fact that the arch was constructed with such unusual materials—and that it is called a bridge despite functioning more as an obstacle than a pathway—are hallmarks of Mandy's famed eccentricity.
Local legends tell of a portal to a magical land on the shore below the bridge's construction site.
Whether you find this portal or not, we hope you enjoy the beautiful scenery here on the Rainbow Bridge.
Tch! Don't tell me I got caught… Your senses are sharp, I'll give you that.
Why are you hiding here?
This place, the $map:02000262$, was created by us, the luditionists. I'm taking a quick peek to ensure everything is running smoothly. And by smoothly, I mean with lots of exciting incidents.
A world without incidents is boring, hmm? We don't want a boring world.
What does a luditionist do?
Hush, now. Don't ask too many questions or you'll get hurt. Let's just say that we're trying to make things more fun.
<font color="#909090">(The bubbling water behind this statue is just the right temperature. There's a plaque on the totem.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The bubbling water behind this statue is just the right temperature. There's a plaque on the totem.)</font>
Dealing with aches? Pains? Fatigue? Skin blemishes? Then take a soak at these world-renown hot springs! A five minute soak in these naturally heated waters is all you need to feel like a new person!
It's breezy up here!
It's breezy up here!
Huh? What do you want?
$npcName:11000367$'s owner is worried…
That's too bad. $npcName:11000367$ and I were meant for each other. It was fate.
How'd you two meet, anyway?
How is that any of your business? Let's just say that Skittle saved me from a really tough situation.
You should just wish us happiness, okay?
<font color="#909090">(This statue marks the final resting place of a great warrior from Perion.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This statue marks the final resting place of a great warrior from Perion.)</font>
Even on the darkest night, the great Guardian of Wolfclaw Canyon fought without a hint of fear in his heart.
Oh, brave warrior of Perion! Death is not the end. Though you are no longer in this world, your heart will be with the tribes always.
Woe is me, woe is me…
Woe is me, woe is me…
Oh… Hey! You! Help me!
What's going on?
Just hear me out, okay? I'm actually a noble from Tria! A mage cursed me to become a frog, until… Well, perhaps you could help me break the curse.
Don't tell me you want me to kiss you.
But it's the only way to break the curse!
Has anyone else tried breaking the curse yet?
Of course. Obviously, I haven't found the right human to break the curse…
Are you really cursed?
That's what my ma used to tell me when I wouldn't eat my flies. The old frog must've taken me in when I was really little.
Ah. Well, I'll pass. Thanks, though.
Don't be so picky. I'll shower you with riches when I'm back in my rightful form! I just know in my guts that you can break this curse.
You keep telling yourself that. I'm out of here.
Where, oh where will I find someone to break my curse? Woe is me!
Huh. I didn't know trees could scream.
Well obviously I'm not a tree! How did you even spot me? I'm here on a secret mission!
You one of Frey's men?
Did the empress send you?
Liar.
I'm trying to keep a low profile here. Can't you pretend you didn't see me and just move along?
You aren't worthy to even speak of her!
Stop blathering. I'm on duty. Get out of here now, before you regret it.
<font color="#909090">(These are the remains of a dragon. They appear to be very old.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(These are the remains of a dragon. They appear to be very old.)</font>

<font color="#909090">(Judging from the skeletal structure, you can tell that this was a distant cousin to the modern girant breed of dragon. It wasn't very big, but its thick jaw suggests it had a powerful bite.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You've also noticed that the fire dogs are steering clear of these remains. Did this dragon once prey on those mutts?)</font>
Ah, it's hot… Even hotter than yesterday…
Ah, it's hot… Even hotter than yesterday…
Another human? Phew. You guys really don't mind this heat?
What's the matter?
Don't laugh! I've got heatstroke. I think. I came up here because it's cooler, and now I can't go back down because it's too hot.
You… do realize you're a fire dog, right?
You think I don't know how weird it is that I hate the heat? Maybe it's because I was born in winter…
I thought you guys needed fire to stay alive.
No, no more fire! I can't go back down there. I gotta shake this heatstroke…
Eating something spicy might take your mind off the heat.
You're just like all those people napping down there. No help. No help at all…
Uh… Um…
Uh… Um…
Okay, I'm just gonna do it. I'm going to ask. Hey, human! Tell me something…
Know what?
What am I? I mean, what do you think I'm gonna be when I grow up?
What do you mean?
Am I gonna be a moth? A butterfly? Maybe a beetle?
You're a beetle, for sure.
Oh, you're definitely a moth.
Hmm. Maybe a butterfly?
R-really? I guess beetles are pretty cool…
Wow… A moth? So the butterflies were telling the truth… I might as well just end it now. Sniff…
That's a relief! The butterflies said I was a moth, but I want to become a beautiful butterfly!
Look at that dumb wormy-worm!
Look at that dumb wormy-worm!
You see that fat little bug over there? Do you think he can become a butterfly?
That's correct.
No.
Pssh! You think that's how a real caterpillar looks? You must have a tiny brain.
Yeah, exactly. Yet that poor creature actually think it's gonna be a butterfly. Can you believe that?
<font color="#909090">(Pressing your ear to the door, you hear some Blackstar gangsters talking.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Pressing your ear to the door, you hear some Blackstar gangsters talking.)</font>
<font color="#f45342">The big party's tomorrow. You get that cake for Haren yet?</font>
<font color="#41f441">I'm workin' on it! That bakery ya sent me to ain't exactly quick. You know they take orders years in advance?</font>
<font color="#41f441">Wait a sec. This is for Haren? I told 'em to put Min's name on the cake!</font>
You what?! Chen's gonna smash my head in when he sees we messed up Haren's birthday bash!
<font color="#909090">(A teeny-tiny scribble written so small, it almost appears to be shy.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(A teeny-tiny scribble written so small, it almost appears to be shy.)</font>
$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s secret, exposed! She actually has a boyfriend! We've been betrayed!
<font color="#909090">(Is the person who wrote this… angry? $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s fans can be scary sometimes…)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Wait. There's another note written here!)</font>
Interesting rumor. If you happen to meet my boyfriend, bring him to me. I want to know what he looks like. - $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$
<font color="#909090">(You faintly make out the cries of a woman. She somehow sounds far away and close at the same time.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You faintly make out the cries of a woman. She somehow sounds far away and close at the same time.)</font>
My child… My child… Where are you…?
Come back to me… Come out of the cold… Your mama is waiting…
(Pay 3 $itemPlural:30000554$ for 1 spin.)
It seems like you're a little short. You need 3 $itemPlural:30000554$ to spin the $npc:11001654$.
…I feel a burning gaze.
…I feel a burning gaze.
Hi there.
Whew, it took me an eternity to find this house.
I go wherever I'm needed.
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
I will too grow up to be a butterfly!
Rain, rain, go away. Go away forever.
Rain, rain, go away. Go away forever.
Oh, a passing adventurer. Why don't you take a break and chat with me?
Okay. Know any stories?
Well, I can tell you your story, if you like. You've been pushing forward without rest. But do you really know where you're going?
What do you mean?
I've been here for over a century. I know many things, including things about you. What would you like to know?
Tell me about my future.
Will I ever find true love?
How did Maple World come to be?
I tell you I know things, and you assume I'm a darned prophet. Ha! Okay, I'll play along. I see much potential in you, my friend. Your future holds many great things.
And what would I know about love? I've been alone my entire life…
Why are you asking me? Didn't someone fill you in when you first started your adventure? Something about two goddesses and the birth of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.

Your face is full of questions.
What happened?
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
Ugh…
Is this how I die…? From… training…?
Ugh…
Focus on your training.
Willpower alone does not make you a knight.
Focus on your training.
This beats the slums, sure, but man…
Listen, I don't really feel like talking.
This beats living in the slums, but man…
What seems to be the problem?
Sigh… Will I ever get to leave this house again?
Sigh… Will I ever get to leave this house again?
I don't dare set foot outside!
Hm… The schedule's tight, but we should be able to finish sector B today.
Hm… The schedule's tight, but we should be able to finish sector B today.
Ah, a new face. What do you want?
What are you building here?
Ah, I see you've got an inquisitive mind. Good. I like it!
We're building a geothermal plant here. Just you wait. In a few years' time, we'll be providing all the power to the nearby towns!
The old… erm, tenants used this place to build a smelting furnace, but they didn't have the know-how to handle this much heat.
Anyway, since this place is basically abandoned, we decided to take things over. If you want to lend a hand, we can always use another strong back or two!
Shh! You'll wake up the other fireflies. No loud noises allowed.
Shh! You'll wake up the other fireflies. No loud noises allowed.
Quietly, now… You're here looking for a quiet place to rest, aren't you?
What makes you think that?
Humans always come here when something's on their mind. Our pretty light helps them feel better! I figured you might be the same.
I can't do a danged thing to actually help you. But hey, if staring at our sparkly heinies brings you peace, then stare away!
<font color="#909090">(This enchanted marker has been warded against the ages. Ancient writing has been etched into it.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This enchanted marker has been warded against the ages. Ancient writing has been etched into it.)</font>
When our world was young, the goddess of light faded away. It became the responsibility of us fairfolk to carry what remained of her work into the future.
The taint of the darkness remained. Without our goddess, it fell to us to seal it away.
Someday, we believe that our goddess will return to us in mortal form. Until then, we wait and stand watch against the shadows.
Ribbit ribbit…
Ribbit ribbit…
Ribbit ribbit… Here we go again… Ribbit ribbit!
Ribbit ribbit!
Ribbit ribbit!
Ribbit ribbit! I might be under a spell, too!
A cold and rainy day, like when we met. His eyes, his love, I never will forget…
A cold and rainy day, like when we met. His eyes, his love, I never will forget…
I see a wand'rer, hail! Be welcome here. This is Ellosylva, the Fairy's Tear.
That's a sad name.
We fairies oft wear smiles bright and hale, but in this rain, I share my pain, my tale.
What's your story?
A human's heart I held in hand, and mine in his. But human lives are short and I was left behind when it came to be his time.
He told me that my song made him think of the rain. That is why I sing here—to remember him. But, no matter how cheerfully I try to sing, it always comes out sad…
Ah… Peace at last…
Ah… Peace at last…
Hello. Have you come here to rest, too?
That's correct.
I see… It's quiet here, isn't it? I love it. All of the hustle and bustle of city life just melts away…
You must have been through a lot.
Everyone has their challenges in life, no? I love my job, but sometimes it gets to me.
I hear you.
I'll be here for a little while longer, just soaking in the scents of the forest. I'm going to get plenty of rest before I go back.
Enjoy yourself!
You, too! I bet you could use the break even more than I could. Everybody needs some rest now and then.

할 말이 있다고 한다.
They can't hang around here forever… can they?
Do you have old enchanted equipment you don't need anymore? I'll turn it into a scroll so you can transfer the enchantment to your new gear!
The people of Perion know that nothing is better after a long day of hunting than a dip on the springs. And best of all, it's free to use!

Once a fairy falls in love, she never forgets her lover, even after they've gone to the place where we cannot follow…
I broke the rules and fell in love. I first met him here in $map:02000042$. It still smells like him…
We were happy together, but it couldn't last. And now, I can never see him again…
It's a beautiful song.
Thank you, traveler. I like to think that he's out there, somewhere, still listening to me. Come see me again whenever you want to hear me sing.
<font color='#909090'>(Is the enchanting business not working out? What a strange turn of events…)</font>
We must harden our resolve.
We must harden our resolve.
($npcName:11004571[gender:0]$…?)
Are you making this up?
I think I remember that.
Live long enough, and you begin to lose perspective on good and evil—right and wrong. The hero of yesterday can become the villain of tomorrow.
I can't say whether the future will be good or bad, but now… for now, you are magnificent.

I like to think that everything will work out for people who live their lives with conviction and purpose. You may not believe me now, but someday you'll think back on this old turtle's words and understand.
That's not to say I've never been in love. There was someone in my life… but she passed away in an accident. I never mustered up the courage to tell her how I felt…
Sorry. I didn't mean to stir up bad memories.
Oh, it's all in the past now. Perhaps, when I leave behind this mortal coil, I'll see her again. It's something that gives me hope, anyway.
I'm sure you'll see her again.

That's kind of you to say. If I were to give you any advice, it would be this—don't follow in my footsteps. When you find someone you love, tell them how you feel. Don't live your whole life wondering what could have been…
The goddess of light may be gone, but the remnants of her power permeate this world. It is up to you to help the empress carry that blessed light on into the future.
How'd you know I'm helping the empress?
Oh, you don't get to my age without learning how to keep your ears open.
You better leave while I'm still in a good mood. I'm no ordinary rock.
What seems to be the problem?
I've got nothing to say to you.
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
This place would've been finished by now if the celebrations hadn't been canceled…
I'm just happy there's somewhere for me to kick up my feet and relax.
Do you have business with me? Hm?
Tell me about yourself.
What do you know about the $map:52000034$?
I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haw! I can't believe you never heard of me. Well, remember me for next time.
Has somebody been tarnishing my good name? It's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, isn't it?
You probably already heard this, but listen anyway. They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Get it?
Has somebody been tarnishing my good name? It's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, isn't it?
Can I help you?
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
This isn't any ordinary warehouse. That much is obvious.
The boss wouldn't have trusted me with this job if I weren't important.
Do you know why I'm called $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$?
No clue.
Yes.
I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! Haw! I can't believe you never heard of me. Well, remember me for next time.

Got to keep my eyes open.
Do you know why I'm called $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$?
You want to ask me that? Right now?
You're no fun. Forget it.
Wh-what? You worried about me? Don't! Look… You're giving me goosebumps!
What's with the intense stare? Spit it out or sc-scram! <font color="#909090">(He's blushing.)</font>
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
What's this information the boss wants?
Ugh… What a headache…
Hm… Did I ever tell you why they call me $npcName:11001680[gender:0]$? I'm sure I told someone, but I can't remember if it was you.
Why do you keep asking that question?
Let's talk about something else.
You got a problem with that? I'm my own man, and if I want to ask the same question over and over again, you can't stop me. Just for that, I'll tell you again!
They call me Bravos 'cause I'm so great I deserve a standing ovation! I hope you remember this time, 'cause there will be a test!
What, you come here to stare at me? Unless you have something else to say, scram!
You need anything, you just call out my name. Not that I'll come running, but maybe it'll give you good luck.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
Who's this $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ guy I keep hearing about? Local cage fighter or something?
If Ereve'd just thrown her party like a good little empress, I wouldn't have to be here now…
You got something to stay, or you just gonna stand there and stare all night? Actually, I don't care. Get outta here.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
There's something off about this place. It doesn't smell right.
This musty smell… terrible.
You need something, go bother $npcName:11001545[gender:0]$ instead. He likes to hear himself talk, and I got real work to do.
What're you staring at? You want a piece of me?
If he shows up, I'll knock his block off.
What's this cold sweat…? Hunger…?
Whatever you want from me, it can wait.

This place gives me the creeps.
Crud. I shoulda gone before we came here.

If that's what you think, then I won't ask any further.

Frickin' Zabeth… Killjoy…
The moment you step out of here, you're a marked $male:man,female:woman$. Capisce?
I have no clue what you're talking about.
That's fine. You go about your business. You leave the thinking to me.
If you got something to say, say it.
I should've taught $npcName:11001631[gender:0]$ a lesson in respect when I had the chance…
I don't care what $npcName:11001631[gender:0]$ says. I call the shots around here, and don't you forget it.
Just when I think these two are unbelievable, they do something to one up themselves.
If you need anything, you can try asking $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ or $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$. I can't guarantee that they'll be very helpful, though.
What's taking him so long…? Huh? What do you want?!
What are you up to?
Wh-what do you think? I'm sorting junk, that's what!
(Stare at him.)
I-I'm not up to anything bad. Really. I'm just…
Wait. You're…
You know me?
You're the Gray Wolf! I was there when you took down those Blackstar goons in $map:02000138$.
You're thinking of someone else.
No, I'm not. You trying to stay off the radar? I would, too, if I had as many enemies as you. But your face has been burned into my brain ever since that day.
Anyway, what are you doing here?
I have business here.
Here? You and the Blackstars are mortal enemies now, right? Wait… you didn't come here to take them on at their headquarters, did you?
Things… got a little out of control.
Y-you really are the terror of $map:02000138$! The equal of a hundred warriors! Y'know, I used to think you were just another thug… Since you're here, maybe there's a question you can answer for me.

I have a, uh, "friend" who went inside their headquarters. He should have been able to sneak out while you kept the gangsters busy, but he's still missing. You didn't see anyone… suspicious when you were there, did you?
Everyone in there looked suspicious.
Yeah, yeah, good point. Ha, I almost feel sorry for the Blackstars, having an enemy like you. Hahaha!
(Say nothing.)
Ha… Ha ha… Ahem. You're a pretty intense $male:guy,female:gal$, you know that? I hope we meet again.
You better be careful. We're watching you.
Remember, that guy's all talk and no action. I can beat him with one hand tied behind my back.

Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.
I need a glimmering Balrog's weapon.
How goes your research on power wavelengths?
I'm a scientist, not a magician. I can't just whisk such things out of thin air. I don't suppose you actually brought me the materials?
As it happens, I did! So, can you make it?

<font color="#909090">(He grumbles under his breath and puts together your new weapon.)</font> Here you go. I only made it because you asked so nicely. If you want it polished up, I suggest you get it to a smith right away.
What's this? Your bag's full! Why are you wasting my time when you don't even have space for a new weapon?
I need raw materials for a job like this! Say, 30 $itemPlural:30000437$ or so. And don't forget the $item:30000560$!
It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.

I don't have time to chat right now. Come by later, okay?
