How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
Feel free to ask me anything.
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing…
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.
They say Runeblades are masters of swordsmanship and magic. Being good at either one is hard enough… How did you manage to master both?

Hey, you're the Gray Wolf of $map:02000100$, aren't you? They say that you're a master martial artist and that you're taking the fight straight to the gangsters! A real champion of the people! You're my hero! Though… I thought you'd be taller.
You've mistaken me for someone else.
R-really? I'm sorry. I always wanted to meet $male:him,female:her$ in person. I guess I just got excited.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$… And $map:02000064$…

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!

사랑하는 이들의 아름다운 마음은 이곳으로 모여 빛이 되고, <font color="#ffd200">7일에 한 번</font>, 달은 그 빛으로 세상을 돌며 어두운 밤을 비춥니다. <font color="#ffd200">달이 빛을 담는</font> 기적의 밤, 바로 그때가 <font color="#ffd200">일곱 번째 달밤</font>이랍니다.

세상에 차오른 사랑이 많을수록, 이곳에 모여든 빛이 찬란할수록 달은 밝게 빛날 겁니다. 그리고 <font color="#ffd200">사랑의 섬</font>으로 향하는 다리가 열리지요. 유일하게 별빛이 닿지 않는 그곳에서라면, 우리는 만날 수 있습니다. <font color="#ffd200">일곱 번째 달밤</font>은 <font color="#ffd200">우리의 하나뿐인 희망</font>인 겁니다.
그 생각을 안 해본 건 아니지만… 큰 문제가 있었습니다. 이곳의 <font color="#ffd200">물</font>은 아주 차갑고 깊습니다. 특히 달빛이 사라졌을 때는요.
저쪽에 징검다리가 있는 것 같다고 말해준다.
그건 압니다… 건너 보려고도 했죠. 하지만, 다리가 오르락내리락할 때 물에 빠져 죽다 살아났답니다. <font color="#ffd200">까치</font>와 <font color="#ffd200">까마귀</font>들이 아니었다면 전 이 세상에 없었을 겁니다.

그래서 별님들이 저희에게 벌을 내리셨어요. <font color="#ffd200">별빛 아래</font>에서는 둘이 만날 수 없도록…
그럼 낮에 만나면 되지 않느냐고 묻는다.
별님들이 너무하는 것 같다고 한다.
저와 $npcName:11004099[gender:0]$$pp:는,은$ <font color="#ffd200">별</font>에서 태어났어요. 별의 아이들은 별빛이 가리키는 길을 따라서만 움직여야 하지요. 그래서 별이 나와있지 않은 곳엔, 저희는 갈 수 없어요.
하지만 이곳, <font color="#ffd200">$map:63000062$</font>에 <font color="#ffd200">달빛</font>이 가득 찬다면… 잠시나마 별님들의 눈을 피해 자유로워질 수 있게 될 겁니다. <font color="#ffd200">일곱 번째 달밤</font>만이 유일한 희망이지요.
잘못했으니 벌을 받는 건 어쩔 수 없죠, 뭐. 하지만 너무 오랫동안 못 만나고 있어서 속상해요. 우리 잘생긴 $npcName:11004099[gender:0]$ 얼굴 잊어버릴까봐…

Do you want to empower your gear and become even stronger? Then trust me with your choicest items! I only accept armor at level 50 or above!

Excellent choice of gear! Now all you have to do is select an empowerment catalyst. Then we'll be good to go. Empowerment crystals can be crafted through the smithing life skill. They can also be purchased from Taroz the Battle Sim Operator at the Hall of Heroes. If you're in a high-level guild, you can purchase them from Tien, the empowerment Material Merchant at your guild house.
Empowerment shall begin!
Go ahead! Check to see how much stronger you are. I think you'll be quite pleased!
Don't waste my time. $map:02000051$ doesn't need the likes of you.

What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?

I don't know, exactly. I heard we were gonna set up a base of operations in $map:02000001$, but there were problems with the construction. Eventually we gave up on the building, and… Well, take a look around you.
Blackstar is moving in on $map:02000001$?
You really have no idea how big Blackstar is, do you? Every gangster in the underworld is connected to it one way or another. Gray Wolf or not, you can't take it on by yourself.
Let's talk about something else.
Yeah, what do you want to talk about?
What's your standing in Blackstar, exactly?

Isn't it obvious? There's a reason I'm always picked for the best missions. The boss trusts me. I'll be an officer in no time, and then idiots like $npcName:11001686[gender:0]$ will have to do whatever I say.
How are you feeling?
Yeah, what do you want to talk about?
What was that clone in the video?
Beats me. I never saw it before. This is a messed up thought, but could you imagine having 100 $npcNamePlural:11001688[gender:0]$ running around? Ugh, just having one of him is too much.
How are you doing?
That place before… You could feel the fighting spirit in the air! This place, on the other hand… Words don't do it justice.
What's your rank in Blackstar?
I'm a henchman, plain and simple. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$ has big ideas about moving up in the organization, but I don't care what they call me as long as I get to bash heads in.

Boss. Lackey. It doesn't matter. All that matters is how strong you are. $npcName:11001678[gender:0]$ can try to rise as much as he wants, but he's got a glass jaw. A weakling like him just ain't officer material.
Were you worried about $npcName:11001679[gender:0]$?
Wh-who's worried? Stop talking nonsense, or I'll beat the stuffing outta you!
What was that clone in the video?
I don't know if it was a clone or just someone who really looks like $npcName:11001680[gender:0]$. And I don't want to know. Now stop making me think about it.
You look a bit on edge. Why not let your hair down and have a drink at the Penguin Bar?
How'd you like to use a Golden Bell Ticket? It's a chance to buy a round of drinks for people at the Penguin Bar!
Buy it for 1,000,000 mesos.
<font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>, what a fine, fine person you are! Thanks to you, everyone will get a free drink! Just ring the golden bell next to you.
It's <font color="#ffd200">1,000,000 mesos</font> for a Golden Bell Ticket. Do you not have enough mesos? Then I'm sorry, you can't ring the bell.
Stay as long as you want. That's what places like this are for.
Gray Wolf…
How about this. You know why they call me $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$?
No clue.
Yes.
I heard your real name is Brav-gross.
Ahem! I don't know where you heard that, but it's a dirty lie. $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is my name, and $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is who I am. Now get outta here, before you make me mad!
I heard your real name is Brav-gross.
Ahem! I don't know where you heard that, but it's a dirty lie. $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is my name, and $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ is who I am. Now get outta here, before you make me mad!
How big is your organization, really?
Why do you care? That's none of your business. Now, I'd say that's enough stupid questions out of you.
How should I know? It wasn't my operation. I don't even know where they are. I know you made some sorta deal with the boss, but let me give you some advice anyway: don't do anything stupid.

What I wanna know is why you're going along with whatever the boss says. A strong fighter like you could take Blackstar for $male:himself,female:herself$ if $male:he,female:she$ wanted. Maybe you just don't have the guts.
I'm just afraid for their safety.
Yeah, sure you are. And that's the only reason you wanna know?
I lost the match. I'm honor bound to work with him.
You're a bigger fool than $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$. Well, I guess I can't hold it against you if it means you're working with us instead of against us.
What do you know about the $map:52000034$?
What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?
What do you want to hear? Tales of my exploits? The names of punks I beat to a bloody pulp?
How did you get the name "Zabeth?"
Wh-why do you want to know? Did $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$ put you up to this?
Ahem! Don't listen to that fool. My name is Eliza—
I-I mean, it's $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$! Just $npcName:11001682[gender:0]$, got it?!
Your name is Eliza-what?
Quit it with the stupid questions! It's none of your business!

Is that what this place's called? I didn't know that. I don't care, neither. I just want to get back to base. I belong at $map:63000020$, watching over the fighters. This town doesn't hold a candle to the excitement of the ring.

I got no idea who you're talking about. Ask $npcName:11001674[gender:0]$. Now, the one I'm interested in… is you. They say you're the Gray Wolf. I don't buy it, 'cause why would the Gray Wolf work with the boss? Gray Wolf or not, you could fight your way to the top of Blackstar if you wanted.
My code of honor wouldn't allow that.
Code of honor! That's rich. Sounds like you're too much of a coward to take on Blackstar. Can't blame you, though. I wouldn't want to fight me, neither.
(Raise your fists.)
Uh…! D-did you hear that? M-my stomach's calling. I better go home and… and turn it off…
Was there something you wanted to ask me?
What do you make of my arrangement with $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$?
What happened to the vagrants Blackstar took hostage?
To be honest, I don't know why that man—I mean, the boss—keeps you around. The things he's asked you to do…
…could be done by anyone.
Yes. Easily. And you don't even like him. So why does he have you do it?
I think I know the answer to that.
Oh?
He's trying to tame me.
Maybe, but can you be tamed? My peers may think you're harmless, but I see a wolf that's taken care to hide $male:his,female:her$ fangs and claws.
If you're worried about their safety, well, that all depends on your cooperation.
I don't understand why you allow the boss to walk all over you. You have no obligation to him. Blackstar is big, but you…
I lost the match. I'm honor bound to work with him.
You say that, even knowing that the fight was fixed? Incredible. You're the most loyal, honorable, and… frustratingly righteous person I've ever met.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
I've learned a new lesson from $npcName:11001629[gender:0]$.
Let's talk about something else.
Welcome! Pay 1 $item:30000869$ to spin $npc:11003472$!
Welcome! Pay me 5 $itemPlural:30000869$, and I'll let you spin the $npc:11003472$. How about it? Feeling lucky?
Pay 5 $itemPlural:30000869$ to spin once.
Pay 50 $itemPlural:30000869$ to spin continuously.
Pay 500 $itemPlural:30000869$ to spin continuously.
Spin the roulette for a chance to win great prizes! Come on, you know you want to!
May Lady Luck blow you a kiss, $MyPCName$!
You don't have enough coins. Therefore, you need 5 <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:30000869$</font> to spin $npc:11003472$ once.
To take a spin on the $npc:11003472$, you need 5 <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:30000869$</font>. Clear the event dungeon to get $itemPlural:30000869$!
If you have $itemPlural:30000869$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:02000064$!
All right, let's spin it 10 times in a row! Keep your fingers crossed, $MyPCName$!
Roulette spin number $rouletteCurrent$! Good luck!
All right, let's spin it 100 times in a row! Keep your fingers crossed, $MyPCName$!
Roulette spin number $rouletteCurrent$! Good luck!
Ah, Gray Wolf. You have business with me? If you're looking for the $map:2000216$, you've come to the right place.
What's the $map:02000216$?
I'm curious about Blackstar.
I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it. This is a place that services people with extraordinary taste. Our clientèle does not typically mix with rough-and-tumble fighter types.
I'll have to check what items I have that are suitable for your skills. Are you looking for something in particular? Or do you have a rare item that you'd like to sell?
I don't care either way. The products here are incomparable to those available in $map:2000100$. Heh.
Simply talk to the traders here to browse their wares or sell your items on the $map:2000216$. They'll do their best to help you. Probably.

Keep in mind that the only place to trade epic and better items is the $map:2000216$. And if you try to secretly trade such items without us, we'll know. You may be the famous Gray Wolf, but this is our field of expertise.
Now, if you'll excuse me…
I'm telling you this for your own good. A place like this draws a lot of attention. Even now, agents from many organizations are watching us.
Not many people recognize you as a threat. But if you keep asking questions like that, they'll start to take notice. You don't want that. Understand?

You may not be Blackstar's biggest fan, but not everything it does is bad. The $map:2000216$ has drawn adventurers and traders from all over Maple World. I'd say that it's single-handedly put $map:2000100$ and $map:2000135$ on the map.
The people of $map:2000100$ are thankful for what we've done for the community. So I suggest you keep your opinions about Blackstar to yourself while you're here.
You have something to say to me?
You have something to say to me?
Hah… I can barely breathe…
Mm? Yes?
Tell me about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.
You've come to the right man. What do you wanna know?
Does $npcName:11001618[gender:0]$ get along with $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$?
Maybe you didn't know this, but $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is the boss's son. Heir to the kingdom, though you wouldn't know it to talk to him. All the officers sure seem to like him, though.
And why is that?

You ever meet a boss's kid before? You know the type. Throws his daddy's weight around. Makes all the company goons do whatever he says. Well, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ ain't like that. He doesn't care about power or money. So why wouldn't they like him?
And what does the rank-and-file think?
$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is our hero. His pop's the head honcho, but $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ didn't ever get nothing that he didn't earn with his own two fists. A real man's man, you know?
Let's talk about something else.
Tell me about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.
Yeah? What do you want to know?
I want to know about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$'s fighting style.
What're you asking me for? You're the one who faced him in the ring! I told you he'd take you out with a single punch, didn't I? Ha!
How does $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ train?
Trying to figure out how he got so strong, eh? I think he was just born strong. I hear he never slacks off on his training, but no amount of training makes you as tough as he is.

He's got a 30-step routine he goes through every single day. Enough to give a normal man a heart attack, they say. Some of the other lunks in the organization tried it, and they all passed out foaming at the mouth.
What's the routine?
It's nothing special, really. 4,000 knuckle push-ups, 1,000 finger push-ups, 5,000 sit-ups, 5,000 squats, 200 laps around the track… That sort of thing.
He uses sandbags and chunks of meat as punching bags, and he lets others whale on him to toughen him up. There's no secret to his training. He's just that tough.
Let's talk about something else.
Tell me about $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ is truly a magnificent beast. It's not just that he's strong—he is completely and utterly fearless.
What does he have to fear? His dad is the boss!

Of course you would assume that $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ gets special treatment because of his father. But, in truth, it's $npcName:11001618[gender:0]$ who is lucky to have $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ for a son.

When Blackstar was first started, it had many enemies. Hardly a day passed when someone didn't try to take the boss's life. But $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ watched over $map:02000100$ like a hawk, keeping his father safe and eliminating our enemies one at a time.
He won't take credit for it, but there would be no Blackstar without him. And yet, some people still grumble that he acts too cocky for a brat who merely happened to be adopted by the boss.
Wait, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ was adopted?
I don't know the details. All I know is that the boss brought home this ten-year-old boy one day and treated him as a son. He couldn't possibly be the boss's real child.

Whatever their story is, $npcName:11001547[gender:0]$ doesn't seem to care about his birth or his position in Blackstar. Most of us respect and admire him, and those who don't are too cowardly to speak up.
Let's talk about something else.
How may I help you?
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
If you have any questions about the Shadow Expedition, I'd be happy to help you.
What's the Shadow Expedition?
What traits can I get from the expedition?
What are $itemPlural:90000018$?
The $map:02000001$ Guard commissioned the Shadow Expedition to investigate and weaken the darkness that welled up behind this huge gate.
Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ extends his personal invitation to adventurers like you. Explore the darkness, uncover its secrets, and halt its spread.
Do you have any more questions?
What traits can I get from the expedition?
What are $itemPlural:90000018$?
Thanks for the information.
The expedition grants you special traits that you can wield when in the dark places at the end of this passage. Only experienced expeditionists can benefit from these traits.
Learn the traits and activate them before entering the darkness. You can also use $itemPlural:90000018$ to upgrade your traits.
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Shadow Expedition?
What are $itemPlural:90000018$?
Thanks for the information.

As you explore the darkness, you'll find $itemPlural:90000018$. You can use them to learn and upgrade your expedition traits, which will help you survive in this place. As you clear greater difficulties, you'll be able to carry more of these.
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Shadow Expedition?
What traits can I get from the expedition?
Thanks for the information.
My pleasure. If you ever have any more questions, I'll do my best to answer them.
Jump from one floaty to the next for a boost!
Don't fall in the pool, or you'll lose your boosts!
Jump from floaty to floaty with your friends!
No! No! I hate losing!
내 사랑… $npcName:11004100[gender:1]$…!
기적이 일어났어…!
사랑의 섬이 열리는 <font color="#ffd200">신비로운 일곱 번째 달밤…</font> 그 기적을 불러와주셔서 고맙습니다.
이제 행복할 일만 남았다며 축하해준다.
네, 행복한 오늘을 마음껏 즐기겠습니다. 비록 이 밤이 지나면 다시 우리는 헤어지겠지만… 이런 기적의 순간을 만난 것만으로도 행복합니다.
그게 무슨 소리냐고 묻는다.
아… 그건, 오늘 밤이 지나면 달님이 다시 여행을 떠나기 때문이죠. 별빛이 강해지면 저희는 다시 떨어져 있어야 한답니다.
힘내라고 위로해준다.
괜찮습니다… 그래도 이 만남의 순간이 있음에 행복해요. 고마워요, $MyPCName$님. 이 은혜, 저희는 절대 잊지 않겠습니다.
$npcName:11004099[gender:0]$… 내 사랑…
정말… 꿈만 같아
$MyPCName$님…! 이게 <font color="#ffd200">꿈</font>은 아니겠지요…? 한번, 저를 좀 꼬집어 주실래요?
$npcName:11004100[gender:1]$의 손등을 꼬집어 준다.
아얏…! 정말 꿈이 아니네요. 너무 기뻐요.
아팠다면 미안하다고 말한다.
아이 참, 아니에요. 제가 부탁한걸요. 이 <font color="#ffd200">기적</font>을 불러와주신 건 모두 $MyPCName$님의 힘인데, 미안하다는 말씀을 왜 하세요!

비록 하루뿐이지만, <font color="#ffd200">만남의 순간</font>이 온 것만으로도 너무 행복해요. 이게 다 $MyPCName$님이 애써 주신 덕분이에요. 참, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004102$</font>님이 <font color="#ffd200">특별한 선물</font>을 준비한 것 같던데 꼭 받으시고요.
고마워요, $MyPCName$님. 저도, $npcName:11004099[gender:0]$도 이 은혜는 절대 잊지 않을게요.
항상, 내 사랑 생각 뿐이야.
항상… 내 사랑 생각 뿐…
I can't give you the mission yet… you're not ready.
I serve the darkness.
$MyPCName$, are you all right?
I sense the war chief at the top of the hourglass. And yet… something is amiss.
I sense the war chief at the top of the hourglass. And yet… something is amiss.
We've got to act fast!
We've got to act fast!
Welcome, $MyPCName$, my soulbond.
$MyPCName$, my kin, you've come.
I am dutybound to protect the young mistress.
For the lady, I would sacrifice anything.
Hah… Well, that opened up a can of worms.
This had better be important.
We'll always do our best.
I'll do whatever I can to aid you.
I'm ready for anything.
The Green Hoods are always ready.
Talk to me whenever you need assistance.
Our knights always do their utmost.
Focus on the task ahead.
If you have something to say to me, say it now.
I am ready to leave at a moments notice.
Guidance has been retasked toward the recovery of Lapenshards.
Hmm… Did you need something?
Sounds like you've got an important mission! I'm sure you'll succeed!
I have no time for nonsense.
Isn't there someone else you could be bothering?
All's well!
All's well!
Nothing to report, $male:sir,female:ma'am$.
To suddenly appear in a place like this…
If I see anything unusual, I'll report in right away!
The blast area was pretty big…
I've got a mission to complete.
You have our full support.
I'm helping $npcName:11004108[gender:0]$ research the blackshard.
I'd say you yourself are worth studying, after surviving an explosion of this magnitude.
I'll let you know if I detect any unusual movement inside the blast radius.
See something, say something!
What an ominous place… If $npcName:11004110[gender:1]$ didn't need us, I'd keep my distance.
Just how big was the explosion?
What an ominous place… If $npcName:11004110[gender:1]$ didn't need us, I'd keep my distance.
Just how big was the explosion?
The road to victory is paved with good intel.
I've never seen anything so spooky.
I'm here to assist $npcName:11004109[gender:0]$.
Have you seen anything out of the ordinary?
…N-nothing to report!
Y-you're talking to me?
Hmph… To think I'd be stationed in a place like this in my twilight years…
So… tired… When's the next shift change?
I'm sorry I made you worry…
I'm not sure how I can face everyone…
I'm still confused.
I'm so lost…
My head hurts…
Just what did we see in the darkness…?
My mind is somewhere else today.
It's a tad noisy here for my tastes.

At last… The prophecy comes to pass…
The long night descends upon us…
Finally, you have arrived.
You summoned me?
Indeed. Your training has brought you to an important crossroad. According to our traditions, it is time for you to set out on a journey to test your skills in the outside world.
However, the presence of this terrible darkness must be dealt with first. We can discuss your training later.
There are three secrets to unbeatable strength: training, training, and training.
Train as if there is no tomorrow. If you don't, then there may not be.
Get to the point.
I want to know the secrets of animus.
Tell me about last year's incident.
Why aren't there more students of Guidance?
Knowledge is just as important as strength. For that reason, I will answer your questions, no matter how stupid they are. Don't make me repeat myself.

Animus is both the core philosophy and the energy developed by the Lone Spirit, who founded our order long ago. When you become one with nature, you can harness this energy and turn it into martial power.
The outsiders wield a similar force that they call magic. Animus is more powerful, of course, but it takes years of dedicated training to master. <font color="#909090">(He eyes you coolly.)</font>
The master and I were traveling the Land of Darkness on a training journey when we heard a series of explosions. We followed the sound and found you, dying.
The master refused to let you die. He channeled his animus into you so that you would live. Do you understand what that means?
No.
Yes.
If you don't understand your roots, you will never know wisdom. If you don't show gratitude, you will never know humanity. And you… You know neither. So just listen and nod.
I begged him not to, but he gave you a portion of his power. He didn't simply heal you… he transferred his animus into you. Animus developed over centuries of training.
I don't understand why the master was so determined to save you, but your life is his now. The only way to repay him is to train as hard as you can and become a great student of Guidance.
If you knew that, maybe you wouldn't have slacked off in your training so much! Did you really think I wouldn't notice? You need to put your all into it!
There is only you, myself, and $npcName:11001699[gender:1]$. Does it bother you that there are only three of us?
When I joined Guidance, there were quite a few students. In its heyday, the mountain was teeming with them.
Where did they all go?

They left for various reasons. Some thought the training was too hard. Others left to join the world of humans after their training journey. A few only wanted to learn some simple tricks, and left as soon as they'd done so.

A few of our former students created their own group in the outside world. If they couldn't make it here, I doubt they'd have much success on their own. They certainly wouldn't hold to our values of integrity and righteousness…
What did they call themselves? The Blackwinds? The Jaw Smashers? Something insane like that. Let their mistakes be a reminder to stay on the path of training.
Nothing like slipping away to my room for a little rest!
If I go outside, $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ will make me train more…
What do you need? Maybe I can help.
I had a strange dream…
I want to know more about Guidance.
How long was I out?
Tell me about the master.
That would explain all the mumbling. It wasn't… the dream, was it?
No… It was different this time…
That's a relief! I think I'd go crazy if I kept having nightmares about being chased by some mysterious figure.
I dreamed about the first time I met the master and $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$.
That's the earliest memory you have, isn't it? It must have made a real impression! And why not? The first time I met you also left an impression.
Not a bad impression, I hope!

No, no, not bad, just… startling. The members of Guidance have always been animal folk, at least until you came along. I never expected to see the master and $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ return to Halo Mountain with a bloodied human in tow.
I was sure the master would boot you back out as soon as you were walking again. Instead, he took you on as his student. $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ sure wasn't happy about that…
For thousands of years, Guidance only ever accepted animal folk into its fold. It was specifically founded by the great Lone Spirit to help us reach enlightenment.

But that was long ago, and the Lone Spirit's philosophy has surely evolved over millenia of teaching and study. Besides, Halo Mountain is practically empty now, so I say it's time we started accepting more members… including humans like you.
Before you came along, it was just the master, $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$, and me. But with you, we're now a happy family of four.
Where did all the students go?
Some finished their training and left with the master's blessing. Some left to live with the humans. But most of them couldn't handle the training and gave up.

Regardless of the reasons, we still consider all of them members of Guidance. Well, almost all of them. Some of them started their own group devoted to money and power, not enlightenment. We're not on good terms.
Half a day, maybe? $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ was pretty moody about it, since it's the second time you've fainted on us. He just needs to have more patience with your human stamina, if you ask me.

I don't mind. Taking care of you gives me the chance to relax here and do my antlers. These fairy sparkles take time to get right, y'know. Hey, you want me to do yours? We've got time… if you leave now, then we both have to get back to training…
I'm ready.
Oh, all right. Guess I can't sit around here all day.
Why do you think I fainted?

It must be the animus that the master breathed into you. I've never heard of a human using animus before you, so it makes sense it would be hard on your squishy, furless body. Besides, the master's animus is potent even for us animal folk.
You have a great power inside you, but you're not strong enough to control it. I imagine that feels pretty rough now and then.
I want to know the secrets of animus.

There's nothing secret about it, really. All you have to do is reach unity with nature by disciplining your mind and body, and then harness the energy that creates. The trick is actually doing any of that.
I'm sure $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ would be happy to tell you all about it during training.
Master $npcName:11001556[gender:0]$ is our teacher and the leader of Guidance. He is the fifteenth master to hold the title of Munakra, which means "seeker of knowledge."
Munakra?
The Lone Spirit led Guidance for hundreds of years before he vanished. When the time came, he chose the wisest of his students and bestowed upon them the title of Munakra.

Since then, the wisest student of each generation receives the title and becomes Guidance's new leader. Our master is the fifteenth in that line. And even if we're pretty small now, we still stand thanks to his leadership.

The master makes a yearly pilgrimage to the outside world to help the needy and fight evil. He does it all in secret, too. I think he's done more to help Maple World than any of the Munakra who led Guidance before him.
Maybe I should take a nap…
Where in the world did $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ go?
Did you see that shadow? I wonder if that was $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ skulking around.
I didn't see anything.
Well, I know I saw something! And he has to be around here somewhere.
Come on, $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$. Think!
What's our next move…?
We need to focus… focus…
Is the master really gone?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ chokes back a tear.)</font> The master is fine. He… he has to be…
I failed to protect Halo Mountain.
Our master…
Halo Mountain…
Is the master really gone?
What do we do now?
Who was that?
I doubt we've seen the last of him. His command of animus is unlike anything I've ever seen. And until he returns, I will do everything I can to protect Guidance.
I know that we need to evaluate our options carefully… But all I want to do right now is destroy something. I will be deferring to $npcName:11001656[gender:1]$ for now.
I've never seen or heard of him before. Strange that the master never mentioned him, but it sounds like this Kandura lost the title of Munakra to him and has held a grudge ever since.
The power he wields wasn't pure animus. The darkness tainting it was potent.
If I could control my power, I could have…
…saved him? Perhaps. The animus you possess was honed over centuries of training by one of the greatest masters Guidance had ever known.
And if the master hadn't given you that animus, he may have had the power to stop this. I always feared something like this would happen…
But… I suppose I can no longer humor such thoughts. It is just the three of us now.
Losing him is… I don't…
…Well, you're his legacy now. Conduct yourself accordingly.
I'll do my best.
Don't misunderstand me. I'm not trying to cheer you up.
I don't like you, and I doubt I ever will. But, like it or not, you are my $male:brother,female:sister$ in Guidance. We must work together if we are to overcome our trials.
Whoever they were, I will stop them.
They must have a leader…
If you have something to say, just say it.
Where have you been?
You're hurt.
What are these shadows?

As I said, I saw one of those creatures while checking on the barrier stones. It led me into a trap, which took time to get myself out of. Do not worry… those who laid the trap will be laying no others.
Do not presume to tell me my business! I am the first student of Guidance, and those frail things could hardly lay a… a… whatever they have on me!
I have no idea. They aren't of nature, that much is obvious. And they are organized. Someone is behind this…
Whoever they were, I will stop them.
They must have a leader…
They've pushed us all the way back to $map:63000029$…
What's our next move?
I thought we could handle this on our own, but there are too many of them. We have no choice but to report the situation to the master. He will know what to do.
We shouldn't have let them get to $map:63000029$…
Even with $npcName:11001672[gender:0]$ here, this doesn't look good…
Now isn't a great time to talk!
What are these things?
Whatever they are, they aren't good. Let's focus less on what they are and more on how to stop them.
I feel like I just got here and I already need a nap…
Someone needs to teach $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ about the power of napping.
How can I help you?
$npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ is a tough teacher.
You don't need to tell me that. He's the reason some of our old students left!
$npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ cares about only one thing, and that's training. He expects everyone to keep up with him, and the problem with that should be obvious.
I will say, he has a talent for crushing confidence, and that's important when you get arrogant students. His heart's in the right place, it's just… cold and unfeeling, you know?
If you ask him why all those students left, he'd tell you they were too soft. Even if he's right, he's not helping them by driving them away!
Ugh… I may have overdone it…
I don't think this is over…
If $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ had gotten here a minute later…
Let's talk about something else.
I didn't even realize you were alive at first, you were so close to death. The master tried to cure you, but you were too far gone.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.
Let's talk about something else.

Hello there.

You'd better have a good reason for interrupting my training.
You have something to say to me?
You have something to say to me?
You have something to say to me?
You have something to say to me?
I'm here!
Did you find me?
Accessing system. Confirming credentials…
Foolish bird… He'd better recover quickly.
I'll make sure he's on his feet again soon.
It's good to see you, $MyPCName$. Is there something I can get for you?
I feel much better now.
Now that $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ is better, I can finally get some rest.
Hello again. Is there something you need?
Ugh… I feel… heavy…
Yawn! I could use a nap.
Mmph… My head is throbbing…
It's hard to focus without a good night's rest, you know?
I think there's more going on here than we realize. It's at times like this we have to keep a clear head. Got it?
Come to think of it… Did I take a nap today?
It's so dusty. $npcName:11001557[gender:0]$ really should clean more.
Were your contacts any good this time?
I have this indescribable feeling…
Perhaps this is the energy of the earth…
The more I look at this place, the more mystified I am. Almost as if… it yearns for something…
There's a strange energy about this place.
There's definitely something here.
The artifact must be hidden somewhere nearby. Or something related to it, at the very least.
I need a rest…
Do you mind? I don't want to think right now…
I must focus on recovering.
My training was lacking…
If you have something to say, just say it.
I do not care for this $map:02000001$.
Maybe I needed more time to heal…
Can I stay like this…?
My head is spinning…
If that's true…
Nothing makes sense right now.
If things are to return to normal, then we must stay united. Don't forget that.
I can sense animus in this place.
Nature is wonderful.
Lava and ice… an unlikely, but breathtaking, view. It reminds me of you, $npcName:11001711[gender:1]$, and myself.
If we follow this energy…
Enough talk. We must focus on finding the artifact.
Forget it. Please…
I couldn't do it… I'm sorry…
I'm not telling you a thing. It's better that way.
Can you see me?
I'm here!
Can you see me…?
This place is quiet.
Security systems will be put online if you do not verify your credentials. Failure to connect will require you to re-verify your credentials at the front gate.
Huh?
Huh?
I was worried about you. Let's get out of here.
Nonsense.
There's nothing more to talk about.
So much power…
All this power… I want to test it on something…
Your aura is one of virtue.
All that lifeforce… will you give it to me?
Forget it.
This is nothing.
Sigh, another patient?
And just who's going to treat my injuries?
I pray everyone is safe…
Please don't overexert yourself.
I am dutybound to protect the young mistress.
For the lady, I would sacrifice anything.
Are you here to see the doctor? Do you have an appointment?
Sigh, no time to rest. Too many patients to get to.
I've been waiting for you.
First thing's first. Let's get out of here. Be careful.
I've been waiting for you.
Sigh… You're…
Phew. That was close.
You've made a foolish decision, but I won't stop you. This is who you are.
Hmph. Looks like I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place.
We can't just let you die, now, can we? But you tell anyone I helped you, and I'll finish the job myself.
I don't know if I can do this…
Stop causing trouble! Just… just stop doing anything!
You're as reckless as I remember.
I've been waiting to meet you again.
<font color="#909090">(Someone has left a mark here.)</font>
What is this artifact we're after?
Should we be looking for the master?

I don't know exactly what it is, but supposedly Lone Spirit, the founder of Guidance, left behind a treasure that would grant enlightenment to his true heir. It was passed down through generations… until the eleventh Munakra vanished with it.

Some people think it was destroyed. Others think that all of its power was drained, and it's been placed in hiding until it can recharge. Others say that Lone Spirit reincarnated and claimed it for himself. Who knows which theory, if any, is true?

The only reliable information on the artifact is told through word-of-mouth, so the only one who would really know is the master. What if… what if $npcName:11001559[gender:0]$ came to Halo Mountain for the artifact?
That must be it. I'm sure he said something about an artifact when he attacked us… <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001706[gender:1]$ is lost in thought.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
The master can fend for himself. Don't worry, all right? <font color="#909090">(Even as she comforts you, worry is etched in her face.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
How is $npcName:11001715[gender:0]$?
What do you think of $map:02000001$?
You aren't actually worried about him, are you? He'll be soooo happy to hear that!
I'm not worried! Just… concerned.
Well, he'll appreciate your concern, anyway. I'm keeping a close eye on him, so you just leave him to me.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001707[gender:1]$ stops talking suddenly. She hesitates for a moment, then speaks.)</font> $MyPCName$… Thank you.
What for?
$npcName:11001715[gender:0]$ has always been very hard on you. But you've stood by us through this crisis, when other students abandoned us for far less.
Now Halo Mountain has been burned to the ground and the master is gone. Guidance exists in name only. You have no real obligation to us. Why don't you wash your hands of this whole mess?
I owe the master my life.
Maybe… But I want to thank you anyway. That's all.
Let's talk about something else.
This place is amazing! I've never seen such a big city before. It's loud and crowded and crazy, but I think I see why humans like it here.
I also get why students who completed their training came to live here. It's about as different from life on Halo Mountain as you can get.
So, you think you'll be a city slicker from now on?
No, I don't think so. This place is amazing, but I'll always choose a peaceful life on Halo Mountain… <font color="#909090">(There's a far-off look in her eyes.)</font>
N-no need to dwell on the past, I guess! Let's talk about something else.
How are your injuries?
They are… instructive.
What does that mean?
The best victory is a half-victory. The second best is an easy victory. The worst is a complete victory. Do you know why?
No.
Victory and defeat are meaningless concepts.
I like the victories where I crush my foes.

An easy victory makes you lazy. A complete victory makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.
I may have been defeated on Halo Mountain, but my small victories gave me the courage—no, a reason—to try again.
Defeat is just another part of training. The master said that every mistake is a chance to better yourself. Do you understand now? <font color="#909090">(Junta grins at you.)</font>
Let's talk about something else.
Don't get philosophical on me. A real philosopher once said, "Do not let what you think you know get in the way of what you have yet to learn."
Every concept, no matter how insignificant, has some value. I suggest you listen carefully.

An easy victory makes you lazy. A complete victory makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.
Defeat is just another part of training. The master said that every mistake is a chance to better yourself. Do you understand now? <font color="#909090">(Junta watches you closely.)</font>
A victory like that makes you arrogant, and is almost always followed by a crushing defeat. A half-victory, on the other hand, is only half of a defeat. You have a chance to get up and try again.
Was Halo Mountain your first half-victory?

The world is larger than you think. Even outside of Guidance, there are great warriors to rival my own abilities. There is one in particular that I remember to this day… a champion of a place called $map:02000100$.
An outsider beat you? They must have been a great beast.
Not a beast… a man. And who said I lost?! I'm insulted that you'd think I would lose to a human… Still, this one was my match.
Who was he?
It doesn't matter. I don't even remember his name. All I recall is his long red hair, and the scars that covered his body.
He was too fast and strong to be a normal human. His punches… It was as if he somehow had command of animus. I wonder what sort of training makes a man like that…
Well? Do you have anything to say?
It sounds like he had real strength.

He did. And he got that strength on his own, through hard work. You, on the other hand, are only strong because of the master's animus, and you still faint from time to time! So you'd better train just as hard, understand?
Yes.

We're threatened by the strongest enemy we've ever met. We can lay low for now, but eventually we will need to unite our power and take him down. Will you be strong enough to do your part when the time comes?
You're dismissed.
Let's talk about something else.
Never forget your roots, child.
System Command: Absorb target's energy.
I've been waiting for you!
Why are you here?
See anything interesting lately?
Heh heh… Most humans can't comprehend the importance of my work here. Don't look down on me just 'cause I'm small!
But I can tell that you're more sensible then the other humans. You value meerkat ingenuity, yes? Not a thing happens here that we don't see.
So, what have you seen lately?

All kinds of people come through here, raising all sorts of ruckus. Sometimes they make angry noises at us because they can't get their security deposits back. Once time, I saw the guards drag away a human male because he wouldn't leave the pretty human female.
$male:Which pretty human female?,female:You mean me?$
$male:Lessee…,female:Nuh-uh!$ $npcName:11000515[gender:1]$. You know her? You better steer clear. She's pretty, but she's got thorns!
You see me? You have exceptionally sharp senses.
What are you doing here?
Where's it written I've got to tell you anything?
Just curious.
Come on, tell me!
You may have enough free time to bug strangers, but I don't. Scram.
Let me think… No.
Tell me what you have to say.
Who are those two behind you?
These are my companions. Don't worry, they aren't nearly as violent or nasty as they look.
I feel… sluggish…
Why's that?
Do you know how long it's been since I had a good nap? Ever since we got here, I've been so busy that I haven't had time to train, let alone get my beauty sleep.
Go take a nap now.
It wouldn't do any good. I have to get myself good and tired from training, or I can't doze off. So it'll just have to wait! <font color="#909090">(She gives a cheerful laugh.)</font>
Your informants are little cuties.
Is their information reliable?
I suppose they are! Don't judge them by their looks, though. They've got a knack for gathering information.
Let's talk about something else.
I can't think of any reason it wouldn't be. If you're worried, I'll vouch for them personally. They've never failed me in the past.
Let's talk about something else.
None of us are okay right now. All the more reason to stay strong.
(Nod your head.)
You know, I… Oh, never mind. <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001714[gender:1]$ looks you in the eye, but stops herself from saying more.)</font>
I've given it some thought, but I still don't understand why some of us would leave the master's guidance to live in human cities like $map:02000001$. $MyPCName$, do you like this place?
It's not too bad.
It's too loud for me!
Hmph. If you have time to enjoy the sights, then you have time to train!
Let's talk about something else.
Yes… Yes, it is, isn't it? It hasn't escaped my notice that you've been training hard lately. Don't strain yourself.
Let's talk about something else.
Not all questions require an answer. Some mysteries are better left unsolved. But even I have trouble when to seek the truth, and when to let an issue lie…
What are you talking about?
Never mind. I've just had much on my mind lately…
<font color="#909090">(Your vision blurs and you feel dizzy.)</font>
Connecting to the BeyondLink database… Connection established.
(View Code 0.)
Code 0 Project Hand: Summoning System/Transdimensional Implementation
(View Code 1.)
Code 1 Project Mantra: Narubashan purification rate is normal. Mental and physical changes detected during administration.
(Next page.)

More sample data is required. Out of 100 personnel supplied by Katramus through the Red Cape, only half can move on to phase 2. Conversion to phase 3 requires the restoration of the missing prototype.
(View Code 2.)
Code 2 Project Katramus: Linking $map:03000145$ data not necessary. Code 1 is the highest priority.
(Next page.)
Code 1 Support Proposal: Move Dr. Rokel's project. Given current situation, highly likely that Code 2 will be terminated.

Code 1 Support Proposal: Move Dr. Rokel's project. Given current situation, highly likely that Code 2 will be terminated.
What?
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life…

I'm sorry, but I don't believe you possess the necessary qualifications to join the Royal Guard. The job requires great stores of both fortitude and determination, and it's my assessment that you possess neither.
Tell me about the Royal Guard.
Who is $npc:11000074[gender:0]$?

The rage that fuels us Berserkers is a hot and roiling one that scorches the soul. And I can see it's just not in you. You're just like everyone else… you'll never know what it feels like to be truly alive.
Tell me about the war chief.
Tell me about Vayar Mountain.
Are you still here? I'd suggest you stop wasting my time, before I make you a guinea pig for my magical studies.
Do you know who I am?
What, are you some kind of celebrity to the common-folk? Why would I know anything about— Woah… what's up with your aura?

I didn't notice it while I was busy trying to ignore you, but your aura is like nothing I've ever seen. I sense two opposing forces swirling within you. It's like watching two stupid salamanders trying to swallow each others' tails.

The first energy unlike anything ever described within the Encyclopedia Arcana… It almost resembles the energy of nature, but… it's so condensed. Incredible. I would never have believed a mortal could accumulate so much power in a single lifetime.
And the second is something darker. It's almost feels like… No, that's not possible.
I don't know what you're talking about.
Just what in the world are you?
I have no memory of my past.
Huh? Really? Were you in some kind of accident…? Come closer. I know just the spell for reading memories.
(Move closer.)
Stay perfectly still. <font color="#909090">(She places her hand on your head and begins to recite an incantation. A spark leaps from her finger tips, and your head starts to feel fuzzy.)</font>
I can't see anything… There's a thick purple haze swirling around inside your head, it's obstructing my view.
I don't believe it. Could you really be…!? No, it's better not to rush to any conclusions. I've got to consult with my colleagues. In the mean time, I'll be keeping an eye on you. Please leave now.
Change the subject.
Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court… nor do we care who you are. Our interests lie in more scholarly pursuits.
What do you care about?
What caused the earthquake?
There's another subject I'd like to ask you about.
$MyPCName$, do you believe in… the Light?
What do you mean by "the light"?

The Light <font color="#ffd200">shines on everyone</font>, regardless of their belief or lack of belief. It <font color="#ffd200">guides</font> you through the darkness, keeping you from wandering astray.
No light has ever guided me.
You just haven't noticed it. I can see it all around you, though it is rather dim.

You may not realize it, but that warm light is guiding you along your path. (You think that's a rich presumption. Doesn't this person know that this light has nothing to do with you? Your guide is the Lone Spirit and the Master's teachings.)
Change the subject.
I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen your path. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.
How bad was the quake?
Who is $npc:11000075[gender:1]$?
Talk to $npcName:11000043[gender:1]$ about a different subject.

People <font color="#ffd200">suffer</font> when their daily activities are threatened by crime. We Green Hoods exist to ensure <font color="#ffd200">peace and safety</font>, even though that's a challenge without end.
What about you? Have you ever felt threatened by anything? <font color="#909090">(Memories of Brother $npcName:11001715[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001706[gender:1]$ flash through your mind.)</font>
I prefer not to think about such things.

Fighting crime is only a means to an end. Our <font color="#ffd200">true mission</font> is to protect this whole world from all threats, so that everyone can live without fear. We won't stop until we achieve that.
Change the subject.
You don't have to be a member of the Green Hoods to help protect this world. If you come across wrongdoers, please see to it they're punished.
Tell me about the Green Hoods.
Tell me about the criminals.
Talk to $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ about a different subject.
Look at my weapons, $MyPCName$. Heavy Gunners use firearms like these. Amazing, huh?
Take a look at $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$'s cannon.
Let me tell you about this cannon. It's specially forged in Taliskar… <font color="#909090">(You touch the cannon, and instantly feel cold and dizzy. Her voice sounds like it's miles away.)</font>

Heh, I told them there was only person who could handle this cannon, and that person was standing right in front of them! Heh, heh. It was me, get it? Hey, I asked you a question! Are you even listening?
Hey, what's going on? You look pale. And you're sweating like crazy. Ha, ha, is touching my cannon that exciting?
Hey. What's happening to you? <font color="#909090">(Her cannon brings up images from the nightmare you used to have when you slept in Halo Mountain. You'd better leave.)</font>
I want to leave.

Oh. Well, fine. I was going to show you the awesome things my cannon does, but I guess not. What's wrong with you, anyway? Been traumatized by cannons or something? Wouldn't surprise me, since they're so powerful. They should only be handled by the fearless, anyway.
Change the subject.
Hm, you're not a Heavy Gunner, $MyPCName$. You know what that means? You don't know how to <font color="#ffd200">have fun</font>!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Talk to $npcName:11000046[gender:1]$ about a different subject.
Blah, blah, blah. You're more talkative than you look. Why are you babbling on like this? Curious about something?
Do you know who I am?

What? No. How would I know that? You some sort of celebrity? No, I didn't think so. The only way I could know who you are is if you were from $map:02000100$. Trust me, I know everyone from that place.
How do you know everyone from there?
Clearly, you should be asking who I am. I'm all over the back alleys of $map:02000100$. I know everything that happens there.
Well, let's hear what you know, then!

Right now, the talk of the town is the Gray Wolf, who decided to leave the shadows of society and duke it out with the Blackstars. Word is that the Gray Wolf singlehandedly razed the Blackstar stronghold.

But that's not even the most interesting part. What's really amazing is the Gray Wolf took on the champion of $map:63000020$! Everyone knows the Champ can't be beaten, but the Gray Wolf went for it anyway! Dumb decision, really. The Warrior wiped the floor with them. There's a reason he's called the Monster, you know.
Is the Champ really that tough?

Wow, you really don't know? He's a champion who successfully defended his title 47 times out of 48 matches. And the one time he didn't win, it was a tie. For the 47 victories, he brought them all down with a single blow, if you can believe it.
What happened with the tie?

Oh, it was amazing! The Warrior couldn't land a blow, no matter how hard he tried, and neither could his opponent. They just kept trying until both were exhausted, and it was really tense to watch. Finally, at the end, they were both heaving with fatigue, barely able to stand. Without a word, the challenger turned and stumbled away.
Tell me about the challenger.

I don't know. No one does! See, as if it weren't dramatic enough, nobody could find out anything, except that the challenger was a were-eagle known to some people in $map:63000020$, who of course would admit nothing.
And why would they? That would be admitting that the Champ isn't invincible.
Change the subject.

$MyPCName$, I can tell you <font color="#ffd200">how to get what you want</font>. Oh, wait… I see now you're not a Thief. Well, then you wouldn't even know what <font color="#ffd200">freedom</font> is. Just go along your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
Talk to $npcName:11000050[gender:0]$ about a different subject.
What, do you want to hire me?
Can I hire you?
That depends. There are many things I need to consider, such as how much money you can afford.
You can't hire me for just any sum. Whom do you want me to take care of, anyway? What's the <font color="#ffd200">name</font>?
$npcName:11001559[gender:0]$.
…I'm going to pretend that I didn't hear that. He's one of the greats.
Change the subject.
This place is making me uncomfortable. I mean, it's interesting, but it's not what I like.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
Talk to $npcName:11000051[gender:1]$ about a different subject.
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life…
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life…
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life…
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life…
Not many people know this, but there's a sect of animal people who live in the mountains and practice mysterious martial arts. I've heard legends that they can even bring the dead back to life…
Great work out there today!
I've got just what you need to continue the search.
I'm lost.
I'm not depressed.
On to the next portal! Since you've passed through the gate to $map:02000023$, the portal there will open new paths to you. But if there's nowhere to go, the portal won't work.
You look worried. Go ahead, put your feet up and tell me your troubles.
안녕하세요? $MyPCName$님! 트라이아 왕실에서 모험가님들을 위해 특별한 보급품을 준비했습니다. 바로, <font color="#ffd200">젬스톤</font>과 <font color="#ffd200">루미스톤</font>을 <font color="#ffd200">업그레이드할 수 있는 재료</font>입니다.
왕실에서 공개한 특별한 상자를 이용하면, <font color="#ffd200">준비해 오신 재료</font>로 젬스톤과 루미스톤의 업그레이드 재료들을 만들 수 있어요!
어떤 재료를 준비하면 되는지 물어본다.
희귀한 재료들을 만들어내는 원리가 궁금하다고 한다.

먼저, 몬스터들을 사냥하면 얻을 수 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001187$</font>$pp:를,을$ 모아오세요. 저 앞에 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004215$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004216$</font>에 넣어 에너지 변환을 하면 젬스톤과 루미스톤의 업그레이드 재료를 얻을 수 있답니다.

그리고 에너지 변환에 성공하려면 준비할 게 하나 더 있어요. <font color="#ffd200">젬스톤</font> 업그레이드 재료를 얻으려면 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001188$</font>$pp:가,이$, <font color="#ffd200">루미스톤</font> 업그레이드 재료를 얻으려면 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001189$</font>$pp:가,이$ 필요하죠.
그건 어디서 구할 수 있는지 물어본다.
제가 <font color="#ffd200">판매</font>하고 있습니다. 왕실 마법사와 수호사제님들이 공들여 만들고 계시는 거라서 수량이 넉넉하진 않지만요…. 모든 모험가님들을 위해 구매 수량을 제한하고 있는 점, 양해해 주세요.
$npc:11000075[gender:1]$님의 명을 받은 $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$님은 왕실 보물창고에 잠들어 있던, 먼 세계로부터의 이방인이 선물했다는 이 <font color="#ffd200">두 개의 상자</font>를 활용해 세상의 몬스터들이 가진 에너지를 변환하는 방법을 고안해 내셨습니다.

이 두 개의 상자, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004215$</font>$pp:와,과$ <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004216$</font>$pp:는,은$ 물질이 가진 에너지의 성질을 변환하는 특별한 능력을 갖고 있답니다. $npc:11000601[gender:1]$님은 이 점에 집중하셨던 거죠. 몬스터들의 힘을 변환해, 모험가들이 활용할 수 있을까? 라고요.
에너지 변환 중 대량의 손실이 없다면 가능하다는 결론에 이르렀고, 몬스터의 에너지가 담긴 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001187$</font>$pp:를,을$ 일정한 구조 안에 묶기로 했습니다. 결과물은 누구나 이용할 수 있어야 했기 때문에, 장비에 착용할 수 있는 젬스톤과 루미스톤에 힘을 더하는 재료를 만들기로 의견이 모아졌죠.
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001188$</font>$pp:와,과$ <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001189$</font>$pp:는,은$ 각각 젬스톤, 루미스톤의 에너지에 맞는 성질로 변환할 수 있도록 해주는 구조물의 역할을 한답니다. 어때요, 조금은 이해가 되시나요?
준비할 재료를 알려달라고 한다.
안녕하세요? $MyPCName$님! 트라이아 왕실에서 모험가님들을 위해 특별한 보급품을 준비했습니다. 바로, <font color="#ffd200">젬스톤</font>과 <font color="#ffd200">루미스톤</font>을 <font color="#ffd200">업그레이드할 수 있는 재료</font>입니다.

<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001188$</font>$pp:와,과$ <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001189$</font>$pp:는,은$ 각각 젬스톤, 루미스톤의 에너지에 맞는 성질로 변환할 수 있도록 해주는 구조물의 역할을 한답니다. 어때요, 조금은 이해가 되시나요?
준비할 재료를 알려달라고 한다.
You must be here about this fancy chest, yes? It's enchanted to provide you with the materials you need to upgrade your gemstones.
Go ahead and give it a try. You'll need the proper reagents to open it, of course.
What reagents do I need?
I'm curious about the science behind this.
You'll want some $itemPlural:30001187$, which you can get by hunting monsters. That's the raw material that you will turn into gemstones.
To trigger the reaction, just use some $item:30001188$, and viola!
How do I get those?
Fortunately for you, I just so happen to sell them! I should warn you, though, that my supply is pretty limited. It's not easy to make, you know.

$npc:11000601[gender:1]$ discovered this chest while taking inventory of the royal reliquary. We think it was a gift to the empress from a faraway place. Anyway, it seems to turn the energy of monsters into something useful.
The $npc:11004215$, as we've taken to calling it, can convert all kinds of energy. As soon as she found it, $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ set herself to researching the device.

To her surprise, the chest was even able to take the $item:30001187$ taken from monsters and turn it into gem dust. We agreed that it would be in everyone's best interest to make this device freely available to adventurer's like you!
<font color="#909090">(This $npcName:11004215$ can create gem dust to help you upgrade your gemstones.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Do you wish to create some $itemPlural:20301849$?)</font>
(Create 1.)
(Create 10.)
(Not now.)
<font color="#909090">(Consume 10 $itemPlural:30001187$ and 1 $item:30001188$ to make 1 $item:20301849$?)</font>

The Team Mushroom is a huge organization, you know!
What is it?
The Team Mushroom has people all over the world. You'll find them wherever you find monsters!

Team Mushroom and Dryad Co. don't have much in common. Dryad sells the tools of the pet-taming trade. Team Mushroom is working to protect the world from devastation, and unite all peoples across the nation!
I work alone, but I'll be in need of a partner in the future.

$item:61000005$ and I are training. I'm going to be a great pet master someday!

Tamed monsters are called 'combat pets.' Don't forget that, 'cause it might be on the test!
Do you need more candy packs?
Ever since those hungry $itemPlural:61000002$ showed up, this place has been overflowing with tourists. I actually ran into a childhood friend the other day!

I'm a member of Team Mushroom, but I'm also a freelance pet-tamer.

Not now. I'm on vacation.

My parents ran this store before my brother inherited it. And now he's chasing his dream of turning it into a cafe or something…

Let's get to business.

Where can I get these monster candies?

It's actually a burning volcano. I wouldn't climb it without the right gear. Unless you're lava resistant…?

An aura has no physical form. It's intangible. Still, if you focus hard on one thing, you're bound to reach your peak.
When you focus one gathering one type of aura, you'll feel it build up. Once it's full, it can be placed in a bowl, like water.

얼마 전, 낡고 오래된 책 한 권을 구해 읽어봤는데요. 그 안에 놀라운 사실이 적혀 있었어요.
뭐가 적혀 있었는지 물어본다.
오래전, 어둠에 땅에 있던 작고 반짝이는 조각들이 몬스터들의 옷가지에 묻어 메이플 월드로 옮겨졌다는군요.
그 반짝이는 조각을 메이플 월드의 몬스터들이 무척 탐했는데, 그 물체에는 사악한 힘이 깃들어 있어 악한 몬스터를 더욱 악하게 만들었데요.
작고 보잘것없던 몬스터가 그 조각을 소지한 뒤로는 수십 명이 힘을 합해야만 잡을 수 있는 거대 괴수로 변신했다는 기록도 있어요.
재밌는 사실은 선한 사람에게는 그 물체가 그저 반짝이는 조각일 뿐, 없던 악한 마음을 새로 만들진 않는다는 거예요.
그리고 더욱 놀라운 건, 그 조각들을 모아 하나로 만들면 어둠의 땅의 지난 시간을 비추는 거울이 된다는 사실이에요.
믿거나 말거나 책에 적힌 내용이 사실이라면…
그 반짝이는 조각들이 몬스터들의 손에 있는 한, 메이플 월드는 계속해서 크고 작은 위협에 시달릴 텐데…큰일이에요.
제게 하실 말씀이…?

그거 알아요? 세상에는 말이죠… 이유없이 존재하는 건 아무것도 없어요. 모두 나름대로의 사연이 있는 법이라구요.

Let's all get together and make happy memories!

Climb all the way up the cliff to the north of $map:63000089$ and you'll find a whole heap of golden treasure chests!
It'll be a piece of cake for an adventurer like you. Anyway, good luck!
R-really? Maybe… maybe you just need to find something fun to do? Like… did you know about the treasure chests at the highest point in $map:63000089$?
I don't! How do you get to them?
I don't care!
Waaaaah…
Can't you… can't you just pretend to care? I worked sooo hard to put this party together… Waaah…

Welcome to the Xenon Systems Research Lab. I want to thank you for joining our study. It wasn't easy finding a guild to participate in our experiment, but I suspect you just might enjoy it!
Grar!
Grar!
These creatures are not normally so aggressive.
These guys woke up on the wrong side of the bed!
Boil, bubble, simmer and… glubble!
Urgh! I'll get burned to cinders before I ever graduate to full witch!
Guard the cauldron. Deal with customers. Deal with customers. Guard the cauldron…
$npcName:11000304[gender:1]$, that dratted old bat! Well, at least I don't have to worry about getting lonely…
Who's $npcName:11000304[gender:1]$?
What's with the cauldron?

She's only her exalted fancy-warts, the grand bossy-britches of all the witches! Oh, we were friends once, back in the day. But I wasted my time when she was mastering her grimoires, and… Well, no point regretting it now!
What happened?

This old thing? You see, once a year, a deep shadow covers the world, and all the demons and spirits rise from the netherworld to cavort and caper in the mortal realm. I think you humans call it Halloween.

Anyway, this is the one time of the year when we can get all the ingredients for witch stew! And we witches, we've got to have our witch stew. It gives our magic that extra little OOMPH that makes us so wonderful.
It's a long story. And an ugly one! Instead of nosing into my painful memories, why don't you help me with this cauldron?
Oh oh, what have I gotten myself into in my old age?
It's been a while since I last met a stranger. Hey, adventurer, does darkness still exist in the world?
It's been a while since I last met a stranger. Hey, adventurer, does darkness still exist in the world?

$item:30001092$는 이벤트 기간 동안 접속 10분, 접속 60분이 지나는 시점에 매일 우편으로 받을 수 있습니다. 그리고 모험, 레이드, 카오스 던전 클리어 및 재배, 축산, 채집, 채광, 제작 시에도 일정 확률로 추가 획득이 가능하답니다.
참고로 <font color="#ffd200">$item:33000281$</font>이나 <font color="#ffd200">$item:20301361$</font>을 이용할 경우에는 $item:30001423$를 추가 획득할 수 없답니다.
$item:30001423$는 원정대 기념 상점에서 기념 상품들로 교환할 수 있답니다. 저희 기념 상점은 이벤트 기간에만 한정 운영되니까 참고하세요!
You realize this IS the land of darkness, right?
I see… I guess our efforts haven't paid off yet…
What do you mean?
After this world was created, my kind studied magic here for a long time. We sought to stand against the darkness that everyone else thought had disappeared.
What kind of magic did you study?
Powerful magic! Magic that could drive away darkness! Magic of light, hot and bright! Magic that is not easily accessible, not even to us…
Wow. You're really passionate about this, huh?
We are oathbound to banish the darkness. It is our mortal enemy, and it has tried to destroy us again and again, ever since learning of our existence.

We pushed and pushed to master ever more powerful magic as our enemy, the darkness, grew stronger. But we grew too greedy. Our effort to put the darkness to sleep before the power of the goddess of light ran out… wasted!
Though we failed, we watch over this world still, ever mindful of our pledge to drive out the darkness.
Only when the darkness disappears from this world will I be able to rest in peace…
"That man is the root of all evil!"
"He appeared out of the blue, pale as a ghost. Even my cows were scared of him."

"But I couldn't kick him out. He seemed injured, and I was raised a gentleman. But letting him rest in my fields was a mistake. He pulled out a black bottle, grinned this sick little grin, then poured it all on the ground."
"Everything happened quickly after that. The dark shadow that blossomed out of the liquid…"
"My livestock were engulfed by darkness. They cried out as they transformed into monsters. The fields and streams turned black as ink. Even the people living on the farm became twisted."
"I tried to outrun the darkness, but I sense my time is short. I can feel the corruption of this forsaken ground crawling up my legs, slowly transforming me…"
"If you can read this, flee! Flee at once! This land is cursed. If you stay, in the end, you'll become… like me… IT IS TOO LATE!"

No one important. I'm just passing through.
You're either brave or real dumb, to come all the way out here. Anyway, my name's $npcName:11004252[gender:1]$. I'm here observing.
Observing what?

Observing the movements of $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s army. He's one of the Seven Commanders, you know, and I have it on good authority that he often sends his troops through $map:03000115$ and $map:03000118$.
Are you sure that's wise?
Pfft, I'm not scared. I have family in Maple World, and I'll do anything I can to keep them safe, including marching right up to $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ and stopping him right here and now.
I've never seen you around these parts before. You're not up to any funny business, are you?
Nah, just passing through. What's up with this place anyway?

This place, $map:03000165$, used to be infested with monsters. But it wasn't the castle who cleaned it up, oh no! Let me tell you, it was us folks from the Lumina Liberation Army! And to think, this place didn't even have any roads!
We keep the peace here now. Can't rely on those castle folk, you know?
…You realize this place is totally infested with violent pig-folk right?
Compared to before, this is nothing! I admit it's still a work in progress, but one day soon we'll be rid of all those monsters!

(It's said that the spring was tainted long ago by the blood of the goddess of darkness. It is also said that this spring contains the blood of an ancient turtle. No one knows the truth of the matter.)
<font color="#909090">(Nevertheless, it's probably best not to let the liquid touch you.)</font>
So sweet! So very, very sweet. We're so blessed to eat such tastiness. Wouldn't you like to be blessed, too?
Aren't you worried about getting fat?
Oh, no. Oh, no, no, no, never. Doesn't it just look irresistibly scrumptious? Don't you want to just take a lick?
It can't be that great…
You see those monsters over there? They're a long way from their natural habitat. They're all here because they're in love with these sweets. Such tasty, tasty treats.
That actually sounds kind of dangerous.
Dangerous? No way! Would we lie to you? There's nothing sweeter than to live life here amongst the world's tastiest treats.
Uh, yeah. This is where I get the heck out of here.
Where are you going? Have a taste!

<font color="#909090">(A brief note can be found next to each item.)</font> <font color="#ffd200">Cure-all Anesthetic Ver. 2</font> Prevents blood clots, relieves fever and pain. Effective on muscle pain. Take up to 3 pills per day. Symptoms should abate within 2 days.

<font color="#ffd200">Goldus Pharmaceutical's Digest+ Tab Ver. 5</font> Aids with indigestion, loss of appetite, and overeating. Note for next test session: must be swallowed whole. DO NOT CHEW! Consume 3 times daily, with meals. Take for 3 full days for best results.

<font color="#ffd200">Yellow Skin Goo (Name Pending)</font> Minimizes appearance of eczema. Ointment should also treat folliculitis, boils, and acne, but the tests will tell for sure. Clean affect area, apply twice a day. Or, apply on a clean gauze and staple to skin. Wait, tape might be better.
<font color="#ffd200">Ludi-solver (Experimental Solvent)</font> Slows down or reverses the ludibrification process. NOT TO BE USED ON HUMANS. For inanimate object only. Ingredients extremely toxic.

<font color="#909090">(Rumor has it that $npcNamePlural:21000053$ make their den below. The steam that rises from deep underground is said to be toxic to humans.)</font>
What are you researching?
Oh, not much. Just, you know, the dragon that lives here in $map:02000011$.
Maybe. That's what I'm researching. I personally believe that $npcName:23100011$, the legendary dragon, lives here, but I'm searching for proof. You've heard the legend, right?
Nope! Tell me!

Once upon a time, not too far from here, there was a place called the Forest of Wisdom. One day, the fire dragon turned the place into a sea of flame. It was the greatest loss of life in the history of the world. Supposedly, the dragon slumbers somewhere here in $map:02000011$.
This area didn't used to be so hot… Not until after the fire dragon went into hiding here.
That's my theory, at least. Anyway, if you find anything, let me know. I kind of want to go home now.
Recently, this place has been transforming into ludibrium at a rapid pace. Once ludibrification starts, everything becomes mushy and then solidifies instantly.
<font color="#909090">(This ludibrification has been happening all over Maple World. There's no prevention, except to be careful.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Will everything eventually become ludibrified?)</font>

You know him. He's a bit of a dummy. Nobody ever taught him how to express his feelings.
Ahem! What is it?
Thank you for letting me back.
I don't want your thanks. Guidance needs you, even if I can't stand you.
I know you care, deep down!
Sigh… Hopeless, as always. If you have time to spout nonsense, you have time to train!

You mean you really have seen $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$? I saw her once.

It was only for a moment, but it was like seeing a brilliant shooting star shining against the darkness of the sky. In that moment, $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$'s wondrous image became imprinted in my mind as if it were a photograph, and I was never the same again.
Since then, it's been my dearest wish to see $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$ again. I've reminisced with others about her and painted dozens of pictures of her based on that single, beautiful memory.

In these paintings, I strive to encapsulate even a small part of $npcName:11000735[gender:1]$'s celestial charm. The reflection of her soul is like an ever-changing sky, bright as a summer's day or stormy as the darkest winter's night…

I may have only seen her once, but I know the wonder of her soul. She appears as swiftly as the wind and disappears just as soon. Fleeting as my time with her has been, I know she's the woman of my dreams!
Until the day I can profess my true love for her brilliant soul, I shall paint and expound upon her many wonders to those who would share my appreciation.

$MyPCName$, what is it?
Another day, another incident…
…And this knucklehead, where in the world is he?
What is it?
My son is a bit… no, he's very hard-headed. I lost my patience with him, and well… He stormed out of the house and hasn't returned yet.
Sigh… People are right when they say parenting is the world's hardest job.
It's a beautiful day today. Hopefully it'll stay that way…

As the elder of this village, I'm doing my best to keep its residents safe. But there's little I could do about the seal of the Land of Darkness breaking, and now something terrible seems to happen every day.
The only wish I have now is for peace. $MyPCName$, I'm relying on you for that.
What's the matter, dear?
Now that the court's been canceled, everyone has been clearing out of here. I used to pray for this day to come, but now the city feels so empty.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I was just about done with this batch of cookies. Would you like to wait for them? My fresh-baked cookies are famous here in $map:02000001$, you know.
That $npc:11000055[gender:0]$, where did he go this time?
What should I make for dinner tonight?
What?
Did you really think you could hide that? Hmph!
Nothing is going my way.
I don't care why the court was canceled anymore. I've heard every rumor under the sun, and now they're saying it was an earthquake? Ridiculous! All I want now is to kick back.
Bah, everyone acts like they're the busiest person in the world. Everyone here in $map:02000001$ spends their day rushing around like fools. Seriously!
Let's see… So, this book goes…
Ahh, it's going to take forever to organize these books!
What a mess!
Please, try not to step on the books on the floor.
$npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ has a bad habit of returning books late.
Learning isn't limited to school. It's something you'll do your whole life. We should all strive to become true intellectuals.
What's wrong?
I hope everything's okay in $map:02000076$.
I wonder how Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is doing…
Platoon leader of the Green Hoods, at your service. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ sent me here to watch over $map:02000146$.
There's one person whom I admire more than $npc:11000015[gender:1]$, and it's my father. He died of illness when I was young, but the bow he carved for me was my inspiration to join this militia.
I'll do my best to become a good militia member, so I can believe my father would be proud of me.
What's wrong?
We'll follow Captain $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ to the end!
For our hometown!
We must train harder in trying times.
If you want to join the Green Hoods, then head to $npc:11000045[gender:0]$.
