Life is meaningless…
Ashes to ashes…
Everyone thinks they're special, but the world keeps turning without them.
What's wrong?
Nothing. I just understand the way of the world.
Dust thou art, and to dust shalt thou return. Come empty, return empty. In the end, there's nothing in this world that is truly yours.
What is it?
No, no. There's nothing wrong with me.
Maybe I should get cosmetic surgery.
$npcName:11000318[gender:0]$ keeps making fun of my face.
I want to look pretty for him.
Can I talk to you about something?
Sure.
One of the guys in my neighborhood keeps making fun of my face. He says I'm ugly. Am I… really that ugly? Please be honest with me.
Nope!
Yep!
Really? You really don't think I'm ugly? Then… do you think he'll think I'm pretty?
Well, I didn't say you're pretty, either.
Who is he?
Oh, I see… Then maybe I should really think about getting cosmetic surgery. Thank you… for depressing me further…
Then do you think I'll look pretty if I get cosmetic surgery? I really want to look pretty for him.
Who is he?
Yeah, I mean… maybe that'll work.
I don't know his name. He's one of the travelers who came to $map:02000001$ because of the court.
Big blue eyes. Beautiful golden hair. He looks so dashing with the sword on his belt! And his polka-dot scarf… it's so cute! Have you ever seen anyone so amazing before?
No.
Yes.
You know, sometimes he looks around as if he's waiting for someone. Do you think he has a girlfriend? What if he has a girlfriend?
I don't know.
I don't think he has a girlfriend.

So, you don't know. Three times a day, in the morning, at noon, and in the evening, I go out to the main road. I pretend to take a stroll, just to steal a few glances at him. Ah, I want to see him again! Do you think I'm in love?
Do you think so? Okay, then I really need to go to $map:02000107$…
Am I really that ugly?
How may I help you?
What does a rainbow look like?
Have you seen a rainbow?
It's pretty, isn't it?
$MyPCName$, are you an adventurer? Have you ever seen a rainbow?
Yep.
Nope.
Whoa! What does it look like? $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ says there's always a big rainbow over the dam!
Who is $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$?
Where is the dam?
Hmm, really? $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ wrote to me in a letter that there's always a rainbow over the dam!
Who is $npcName:11000174[gender:1]$?
Where is the dam?
$npcName:11000174[gender:1]$ is my cousin living near the dam. She used to live here until her father had to move there for work. I wish I had to move out there too…
Mm, I don't know exactly. $MyPCName$, do you think you could find it? I'd give anything to see it!
How may I help you?
Mom's going to give me an earful if I go home.
Ah, I hate homework!
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and… What was the name of that big-shot warrior?
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and… What was the name of that big-shot mage?
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and… What was the name of that big-shot archer?
I hate history the most. There are too many things to remember, heroes and names and… What was the name of that big-shot thief?
Can someone just do my homework for me?
Hey, man! What's happening?
When you're happy and you know it, shake it out!
Don't bottle up your anger!
Hello.
Feel free to take a look around.
Are you interested in cars?
Welcome to the Tuning Motors Showroom! Are you looking for something in particular?
I'm here to help you find the perfect car for your style and needs. What kind of car do you like?
Rugged 4-wheel-drives.
Luxurious sports cars.
No cage for me! I want a bike.
Ooh, you've got excellent taste! 4-wheel-drive vehicles are designed to handle a wider variety of terrain, including fields, swamps, sand, slopes, and so on.
Lucky for you, I've got one 4-wheel-drive model brochure left. Would you like to take a look?

Ooh, you've got excellent taste! 4-wheel-drive vehicles are designed to handle a wider variety of terrain, including fields, swamps, sand, slopes, and so on. Lucky for you, I've got one 4-wheel-drive model brochure left.
Oh dear, you don't seem to have enough room in your bag for this brochure. It must be completely stuffed! Make some room if you'd like it, please.
I knew it! You had that look that says "I've got a need… for speed".

The Tuning Motors Enpilar series features a high-performance engine slotted into a low-riding, stable chassis to minimize air resistance and give more power to the speed-sensitive steering and brakes. $MyPCName$, it won't disappoint you!
Ooh, we're kindred spirits! With a bike, you can fly through narrow alleyways and congested freeways at high speed. And don't forget the sense of freedom that you don't get in a car!

The Tuning Motors Chopper series is the king of Maple World touring bikes, and it's been the most popular bike on the market for years. It has a much larger displacement than street bikes, and its engine makes a throaty roar that you can't help but love!
Ooh, you've got excellent taste! 4-wheel-drive vehicles are designed to handle a wider variety of terrain, including fields, swamps, sand, slopes, and so on.
Good, you already have our 4-wheel-drive model brochure. Read through it, and let me know if you have any questions. And it wouldn't hurt to have a look at our other models, too.
How may I help you?
The past holds so many secrets that we have yet to unravel.
그거 알아요? 세상에는 말이죠… 이유없이 존재하는 건 아무것도 없어요. 모두 나름대로의 사연이 있는 법이라구요.
How may I help you?
Some things get better with age.
People nowadays tend to throw their things away the moment they're done with them. It's a shame, really.
Antique items are precious relics of the past. You can trade antiques, but you can't bring the past back.
What is it?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Where in the world is she?
Hm… Have you ever felt like you're being watched? You get this itchy feeling on the back of your neck when that happens. I've been feeling it a lot lately. Why do you think that is?
Excuse me, have you seen a girl around here who looks like me? She has blond hair and blue eyes, just like I do. I don't remember what she was wearing, though.
She's my sister. She went to do her hair and never came back. Does it take women a long time to do their hair? Huh… maybe she was getting it dyed.
Can I help you?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Help me… Shut down the power…
Please… Nnghh… Pull the lever… Turn off the power..
My robots… have been corrupted by shadow energy… Ugh…
What is it?
Help me… Shut down the power…
Please… pull all the levers and turn off the power…
My robots… have been corrupted by shadow energy… Ugh…
What is it?
How can I help you?
How do you think the hotel was built on this cliff? Aren't you curious?
Can I help you?
Ah, I want to be a great hotelier someday!
What can I do for you?
Uh-oh, I see dust. Tsk, tsk.
Being a hotelier is all about making sure the guests are happy.
I've been by $npcName:11000341[gender:1]$'s side since she was born. It's the least I could do to repay her grandfather, who took me under his wing when I had no place to go.
If the Andreas hadn't fallen so easily, this $map:02000178$ would not be here today.
What happened to the Andreas?
T-that's… Ah, let's not stir up old, painful memories.
Did you come to see me?
Is there no good solution?
I'm a little tired…

After my family fell, the only thing I had left was the mansion. I decided to forget my former glory as the heiress of House Andrea, and turned the mansion into $map:02000178$. People started to call me $npcName:11000341[gender:1]$ not long after.

$npcName:11000340[gender:0]$ had been the butler for my family as long as I could remember. When my family fell, he stayed behind when everyone else left. Now he's the hotelier of my hotel. I owe him so much.
May I… help you?
I can't believe I'm homeless now.
I can't believe this is happening to me…
What is it?
For years, I saved as much money as I could so that I could one day build a house of my own. And the day my dream finally becomes a reality, a giant mushroom comes and chases me away!
Curse that $npcName:22000321$… What does a mushroom need with a house, anyway?
I paid for that house and the land under it, it belongs to me! This is completely unfair!
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
This fire can purge evil and reveal the true nature of something.
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
It's the Dark Wind Bounty Bulletin Board.
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
Feel free to ask me anything.
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing…
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$… And $map:02000064$…

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000001$.
Feel free to ask me anything.
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.

Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing…

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$… And $map:02000064$…

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
How may I help you?
How much longer will it take to finish my house?
I've been traveling all my life, and the greatest lesson I've learned is to never waste anything. $npcName:21000029$, for example, has hundreds of practical uses. It's amazing stuff!
Can I help you?
Please, don't destroy the park!
Nature is precious!
You can't step on flowers like that! Don't lie to me, I saw you!
How may I help you?
Being able to work is a blessing.
People shouldn't waste their lives being idle. Work is its own reward.
Our fuel needs are growing by the day. I think more excavation sites will be needed soon.
We're pumping oil every day. It's still kind of surprising how much we need to get by.
Grr…
Grr… Those villains!
If only I could get out of here…!
Ah, I'm finally safe! You're my savior.
I thought I was going to die. I used to think I was untouchable. But after they took me so easily…
I can't believe you came to save me… Thank you. I'll live an honest life from now on. I'll donate to charities, pay all my taxes, and volunteer at the soup kitchens.
What is it?
Woof! Something's happening here!
Woof! One day, a meteor fell from the sky. Be careful, it might have friends.
What is it?
Get me out of here, woof!
I'm hurt, woof…
Help, woof…
What is it?
Can I help you?
I'm tired of doing bad things.
I'm a new man. From now on, I'm going to live an honest life. I'm leaving my days of being a thug behind.
May I help you?
I hope my son is doing well.
Are you traveling? You look like you're about my son's age.
$npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is my only child. He left home recently, wanting to strike out on his own. If only he knew how much that hurt his mother.
The day before yesterday I got a letter from $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$. He must've written it somewhere around here… even the edges are singed. So I bought an ice pack to keep him cool.
My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of all that lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.
My son, $npcName:11000360[gender:0]$ is on the other side of all that lava. I wanted to visit him, but I'm just too scared to cross it myself.
What's wrong?
It seems even the heat can't faze the twins.
Whew, it sure is hot here! I told my mom that I could make it on my own. Maybe I should've taken $npcName:11000420[gender:1]$'s advice and settled down in $map:02000111$ instead…
How may I help you today?
Welcome to $map:02000157$!
$npc:11000065[gender:0]$ is really amazing. When he sets his mind on something, nothing can stop him!
Can I help you?
Fresh ingredients are the best ingredients!
People don't know how delicious $npcName:21000059$ can be.
Not many people know this, but cooked $npcName:21000059$ can be incredible. I'm getting ready to sell $npcName:21000059$ dishes made from my own secret recipe.
Look around.
Read the journal.
Shush! What is it?
Shush! Please leave quietly. I'm done for if they find out I'm here.
How may I help you?
$npcName:11000367$! $npcName:11000367$! Where are you?
Do you know what makes cats so appealing? It's how independent they are! Though… it's possible for them to be too independent. Like $npcName:11000367$, for example.
What is it, meow?
There's nothing like love, meow!
Do you believe in love at first sight, meow? I do! Look at the cat next to me. Isn't she beautiful? Me-ow!
What is it?
Humans, leave the forest be!
$MyPCName$, you of all people should help protect the forest!
Beep!
Beep! Unauthorized access.
Beep!
Beep! Unauthorized access.
Beep!
Beep! Unauthorized access.
How may I help you?
This is the power of science!
All research serves a vital purpose!

As scientists, we must always look toward the future. We must not abandon our research because we aren't happy with the immediate results, or out of fear of perceived consequences. Science requires persistence and dedication!
What is it?
Why are you looking at me like that? Ha ha ha!
I saw you watching me earlier. You're barking up the wrong tree.
Don't you believe me? I have nothing to hide. Have you always been this nosey?
What?
I don't think I can hunt in peace anymore.
Not everyone can be a wolf handler.
What?
So uh… are you a dude or a lady?
Think what you like!
There are treasure chests hidden all over the world. How did they get there? Who knows and who cares! Just remember the golden rule: finders keepers!
What seems to be the problem?
When will I ever pass through this valley again?
Enoki mushrooms grow here. They require clean, undisturbed areas to flourish. I suppose no one ever comes to this valley, then.
How may I help you?
Ohm… Ohm… Dear aliens…
One day, I'm going to soar!
Do you believe in aliens? I do! There has to be loads of intelligent creatures out there, the universe is huge! You should stop by some night and watch the stars with me.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
What's up?
Ahh, such a nice breeze! And the scenery is beautiful!

Heya! I'm $npcName:11000379[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
What's up?
I feel like a king surveying my domain!

Well hey. My name's $npcName:11000380[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
What's up?
There's nothing I can't climb!

Hey there! My name is $npcName:11000381[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
What's up?
There's nothing I can't climb!

Hello. My name is $npcName:11000382[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group of free-climbing enthusiasts who support each other on our quest to surmount the greatest of heights. Anyone with a passion for climbing is welcome.
How may I help you?
Tsk, tsk. You're quite foolish, child.
You're lucky I found you and that I'm a doctor. You could've been in big trouble. Stop being stupid, and listen to your parents!
Aw, it hurts…
Ugh… It hurts…
S-stop talking to me… Ughhh…
Can I help you?
So dirty! I'd better clean!
If you see trash on the street, by all means pick it up! Everyone has to do their part to keep their homes clean.
What is it?
Hello. I am $npcName:11000386$. You seem surprised that I can talk. Don't be. Maple World is full of surprises after all.
How may I help you?
Eee! He's so handsome!
Have you seen $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$? He's right over there… and he's sooooooo handsome. Ah, I wish I could get close to him…
Can I help you?
Hey, don't get too close!
Hey, you're too close!
The crowd's already whipped themselves into a frenzy. It's like this wherever we go. Hey you! Back up, buddy.
How may I help you?
Balloons!
Cheap, no-pop balloons!
Since the big split, $map:2000115$ has been attracting all kinds of lookie-loos. And a true businessman never wastes a good opportunity like this!
How may I help you?
Welcome to $map:02000033$.
We've been busy. People are still checking in, with no idea the empress's gathering has been canceled.
The empress is no longer holding court, but we're still booked up. I don't think most people have heard the news yet.
What?
Did you hear the court was canceled?
Have you just arrived in $map:02000001$? I came here three days ago and I'm already sick of this city. What a waste.
Huh?
How could this happen? Argh!
Did you hear the court was canceled? I thought it would be a big to-do, so I arrived two weeks ago.
And now it's canceled! Argh, I stayed at the hotel for two weeks for nothing!
What seems to be the problem?
Should I just give up and go back?
Hoo-haa… Hoo-haa…
When my manager is angry, he screams at the top of his lungs and throws anything he can get his hands on. No one can stop him. All you can do is avoid him.
How may I help you?
This city is going to the dogs…
They say that old miser, $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$, is the worst… but they haven't met $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$!
Can I help you?
Life is tough…
Everyone here works hard, including me, but we can't ever seem to get ahead. It's sad, and I've heard $map:02000100$'s mayor is responsible for keeping us all poor.
Why me? What did I do?
Can't… keep… eyes… open…
Keep those thugs away from me…
So hungry…
May I help you?
Ah! The air is so much fresher up here!

It may not look it, but my house is the most expensive in the neighborhood. There's nothing quite like living up so high. I hope my daughter appreciates how hard it was for me to get this place for us.
Why did you call me?
Cough, cough… This smell is killing me!
Cough, cough… I'm tired of living in this cesspit. I'm going to make it out of here one day! *Cough Cough*
What is it?
Oh geez, this is disgusting! I wish I could cut off my nose.
The more I think about it, the angrier I get! How could they stop me from going on vacation, and one that I've had planned for months? Maybe I should just leave and let them deal with the water.
How can I help you?
I have no idea what is happening… Sigh…
Dark Wind told me to take some time off, so I thought I'd take a vacation to the dam. Then I noticed that… thing… under the water. How am I supposed to rest now?
Dark Wind told me to take some time off, so I thought I'd take a vacation to the dam. Then I noticed that… thing… under the water. How am I supposed to rest now?
How may I help you?
I should pack this. And this. Ooh, and that…
Please be very careful with this. It's one of my all-time favorite comic books.
$male:Mister,female:Lady$, do you like comic books? They're my favorite thing in the world. I want to be an illustrator when I grow up.
Uuugh…
Ugh… Ugh…
I need $item:20000060$ from $npcName:21000078$… to cleanse myself…
This toxin… stronger than I thought…
Uuugh…
Ugh… Ugh…
I-I can't… speak…
May I help you?
I'll get my revenge no matter what!
I miss my family…
I'm not a merchant.
$npcName:23000024[gender:1]$ carries a dark power. Try not to get poisoned.
Some folks think I must be a blacksmith. But not all yetis are smiths, you know! So stop trying to buy my stuff.
This is the Dark Wind Bulletin Board.

Eliminate $npcName:29000023$ and bring me proof for your reward.
- Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$
What is it?
You don't have to look twice. I'm who you think I am.
Sometimes I'm afraid to look in the mirror.
Why?
I might fall in love with myself!
But I'm already in love with you!
I'm just gonna pretend I didn't hear that.
I know how difficult it is to resist my incredible charms. Don't hate me because I can't love you in return.
Hey, hey! What are you looking at? Look at me! Hello! Hey, can't you hear me?
What do you want to know?
You're being very attentive. I'm glad I'm not boring you. Is there anything else you want to hear?
Actually, I'd better be on my way.
Tell me another old story.
Tell me about Maple World.

It has gotten late. I hope you didn't have too much of a hard time listening to this old man. I hope it will help you on your adventure. Mushrooms and pigs are running rampant on the trail these days, so be careful. I wish you a good adventure.
Another old story? What kind of story?
Tell me about the sages and the Lapenta.
Tell me about $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the Seven Heroes.
I'm not that interested in old stories, honestly.
This world wouldn't have existed if it weren't for the sages and the Lapentas. Which story do you want to hear first?
Let's hear about the sages.
I'm interested in the Lapentas.
How about a different old story?

In the ancient times, the three <font color="#ffd200">sages</font> were responsible coordinating the balance and order of the world in the behalf of the Goddesses, with power of <font color="#ffd200">life</font>, <font color="#ffd200">space</font> and <font color="#ffd200">time</font>. Then one day...

As <font color="#ffd200">darkness</font> enveloped the light, the world fell into chaos and despair. The <font color="#ffd200">sages</font> created the lapentas of <font color="#ffd200">life</font>, <font color="#ffd200">space</font> and <font color="#ffd200">time</font> with a strong power to seal the <font color="#ffd200">darkness</font>.
However, after exhausting all their power to make the <font color="#ffd200">Lapentas</font>, they were swallowed up by <font color="#ffd200">darkness</font>. How is it? Did I satiate your curiosity?
Yep!
The Lapentas are holy relics created by the sages who had been endowed with divine power. They were created for performing a purification ritual after sealing the darkness.
The Green Lapenta keeps the balance of life, the Blue Lapenta governs space, and the Red Lapenta maintains time.

Currently, these three <font color="#ffd200">lapentas</font> are being used as barriers to seal the darkness. However, there is a rumor that it was not truly sealed. It is said that, in reality, the <font color="#ffd200">Seven Heroes</font> are the ones keeping the world safe from it. How is it? Has your curiosity regarding the <font color="#ffd200">Lapentas</font> been resolved?
Yep!

<font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000075[gender:1]$</font> and the Seven Heroes are valuable people who protected the world with the help of the <font color="#ffd200">sages</font>. Whose story do you want to hear first?
Let's start with $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$.
I want you to tell me about the Seven Heroes first.
How about a different old story?
The Goddess of Light sacrificed herself to save the world from the <font color="#ffd200">darkness</font>, and gathered her remaining power before disappearing, leaving a being to replace her.
That being is Empress <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11000075[gender:1]$</font>, the great protector.
As the symbol of light and a spiritual pillar of the Maple World, Ereve played a major role in rebuilding the world as it is today.

After the reconstruction, she showed a lot of comfort and strength to people through public <font color="#ffd200">courts</font> every year... But she stopped at some point. There is a lot of speculation about why, but there must have been a solid reason.

Fortunately, from this year on, the <font color="#ffd200">court</font> will be held again. If you attend this <font color="#ffd200">court</font>, you will probably be able to see the Empress in person. How is it? Are your questions about $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ cleared up?
The <font color="#ffd200">Seven Heroes</font> are legendary warriors who fought against the <font color="#ffd200">darkness</font> with the Empress. According to the stories, the Seven Heroes…

Were, with great focus on, the <font color="#ffd200">Mage of Light Cerian</font>, the <font color="#ffd200">Archmage Asimov</font>, <font color="#ffd200">Elder Manovich</font>, <font color="#ffd200">War Chief Wolf Heart</font>, <font color="#ffd200">Captain Winn Stilton</font>, <font color="#ffd200">Guardian Priestess Luanna</font> and <font color="#ffd200">Souls' Balon</font>.

Some of them lost their lives or disappeared in the war against the <font color="#ffd200">darkness</font>, and some were tasked by the Empress with keeping the <font color="#ffd200">Lapentas</font> safe. How is it? Are your questions about the Seven Heroes cleared up a bit?
Not much is known about the Demon King. He was powerful enough to bring Maple World to its knees, and no one who challenged him lived to tell about it.
No one knows where he came from, how he came to be, or what made him so powerful.
What everyone DOES know is that the Demon King hails from a world of death, despair, and fear, permeated by the power of darkness that he wields so brutally.
People named this dark world the Shadow World, and despaired when they found that even the Lapentas themselves could not purge the darkness.
So long as the protective ward of the Lapentas lasts, Maple World will be safe. But there is always the fear that the Shadow World will find new ways into our world, and destroy it.
So, somewhere beyond the reaches of our peaceful, idyllic Maple World lies a realm of pure darkness and terror that seeks to destroy us all. Does that answer your question?
Yep!
Maple World... It is where you will have adventures in the future, so it is only natural you're curious about it. Let's see... Where to begin?
Maple World is a collection of continents floating in a vast, endless ocean. The biggest continent of all is Victoria Island.

Victoria Island consists of the capital city of $map:02000001$, where $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$</font>'s palace stands, $map:02000076$, $map:02000023$, $map:02000051$, and $map:02000100$. Each of these areas has developed its own unique culture.

Among them, $map:02000001$ is a metropolis built around the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s palace and protected by massive castle walls. It's the political, economic, and cultural center of Maple World.

$map:02000076$ was once a quiet hamlet on an empty prairie. Then a group of bow craftsmen joined it and made it thrive among hunters and adventurers. Its elder is called… $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$, I think. I've heard he's a respectable fellow.
$map:02000023$ started out as a village of fairies in the depths of the Ellin Forest. After ages of hiding from the greater world, they have consented to allowing humans to visit them.

$map:02000051$ is situated on the far side of the treacherous Vayar Mountains. Rugged descendants of powerful tribes live on those rocky cliffs, and only the hardiest travelers can make it up there to pay them a visit.

$map:02000100$ was created by the Kerning workers who stay cooped up inside their bunkers, inventing things and studying crafting skills. Even I haven't been down there yet, but I've heard their technology is astonishing.

In my time, a great many young people left their homes on Maple Island and traveled across the vast oceans, dreaming of adventures and new challenges that awaited them on Victoria Island. I don't know if that's still the popular thing to do… Come to think of it, I haven't left this cabin for a long time.
Perhaps, instead of listening to this old man prattle on, you should venture forth and learn about this world for yourself. But for now, is there another story you want to hear?
Yep!

The Shadow World is a world of death, despair, and fear, created by the Demon King. The only thing keeping him and his darkness from spilling into Maple World is the Lapentas, the legacy of the sages.
After the sages perished, their Lapentas formed a protective ward around this world which keeps the Shadow World at bay.
However, some ten years ago, the Blue Lapenta of Space broke. That lifted the seal on the Land of Darkness, and allowed a gateway to the Shadow World to open.
It is believe that this tragedy occurred because a servant of the Demon King tricked a protector of the Lapenta.
Fortunately, we still have the other two Lapentas hidden away somewhere in Maple World. So long as they persist, the ward will keep us safe from evil.
The army is doing everything they can to prevent the darkness infecting the Land of Darkness and Shadow World from spreading, but…
Perhaps what the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ needs are great heroes who can preserve what peace we have.

I don't know if there are people strong enough to protect the $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$, the Lapentas, and this world against the Demon King and his darkness, though. Anyway, is there another story do you want to hear?
Yep!
Ah-choo! Aww. What is it?
Ah-choo! I hate… pollen… ah-choo! It's terrib… ah-choo!
Please… I need to stop… ah-choo! I need to stop sneezing… Bring me $item:30000125$… ah-choo! The wildflowers over there. Sniff… You can pick up $item:30000125$ with the Z key.
Ah-choo! I hate pollen… ah-choo!
You can pick up honey from the ground with the Z key… ah-choo!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
The forest trail is too dangerous. We have to make it safe again, as soon as possible.
$npcName:99000041$ are making this trail too dangerous to travel.
$MyPCName$, nice to meet you!
I hope we can clean up this forest trail once more…
This forest trail is the only path connecting us to $npcName:11000407[gender:0]$, and the monsters are making it unusable. $npcName:11000409[gender:0]$ and I are working to clear them out.
Yo!
These spray cans are how I express myself.
You ask me, tagging is just as much art as sick beats and hot moves. Some people say I'm just some punk, but they don't know what they're talking about.
Wassup?
Chick-chicka boom, chick-chicka boom!
Sup, man? You wanna talk art? What do you think is the soul of art?
I don't… know?
Heart
Talent
Swag
Then lemme educate you, man! A real artist uses their tools to show the world their heart. That's the whole point, yo!
That's right! You're on point today!
Talent? Man, anyone can train up talent. That's not what's important.
Seriously? Man, I don't want to talk to you anymore.
You got something to say?
Eat a lot of fish.
Do you want to know my beauty secret?
$MyPCName$, I wasn't talking to you.
Someone, please make these turtles go away.
$MyPCName$, I wasn't talking to you.
Are you sightseeing? Head north to the condominium complex. The staff is nice, and it's really pretty around there. Just sayin'.
$MyPCName$, do you like fish?
Yep.
Nope.
Well $MyPCName$, you're more health-conscious than I thought. Fish is an excellent source of protein and other essential nutrients.
Oh, you should eat fish regularly. I thought you knew that, $MyPCName$. Do you only eat red meat? It's too fatty. Eating fish helps you lose weight.
May I help you?
Sigh… I haven't had any customers lately.
I came here with my daughter $npcName:11000420[gender:1]$ to start a new life. But if those turtles don't stop showing up, we'll have to move again.
<font color="#909090">(The headstone is old and worn, and there is an epitaph inscribed upon it.)</font>
Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.
Here lies Roanna Levematri. She leaves behind her lover Alberto, whose heart will never heal.
Catch me if you can!
What is it?
Have you seen a lost girl on the street?
Oh, my poor baby!
She's so pretty! She looks like a doll.
Have you seen a lost, crying girl on the street? She's carrying a doll in her arms like it's a real baby.
What brings you here?
I'd love to ride a $npcName:11000423$, but…
These vultures are not tamed. What if they fly me to some unfamiliar place or drop me in midair?
What is it?
Ahh, I want to go home.
I shouldn't have followed him.
What have I gotten myself into? I should never have followed $npcName:11000425[gender:0]$ here. What's going on? And why's it snowing?
What're you doing here?
I shall train these vultures well.

Mature $npcName:11000423$s are almost impossible to train. The best time to train them is right after they're born. If only $npcName:23000019[gender:0]$ didn't keep interfering, I could train up a new group of chicks…
Why are you bothering me?
To us adventurers, pain means we're alive!
A true adventurer dives head-first into trouble! He's not afraid of jumping off a cliff into a sea of lava or fighting giant, rampaging monsters!
Ah, the smell of the sea!
I haven't had time to myself like this for a long time!
I just ate lunch, and I'm already hungry.
Mm? Do I know you?
Come try $npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s $itemPlural:30000140$!
$itemPlural:30000140$? That sounds delicious! I'll be back for those.
I'm so glad I decided to come to the beach.
Ah, I love the sound of the crashing waves.
$map:02000111$ is such a beautiful place to be! Except for the turtles. They're awful.
Mm?
$npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s special…
Not interested.
I'd better rest while I can!
The beach is the best place to get away from it all!
I've heard stories of treasure chests under the sea, but I've never seen one. How about you, $MyPCName$?
Yes?
$npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s special…
Go away.
I came here to rest. Stop bothering me.
$npcName:11000362[gender:0]$'s special…
Baa.
What's wrong?
It's beautiful here, isn't it? Welcome to $map:02000076$!
I've been ordered not to let any shady types in.
I want to protect the peace of $map:02000076$ and all of Maple World.
I hope I'll make lots of new allies.
Welcome to $map:02000076$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000076$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000076$ used to be the home of archers and craftsmen, all living in a collective. They produced many great works and great hunters, generation after generation.
The Green Hoods formed to protect the village from outside threats to their peace. Their current leader is their fifth, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$.

Is $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ the chief of this village? Ha ha, no. The chief of $map:02000076$ is $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$'s father and $npc:11000001[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were young.

That's why $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ takes care of $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ like his own. You know, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ doesn't like people talking about her. So, maybe don't tell her about this conversation?

I've heard a great earthquake occurred near $map:02000001$, and the empress's court was canceled as a result. I hope the damage isn't too serious. That disaster might also keep $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ from returning anytime soon.
$npcName:11000045[gender:0]$ won't tolerate anyone trying to take advantage of a chaotic situation. I hope he'll be back soon. We need him more than ever.

You've probably noticed that the Green Hoods are all archers. We're renowned throughout Victoria Island for our marksmanship, and even $npcName:11000045[gender:0]$, the master archer of $map:02000001$, is a Green Hood.
In fact, she taught me everything I know about loosing a bow. If you're interested in archery yourself, I'd suggest paying her a visit next time you're in the capital.
Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a house of their own. $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ is doing what he can to manage the housing lots around the village, but there's only so much land.

If you don't have a house yet, you could settle down in $map:02000076$. $map:02000105$ is also quite nice, and is famous for its beautiful maple trees. There might be some empty lots still available in $map:02000104$ or $map:02000143$ as well. If you're looking for more affordable options, then you can check out the apartments in $map:02000105$ or $map:02000104$.

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling the ant tunnels.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000076$ first.
What brings you here?
Do you need help?
You'd better not cause any trouble here, or you'll be sorry.
Don't write us off as government goons.
Protestors sure are noisy today…
What brings you here?
Tell me about Kerning City.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000100$ used to be a village of inventors and engineers who worked out of bunkers. It was a center of research and discovery.
Their achievements gave rise to the modern, high-tech metropolis that is $map:02000100$. But where are those engineers and inventors now? That question keeps me up at night.

Anyway, security in $map:02000100$ is handled by us Dark Wind scouts. Losing Winn Stilton was a big blow to the group, but we were able to reunite under the great leadership of our current captain, $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.

The current mayor of $map:02000100$ is Mr. $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$. Word is that $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$, the wealthiest man in the city, has the mayor in his pocket. Of course, there are always going to be rumors like that floating around.

I've heard the court was canceled because of the great earthquake that hit $map:02000001$. It might be a good thing, honestly. The poor people in $map:02000100$ have been upset about the widening gap between them and the rich. Not having the money to attend the court was like salting the wound.

But it also worries me. What if the people decide to rise in rebellion, now that the highly-anticipated court was canceled and their beloved $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ is nowhere to be seen? As part of Dark Wind, I feel more responsible for this city now than ever.

You ever visit $map:02000001$? Major players from the backstreets of $map:02000100$ have decided to meet there and recruit new members. Assassin Master $npcName:11000051[gender:1]$ should be there too.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be there. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of a house of their own. There are many houses in this city, and plenty of people who want them. If you don't have a house yet, how'd you like to settle down in $map:02000100$?

North of $map:02000100$ is $map:02000166$, the site of some booming new developments. Recently renovated, $map:02000165$ and $map:02000167$ are often mentioned as hot properties. There are also low-priced apartment complexes in $map:02000164$, west of $map:02000100$.

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000146$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, hiring a maid is a good next step. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in $map:02000001$ is an expert on assistants and can definitely help you out. Maybe you should look for a house around $map:02000100$ first.
Captain $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$… No, he's not my captain anymore. This is all too much. What's going to happen to Dark Wind now?
Please help me.
Welcome.
The game will begin shortly. Places, people!
Can I help you?
Yikes. I could've died!
I don't want to talk. I got ripped off by my boss, and then I almost got killed by robbers. My life sucks!
Do you want to know what the owner of Cathy Mart is like? The worst, that's what!
Can I help you?
Oh no. I left the cash in the registers!
If we don't get that money back, it's coming out of my paycheck…
I don't know who's worse, the boss or the robbers.
Ah… I want to get better soon, so I can go on adventures again.
I want to get better soon, so I can go on adventures again.
Cough, cough! Aww, my legs…
When can I sail again? Cough, cough! My leg had better heal quickly so I can get back to finding that pirate island.
The sea may look calm from here, but it can destroy you in an instant.
Ugh…
Ugh…
The pain…
H-help me…
Empress… I've failed…
Ugh…
What is it?
Aww, my love…
He's so handsome!
Get out of the way, I can't see $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$!
How may I help you?
Let peace reign in $map:02000001$!
May Ereve bless you!
All hail the empress!
Never let your guard down!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.
Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing…
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$… And $map:02000064$…

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
How may I help you?
May Ereve bless you!
Let peace reign in $map:02000001$!
Never let your guard down!
All hail the empress!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.

Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?
