You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing…
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$… And $map:02000064$…

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Can I help you?
Never let your guard down!
Let peace reign in $map:02000001$!
All hail the empress!
May Ereve bless you!
Welcome to $map:02000001$. How may I help you?
Sell me on this $map:02000001$ business.
What happened to the empress's celebration?
Hey there. I'm new in town.
$map:02000001$ is the biggest city in all of Maple World and the seat of $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s power.
$map:02000025$ watches over the city from the north. It's off-limits to the public, I'm afraid. Her majesty's safety takes priority over the curiosity of tourists.

The $map:02000188$, the Banners of Glory, and a taxi stop are all conveniently located in the center of the city. For a reasonable fee, you can hire a taxi to take you to any other taxi stop you've visited, you know. Oh, and the job instructors from all over are gathered in the $map:02000188$.

The Banners of Glory in front of the palace mark the victories of certain powerful guilds and individuals. We update the banners all the time, so you can stop by whenever you like to see who has the most trophies and victories.

In the northern parts of the city, you'll find the royal office and library. $map:02000031$ is a must-see for any book lover, of course. It's not the biggest library in Maple World, but I like to think that it's the best. When I'm off-duty, I love to wander the stacks.

Behind the library is a shopping district where you can find special items, anything from home decor to mounts. If you have $itemPlural:90000006$ from guild battles, you should speak to $npcName:11000620[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000626[gender:1]$.

To the southwest, you'll find shops that sell equipment and other supplies. $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ is one of the best smiths in the land, and $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ sells all the latest herbs and potions. Never pick a fight without a stack of potions, I always say.

Head southeast and you'll find the residential district and hospital. Kick your feet up and relax after a long journey at $map:02000033$. Have your ailments treated by Tria's finest physician at $map:02000125$. And there's nothing $npcName:11000038[gender:0]$ can't cure.
And that's $map:02000001$ in a nutshell. A long, wordy nutshell. If I told you everything about the city, you'd be here all night. Is there anything else you want to know?

I know that you probably came from very far away to see the empress, but these things can't be helped. Thank you for understanding that we had to cancel the open court in the face of unexpected disaster.

$map:02000001$ is the political, economic, and cultural heart of Maple World, so it's always crowded. But in preparation for open court, there must have been ten times the normal number of people here.
Of course, when you have so many people in one place, problems are certain to crop up. Thieves, con artists, and the incident at the celebra—Oops. Maybe I shouldn't have said that.
Anyway, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is determined to keep the peace. Enjoy your stay here, and stay out of trouble. For your own sake.
If you're looking to take up a job, you should make a stop at the $map:02000188$ in the center of $map:02000001$. Job masters from all over the world are gathered there.
The timing is pretty lucky for you. If it weren't for the empress's court, they wouldn't be here. Of course, if you aren't at least level 10, they won't even talk to you.
Gosh, you're a Knight! I may be a humble guard now, but someday I want to be just like you.
You know, an old friend of mine left town to become a Berserker. I wonder how he's doing…
If you're a Wizard, then you'll want to visit $map:02000031$. Even the fairies of $map:02000023$ say our library is the best.
It is an honor to serve you, Priest. How is the empress doing?
You're a Green Hood, aren't you? That's great. We guard could use the support of people like you during these crazy times.
You're a Heavy Gunner, aren't you? I've always wanted to visit $map:2000270$.
We're watching you, Thief. You are a guest of the kingdom, but we won't abide any criminal activity.
Know this, Assassin. $map:02000001$ is a city of light.

Everyone in Maple World dreams of having a home to call their own. The empress and her court work tirelessly to open up new plots of land, but there's only so much space, so not many people can have the luxury of owning a magnicifent villa.

If you don't have a house yet, you should consider $map:02000001$. Property in the city proper is expensive, but the outlying suburb of $map:02000002$ is partially subsidized by the empress. And there's always $map:02000119$… And $map:02000064$…

There are many advantages to owning a house, you know. These days, every home comes with a device that will let you teleport there at anytime from almost anywhere. Let me tell you, it's saved my butt plenty of times after a long day of patrolling $map:02000092$.

And the merchants in $map:02000036$, west of $map:02000023$, have all kinds of interesting furnishings for sale. Decorate your floors, walls, furniture, and yard to create a house that's unique to you. Some merchants will even sell buildings you can place on your lot! When you're ready to buy, go to $map:02000036$ to shop for your house.

If you already have a house, you could always hire an assistant or two to keep you company. $npcName:11000700[gender:1]$ in the northwestern district of $map:02000001$ hires them out. But first thing's first. You have to buy a house before you can get an assistant!
Welcome!
When will the ships return?
Sailors are rugged on the outside, but soft on the inside.
Can't believe the storms blew my customers away…
You're not from around here, are you?
Why is the harbor so empty?
What's on the menu?

Ugh, don't let me get started. Not too long ago, there was a big storm that rolled in with a tsunami, and all the regular ships we used to get here stopped coming in. Let me tell you, before the storm this place was packed with ships.
If it's seafood you want, I'm your woman. Sushi plates, crab cakes, calamari, I make it all! Freshest catches you'll find anywhere without catching 'em yourself!
…And if you can wait an hour or three, I can make some for you. The storms have fouled up the fishermen, so I'm still waiting on today's catch. What a life, huh?
I'm a seasoned sailor!
Maybe tomorrow, I'll find that whale…
I haven't shaved for months, and my chin is itching something fierce!
Ahoy there! Have you ever seen a whale?
Yes.
Nope.
Bah, nonsense! I've been a fisherman my whole life, and only seen a whale once. And it was a teeny one at that! Me dream is to see the great blue whale just once before the sea takes me.
Aye, they're an elusive catch. I've always wanted to see a blue whale myself.
How may I help you?
Why's everyone so spooked? It was just an earthquake.
Ahhhh, I'm so bored. Aren't you?
Everyone's all freaked out about the storm and the earthquake, but so what? We need some excitement around here!
I love staying around the house.
There's nothing like rolling around in bed all day.
I don't want to go outside. I don't want a tan!
My girlfriend keeps bugging me to go out, even though it's a great day to relax inside. You get that, right? Make her see reason. If she always insists on doing… things, I worry about our future.
What? Is there something you want to ask me?
It's so beautiful today. Come on, let's go outside.
Stop being such a troll and let's go out, please? Honey…

It's such a nice day to go for a walk or get some juice, but my dumb lump of a boyfriend wants to stay inside. Look at him, he's not even doing anything! Can you convince him to do something with his life?
Ugh…
Ugh…
The pain…
H-help me…
Empress… I've failed…
Ugh…
What is it?
Uh-oh. Please don't say you're in love with me.
I look incredible, don't I?

Hey, I know what you're thinking, and that's not why I'm here at $map:02000107$. I'm all natural! No cosmetic surgery here! I just came to get some fresh air, and check out the latest beauty… trends. While I'm at it.
Can I help you?
I want to become beautiful…
Will I look better if I change my style?
Others say Chief Hairdresser $npcName:11000255[gender:1]$ is the best, but I like $npcName:11000253[gender:0]$'s style.
How may I help you?
Who doesn't want to look pretty?
Oh wow, look at her!
Should I put on some cosmetics? Or should I try a new skin tone?
What brings you to $map:02000107$? Since you're here, I was thinking about changing up my skin tone again. Do you think I should do it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Ah, what is it?
Why am I not growing?
I know height isn't everything, but I really don't like being shorter than most people…
Hmph. WHAT?
I'm not afraid of spiders!
Real men aren't scared of spiders! They squash them flat as soon as they see them!
This place behind me is loaded with spiders. If you're in a hurry, you can squash them yourself.
What is it?
Yoo-hoo! Come play with me!
Good luck!
I hope you hit the jackpot!
I don't recognize you. Is this your first time here?
You've been staring at me. Interested?
May I help you?
Welcome to Goldus!
$map:02000100$ would never have been developed without the help of $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$!
There's a name on it: $npcName:11000477$.
The Goldus way! Put your back into it! Pinch a penny, make a penny!
Can I help you?
My friend, I miss you…
How are you?
$MyPCName$, do you have a friend that you miss? Someone you always think of?
I love how high this place is. The view is so beautiful.
I have a friend not far from here, but being away from him is agony. I wonder how he's doing…
Who is he?
I'm sure he's fine.
That's… Um… Sheesh, $MyPCName$! You wouldn't know even if I told you! Don't you miss someone like that?
Do you think so? I think so, too…
I know he's doing well. He's strong enough to get through anything.
But sometimes bad things happen, and that's why I'm worried about him. $MyPCName$, could you pray for his well-being?
Of course.
It's not my business.
You're very kind! I consider you a good friend, $MyPCName$. I'll be praying for you, too.
Oh, $MyPCName$… You must not have many friends…
Do, mi, so, do! How may I help you?
Hm, this is not the sound I want…
Music imitates nature.
As a musician, I want to make music from the most beautiful tones of nature. That's my dream.
How may I help you?
Remember people, put any Vayar stone fragments you find on the work cart.
$npcName:11000328[gender:0]$ has asked us to gather $itemPlural:30000055$ from the quarry in this work cart. I have no idea why he wants useless junk like this.
I'm busy. Why are you bothering me?
Argh, I'm so busy!
I really could use some help.
I can't get anything done because of those monsters!
If only those monsters weren't here…
I'm busy. If you're not going to help, then at least don't get in my way.
Judging by the rough handwriting, I think $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$ wrote this note.
Judging by the rough handwriting, I think $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$ wrote this note.
Check the note about the starting time.
Check the note about how to play the game.
Check the note about earning rewards.
I know these folks aren't just here to see $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$. Don't worry, I'll start the game when we've got enough people.
Step on the red tile to jump to the center of the cave. Once there, you can step on the blue tile there when you want to leave.
When the game begins, the tiles you're standing on will start disappearing. Last as long as you can without falling, and if you're the last one standing, you win! Easy, right?
In addition to mesos, the winners will get a special reward: $npcName:11000441[gender:0]$'s Blessing, which increases their Movement Speed for 15 seconds.
Do you want a reward? Then join up and complete the game!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Yoo-hoo! Congrats!
You're the best!
You're so awesome!
I was rooting for you, $MyPCName$!
You're amazing!
You did it! Good job!
What's wrong?
This place is still packed.
Yeesh, I don't know if they'll have room for me. I've been out all day. I really need to put my feet up.
What's up?
Tee hee! I want to become $npcName:22000321$ as soon as I can!
My house! Your house! $map:2000202$! Mm?
Down below, $npcName:22000321$ has claimed all of the $map:2000202$ for herself!
She's bad, but… so cool! I want to be a monster mushroom like her!
What is it?
Kyaaahh!
Marry me!
Ah… Doesn't $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ look handsome? As for you? Not so much.
What is it?
Notice me!
$npcName:11000406[gender:0]$!
Rumor has it $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ likes bad girls. I'd better become one, and quick!
Can I help you?
Oof… I think I'm going to faint…
I wish he would hold me in his arms, just once…
He's so hot, and his voice is amaaazing. When I hear him sing, I can hardly control myself!
What is it?
$npcName:11000406[gender:0]$! I'm here! Right here!
Over here! Look at me!
Eww, you're ugly! Get out of the way!
Can I help you?
I don't care what others say.
Heh! Just watch me. This is only the beginning.
Right now, Goldus Group is the biggest company in $map:02000100$, but that'll soon change. I'll be crushing $npcName:11000252[gender:0]$ under my heel before you know it.
What? You want to know if I'm single?
Hah! I don't need a man. All men are narcissistic, chauvinist pigs. I hate them!
Can't you see I'm busy? If it's not urgent, then scram.
I don't sell anything on credit. I trust money more than I trust people.
Can I help you?
Man, I never seem to have time to rest.
I wonder how Mother is doing. I haven't seen her for a while.
I've spoken with many people who are frustrated that the court will not be held.
It must be difficult to explain it to every single person.
It certainly is, but I understand their frustration. They came all the way here to attend the court, only to have their plans ruined. They're upset and disappointed.
Whatever the reason, I still feel personally responsible since I was the one charged with the preparations.

My job is to make sure $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ and the other members of the royal family have everything they need for their day. I'm always busy, but I take pride in my position and my service to $map:02000025$.
Have you been to $map:02000076$? My mother lives there. I really should visit her, but I've been so busy that I haven't had the time since preparations began.
Once my work here is done and I've sorted out all the issues, I'll go and visit her first thing! I've been sending her letters, it's just… she can't see. A disease took her eyesight. Sigh…
Meow.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Did… Did you come to see me?
My best facial feature is… my philtrum…
I want to live in peace, like I used to…
I thought that if we went deeper into the forest, we could keep $npcName:11000751[gender:1]$ safer…
Others pointed their fingers and called us cowards, but we didn't care. We just wanted to keep our charge safe…
Not just anyone can sit on me.
You kick me, and I'm not going to be the one in pain.
How may I help you?
Even time can't help it…
As long as you know who you are and what you believe, what others think of you doesn't matter. That's the way we Boroboros live.
Why did you call me?
I want to go home…
What is it?
Ah, $MyPCName$! Good to see you again. I made it home safely, all thanks to you. I thought Dad would be mad, but he let me in without saying a word.
I've decided to stay out of trouble and be good. Come back and visit, will you?
Can I help you?
What brings you here?
Scram, punk.
Who are you? Stop bothering me.
What brings you here?
Who are you? I don't recognize you.
What brings you here?
What seems to be the problem?
What brings you here?
You must pay for what you did!
If you do something you shouldn't, then you must pay the price.
Pull some weeds and show me how sorry you are. I'll consider reducing your sentence.
Maybe you don't realize this, but I'm the warden of this prison. I don't take walk-ins.
I'm here to make amends for my deeds.
I'm just a tourist!
All misdeeds must be punished. The punishment must fit the crime, or else we risk the criminal committing their crimes again.
How can I reduce my sentence?
How bold! You realize I don't issue pardons…
I'll do anything. ANYTHING.

Will you, now? Hmm… I like the sound of that. In some cases, hard labor can substitute for time served. How about you pull the weeds in the prison yard? Do a good job, and I'll consider reducing your sentence.
See the prisoners in here? Remember that you can always end up the same if you fail to heed the law.
And that's the reason I have a tourist program here. You could learn a thing or two.
Can I help you?
If you're looking for the $map:2000216$, you came to the right place.
What's the $map:02000216$?
I'm curious about Blackstar.
I'm not surprised you haven't heard of it. This is a place that services people with extraordinary taste.
Looking for items to invest in? Have rare items to sell? This is the place to do it.
Whatever your business, you'll find that the goods we broker here are a far cry from those you find in $map:2000100$.
Talk to one of my brokers below to browse or sell items.
Note that epic and above items can only be brokered through the $map:2000216$. We'll know if you try to move them without us, and trust me, we will not be pleased.
Now, if you'll excuse me…
Well, aren't you the joker. If you're smart, you won't repeat that question to anyone else.
For the record, we aren't doing anything illegal here.
The $map:2000216$ attracts adventurers and tourists from all over Maple World, and that's advantageous to $map:2000100$.
In fact, the majority of $map:2000100$'s residents support us. The polls all say so.
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
Can I help you?
What seems to be the problem?
If you're not here for the job, please leave.
Ugh, I'm tired of this rotting smell.
Industrialization, urban development… I don't know who'll really benefit from all that.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
Ugh…
Ugh…
Welcome.
$npcName:11000064[gender:0]$… Being with you like this…
Dad… $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ is back…
After my father passed away, I found his journal among his things. My father was the guardian of the Blue Lapenta, and he wanted $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ to be his successor. So I knew.
I knew there was no way $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ did what the others said he did.
I'm glad the truth finally came out and everything is back to normal, even though $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ hasn't paid for his crimes.
Being with $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ reminds me of the gorilla pie that we used to bake together when we were young.
What could gorilla pie possibly be…?

It's one of those pies topped with walnuts, almonds, and blueberries. When $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ and I first made it, it was so bumpy and ugly that it looked like a gorilla. Why? What did you think it was?
What is it?
Another win for me.
Don't sweat it. Crime is pretty bad around here. That's just how it is.
What brings you here?
What brings you here?
I can't trust just anyone.
Once I get out of here…
I need to find a better place to hide. The Dark Wind would have no trouble finding me here.
Welcome. It's nice to meet you.
Hm…
I can't believe this happened…
$MyPCName$, I can't believe we're meeting again like this. I can see in your eyes how much you've grown since last we met. Do you remember what I told you then? That the world would need a hero?
Looking at you now, I believe that you're the one.
Ha ha ha, you look like you have many questions for me. What do you want to know?
How did you end up on Victoria Island?
Why did you save $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$?
This $map:02000051$ is where I was born and raised. The last time I left, I swore I'd never return… I thought that was best for everyone here.
But something happened, and it made me wonder if I made the right decision. I came back to finish what I couldn't finish then.
What is it?
That's… I'll tell you when I'm ready.
I couldn't ignore the wish of a dying man. Even if he was a prisoner…
And when he awoke after his brush with death, I could see in his eyes that he was innocent. I didn't ask any questions, but I knew I had to help him.
Stay true to yourself, and you can overcome anything. No matter how difficult it is, you can do it.
How may I help you?
What brings you here?
They're up to something.
Sly devils…
Dark Wind has changed too much. Now it's crushing the citizens under authoritarian rule instead of protecting them like they used to. I can't let this continue.
$MyPCName$, do the people in this city look happy to you?
Yep!
Beats me.
Then you're a fool. There's no point in discussing this further. Leave.
Try to see through their deceptions. It's not hard to find the rotting heart of this city.
Can I help you?
I mostly paint portraits. Would you like to know why?
Because the most beautiful thing in the world is people! That's why I like painting them.
Would you like to know when I started painting?
Well, that's… I don't know. Do you remember when you started eating food on your own? Or when you spoke your first word?
Picking up a brush was as natural to me as picking up a spoon. I was born to paint. I don't need to know exactly when I started doing it.
When I have a brush in my hand, I feel like the world makes sense.
Whom should I paint?
How may I help you?
Kids these days… they don't even read books!
Sigh… Maybe it's time I close this bookstore once and for all.
Cough, cough… It's so dusty in here! I've had it with all these old books.
Are you really going to close your bookstore?
Well, I'm certainly thinking about it. Ha ha… My bookstore is the oldest business on $map:02000147$, you know. I'd rather keep it open, but I'm getting too old to run it on my own.
Do you like books?
Yep!
Nope!
Ha, do you? People like you amaze me. I've owned this store for over thirty years, but reading always puts me right to sleep. It's so boring.
I'm glad not everyone feels like I do. I'd have long since shut down, ha!

You don't? Ha, you're just like me. I've owned this store for over thirty years, but reading always puts me right to sleep. It's so boring. Just between you and me, I've never finished a single book in my whole life.
Can I help you?
Ah, we haven't had many guests lately. Do you know why?
What seems to be the problem?
There's another fire!
Unless you've worked a day here, you can't truly appreciate what we're doing.
What seems to be the problem?
Hm… This is an easy case.
I handle corpses for a living. There's not much that can rattle me anymore.
What brings you here?
Ugh…
What brings you here?
What's wrong?
I want… revenge…
The worst thing that can happen to anyone is losing their home. It's like having the ground ripped out from under you.
An eye for an eye… I'm going to teach them what it feels like to have your life shaken to its roots.
What is it?
We should dance! Never stop dancing!
If you're not happy with your life, you should dance. When your body's happy, your mind will be too!
How may I help you?
It's going to take forever to replace all these…
Safety is the primary concern for folks who work in places like this.
Can I help you?
What seems to be the problem?
Want to see what I've got inside this bundle? Then show me your wallet first! Ha, just kidding…
Ugh…
Ugh…
Checkpoint… under attack… $map:02000076$… in danger…
I-I'm okay…
What seems to be the problem?
I must fulfill my duty.
I'm not going to run.
The militia will do everything we can to help you. We have to join forces to protect our world.
What?
What's going on?
I've met more people today than I did all last year.
Is today some kind of holiday? Why is everyone so busy? I think I've met more people today than in my entire life.
Check the items.
Ugh… Is anyone there?
Ugh…
I must report this situation to my captain…
My fellow scouts have been scattered… we're on the brink…
What seems to be the problem?
If you've got business here, talk to a broker. Keep your hands to yourself. I'll be watching.
What brings you here?
Can you see me? That's impressive.
I have the ability to meld with the darkness. What can you do?
Go ahead. I'm listening.
We'll clean up $map:02000100$. Just you wait.
Stay out of trouble. You don't want to end up like Dark Wind.
Ugh…
Ugh…
No…
I have to get up…
Captain…
H-help…
Ugh…
Ugh… No…
I can't… die like this…
Ugh…
Can I help you?
I've never seen this before.
It must be a new product.
Can I help you?
I had no idea about this…
Not bad.
Can I help you?
I want to buy everything in here.
I wish I had more money…
Can I help you?
I don't know which one to buy…
Let's see…
Can I help you?
This seems a little expensive…
Let's see how much this usually is…
Ugh…
Ugh…
No…
I have to get up…
Captain…
H-help…
Ugh…
Ugh… No…
I can't… die like this…
Unable to access data.
Unable to access data.
Unable to access data.
How may I help you?
Cough, cough…
Everything in this world has energy, and lava has the most potent energy of all!
Hm… That's…
There are all kinds of fairies in this world.
There are so many different kinds of fairies, I've lost count.
Fairies love shiny things.
Mm? Are you a traveler?
What are you doing here?
Oh, me? I'm studying these creatures we call the fairfolk. All kinds of fairfolk inhabit forests like this.
I'm busy, so busy!
Please don't interrupt me.
I've got so many things to do!
I have to do homework, and I have to study…
One of the fairfolk left this note.
It's a $npcName:11000598$.
What is it?
Ugh… I shouldn't have done that…
Ah… I'm in pain…
There are treasure chests hidden all over the world, and they're highly sought after by adventurers.
What can I do for you?

How may I help you?
We've made many sacrifices. I pray they weren't for naught…
Blessings to you.
The world is relying on your strength. May the empress's blessing be with you.
Ugh… What… brings you… to me?
Ugh… I wanted to help everyone…
P-please go… I'll be okay…
What seems to be the problem?
If only I was a little bit stronger…
I'll see you soon… my friend…
Keep it down out there, I'm trying to read!
Ugh…
Ugh…
The pain…
H-help me…
Empress… I've failed…
Ugh…
Ugh…
Ugh…
The pain…
H-help me…
Empress… I've failed…
Ugh…
How may I help you?
Aww… I'm still shocked…
Whew, what is going on?
Merchants like me and the palace workers are only allowed entry through the underground passageway. I wonder if I'll ever have the honor of passing through the main gates…
How may I help you look your best?
Ah… What do I do?
What do I do if $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$'s creditors come after me? How could he hang me out to dry like this?
What?
Stop bothering me and scram.
Huh?
I can't afford to get tired. Not yet.
No one knows what it's like to toil in this place. Only another captive could understand.
What seems to be the problem?
Sigh…
I can't return to Maple World until I save these people. I'll never be able to forgive myself if I leave them behind.
Huh?
I don't expect anything from the empire anymore.
The empire turned its back on these people when they needed it the most. Someone had to step in and protect them. And the empire will get what it deserves.
What seems to be the problem?
We can't just wait. We have to do something.
Don't compare us to the empire. They care more about their hierarchy than the safety of their charges. Their hypocrisy is disgusting.
This is troublesome…
I don't know…
Hmph, I can't believe I have to investigate this!
Could you help me?
How on the world am I supposed to fix these wagons? I can't carry them back to town!
Try to think positively.
It's nice to be outside sometimes.
We need more people to handle the damage.
Mushrooms want wooden ladders. Just wooden ones!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!
$map:02000051$ is a great place to raise a family like mine. Its highlands are safe from monsters on the ground, and my children can practice flying!
Screeeeech!
Screeeeech!
Have you heard how some people coddle their children? It's ridiculous to me! You've got to toughen up your kids, so they can fend for themselves in any situation!
How may I help you?
No prisoner will ever escape on my watch.
Hey, you there! Keep it down!
If you cause any trouble, it's the dungeon for you!
You're touring $map:02000124$, are you? Stick to the route, then. You wouldn't want to mess with some of these prisoners.
What kinds of offenses have these prisoners committed?
Can they get their sentences reduced?
They've spoken lies or slander about certain people or places, publicly supported or attacked public groups, or used chat, displays, UGC, or character names to offend others.

Of course, one doesn't get thrown into prison for committing these offenses just once. They're given multiple chances to redeem themselves first. If they still refuse to see the error of their ways and keep making the same mistakes, then they will receive punishment from $npcTitle:11000514[gender:1]$ and Judge $npcName:11000514[gender:1]$.
$npcName:11000514[gender:1]$'s punishment can make their life in Maple World very difficult. But if they prove how sorry they are, they can have their sentence reduced.

Pulling weeds in the prison yard is one way of proving that, but so far I haven't seen any prisoner pull weeds long enough to have their sentence reduced. It just proves that some people don't change.
For more information about the prison, please refer to this brochure. Enjoy your tour.

Get me out of here…
Please, get me out of here…
I'm sorry… I won't swear again, I swear!
Come on, cut me some slack…
Get me out of here, would ya? I've got a stash on the outside. A million mesos for my freedom. What'cha say?
No way, you're in for fraud! That's the worst!
Bah, how did you know I'm in here for fraud? Did the warden tell you? If you're not going to get me out of here, then scram!
Get me out of here…
Argh, the toilet is clogged again!
Warden, I need this toilet unclogged!
Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?
How did you end up in here?
For swearing. Why? Don't say you never swear. Everyone does it! So why is it such a crime??
Ugh… This smell… The toilet is clogged…
I'm innocent!
I'm INNOCENT!
Get me out of here…
I cursed once. ONCE! I don't deserve to be here!
Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?
How did you end up in here?
Argh, don't get me started. Why can't I change my own profile image to something I like? So what if the picture is a little bit… lewd?
Get me out of here…
How can I get out of here quick?
Argh, I'm bored to death in here.
Excuse me… Please get me out of here! I promise I'll never misbehave again!
Get me out of here…
Get me out of here…
I'm going insane in here.
I really want to get out of here. Please help me. I'm sorry for what I did. I really am.
Get me out of here…
Sigh… This is just my luck…
Bah… This is boring.
When will I be let out? Is it soon? Please?
Get me out of here…
That toilet must be clogged too.
It's been three days since the toilet backed up. Ugh… This smell!
Get me out of here…
Argh, this place is a sty! I hate prison!
Get me out of here…
Ah… I'm bored…
Time just crawls in here…
Bah, I'm just going to sleep…
Did you call me?
I'm INNOCENT!
Get me out of here…
I only made clothes I wanted!
I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.
How did you end up in here?
I made a T-shirt with a sexy picture on it, so what? That's not a crime!
Get me out of here…
I'm INNOCENT!
Get me out of here…

Argh, this place is a sty! I hate prison!

Ah… I'm bored…
Get me out of here…
I'm INNOCENT!
Get me out of here…
Why can't I have the name I want?
I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.
How did you end up in here?
I used some swear words for my character's name. That's how I want to express myself! Why should I care about other people's feelings?
You've got a problem in how you think.
Shut up! I don't need your lecturing! Go away!
Get me out of here…
Ugh… This smell…
That toilet must be clogged too.
It's been three days since the toilet overflowed…
Get me out of here…
Ah… I'm bored…
Time just crawls in here…
Bah, I'm just going to sleep…
What are you lookin' at? This ain't no zoo, and I ain't no animal! Ahhh, I hate alla you!
Get me out of here…
Eww… I'm tired of the mold around the sink!
I can never completely rid myself of the mold…
I wonder if the tap water is even clean…
I can't wait to get out of here. How much longer?
What are you looking at?
I'm INNOCENT!
Get me out of here…
I cursed once. ONCE! I don't deserve to be here!
Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?
How did you end up in here?
I swore, and apparently that's SO wrong that they had to throw me into prison?
When can I get out of here?
Bah, it'll take forever to get rid of all these weeds!
These weeds are so stubborn!
The war against weeds is one that can never be won.
Huh? You don't look like an inmate.
What are you doing?
Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Ugh, I'll grow old before I can pull that many weeds.
When can I get out of here?
How many times do I have to say I'm sorry?
These weeds are so stubborn!
The war against weeds is one that can never be won.
I'm busy. Scram!
What are you doing?
Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Ugh, I'll grow old before I can pull that many weeds.
When can I get out of here?
Am I going to be doing chores forever?
These weeds are so stubborn!
How many times do I have to say I'm sorry?
Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-five… Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-six…
What are you doing?
Are you blind? I'm working! I have to pull a million weeds to have my sentence reduced. Argh, and now you've made me lose count!
When can I get out of here?
Bah, it'll take forever to get rid of all these weeds!
Am I going to be doing chores forever?
The war against weeds is one that can never be won.
I'm busy. Scram!
What are you doing?
Can't you see? I'm working! If I were you, I would've stayed home napping instead of coming to see a horrible place like this.
Can I help you?
How may I help you?
What brings you here?
What is it?
What's wrong?
How may I help you?
What is it?
There's a mark carved into the wall.
What is it?
I miss Cecilia…
Do you believe in love at first sight? I do. I fell in love with $npcName:11000151[gender:1]$…
Toot-toot-toot…
Access denied.
WHAT?!
It's really stuffy here.
Bah, it's not easy to set up a date.
Mm? What?
What are you doing?
You're a curious sort, aren't you? As the old saying goes, ignorance is bliss.
Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong.
WHAT?!
Why are you bothering me?
Those ignorant punks…
Wait, are you going to go down to the basement?
Yep!
Ha! You're funny. I don't know how you got down here, but trust me when I say you NEVER want to go to the 2nd basement. There are some really scary guys down there.
It's just as well, I don't feel like dealing with you myself. Go on, go to the basement. And don't say I didn't warn you.
WHAT?!
Ah… Achoo!
This place is so humid.
What are you doing here? How did you even GET here?
Easily.
Kid, I'm impressed. You made it this far, but it's time for you to go. Leave before something bad happens to you.
Why?
I stay well away from the basement levels. And I live here!
I had to come down here today, but believe me… I can't WAIT to get back upstairs.
Don't try anything stupid. Just get out of here!
<font color="#909090">(One of these books seems out of place.)</font>
No, no! I don't want to go back in there!
Hey! Did you just throw me on the ground?
How did you end up on the bookshelf?
A stupid monster brought me back here. Please, you've got to take me with you!
Your bag is full! Make some room for me, will ya?
<font color="#909090">(You always remember to put books back where you found them… right?)</font>
Yes, here!
It's locked! You need a key!
Make sure to return books to where they belong!
Can I help you?
<font color="#909090">(This looks like an old journal. You open the faded cover and turn to a dusty page.)</font>
"When I discovered the secret passageway, I was excited beyond measure. I thought I could finally escape."
"But at the other end of the passageway, an endless abyss awaited me. Is it really impossible to escape from this misery?"
What brings you here?
Mm? Are you here to challenge me? You can never defeat me, no matter how many times you try. You'd better give up before you get seriously hurt.
I want to challenge you.
What's the $map:65000001$?
Heh. Interesting. You challenge the undefeated champion of $map:65000001$, the victor of 47 consecutive matches. Very well. I shall give you what you desire.
But not right now. We gladiators fight only inside the ring. That's our rule.
As you can also see, I'm quite busy. Perhaps while I attend to my business, you can start to make a name for yourself. Why not go prove your strength at the $map:65000001$?
You must not have heard about the $map:65000001$. All right, I shall do you the honor of hearing $npcName:11000675[gender:0]$'s own explanation. So listen.
The $map:65000001$ is a place of battle where up to 10 warriors can take turns battling one on one, until only one remains. The order of their fights is random.
Unlucky fighters may be eliminated in their very first match. But those who are truly strong, truly deserving, will triumph over fortune and faith.
I should know. I've done it countless times. Now… Do you still want to challenge me?
Can I help you?
Yawn… I'm so sleepy…
$npcName:11000057[gender:1]$'s soul has hardened like a stone.
Ve salvabre.
Rufenamitevita solesimeia…
Lojebronisieta cube moshavius ereboiboimesa…
Momovi suzieshala losietarmo…
Ve salvabre.
Lubela moisi meiv…
Jerta-!
Ve salvabre.

Shajehofinisiatarognaia leizen…
Serevitamo…
Ve salvabre.
zermei sechalosinia!
Lephaihos moenoisi…
Ve salvabre.

Zeremoisi luzeirushubroserpiata…
Ve salvabre.
Lopeisi nerpitouar…
Rejemoisi…
How may I help you?
$map:02000227$ is the border between the mortal and spirit realms.
It's a $npcName:11000686$.
I'm saved!
You saved my life.
Oh, thank you!
Help me…
Help! Anyone, please!
Aaarrgggh! Leave me alone, please!
Stop! Aarrggh!
Help me…
Someone will come and help us. If not… Sniff…
Please… stop… torturing me…
Help… Please…
Help me…
I'm s-scared… Help…
Let me go… This is too much…
I miss you… Mom… Dad…
$MyPCName$, welcome.
Is… Is he okay?
I really hope he's okay…
$npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ is the only one who stayed with me when everyone else turned their backs.
So I'm going to stand by him, no matter what happens.
L-leave me alone…
What brings you here?
I can do it!
Making potions isn't like cooking at all!
It's almost done!
Making potions is very difficult. The first priority is preparing the ingredients. You need very specific ingredients to make effective potions.
Some people compare potion brewing to cooking. They're crazy if they think potions are as easy to make as food.
Here, I'll give you an example. Say you're making fried rice. You can put in just about anything you want. Ham, peppers, carrots, anything you want.
When you're making a potion, however, you must add the ingredients in the correct order, at the correct time. You can't take your eyes off the cauldron.
How may I help you?
Ah… I can't sleep…
I keep having nightmares. They wake me up all night…
You get near me, you get hurt.
Who's there?
Mm… Who's there? I can't see you, but I can sense your burning soul.
What happened?
What's the $map:65000002$?
…Do you mean my eyes? As you can see, I'm blind. I committed a sin so grave that I gave up my eyes in penance.

I can tell you want to hear my story. I assume $npcName:11000289[gender:0]$ told you about the arena. That is where you can always find a fair fight. No battles to the death, just competitions of strength.
But I killed someone there. It was an accident, and everyone who watched our fight agreed that it was unavoidable, but I couldn't forgive myself.
That's why I decided to hide in the darkness. That's all.

You must be interested in the $map:65000002$. But as its name suggests, it's a dangerous place. Everyone in there is determined to hurt each other in a contest of strength. If you want to join in, you'd better prepare well.

The $map:65000002$ is a battleground in which up to 10 warriors battle each other for points, and whoever beats more competitors than the others wins. When you beat another warrior, you get points. When you are beaten, you lose them.
Since so many warriors fight each other at the same time, sometimes things get really chaotic. The winner might not be the strongest of them all, but the smartest.
It's always good to test your strength, but be careful not to let your excitement get the best of you. That's all I have to tell you. Be on your way.
How may I help you?
We don't have time for this. I'll take $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ to HQ. $MyPCName$, please follow $npc:11000057[gender:1]$.
What brings you here?
Ugh…
No… We were so close to catching him…
Time is of the essence. We must request backup right away.
Can I help you?
Come to sample our juice? $npcName:11000445[gender:1]$ right here will set you up. Hope you're ready for a trip to flavor country!
Juice, right here! Life-changing juice!
Punch makes me happy!
What? If you have something to say, say it.
I'm busy! Oh, where is my husband when I need him most?
I'm so winded… I can't run.
What? Do you have business with me?
What is it?
Meow.
Did you call me?
I really hate high places.
Why is it that all the beautiful places are so high up?
I think I can cross this bridge if I don't look down. But… what if I lose my footing because I can't see where I'm going?
Hello.
Woo-hoo! Have a great day today!
Yoo-hoo! Yet another beautiful day has dawned. Isn't it great?
Yep!
It's not worth it.
Since I became a Bunny Gal, every day has been like a dream. I never thought my life could be this fun!
Oh, you don't think so? Why not? It's all a matter of perspective. You should try to think positive. Like me! Hee hee hee!
Hm? Where are you staring at?
I can't help it… you're so pretty!
I… wasn't staring at you!
Oh, really? Do you think I'm pretty? I wasn't always so pretty, you know. Hee hee hee! I'd like it if you'd come visit me more often. I think I like you!
Oh, y-you weren't? Hmph, for a moment I thought you had the hots for me.
But… are you SURE you weren't staring at me?
Nope!
Okay… you caught me.
No? Well… All right then. If you say you weren't, then you weren't. Oh well!
You were, right? I knew it. Hee hee! Don't be embarrassed. You aren't the only one who likes to stare at me.
Wow, $MyPCName$, don't you just love the weather today? Back when I had to stay inside, I could hardly tell what the weather was.
What happened to you back then?
Huh? W-well… I don't… I don't want to talk about my past.
Let's talk about something else, shall we? Keep your head in the present, I always say! Eyes on the prize!
How may I help you?
Dad, play with me.
I'm bored.
Dad doesn't want to play with me. $MyPCName$, could you play with me?
How may I help you?
Ughhh…
This is because of his liver…
I have terrapin cousins living in the sea, and one of the most famous terrapins in history is called Byeljubu. Have you heard of him?
How may I help you?
Hm…
I'm itching all over.
Wah! This thing is eating me alive!
Ah, so plush and comfy!
Err? Are you a traveler? You look… cool.
I'm cooler, though. Hee hee!
What? I'm in the middle of creating music that speaks to the soul!
Shut up! Shut up!
Sigh… Do you even know the pain of creation? Bah, there's no soul in this music. If there was, I'd be able to feel it!
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
I may be old, but I'm young at heart.
Where is this smell coming from?
Don't judge a book by its cover. I may be old, but I'm still a girl on the inside.
Do you think you can beat me?
Laughable!
I doubt there's anyone worth challenging here, either.
Do you want to challenge me? You know how to play rock-paper-scissors, right? Heh, let's do it. Rock, paper, scissors!
Scissors!
Rock!
Paper!
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font> We tied. Not bad. Do you want to try again?
Again!
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font> We tied. Why don't you try again?
Again!
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font> I won. Looks like you're no match for me either.
Again!
<font color="#909090">(She plays rock.)</font> I won. What's wrong, cat got your tongue? Oh, right… losers don't get to speak! Hee hee… Want to play again?
Again!
<font color="#909090">(She plays paper.)</font> Oh no, I lost! I can't believe it!
I won!
<font color="#909090">(She plays scissors.)</font> D-did I really just lose?
I won!

While I was making supplements in a corner of Goldus's drug factory, I accidentally came across a sample of $item:20000102$, a natural stimulant.

When ingested, this chemical heightens one's mood, relaxes their mind, and also gives an energy boost. The empire prohibited its use simply because it's produced in the Land of Darkness. All that did was drive the trade underground!

We first met in Katramus. The Lumina Liberation Army sprung us while we were being transferred to another prison, and we joined up together.
We promised that we'd stick together like we did during our time in prison. That was the most difficult time of our lives.

Oh, no…
$npcName:22400062$ must be stopped!
No… This can't be happening!
This is beyond bad! $npcName:22400062$ is trying to manipulate the timeline to his own ends! If he succeeds, the resulting temporal cascade will wipe away all of history as we know it!

This place exists upon the central axis of time for our universe. It is a road to all things. Here all possible timelines coexist simultaneously. $npcName:22400062$ plans to collapse them all into a single eventuality, one where he reigns supreme!
Can I help you?
I-I'm scared…
Sniff…
Please… help…
Help…
Dad… Sister… Sniff…

We have to protect the Lapenta of Time…

Who would have thought something like this could ever happen?
I don't think it's coincidence that I landed here.
I believe more than one timeline exists in Ludibrium at this moment.
What is it? I'm doing something really important. Please don't distract me.
Finally, the time has come!
I can't relax.
The world keeps changing, and our technology and science leads the way. Mark my words, I'll usher in a new era with my work.
Hello.
Maybe the time machine worked too well.
I shouldn't change anything in the period I'm visiting.

My prices are lower than any supermarket's. Here, come try some samples.
Oh?

Time has stopped.
Isn't this incredible? Frozen in time…

This place is more dangerous than you think. Don't do anything stupid.
Every time I think I found a clue, it turns out to be nothing.
Don't rely on Fairy Dew too much. This place is teeming with monsters that are stronger than you.
Sigh…
The world looks more interesting when I see it through a telescope.
When I'm curious about something, I can't stop thinking about it.
I've got this awful, creeping feeling that something bad is coming. I really hope I'm wrong.
Ahem… What is it?
People try to put us down, talking about my generation…
Old man, look at my life. I'm a lot like you were…
Who's going to scratch my back later?
I think all the hair that should've gone to my head went to my chin.
Ugh, why do I feel so bloated?
I don't know if I could handle seeing something like that again. It was surreal, horrifying, futile…
What are you talking about?
Are you new to $map:02000111$? Because most people who live here know what I'm talking about. It was the $npcName:23000017$ Tsunami.
Never heard of it.

That happened way back when I still had a full head of hair. It was January 23rd, around 11 p.m. The cold, merciless wind was churning the sea when the legendary turtle king $npcName:23000017$ awoke and rose to the ocean's surface from his briny domain.
I've never seen such a massive, terrifying creature in my whole life. And it was fast. I couldn't believe it was a turtle.

Anyway, the news of the legendary turtle king surfacing quickly spread, and great warriors came from all over Maple World to battle back the deadliest turtle in history. Ahhh, just recalling that day makes my nonexistent hair stand on end.

A single strike from that turtle's leg sent dozens of warriors flying. Some of them were terrified into running. But enough brave souls stuck it out to tire the turtle out. For awhile, it looked like we might come out on top.
It must have been an hour into the battle, when suddenly a loud roar came up from the sea. The next thing I remember is someone screaming about a tsunami coming.
In an instant, a wave tall enough to block out the sun rose up. The warriors had to finish the fight and warn everyone else to escape before all was lost.
Acting as a team, the warriors came together and pressed back against $npcName:23000017$ twice as hard. It was the most intense battle I've ever seen.
I'll never forget the moment they finally flipped $npcName:23000017$ over. It was an incredible victory, cut short by the massive tsunami crashing down on us!

I don't know how long I was out. When I woke up, the sky was clear and the sea was quiet, as if the terror of the previous night was but a dream. It might as well be for those warriors… for they and $npcName:23000017$ were all swept out to sea.
What was perhaps the most frenzied battle in history was lost to the tides, with only myself and a few other survivors to retell the story.
$npcName:23000017$ has never returned to bother us since that day. I don't know if the tsunami swept it away, or if our heroes taught it a lesson.
I've been studying turtles in the hopes of finding a clue to where their king went. And now, with my bald head and hunched-up shoulders and craning neck, I almost look like a turtle myself. Heh.
I'm going to be rich soon.
I'm going to be rich!
What am I going to do when I become rich? Well… I want a nice-looking house, a nice-looking car, nice-looking clothes, nice-looking shoes… Basically, everything I have should look nice. Right?
Do you know how the fairfolk greet each other?
Mm, I love this fresh forest scent!
Forests are the cradle of life for woodland creatures like us fairfolk. If they get cut down, we'll fall with them.

I can't remember anything. I miss my mom.
This situation is more serious than I thought, but I'm not going to back down now!
I'm not going to run!
I'll do anything for the safety and peace of $map:02000076$. I'll fight as long as I can, for the honor of the Green Hoods.
Oh, no. You aren't getting my digits. Now shoo!

Unngh… Unngh… Unngh…

I believe if I work hard now, I'll be able to retire and spend time with my daughter someday.

Wa-tcha! Hyooooo!
Nothing is impossible for true martial artists. Do you want to become strong? It won't be easy.

Kun, kun. Kunba, kunba.

I wasn't always so forgetful. On that note… where am I? I don't know what went wrong this time…
Please, please leave me alone! I can make it work this time!

That was the only way to show my gratitude… Sniff…

Hey, how did you find this place?

You can hold onto this seagull if you want to take off.

I can't make a move just yet…
Some people say I don't look like an adventurer. They think I would look more relaxed sitting behind a desk, reading and daydreaming.
That means they don't know me. I prefer seeing things for myself rather than reading them from books. That's why I'm so happy about this job with the Adventurer's Guild.
Speak up. I can't hear you over the alarm. Cluck!
Clearing my throat… Cock-a-doodle-doo!
The sun is up! Cock-a-doodle-doo!
Someone, please turn off that alarm clock. Cluck!
Ring, ring! Out of the way!
I go to sleep to the sound of ticking clocks.
I wake up to the sound of alarm clocks.
Whew, that was close. You almost startled me right off the clock!
I haven't seen any strangers here for a long time.
I'm glad I can see rainbows all day.
More people would live here if it weren't for the monsters.
Most people steer clear of this place because of the monsters.
Who are you?
What do you think is on the other side of the rainbow?
I could never get tired of eating corn.
Can anyone tell me of the world beyond the rainbow?

Hello.

How did $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ die?
What kind of deal did you make with $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$?

Well… It's all because of that blasted caravan attack. Just before $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ became a suspect, he wanted to go over our alibis. I went to our meeting spot in the $map:02000043$ to meet him.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s assassins were waiting for us when I got there. They thought $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ and I were loose ends, so they were going to get rid of us.
I escaped, but it was too late for $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$. I never imagined things would go so wrong.
It wasn't a deal so much as extortion. I've been stealing money from Barrota for years. Basic stuff–a redirected delivery here, an extra fee there.
$npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ found out somehow. If I didn't work with him, he'd have exposed me to the public.
And what did he want?

He wanted the supplies for the big court gathering in $map:02000001$. I offered to pay him off, but he said he wasn't interested in money. That's when I realized he was up to something truly dangerous… but it didn't make a difference to me.

Of course, stealing imperial supplies is a tall order. I needed a man on the inside, and I got it in $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$. He had a reputation for being a straight shooter, but everyone has a price.
$npcName:11000492[gender:0]$'s mother is sick. I told him I could get her the best medicine money can buy. Better, even. That did the trick.

I promised $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ that nobody would get hurt. It was a lie, of course, but desperate men will believe anything to ease their consciences. It wasn't hard to get the caravan route and schedule out of him.

I delivered the plans to $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ personally. Met him at $map:02000117$. Him and the lady in the red cloak… I knew then that I'd never be able to live with myself after what I'd done.
But it was all over… or so I thought. The court was canceled, an earthquake tore up the royal road… All I knew was that I wanted out.
And how did that go?
You know darn well how that went. Now $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ is gone and my life is ruined…
What seems to be the problem?
Sigh…
My legs are killing me…
Criminals are held here while waiting for sentencing. Once sentenced, they're sent to $map:02000124$.

Oh, yes! I've got something to tell you.
I was in the mood to cook, so I made this for you, $OwnerName$.
I may have accidentally used salt instead of sugar, but it tasted okay to me! How do you like it?
It's delicious!
It's so salty!
Really? I guess I'm not such a good cook after all. Don't eat any more of it. I'll eat it. As punishment.
Huh? It is? I'm so sorry! But you didn't have to say it so rudely… Excuse me. I'd like to be alone for a moment.
I knew you'd like it! Hmm, should I make it again for you tomorrow?
Right? Hehe. I might not be good at much, but I'm great at cooking!
I almost forgot!
I thought you might be hungry, so I bought snacks! Want to eat them with me? No, actually… I'll just watch you eat.
I've gained a few pounds since starting this job. Probably because I'm so happy! But I should probably cut down on the snacks.
What? You look great!
Yeah, you could stand to lose a few…
Are… are you calling me fat, $OwnerName$? How rude!
Is that so… Well, I was going to tell you something important, but whoops, I forgot what it was. Too bad.
You… you think so? You think I look great? Wow! Hehehe. Thanks!
Really? Hehe, in that case, I'll take a nibble… or two… or three… You know what, just give me that whole piece over there! Hehe!
You're so busy all the time! You need to take better care of yourself! Here, I made this nutritious drink just for you!
It contains $npc:21000052$ claws, $npc:21000023$ droppings, $npc:21000074$, and tons of other goodies that are great for your health. Drink up!
(Dump it out.)
(Drink it.)
What?! Why?? Do you know tough it was to get those ingredients? I almost died in $map:2000174$! Aagh!
No way… I stayed up three days straight to brew that for you, $OwnerName$… No, I can't give up. I'll make you another one! This is for the good of your health, $OwnerName$!
How do you feel? Amazing, huh? I witch I met in $map:2000006$ was right! I'll make you some more!
Huh. The witch said this would instantly make you as strong as $npc:23090005[gender:0]$! Did she lie to me? I'll make her pay!
$OwnerName$, I cooked this for you. It's a specialty from my hometown. It was my favorite when I was little! I hope you like it.
So… what do you think? You… like it, right?
Ah, it's, um, interesting.
It's delicious!
Too rugged and low brow for you, isn't it? You don't have to eat it. I'll put in the fridge and eat it when you're not home.
Oh. Okay. Sorry, $OwnerName$. I should've made something I knew you liked, instead of something that was special only to me.
Yay! I'm glad you like it.
Whew, I was worried for nothing. Let's eat some more… together! Heehee.
I found this while cleaning the house today. I thought I should ask you before throwing it out.
Did you drop this hairpin? It is yours… isn't it?
Yup, it's mine.
Never seen it before. Nooo idea whose it could be…
Huh? It's not yours. But it's not mine either. Then whose is it?
How strange! You and I are the only ones who live here. If it's not yours, then… No, no… It can't be…
I knew it belonged to you, $OwnerName$! We're the only one who live here. If it's not mine, then it has to be yours! That's domestic bliss, hehe.
I'm so glad I found it for you. So helpful, right? Hehe.
I found this chair when I was grocery shopping in $map:2000001$ today! Heehee! Lucky, right? Oh, no… but what if it belongs to someone?
What if they're looking for it right now? What if they're worried and sad?
Why are you bringing trash into my house?
I don't think anyone's sad about this chair.
Trash? This chair is in excellent used condition! But fine. Your house, your rules. I won't do it again. I'm sorry.
I lugged it all the way here because we need a chair! How can you call it trash? Even you have to admit it matches the decor perfectly… Hmph.
You mean someone threw away such a nice chair on purpose? You're trying to tell me in a nice way that I picked up someone else's garbage, aren't you?
Their loss, our gain! Sheesh, the people here must think money grows on trees!
The weather was so nice today! Perfect for laundry! But guess what I found in your clothes…
Mesos! These are yours, right?
Did you remember to use fabric softener?
Thank you.
Fabric what? From where I come from, people wash their clothes in the stream and dry the under the sun. Oh, dear. Being a servant is tougher than I expected.
F-Fabric softener? Mm, just one second. Now where did I leave my Helping Hands servent guidebook?
Heehee, you're welcome, $OwnerName$! I'm forgetful, too. Once, I put my glasses in the washing machine!
I knew it! Heehee, I'd better check your clothes more thoroughly before I wash them!
La, la, la… La, la, la…
When you leave me alone here all day, it gets a little lonely, so I sing to cheer myself up, heehee.
You should stop. You'll scare the furniture.
That's wonderful. You sounded great!
Oh! Sorry… I'll never sing around you ever again. Sniff.
$OwnerName$, why are you so mean? You could word it a little more nicely. "Scare the furniture." Hmph.
You really think so? Heehee. Thanks, $OwnerName$! Maybe I'll sing for you one day. No, no. I'm much too shy.
Oh, stop. You're making me blush! Heehee.
Not a thing! Don't worry. I'll hold down the fort when you're away!
Huh? My hair looks funny? Well, you know how an iron smooths wrinkles out of clothes? I wanted to do the same thing for my hair.
Maybe I set the temperature too high. I'll keep trying until I get it right.
Nothing much. Oh! I almost forgot! A group of masked people barged in, asking if I was alone.
I told them you're always by my side, because, you know, I always hold you close to my heart. Anyway, they couldn't leave fast enough. Heehee.
Not a single thing, besides the fact that you were gone for way too long, $OwnerName$.
I'm okay. If I get bored, I can invite people over for a party or borrow your stuff and play outside.
Hmmm, I might head to $map:2000235$ for a picnic tomorrow. I love the $item:20000093$ that's sold there! I'll bring some home for you, okay?
It's so different here than Cadimia Island, my home. So many people and things I've never seen before!
Someday I'll tell you all about Cadimia Island, heehee.
But $OwnerName$, when you're home with me, you can show your true feelings. I know you can't really be as happy as you always pretend.
I spend a lot of time thinking about how to better serve you. You've been so kind, even though I've made a lot of mistakes.
$OwnerName$, don't forget I'm here for you!
Let me be your cheerleader today, for luck! Just don't blame me if anything bad happens, heehee.
I'm always in tip top shape, and it's thanks to you, $OwnerName$! I'll do my best for you today!
Ever since you told me to stop putting dishes in the laundry machine, I haven't dared to use it. But can I make an exception for this sword? It's really rusty and could use a good washing!
Before I became a servant, I lived on Cadimia Island. It's pretty tiny, most people have never even heard of it.
It was just me and gramps, living happily amongst the friendly island critters, trees, grass, and insects. I'm so far now and miss each and every one terribly.
Mr. $npcName:11000179[gender:0]$ used to drop by the island to tell us news of the outside world. It's been years since I've seen him. I wonder how he's doing…
You want to know how I became an assistant? Well, after gramps passed away, I lived alone for a while. One day, Mr. $npcName:11000179[gender:0]$ visited.
He said I needed to see more of the world, meet new people, and try new things.
At first, I was terrified. I had never left the island in my life. But I thought of gramps, and that gave me courage.
After I arrived on Victoria Island, I wasn't quite sure what to do, but I stumbled upon Helping Hands and learned how to work as an assistant. Now here I am, taking care of your home!
Come to think of it, if it weren't for Mr. $npcName:11000179[gender:0]$, I would've never met you, $OwnerName$.
You're curious if I miss gramps? Well, sure. I mean, of course I do.
But I'm all right. He's been gone a long time, and he'd want me to remember the good times, not mope around being sad, you know?
Sometimes, I really miss him a lot. But life is full of hello's and goodbye's. Speaking of which, I want to create lots of great memories with you while I can, $OwnerName$!
Mm, I don't mind talking about myself, but I'd love to hear your story too, $OwnerName$.
$OwnerName$, what kind of food do you like?…Huh? You want to know my favorite food? Mmm, I like seafood.
$OwnerName$, what kind of animals do you like? …Huh? You want me to answer first? I like all animals. I couldn't possibly pick a favorite.
$OwnerName$, what's your favorite color? …Oh, of course you want me to answer first. Hmmm, I like blue, like the ocean.
Hmph, this was a waste of time! I wanted to learn more about you, but I ended up talking about me! Heehee, I still like talking to you, though.
Hello. Are you here to visit master?
Yep!
Nope!
Who are you?
Then you must know master well. Please have a seat.
I see. Please make yourself comfortable. But to be clear, I belong to master and am nobody else's assistant. Thank you.
Then why are you here? It's not nice to just barge into people's houses, you know.
If you have no business here, I must ask you to leave.
Shouldn't you tell me who you are first? Master would be jealous if I gave you too much attention… I hope.
My name is $MaidName$, and I'm an assistant of this household. How may I help you?
Nice to meet you.
Welcome!
May I ask who you are?
How may I help you?
I've been waiting for you.
Welcome home.
I'm tired…
Whew… What should I do next?
Lalalalala… Lalala!
What's this?
Time to focus!
Yawn.
Look at all this dust!
I just cleaned this yesterday…
Eww, how did this get here?
Lalalaaaaa! Lalalala!

While nothing particularly interesting occurred today, I try to appreciate every single day that passes. Once it's gone, you can never get it back.

When you take time to be grateful, the world around you changes. The flowers you see, the sky above your head, even the bus that stops by the house at the same time each day, all of those become special. In the end, you realize that no two days are ever the same.
For example, today, right now, I'm talking to you, $OwnerName$, and that makes this moment special. Every moment we share is special.
I completely agree.
Uh, are you feeling okay?
I apologize. I should be working, not spouting philosophy. If you'll excuse me…
You may think it's corny, but there are many books that go into great depth about this topic. But perhaps I should keep my thoughts to myself.
I knew you would, $OwnerName$. Some may think what I said is corny, but I knew you would understand.
Take a deep breath. Ahhh. See? Even the air is more invigorating when you take a moment to treasure it. Thank you for chatting with me about this, $OwnerName$.
I was gardening today, when a grubby little dog showed up and started running around.
He came up to me, wagging his tail as if he wanted to play. I was elbows deep in weeds, so I wasn't sure what to do.
You let a filthy dog into my garden?!
Awww, did you play with him? And feed him?
Ah, I sent him away, as gently as I could, and wiped away all his paw prints. That's all.
I didn't "let" him, he jumped the fence. It was no big deal. He didn't mess up your flowers or anything.
He was such a cute little thing. I couldn't scold him. He was so cute, you wouldn't have been able to either, $OwnerName$.
I did. In fact, I probably should've asked permission before I did this, but…
I also gave him a much-needed bath. He was such a cute little guy. I hope he comes back.
I knew you'd say that, $OwnerName$. You're just like me.
I not only fed him and played with him, I also gave him a bath and brushed his fur. Then he settled down for a nice long nap at my side while I finished with the garden.
I had a terrible day, $OwnerName$. Are you ready to hear my horrific story?
I was ironing your clothes, and for some reason, I just couldn't get the seams perfect! I tried over and over and over. Seams are one of my specialties, you know.
I was so frustrated! I tried ironing my own clothes, starting with the one I'm wearing now.
And wouldn't you know, it turned out perfectly! So I went back to ironing yours, and I just couldn't do it. Ugh…
To conclude, none of your clothes have been ironed. What a nightmare.
Hey, at least your shirt looks good.
Wait, so I don't have any ironed clothes to wear tomorrow?
That's correct. I'm so, so sorry. I feel absolutely horrible.
I have no excuse. I will stay up all through the night to attempt to get at least one outfit wrinkle-free for you to wear tomorrow.
I'm so sorry, I know I've completely ruined your— Excuse me? Did you just compliment me? Heh, I guess my shirt does look pretty good, doesn't it?
$OwnerName$, you are an amazing person. I am honored to work for you. Let me try ironing your clothes one more time. I think I can do it this time!
Oh! Um. Heh. T-thank you. A servant should look presentable and sharp at all times. See this edge here? I'm normally so good at getting the seams to an extra sharp point!
I feel inspired and motivated now. I will collect my ironing kit and try ironing your clothes again. Thank you for the compliment.
A-ah! W-what? N-nothing! Nothing happened today! N-n-nothing!
Ahhh, how do you always know when I'm trying to hide something, $OwnerName$?
Here, take a look at this paper. It says, "Your soul mate is lurking nearby. Expect an unexpected kiss at an unexpected place."
I got it from a fortune cookie sample at the grocery store.
<font color="#909090">(He takes back the paper and daintily places it in his inner pocket.)</font> I told you it was nothing.
You're not taking a fortune cookie seriously, are you?
Hey, hey! Congratulations!
Who says I'm taking it seriously? You asked if anything interesting happened. I answered. Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go mend your socks.
Of course not. Do you take me for an idiot? For the record, I've always carried I pack of mints on me. I didn't just start today.
Wh-what? No! It's not… I'm not… Ahem. Let's not talk about this anymore.
You've got it all wrong, $OwnerName$. It's just a silly fortune. I'm not stupid enough to get all excited over it.
Now if you'll excuse me, I believe I hear the kettle. Your tea is almost ready. Ahem. <font color="#909090">(He walks away, blushing hard.)</font>
Ah, today was just an ordinary day. Nothing to report, really.
How was your day, $OwnerName$?
Ah, I see. Some days pass by so peacefully. Perhaps it's days like this that make us truly happy.
The most notable event of the day is you talking to me, $OwnerName$. Other than that, I've just been listening to the birds chirping.
On days like this, I like to relax with a nice cup of tea.
In fact, that's just what you should do. Nothing like a sunny afternoon sipping a cup of tea. Just give me a moment to prepare it…
There you go. How do you like it? It's Royal Blend with a touch of cream, perfect for an afternoon as beautiful as this one. I'll leave you to enjoy your tea in peace.
I recently purchases an amazing Earl Grey tea. How about I treat you to a cup, $OwnerName$? Just give me a moment, and you'll have the best tea you've ever tasted in your life.
Here you go. My favorite Earl Grey blend. Do you taste the bergamot flavor? Magnificent! Do you like it?
I knew you would like it. The secret to brewing the perfect cup of tea is whispering for it to be delicious as you prepare it, and that's just what I did today.
Apologies, but I can't join you for tea at the moment. There are some items that require my immediate attention. Perhaps later.
Oh, would you like coffee instead of tea today? I will prepare your favorite latte, then.
I've carefully brewed the espresso and added fresh milk. I hope you like it. Oh, no, you don't need to save any for me. I don't drink coffee.
You want to know about my home? Hmm, I don't usually talk about myself. Let's see…
I come from a beautiful little place right by the sea, near a sharp cliff. It's cold and windy there, but the people are kind and love to sing.
I've been drinking tea since before I could walk. It reminds me of home. Oh, don't worry. I'm content with my life here. I just like to reminisce sometimes.

You want to know my favorite hand cream? You're aware I wear gloves, aren't you? Even if I didn't, scented creams would disrupt the delicate glean of teacups and plates. It would ruin the entire tea-drinking experience.
When I go out out, however, I have been known to dab on a small amount of light lavender or verbena scented lotion.
Does that answer your question?
Curiosity is a powerful thing. It cultivates knowledge! It is the foundation of human civilization! Perhaps you're curious about the linen towel draped over my arm?
Linen towels are essential for a servant. When a spot of tea drips from a spout, the linen towel comes to the rescue. When an errant crumb falls from a cracker, the linen towel brushes it away.
The most important rule is to use fresh towels every hour, pristine and crisply folded. If dirtied, it is perfectly acceptable to replace the towel more often than that.
The linen towel has become an icon of cleanliness, professionalism, comfort, and bliss.
Ah, what a wonderful day. The dishes were washed to a sparkle! My heart fluttered watching the laundry fluttering in the breeze!
The tea I poured reminded me of someone I knew, and the water I squeezed the linen towel felt like the melody of her voice.
She was a childhood friend. I still remember how she held onto her wide-brimmed hat against the breeze atop that cliff, how the skirt of her white dress caressed her legs.
…What am I talking about? I apologize, $OwnerName$. I've grown too comfortable around you. I never meant to share such a private memory.
Please forget what I just told you. I suppose even I get sentimental sometimes.
Hello. I don't think I've seen you before. How may I help you?
I'm here to see your master.
Oh, I don't need anything.
Hey, do I smell tea? It smells good!
Ah. Any friend of $OwnerName$ is an important guest. Please, make yourself comfortable.
Ah, please make yourself at home. Let me know if I can help you with anything.
Then why are you here? This property belongs to $OwnerName$. You, $male:sir,female:ma'am$, are trespassing!
Excuse me? Then you've come into this home uninvited? I'll be watching you. One wrong move, and I'm calling the authorities.
Why, yes! I'm brewing my favorite blend of Earl Grey. Would you like a cup?
It does, doesn't it? Such fine tea can be recognized by scent alone. I just brewed my last scoop of English Breakfast tea. I don't know when I'll be able to get tea that fine again.
I need to get to work. I wonder where $OwnerName$ is?
I will give this next task my all.
How may I help you?
May I ask who you're looking for?
How was your day today?
Excellent job.
It disappoints me when people don't keep their promises.
Rules are meant to be followed.
Hmm, the distinctive bitterness of Earl Grey becomes more prominent when sipped without a squeeze of lemon.
Oh, dear! I speck of dust on my shoe? I must polish it before anyone else notices!
I wonder what the world would look like if I had perfect vision?
Hmm, I like that.
I'm feeling a bit tired.
