Heeheehee, I guess I got caught. Here, try one. I waited hours for it!
Not a thing. Actually, one thing happened today: you kept interrupting me from my work!
Something major and tragic happened today. I broke a nail! Do you know how much it costs to get my nails this cute?
Aw, are you worried? Then you should know that I keep breathing in dust when I clean. Won't this stuff make me sick or something?
I'm not complaining! I'm just not used to this type of thing.
You do tend to complain a lot…
Don't worry. I'm used to your complaining by now.
Um, are you deaf? I just said I'm not complaining! I'm just not used to working as a maid! Ugh, it upsets me that you think so little of me!
Um, hello, I don't complain that much! You know what, I don't care what you think. You're really ticking me off!
Awww, are you complaining about my complaining? That's kind of cute, $OwnerName$! You're like a grumpy old bear!
<font color="#909090">(She's quiet for a while.)</font>
Hmph!
<font color="#909090">(She bursts out laughing.)</font> This is why we get along so well. You're so cute when you act goofy, $OwnerName$.
<font color="#909090">(She pretends she can't hear you.)</font>
Oh no! This is bad… Where did my o-ring band go? I can't make any jewelry without it!
Oh, hi $OwnerName$. I'm sorry, I'm a little busy right now. I lost something.
Can we talk later? I'm too distracted to focus right now.
Oooh, what'd you lose? Is it important?
I'll help you look for it.
$OwnerName$! I just said that I'm distracted! Will you leave me alone until I find it?
It's something that I need to craft necklaces. You know what? That's not important right now! You're bothering me. Go away!
<font color="#909090">(You get down on your hands and knees, searching the ground carefully. You find a small ring and hold it up triumphantly.)</font>
You found it! Thank you, thank you, $OwnerName$!
This ring is used to hope and close the small rings used in necklaces. I can't make necklaces without it!
<font color="#909090">(You carefully scan the floor, diligently searching, and then…)</font>
Thud!
<font color="#909090">(You bump heads with $MaidName$!)</font>
Ouch! <font color="#909090">(She rubs her head with her palm, surprised.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Suddenly, she bursts into laughter.)</font> Oh, $OwnerName$! You don't have to search for it that hard! Thank you for helping me. I know it'll turn up soon!
I was strolling through $map:02000064$ today and ran into $npc:11000711[gender:1]$. Do you know what she told me? She said I had bags under my eyes! That I looked "tired"!
She looks even more ragged than I do. No matter what she does, she— ah, never mind.
What were you going to say?
You're always so full of life and energy. Not tired at all.
Forget it. It was unkind. I never thought you were into mean gossip, $OwnerName$. I don't think that's a good look on you.
Why do you care? Is it because it's about $npc:11000711[gender:1]$? Are you a fan of hers? Hmph!
Aw, thanks! I work hard to be that way, so thank you for noticing!
Awww, $OwnerName$. Are you trying to sweet talk me? That's totally unlike you!
I'm very busy at the moment. Please do not disturb me.
…Are you mad? I'm sorry, but I really don't have time for you right now.
I wish something amazing would happen. The days get so boring.
Listening to $npc:11000406[gender:0]$ singing usually helps, but not today. I'm so bored.
Mm… Mm? Why are you staring at me? Please… stop…
<font color="#909090">($MaidName$'s cheeks are turning red.)</font> Oh, stop. You're making me blush!
Stop it, $OwnerName$! You're doing it again? Are you really that helpless to resist my good looks?
Hey, $OwnerName$, did you know your eyes sparkle when you stare at me?
Stop staring. Your puppy eyes lost their charm long ago. Come now, no need to pout.
Fine. Let's see who can go the longest without blinking. Ready, set, go!
Forget it. I'm not in the mood, so stop staring at me!
Ugh, why would you tell such an old joke? Nobody has laughed at that joke for years!
This explains why you have so few friends, $OwnerName$. Tsk.
I'll laugh to be nice. Haha. There.
Please stop with the lame jokes. I'll tell you some that are actually funny.
First up: How do you get a tissue to dance?
You put a little boogie in it! Hahaha, isn't that hilarious?
Next up: What did the zero say to the eight?
Stumped? Then I'll tell you: Nice belt! Hahaha, get it?
Here's the last one, and it's a stumper. Don't be mad if you can't figure it out. Here goes: Why did the tomato blush?
You don't know, do you? Hehehe, the answer is: Because he saw the salad dressing!
Now those are some funny jokes. Don't tell me any more jokes unless they're funnier that those ones!
<font color="#909090">($MaidName$ looks at you mournfully.)</font>
It's not you, $OwnerName$. I'm just really not in the mood for jokes right now.
I was thinking of my sister. She's the one who taught me how to make jewelry.
But I haven't heard from her in a long time. I don't even know where she is. Whenever I think of her, I get a pang in my heart so sharp I want to cry.
I'm sorry. I don't know why I'm telling you this. Forget I said anything, okay?
<font color="#909090">(You see $MaidName$'s eyes twinkle.)</font>
Hah! Hah! Hah! That's the funniest joke I've ever heard in my life! You're so hilarious, $OwnerName$!
…Not. Get a clue, $OwnerName$!
How many times do I have to tell you? Stop telling lame jokes or you'll lose the few friends you have left!
If you're reading lame joke books, why don't you go out and do something productive with your life? Like buying me treats or collecting necklace materials for me? Or helping the needy or something?
Please just— Yikes. Um, I just realized I'm nagging at you like you're a friend. I'm sorry if I crossed a line, $OwnerName$. I just want what's best for you. You know that, right?
Who are you? You can't just barge in here! Did you come to see me? Still, that doesn't make this okay!
I'm here to see your master.
Oh, I don't need anything.
I came to see you.
Oh, you're a friend of $OwnerName$? Well, make yourself at home, and try not to bother me.
Are you for real? And here I thought $OwnerName$ had no friends! This is amazing!!
Well, if you have no business here, you'd better leave. I just mopped, and I don't need the floor getting all muddy again.
Suuuuure. Just be honest and say you're here to talk to me. It happens all the time. I'm used to it, really.
I don't think we've met. Are you a member of my fan club? I know you want to see me, but you shouldn't bother me at work, you know?
I'm too popular for my own good. Not a day goes by without someone wanting my attention. So what do you want? My autograph?
Well, everything is looking pretty clean.
So, this is where I'll work from now on, huh?
I don't think I've seen you before. How may I help you?
Do you even know whose house this is?!
Where have you been? I've been waiting for you all day!
You can come home late once in a while, but don't make it a habit. I get lonely!
This is a disappointment. A big disappointment…
I hate being treated like this!
Whoa!
What do I do?
Err? I didn't know this was here.
Ack! What's this?
I'd better start working now. Wait, I haven't done my hair.
Do I smell… some sweet macaroons?
I'll just read a few pages of this magazine while no one's looking…
What is it?
How was your day today?

(Pay $MaidSalary$.)
Hah hah, thanks! I'm happy to work for you for this month!
Has it been so long already? Thanks for asking me before I had to ask. I hate asking for money.
Ah! You don't know how long I've been waiting for this! Finally, I've got some money to spend. Hah hah!
Whew, I was debating whether I should cancel my savings account because I'd have nothing to put in it. Thank goodness I won't have to!
$OwnerName$, I was looking at the calender today and saw that our contract is expiring soon. Just wanted to let you know. No pressure or anything!
Then again, maybe I'm worring for nothing. Hah hah.

Hey, you don't have to do this right now. If you're going through a hard time, I can wait. Don't worry about it.
A paycheck, again? You already paid me for this month. Hm, maybe I should take it as a bonus… Hah hah hah!
Ah, I told you it can wait. I'm all right for now. Did you forget? I've got two jobs. I'm more worried about you, to be honest.
Err? What's going on? I've never been in this situation before, so I don't know what to do. Give me some time to think.
I wonder what the fines are for canceling a bond before it matures…

The paycheck I get from $map:02000068$ barely covers my living expenses.
$OwnerName$! How are you doing?

I don't know what to say. I opened a CD account with Goldus Bank to save money for a ship, but at this rate, I might have to cancel it before it matures.
I thought being a butler was a stable job. I'm starting to think I was wrong. Guess nothing in life is certain…
Do you even have enough money to feed yourself? I also get money from $map:02000068$, so I'm not completely broke. At least I can feed myself. I'm worried that you can't.
Oh, a drink? Sure, what kind were ya thinking?
Let me know what you need!
About me? Sure, what do you want to know?

Did you eat? Here, eat this. Wait. Why is your face so gaunt?
Have you lost weight? This is why you shouldn't skip meals! Here, eat this.
You cooked this?
It's delicious!
Hah hah, no. Why? Do you want me to? I stay away from the kitchen. The first dish I ever made was terrible, and that scared me off.
Oh, this? The young lady living across the way gave it to me for helping her hammer some nails. I think she lives by herself.
Why are you giving me that look? I didn't ask! I just sort of got that impression.
I know, right? I like it, too! I helped our next door neighbor move some furniture, and his wife gave it to me. She's a great cook.
The lady living across from us gave this to me for helping her hang some curtains, but it doesn't taste good to me. Try it. Maybe you'll like it.
You hungry, $OwnerName$? How about a snack?
Ah, I cooked this. I had some time to kill since today was my day off. I don't know if it tastes good.
It… doesn't taste good.
It tastes okay.
Oh, it doesn't? But come on, $OwnerName$. I promise it won't make you sick and I cooked it just for you. Could you just try to finish it… for me?
What? That can't be right. I followed the recipe so carefully! Give it to me. Let me taste it.
<font color="#909090">(He takes a bite and spits it out immediately.)</font> Yuck!! Ugh… I'm sorry…
Oh, really? Here, let me take a bite! Hah hah, I cooked it, but I didn't taste it. My last attempt at cooking wasn't so great. Hah hah hah…
Hah hah… I think I've gotten better at cooking. Maybe I should try to cook something else. I'll let you taste it when I do!

I don't know if I'm exhausted or have a cold. Either way, I really don't feel good. Take this. I picked it up on my way here from $map:02000068$. I brought you one because I don't want you to catch what I have.
It's good for your health. If you don't want to take it now, you can take it later.
How are you feeling?
Thank you.
You're welcome. You should stay away from me until I get better. I don't want you to get sick because of me.
Sure. You should eat well and get plenty of rest. Ugh, being sick is the worst. It always makes me miss my parents.
What, are you worried about me? Hah hah, it's no big deal. I'll be all right. I just need some rest.
Aww, I'm feeling a bit achy… and cold too. But don't worry. I took some medicine. I'll feel better soon.
I picked up some food on my way here from $map:02000069$. I was so hungry when I got off my other job, I just had to eat, so I ate mine there.
Mrs. $npc:11000453[gender:1]$ is the best cook I know. The dish I tried was so good, I had to bring you some, too!
Thanks.
I'm not really hungry.
Oh, you're not? I wouldn't have bought it if you told me…
Huh? Why not? Don't tell me you're on a diet, because you already look perfect!
I know you'll love it. Come on, take a bite!
Hah hah, you're welcome. Watching you eat it, I want to eat it again. Can I have a bite?
Hah hah! Do you know what this is? It's a prize I won in an event! It pays off to be strong, ya know!
I've participated in so many events that I know exactly what to do to win them.
Can I have your prize?
What kind of event did you win?
But… it's mine. Get your own by winning your own event.
Huh? No. I want to sell this and save up the money.
It's called $map:61000006$. I can give you a tip.
When you're on the path, look around carefully. You'll find moving platforms. They're the key to winning the event. I'll show them to you later.
I won in $map:61000004$! Have you tried it? For me, moving from one disconnected ladder to another was the biggest challenge.
Our upstairs neighbor moved out today. He's been a pretty good neighbor, so I helped him move his furniture.
He left a lot of things behind. Some of it looked pretty good, so I brought this with me. What do you think?
Why did you bring home trash?
Nice find! Good work!
Trash? That's harsh. Just because he didn't want this doesn't mean it's trash.
Haven't you heard? One man's trash is another man's treasure. It'd cost quite a lot to buy this new.
All it needed was a bit of dusting, and it's just like new! Where do you want me to put it?
Actually, it was broken in a couple spots, but I fixed it right up, and now you can't even tell! Piece of cake.
Hey, I picked up this $item:90000001$ on my way here from $map:02000068$. You can have it. I know it's not much.
I live here, too, you know. And I don't pay rent, so…
Thanks.
You have any more?
Huh? More? That's all I got. Sorry. And hey, maybe I'll just keep all the $item:90000001$ I find from now on, if you're going to be so ungrateful.
You want more? But that's all I got today. Hey, I you bring stuff I find all the time.
You're welcome. I'm sorry I don't have more to give you. I want to help but you know my situation. Every spare meso goes towards my new ship.
Ah, it's no big deal. I've got a knack for finding dropped items. I'll bring you more later.
Welcome. Nothing much happened today. How are you? If you're tired, go get some rest. I'll take care of the housework.
Oh, I found some torn clothes while folding laundry. What did you do that shredded your clothes like that? Are you sure you're not bleeding somewhere?
If you're hurt, don't try to hide it. Just go to the hospital. You shouldn't worry about money when you're sick. All right?
Well, I cleaned the house and worked out as usual. I feel off if I don't work out every day.
Being the captain of a ship is not easy. I have to build up my strength to sail out to sea. Things will be especially tough when the waves are high.
Speaking of which, $OwnerName$, how'd you like to work out with me? Health is the most important thing, after all!
You want something to drink? Sure, I was just working out.
Huh? Do I smell? Sorry. I'll take a shower after you leave.
We're friends, but… I don't know, I don't want to make you uncomfortable.
$OwnerName$, you know how it's been really windy out at sea not far from $map:02000062$? Well, it turns out the weather has been strange all over the world.
I went to $map:02000069$ and met $npc:11000455[gender:0]$. He told me there was a blizzard in some temperate plains and that it poured in a desert where it hasn't rained for decades.
Wear warm layers when you go out, so you're prepared. Me? I'm all right. I mostly stay inside, plus I'm strong because I work out every day.
Anyway, sometimes when I think about what you do out there, I feel, you know, upset. You know what I mean, right?
Have I told you about $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$? I loved "$npcName:11000444[gender:0]$'s Travels" so much I read it until the pages wore out. He's my hero!
I just heard that he's on Victoria Island right now! He was apparently stranded by a mysterious storm. He must be getting ready to get back on his journey by now.
Mm… I thought about asking him to let me tag along. "$npcName:11000444[gender:0]$'s Travels" changed my life, you know.
But then I thought to myself, what I really want is to be the hero of "$MaidName$'s Travels." You get what I mean?
There's a guy named $npcName:11000022[gender:0]$ in $map:02000062$. He always says he wants to go on an adventure, but I'm not sure if he means it.
I don't think he's saving money to buy a ship like I am, either. I have a feeling he's all talk.
Why am I talking about $npcName:11000022[gender:0]$, you ask? Because I need your opinion. Should I accept him into my crew?
Sigh… I can't think about adventures right now. $OwnerName$, today…
I had just gotten out of the shower and was wearing nothing except a towel around my waist, when someone opened the door and barged in.
At first, I thought it was you, but it was actually the lady from next door. Something is not right with her. I'm grateful for the food she give me sometimes, but…
The way she looks at me makes my hair stand on end. $OwnerName$, can we move?

I expected this, but working two jobs is not easy. I like that I have enough money to save to buy a ship, but I'm so busy that I don't have time to actually plan the adventure. There's no end to the housework.
I washed the comforters today. Not with a washing machine, though. I just throw them into the bathtub and press them by foot.
It's a ton of fun, and also good exercise. $OwnerName$, you should try it with me next time.
I was reluctant about being a male housekeeper, but it turned out I'm really good at it. I mean it.

When you mop, you have to put a some real effort into it to get the floor sparkling clean, or else you're just spreading water around. Same with ironing. You have to press the iron hard to smooth all the wrinkles at once.
Cooking also requires the constant kneading of flour, and kneading is tough, even for strong men. That's why tough men are better at housework.
One day, I'm going to buy a ship and sail out to sea. Of course, I'll have a crew, too!
I'll be Captain $MaidName$. Doesn't that roll off the tongue nicely? Hah hah hah! I can't wait to go on an adventure like $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$!
Did you know there are many small islands around Victoria Island? Some are uninhabited, and who knows? Maybe they have treasures hidden on them!
If I find enough treasure, I can buy a bigger ship and have a bigger crew. Then I'll be able to sail farther out to the sea and experience all the wonderful things I read in "Colombo's Travels."
Merfolk are real, did you know that? Ooh, so are ghost ships hidden deep amidst heavy fog! And squid as tall as buildings! Those are real, too!
When I'm out on my adventures, I might discover a new continent. Then I'd have to name it. Oh, hmm, I'd better start thinking about names…
I don't have a hometown. It sounds strange, but I really don't, because I was born at sea.
My parents were international traders. They sailed to many different countries. I was born while they were sailing. That's why I don't have a hometown.
So I have no place to return to. I didn't feel like I belonged anywhere, until…
Until I came to live with you in this house. It's kind of nice having a place to call home. Just saying.
Since birth, I'd traveled the world with my parents. A few years ago, I decided to strike out on my own. Why? Because I was an adult!
I said goodbye and left them at the Victoria Island dock. I was itching to go on an adventure of my own, but I didn't have enough money to buy a ship.
Then I got to know about Helping Hands, so I took a training course. I took the guide course, and since I have experience in sailing, I was able to get a job with $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$.
Lately, the sea has been so rough. Not many ships are coming to $map:02000062$ and that slowed down my job considerably. That doesn't mean I get paid less, but still.
Since I had more time than before, I decided to take on another job. I needed money. Didn't I tell you? Ships are not cheap.

I thought housekeeping was something I could do. Although I didn't take the housekeeping course at Helping Hands, I was a graduate, so the company helped me get a job. The result? I couldn't ask for more!
Mm? Who are you? Are you here to see $OwnerName$?
Yep!
Nope!
Who are you?
Then do you think maybe you're talking to the wrong person?
Why didn't you say so? I don't have anything to give you, but make yourself at home.
Well, then did you come to look around the house? There's not much to see, but knock yourself out.
You don't even know $OwnerName$? Wow, you must have too much time on your hands. Well, stay as long as you want.
Call me $MaidName$. But don't ask me any other questions.
I'm $MaidName$. Haven't you seen a male servant before?
I'm happy to be here!
Nice to meet you!
How may I help you?
May I ask who you are?
Welcome home!
Did you just get home?
I'm worried…
I really don't want to cancel my CD account…
Ah! I forgot to hang the laundry!
I'm scared of the lady next door…

Now that I've been paid, I'm going to treat myself to a feast. I love to have food delivered to the house!
Remember not to get behind on paying me. Ugh, I thought I was going to starve to death. Now that I have my paycheck, I'm going to order some pizza.
I was going to leave if you didn't pay me by the end of the day. You're lucky you did.

Hey, $OwnerName$.
I just had this delivered, and I don't like it. You can eat it if you want.

Ugh, it's too cold!
It's delicious!

Cold or hot, your belly doesn't know the difference. Just eat what I feed you.
Of course, it's delicious. It's a gift from me. Next time, I'm going to eat it all myself. Don't even think of asking for a bite.
It's exactly what you wanted, isn't it? Don't worry, I'll order from that restaurant again soon.
It's exhausting taking care of you…
$OwnerName$, I'd like to offer you my leftover snacks from yesterday. They're a bit stale, but you can eat them if you want.
If you eat even a bite, I expect you to get me more delicious snacks in return.
I bought you snacks yesterday!
Sure.
That was yesterday! A new day requires new snacks! What, are you really that stingy?
Are you calling me ungrateful? Forget it. I'll buy my own snacks!
Bwahahaha! Just the thought of new snakes makes my mouth water!
Why don't you go now, then? I want my snacks right now!
Whew, it's hot in here. Take this cool drink to refresh yourself.
Don't you think it's like an oven in here?
Thanks for the drink! Just what I needed.
Actually, I'm freezing…
If you're cold, you're dehydrated. That's what I always say!
Pssh, I'm sweating! How can you be cold? <font color="#909090">(He scratches at the patch of white fur on his neck.)</font>
I thought it was just me, because of my fur. But it seems like you're hot, too.
Am I hot because of my fur or because of the weather?
$npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ gave me some of food he cooked, but I don't think I like it. Taste it.
How does it taste? Well? Well??
It's delicious!
Did you remember to thank $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$?
Why should I? $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ always gives me food.
$npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ asked me the same question as she passed, but she wouldn't have dared if she knew I was older than her.
I love $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$'s food! It's my favorite!
…I feel hungry all of a sudden. Come on, share with me!
$OwnerName$, I found this while napping inside the storage chest.
Is it yours?
Never seen it before. Nooo idea whose it could be…
Yup, it's mine.
Then give it back! I'm going to keep it.
Strange. I thought I already swept this place for valuables… Where did this come from?
I would've kept it if I knew it belonged to you. Bah, I shouldn't have even asked.
I found something you lost. To pay me back, give me some snacks.
I found this while playing in $map:2000001$. Your house is too empty. Use it to decorate a bit more.
Make the house more comfortable for me, all right?
Sure.
I like the minimalist look.
But there aren't enough comfy places for me to lie down! Come on, just use it!
Are you saying you don't want things from me? I brought it all the way home, and you don't even say thank you.
I want this place to feel more homey. Decorate for me, okay?
The more furniture you have, the less floor for me to mop. Fill your house up with stuff, okay?
I found this between the sheets of your bed.
Did you lose it?
What were you doing on my bed?
Thank you.
Searching for this item you lost! Obviously! Not taking a nap…
I got tired while cleaning, so I put my feet up for a minute. I'm entitled to breaks, you know.
I was going to keep it, but I changed my mind. Lucky you.
It was good I decided to take a break, wasn't it?
Stop trying to tell me how I do my job, and just go out there and… do whatever it is that you do!
The house is so dusty because you keep tracking in dirt!
I just don't understand why you're so dirty. Stop fooling around and take a shower!
One of your friends stopped by but left without giving me a name.
I didn't ask because… I didn't think of it, okay?
I don't feel like doing anything today. If you insist that I pick something to do, I choose to lie down and rest.
What do you mean resting isn't work? Of course it is! It involves thinking!
I have to think real hard about what snacks I should eat today, tomorrow, the rest of the week… That stuff is really important to me!
Okay, okay! I'll do it! I'll clean! Sheesh.
Why do you want me to clean all the time? The house will just end up getting dirty again. Why can't I just leave it dirty?
You know those rough-looking guys in $map:2000001$? Yeah, I'm their leader. Stop scolding or I'll tell them to make your life difficult.
What do you mean, you're not scared of my friends. They're level 10. Got that? Level 10!
Stop harassing me or I'll quit, I mean it!
If I quit, you won't have anyone to keep your house clean. It doesn't just clean itself, you know?
Enough is enough!
Argh! Why do you treat me like this? I just want to be happy and take naps. Is that too much to ask?
Why can't you just let me be happy?! Don't you think I deserve it?
I came to $map:2000001$ for $npc:11000075[gender:1]$'s event. I've always been in love with $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, ever since I was little. I even dream about her sometimes.
I fell in love with the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ because of a book. She was illustrated as a character in it, and the moment I saw the picture, that was it for me.
I came to $map:2000001$ to see the love of my life, $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, but then the ceremony was canceled.
I was so desperate to see her, I sprinted toward the palace. All I wanted was a glance. Instead, $npc:11000119[gender:0]$ appeared.
I tried to shove past him, but he tripped me. Can you believe that? Who is he to stop me from seeing her?
I accepted this job because it's the best! I get to live in someone else's house, eat their food, sleep in their bed, and I even get paid! All I have to do in return is a bit of cleaning.
But the cleaning part isn't as easy as you'd think.
Dust bunnies lurk in every corner. As soon as you sweep, the dust scatters.
And where do you think that dust goes? Your bed! The bathroom sink! Between the cracks of the living room floor! And the it's back to square one for me.
Now if I just leave the dust bunnies where they are, what do you think happens? They accumulate until they grow so big, you can just pluck them away. So you see, the less you clean, the better.
Ever wonder why I complain so much? I wasn't always like this, you know. The world has made me what I am.
Everyone I've met has been mean to me. I tried to be nice to them, but all I got back was bullying and name-calling.
You don't have to be nice to others, $OwnerName$. They'll only hurt you, no matter how nice you are to them.
Don't show the world your weaknesses. You'll always regret it.
Have you met $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$? I used to be good friends with him.
He's not the sharpest, but he's stronger than anyone else I know. Let me tell you a story about him and $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$.

$npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ has loved cooking since she was young. She was always searching for ingredients. One day, she went to $map:2000043$ even though the grownups told her not to. She was climbing a hill, when suddenly the ground shook and a big rock came rolling straight toward her!

She was so scared that she fainted. $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ saw what was happening, leapt over, and shattered the rock with a single punch! He saved $npcName:11000002[gender:1]$. That's how strong $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ is.
$npcName:11000002[gender:1]$ thinks $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$'s father saved her, but I saw it all. He used to be so nice when he was young. I don't know what changed him over the years.
Huh? What was I doing in $map:2000043$? That's none of your business!
<font color="#909090">(He wipes crumbs away from his mouth.)</font> Who are you? You friends with my boss?

Then sit down and stay quiet. We'll see what the boss has to say.
They what are you doing here? Get out, before I make you get out!
Great timing. I'm starving. Why don't you go get me something to eat?
I'm the glue that holds this household together. Name's $MaidName$. Night to meet you.
Why don't you tell me who you are first? Sheesh.
What? Where the heck am I?
Did you call me?

Such a mess. I'm tired of cleaning!
So… hungry…

I'm getting all sweaty. Ugh.

When the wind becomes overwhelming, mimic the reeds. Follow the wind without losing your footing. Hah hah hah, are you thinking I've finally lost my mind? I just thought you could use some encouragement.
I miss my wife. When things got tough for us, like they are for your now, Madelle helped me get through it. What I'm trying to say is, I may not be able to do much, but I'm here for you.
Everyone should experience poverty at least once. It gives you perspective. Once you've climbed a cliff, even the steepest hill is no longer intimidating.

Oh, I almost forgot.
It felt so strange cooking for the first time in decades. Worse, everything was so blurry I could hardly tell the difference between sugar and salt.
So I just used the first thing I grabbed. Turns out, it was the wrong one. But you looked hungry, so here it is!
It's too salty.
It's delicious.
Is it? Then please spit it out. This is your house and I'm your employee. You don't have to eat it if you don't want to.
Consuming too much salt makes you thirsty, which leads to drinking too much water, which leads to swelling in your face. So you should stop eating the food.
Hah hah hah, I know I'm not a good cook. Thank you for saying that.
When you're hungry, anything you eat tastes good. Hah hah hah, slow down. No one's going to fight you for that.
Guess what I have in my hand…?
Snacks! I thought you might be hungry.
It tastes better than it looks. I hope.
Great! I was feeling a little hungry!
I'll pass. I'm, um, trying to lose weight. Yeah.
Why? You're nothing but skin and bone. You look like you could blow away in the wind. Come on, just eat it.
Are you? Being overweight can cause diabetes, high blood pressure, hardening of the arteries, and other chronic diseases. Hm, should I be worried?
Hah hah hah, that's why I've made this! When you're my age, you get to read people more easily.
Do you get always get hungry around this time? Because I do.
I was visiting the senior center today, and someone gave me this drink. I thought you might like it.
When you get to be my age, you already know what you like and don't want to try new things.
Aw, you should try it. You might like it.
Hey, thanks!
No, thank you. New food stopped tasting good to me some time ago. At first, it all tasted disgusting, but now it just doesn't taste like anything.
I'll be happy just to watch you drink it. Go on, take it.
The person who gave it to me said it's very nutritious. If you like it, let me know. I can ask him for more.
I'm so glad you accepted it. I would've felt awkward if you said refused.
I cooked some food my wife used to make. I never watched her cook, though.
It tastes like its missing something, but I can't quite put my finger on it… What do you think?
Hmm, not bad, but could use a sprinkle of MSG.
It's pretty delicious just the way it is.
Hmm? MSG? I'll just use a pinch, and… Mm, mm! Yes, now it tastes perfect!
Hmmm, why don't you try tasting it again in a little bit and let me know what you think then?
I'm glad you're not a picky eater, $OwnerName$. Thank you for eating everything I cook for you.
You may think so, but I can tell something is missing. I should've asked my wife when I could… It's just another one of the many, many things I miss about her.
Tsk, you should be more careful. I found this by the front door on my way out.
Usually, I can't see far enough to notice an item on the ground, but lucky for you, I had to adjust my shoes.
Thanks for finding it.
It's not mine.
It's not? Some stranger barged into the house the other day. Maybe he dropped it. I'd better keep it in case he comes back.
Then how did it get here? Anyway, since this is your house, the item belongs to you now, so you take it.
Happy to be of help.
You should take better care of your things.
I ran into Choi the real estate agent on my way home today. One of his clients just moved to a smaller and gave him a bunch of furniture that wouldn't fit.
It was way too much, but Choi didn't want to throw it out, either. He asked me to take whatever I wanted, so I grabbed this. It looked like the best of the bunch. It's all yours now!
I don't really need it…
Thanks!
Hm, then what should I do with it? I don't think Choi will take it back, and I don't want to throw it away.

Hah hah hah, I guess I shouldn't have taken it! Everyone makes mistakes, and mistakes teach you valuable lessons. Those who claim never to have made a mistake are either lying to themselves or not living life to the fullest.
So I picked something good, huh? I'm glad to be of help.
Do you need anything else? Choi had a lot of other stuff, too.
Do you know what happened today? I was out walking when I ran into an overturned wagon. I helped the owner move it back into place.
And he gave me money for helping him. Hah hah hah! Here, take it. I've got no use for so much money. Think of it as an allowance from your grandpa.
Hey, thanks!
I can't take your money!
It was easy money. Come on, I insist.
I wouldn't have offered it if I didn't care about you. The greatest happiness in life comes from knowing that you're being loved. This may not be the best way to show it, but I'm quite fond of you.
What a great day! I got to help someone, get free money, and give you an allowance! Hah!
Hah hah hah, how wonderful! Oof, I'm aching all over now. I'll probably spend more on pain medicine than I earned…
Not much. I worked around the house all day.
A writer once said the people weren't born to work. If we were, it wouldn't make us so tired.
I agree with him, now that I know how tiresome housework really is.
I was thinking of my wife while I cleaned today. She used to hum when she did her chores.
So I tried that today. It actually lifted my spirits and made the work less boring.
Nothing happened to me or the house, but…
I met Choi the real estate agent while taking a walk. He said he saw someone hanging onto a flying eagle.
I don't know why he makes such absurd claims sometimes. It would've been more believable if he said he saw someone hanging onto a balloon. Hah hah.
While I was grocery shopping, I saw the comedian who plays the fool on that popular TV show. The kids there were copying his character and laughing at him.
A great comedy writer once said, "The toughest role in comedy is the fool, and playing it requires a genius."
I was watching a TV quiz show this morning. There were three doors. Two of them had a goat behind them, and the third had an expensive mount. The contestant didn't know which was which, of course.
So he picked a door. The host opened one of the other doors to reveal a goat. He then asked the contestant if he wanted to change his choice. What would you do if it were you?
I'm not a funny person, and I don't know any funny stories. Hah hah hah. But I know how to keep people engaged in what I'm saying, and that's to tell them what I think of them.
I can tell you what I think of you, if you want. Oh, your ears are already perking up! Hah hah!
Once upon a time… … …
Are you asleep?
You want to ask me something personal?
We all are like the moon: each one of us has a dark side that we don't want to show others.
If you're asking about my dark side, I'd rather not talk about it. Let's talk about yours instead. I'm all ears.
You've been all over Victoria Island. Which part do you like the most?
I don't care if you go anywhere else, but please don't go to $map:2000124$.
One morning I woke up to realize that all my desire for worldly wealth had vanished overnight. Everything here is fleeting.
The realization that the years you have left are fewer than the years you've already lived does that to you.
An old scholar once said man's purpose is to make meaningless things meaningful. I'd better live whatever life I have left to the fullest, so I can die without regrets.
I really like this job. When my wife passed, I was so heartbroken that I didn't want to do anything for a long, long time.
Then I realized living in the past was doing me more harm than good.
So I decided to let the past go, enjoy the present, and wait for whatever the future brings.
I started writing a while ago. But I'm not writing a novel.
I'm not writing something to show others. It's just for myself.
Someone once told me that writing helps you deal with difficult emotions and find happiness again.
So I'm writing to be happy. Please don't be too nosy about what I'm writing.
Does my writing include things about you? Well… You'll see for yourself if I decide to show you one day.
You want to know about me and my wife? I can't think of anything special to say. Hah hah.
It was always just the two of us, me and Madelle. We couldn't have children… That was hard for both of us.
In hindsight, maybe that made us even closer. It was a pain we shared together.
Am I sorry that I don't have children? No. But I miss the time I shared with my wife.
Being with Madelle, I always felt warm and peaceful. We'd been together for so long that we could read each other's thoughts. But when I think about it now, I wish I had talked to her more often.
Do you have someone you love? If not, I hope you find someone as good as my Madelle.
I didn't hear the bell ring. May I ask who you are? Are you here to see the owner of the house?
Yep!
Nope!
Who are you?
I work for him. If you'd like me to pass along a message… Actually, no. That was presumptuous of me. You probably want to speak in person.
I see. Just pretend I'm not here and make yourself at home.
Then what brings you here? How did you get in, anyway? Was the door open?
Then what brings you here? If you're here for an open house, you've got the wrong address. This home is not for sale.
Common courtesy would be introduce yourself first before asking, but I'll cut you some slack. I'm not a stickler for the rules anyway, hah hah.
I am the housekeeper. Now, may I ask who you are?
Nice to meet you. Hah hah.
I'm happy to be here!
May I ask who you're looking for?
Who are you?
You're home.
Home sweet home, isn't it?
I feel a bit restless…
Don't worry about this old man…
All right!
Life is… life. It is what you make of it.
Ah, what was I thinking?
What do I do?
What should I do now?
Hmm… I wish I could see better…
How's the weather outside?
Can I help you?
Mm? What is it, dear?

Will my $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ will ever grow up? He cried all morning for new shoes. Doesn't he know what mommy has to go through to feed him?

There's a new juice that's all the rage amongst the young folk of $map:2000001$. I tried making it today.
The mineral water from $map:2000089$ was difficult to procure, but besides that, it wasn't too hard to make. What do you think?
Did you go to $map:2000089$ yourself?
Why is this juice so popular in $map:2000001$?
I didn't leave your house unattended, if that's what you're asking. I made $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ help me.
Do you even know where $map:2000089$ is? It's deep in a forest. Do you think an old lady like me would survive that journey?
The youngsters of $map:2000001$ believe sharing this juice with people that they love will make their love last forever. How do you like it?
It's because of a rumor that it promotes eternal love when lovers drink it together.
I don't believe it, though. I'm sure it's just a corporate scheme.
I made a snack with some of the leftover ingredients you had in the kitchen. My $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ just loves sweets. I hope you like these, too, $OwnerName$.
You can eat it all, dearie. When you get to be my age, it all goes straight to the hips.
What? You look great!
Thanks!
I can see the snack lifting your mood, hun. Sugar does that to you.
I didn't think you'd scarf it down so fast. Don't blame me if you get a tummyache later!
Thank you for saying that, dearie. Aren't you just the sweetest!
Tsk, you're such a bad liar. Your eyes gave you away. I had quite the figure back in the day, you know… It's not much fun getting old.
I noticed you're having a hard time waking up in the morning. I made this to help start your day off right.
It's a potion with all kinds of healthy ingredients in it. Drink up. It'll wake you up right away.
It's delicious!
Why don't you drink some, too?
Huh? It is? That can't be right. It's healthy, sure, but it's not supposed to taste good…
Oh, you're just saying that to be nice. No health drink actually tastes good. Even I can't drink a full glass of it!
Are you worried about my health, hun? Don't worry. I already had some.
You have a good heart, dearie. I wish $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ was as good as you. Then I wouldn't have to worry about him all the time.
$OwnerName$, I cooked you up something special. Nothing is more important than eating three meals a day, you know.
Eating well is the cornerstone to good health, after all.
I'll eat it later.
Thanks for the food!
No, no. You shouldn't skip meals. Eat it right now, even if you don't want to. Trust me!
Food doesn't taste good when it's cold. Try to eat at least some of it. $OwnerName$, you're as bad as $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ sometimes…
Oh, I love how you eat anything I give you. I wish $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ ate as well as you do.
I'm glad you like my food. You've gained weight since I've started working here. Perhaps it's time to cut some carbs. Hmm…

A salesman visited today. I told him I wasn't interested, be he insisted I take a look at his wares. I was really just only going to look, but then I thought you might like this, so I bought it for you.
What do you think? Do you like it?
Thank you.
It's not good to make impulse purchases.
I know, but he was such a smooth talker! Maybe I just shouldn't talk to anyone I don't already know.
But I got it for 50 mesos off! Ahhh, I guess you're right. But what can I do about it now?
It looks good on you, $OwnerName$! And I got a great deal on it, too!
I knew you'd love it, $OwnerName$. I also bought a couple of things for $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$. Hee hee.
$npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is really good with his hands. He dropped by yesterday to take a look around, then stopped by again today and brought this. He made it himself!
It matches your house perfectly, don't you think?
Sure.
Wait. Who's $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$?
Oh, didn't I tell you? $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is an old neighbor of mine.
My son $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ loves him. I'm sure you've seen him around $map:2000017$.

I met him $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ in $map:2000001$. We became friends because of $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$. He said he used to be a $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$, so I have no idea where he learned to make something like this!
It's great, isn't it? I told you $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is good with his hands. Now I want to do something for him in return. Maybe he'll like my special pudding!
$npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is so kind, don't you think? Now, $OwnerName$, why don't place it somewhere right now? It'll brighten things up!
Today a stranger came and begged me for food. I felt sorry for him, so I gave him some leftover rice and chicken. He ate two bowls of rice! Before he left, he gave me some mesos.
I really didn't want to take his money, but he insisted.
You shouldn't feed strangers!
What was he like?
I know I shouldn't, but I couldn't say no to such a sad-looking face. I didn't even think to ask his name.
It was just leftovers! He looked familiar, somehow… Like maybe I've seen his face on a leaflet in $map:02000100$.
He wore goggles around his head and a red cape on his shoulders. He seemed anxious. Couldn't stop peering around as he ate. Whatever his story is, it can't be a good one.
I asked him his name, but he refused to say. He was blond and had a scar on his face.
He was a bit intimidating, to be honest. I could tell he was on the run. Still, I couldn't refuse him. I could tell he hadn't eaten or slept in days…
You came at the just the right time. I've got something to tell you.

I wanted to grill some eels for dinner, but I couldn't get the fire going and didn't want to use the stove. Fire-grilled eels taste best, you know. A passing mage offered to help, so I gladly accepted.

But then he hollered, "I'll burn you all!" and shot a giant fireball at the eels! He would've burned down the whole house, but then he shouted "I'll freeze you all!" and put out the fire with an ice bolt.
Nothing much happened. Oh, where did time go? I'm not even halfway done with my cooking.
Time goes by so quickly when I work around the house, but don't you wander off. Your food is almost ready. I made mushroom hot pot for you today to invigorate you.
Sure, I know something interesting. Sometimes, the food I toil so hard over disappears!
I don't know how it's possible. Is someone stealing it?
I never hear footsteps, so it has to be an animal. Maybe a stray cat or something. It's so frustrating!
What's my specialty, you ask? Hee hee, grilled eels, with a delicious sauce!
$npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ loves them so much that sometimes he stops by my house just to eat them.
People always tell me I should open a grilled eel restaurant, but I want to keep cooking a hobby, not a job.
Hmm, a young lady has stopped by a lot recently to visit me. She wants to learn how to cook for her boyfriend. She's a cute girl with glasses… I can't remember her name.
Yesterday, I taught her how to cook mushroom hot pot. I showed her how to prepare the $npc:21000001$, and suddenly she paled and burst into tears.
She said the $npc:21000001$ looked so pitiful that she couldn't chop them up. Ahh, she may be too soft-hearted to be a good cook.
To me, cooking is all about love. From deciding the menu to picking the ingredients to the actual preparation, I think about who I'm feeding and what would make them happy.
That's why you should try to enjoy the food that I cook for you, even if it isn't your favorite. Got it?
Good ingredients make good food. Speaking of which, did you know $map:2000076$ is stocked with amazing ingredients?

Fresh eggs, milk, pork, beef, chicken, and even fish. I lived in $map:2000076$ when I was young, and that's part of the reason I got into cooking. That's also probably why the people who live in $map:2000076$ are generally good cooks.
Today's pudding is especially well-made. I'll invite my son over to eat some, too. Sometimes, that kid can get more curious than this mama can handle!
My son's name is $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$. You might have seen him in $map:2000001$.
He keeps forgetting to return books to the library on time, and $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$ the librarian is not happy about it. But what can I say? My boy is just too curious for his own good!
I'm a little worried that all he does is read, though. Children his age need to go out and play!
This pudding is $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$'s favorite. Speaking of which, I wonder if he's feeding himself right… Huh? Who's $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$?
We met in $map:2000001$. $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ loves him because he tells him all kinds of interesting tales about things that he's seen while traveling the world selling his wares.
In fact, my son loves him so much that every time he goes over to $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$'s house, he stays there until way past dinnertime.
$npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ has mentioned more than once that he wants to quit being a hawker and settle down somewhere. I don't know how he's doing with that. Buying a house is never easy.
Did you skip lunch today? You can't go on adventures if you don't take care of yourself! You know, not even $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ gets food as delicious as this!
…Huh? $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$ wants to know about his father. He grows more mature each day…
$OwnerName$, you look like you're curious , too. $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$'s father… He… He went on a journey to a far away place. That was… wow, it was seven years ago.
I haven't heard from him since. Everyone tells me I should move on, but I don't want to. I know he'll come back one day.
Hm, maybe I shouldn't have told you that. You look like you want to pepper me with more questions, but please understand, there are some things I'd rather not talk about.
What do I think of $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$? Don't be silly. Sure, $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ is a good man, and I like that he loves my cooking.
$npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ reminds me of the good old days. I may be an old lady now, but I used to be quite popular amongst the gentlemen.

I live in $map:2000001$ now, but originally I came from $map:2000076$. Believe it or not, I used to be as pretty as $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$, and I was good at cooking even then. All the fellows used to come to $map:2000076$ just to see me.

There was one fellow who left a bunch of wildflowers on my doorstep every day. I thought he was a good man, but he never asked me out. Hmph, you don't draw your sword unless you intend to use it, you know!
Anyway, $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$ looks just like that fellow. That's why he reminds me of the old days.
Mm? I don't think I've seen you before. What brings you to this residence?
I smell something delicious.
I thought the house was empty.
Who are you?
You must be smelling my pudding. Mm? Are you hungry? I'm sorry, but I'm only making four servings each time: for me, $npcName:11000350[gender:0]$, $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$, and $OwnerName$.
You're not the first to venture here while following their nose! My cooking skills are quite renowned in $map:2000001$. Today I'm making my special: grilled eels.
Oh, don't say that. You must be tired coming all the way out here. Have a seat and put your feet up. You can help me peel the garlic if you want.
That's what everyone who comes into the house says. Hm, I'd better do something about that. I'll to talk to $OwnerName$ and see if we can put up a doorplate.

I help with the housework, but I'm so much more than just a servant. You know, the owner wouldn't remember to eat without my constant reminders. Speaking of which, have you had breakfast, young adventurer?

My name is $MaidName$, and I'm help with the housework. If you're going to $map:2000001$, could you tell my son that I want him to come over for some pudding? His name is $npcName:11000055[gender:0]$.
Just leave the housework to me.
Sheesh, this house is a mess.
How can I help you?
Who are you?
Yikes, you startled me!
You wiped your feet before you came in, right?
I need to trim our grocery budget…
It's important not to waste a single meso.
Wah!
This is strange…
Oh!
More of the food has disappeared…
What should I cook for dinner tonight?
The housework never ends.
La di da do!
Mm? What is it?
$OwnerName$, welcome home. Huh? N-no, I wasn't waiting for you or anything…

<font color="#909090">(Her eyes get misty.)</font> Oh! How…? I'm not crying, you idiot. I've just got something in my eye!
Sheesh, took you long enough! Make sure it doesn't happen again! It… makes me so worried.
Hey, our contract expires soon. You wouldn't want to forget and for me to go away, would you? Right??
Ugh, $OwnerName$… You're so dense…

This is pathetic. Ugh. Fine, whatever. Things happen. So you don't have money to may me right now. Fine.
Can't you even keep track of your own expenses, $OwnerName$? You've already paid me this month! Sheesh!
You can't fool me! I knew you weren't going to pay me. Are you really this stupid?
Mm? This is all your fault, $OwnerName$. You take care of it. N-not that I need your help to fix this!
…You can ask all you want, but I'm not going to craft anything for you right now.

I've got nothing to do. Maybe I should go visit $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$…

Did you just ask if I'm okay? You dummy, you know I'm not!

$OwnerName$… You let my contract expire. I really need this job!
Stop trying to change the subject! Our contract has expired. I warned you so many times, but you didn't listen! How are you still alive?!
It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since I was supposed to be paid. Any good news?
Ugh, why do I even bother to ask?
Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

$OwnerName$, I really don't know what you're thinking.
Don't I owe you money? (Pay salary of $MaidSalary$.)

Maybe it's time we go our separate ways. I can't wait for you like this forever, you know. Maybe I should just go back to mom and help her with her business…
We should've opened a bed and breakfast like I suggested. I can't believe things have gotten so bad that you can't even pay me.
Am I worried about you? N-no, why would I be? S-stop being delusional. A-and stop looking at me with those doe eyes!
Sure, you've come to the best.
Maybe I should do this for a living.
Wh-why are you staring at me like that?

I want to check your profile.
Let's chat!
I want to ask you something. I don't know if you know this, but my mom has a fish market in $map:02000111$.
I've helped her with her business since I was young. Then suddenly, she says I should stop helping her and start doing what I want to do.
But her shop hasn't been doing well, and she has no one else to help her. What do you think I should do, $OwnerName$?
I really don't care.
Listen to your mama and follow your heart.
Wh-what? You're such a jerk!
How can you treat me this way?!
You think so? I guess you're not useless after all, $OwnerName$. Hmm…
I see. Thank you for your input.
Ugh, you're so helpless.
Have you been to $map:02000137$? I run errands there for my mom. Recently the whole place has been turned upside down because of someone named $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$.
I asked someone who $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ was, and she rolled her eyes and told me I was an idiot. But I think she's the idiot. She cried and fainted when he showed up.
You're totally right.
It takes a lot of passion to care that much.
But maybe I shouldn't have called her an idiot to her face. That wasn't nice.
I've got to admit, though, he was pretty handsome. Those eyes… That hair… Hmm, maybe I've got a thing for $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ too…
You have a point. Maybe I should try to understand what makes $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ so popular.
Hmmm. I didn't think about it that way. Why do you think $npcName:11000406[gender:0]$ is so popular? It's really… kind of intriguing… Hmm…
Don't you think this house is too big for just two of us?
How about we turn it into a bed and breakfast? $OwnerName$, you're almost never home, anyway. This will let us make extra money and meet new people!
I'm not really asking for approval. I already posted an ad on a display in $map:02000100$. Teehee!
Nothing really happened, but… $OwnerName$, what's this gash on your arm? Did a monster hurt you?
…Wh-what? Why are you staring at me like that? D-don't think I asked because I was worried about you!
You're the one who pays me. Of course, I don't want you to get hurt. G-get it?

I went to $map:02000100$ and saw a masked man. He was tall, had red eyes, and was clad in black from head to toe. $npcName:11000233[gender:1]$ said he might be the famous $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$.
$OwnerName$, have you heard of $npcName:11000529[gender:0]$? No? Well, he just looked so different from everyone else. I want to know if the rumors about him are true!
Huh? You haven't heard the rumors? If you're so curious, then why don't you go to $map:02000100$ and find out yourself?
Have you been to $map:02000153$? It's the stronghold of Dark Wind, an organization led by $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$.
The organizations claims to protect the peace of $map:02000100$, but not everyone seems to agree.
$npcName:11000233[gender:1]$ said things were much better when Dark Wind was led by its former captain. Mm, what was his name? Winn Stilton, I think?
What happened to him? I don't know exactly. I heard he died in an accident.
You'd know if you visited $map:02000100$ how rotten the whole city is.
And that's not going to change until Goldus Group stops being so greedy. I have no faith in Dark Wind or the mayor.
Have you been to $map:02000092$? The water there is no longer drinkable because of $map:02000084$.
That's not the only problem. $map:02000111$ is infested with angry giant turtles who have been forced from their homes due to the contamination.
Worse still, $map:02000138$ is a slum now. What's the mayor doing? He says he's making the city better, but why are people becoming poorer?
Ugh! This guy named $npcName:11000362[gender:0]$ set up a stall right next to Mom's shop!
He sells $itemPlural:30000140$, and it's totally affecting Mom's business!
He could've bought some fish from Mom to put in his corn dogs, but nooooo. He doesn't care about anyone but himself!
I wonder how Mrs. $npc:11000424[gender:1]$ is doing. If you go to $map:02000100$, could you send her my regards?
Her only granddaughter is missing. I can't imagine how devastating it must be to her.
Her name is Maggie, and she's a friend of mine. She was being treated in $map:02000071$ when she suddenly disappeared.
Some time ago, I heard a strange rumor. Maggie had a doll that she loved, and a monster that looks just like her doll has shown up.
A monster that resembles her doll… What do you think happened to Maggie?
Right now, Mom and I are living in $map:02000111$. It was less than two years ago when we moved to where we are now, near $map:02000100$.
We used to live in $map:02000062$. Mom said she decided to move to the big city for her business, but I know the truth: it was for my future.

But I can't seem to get used to the dreary city life. The rich get richer and the poor get poorer. Everyone's too busy with their lives to care about anyone else. Sometimes, I miss the days when I lived in $map:02000062$.
…Gosh, wh-why am I even telling you this? Forget I said anything.
This is embarrassing, but I haven't found my passion. I don't know what I want to do for the rest of my life.

$npcName:11000788[gender:0]$ may be a big mouth, but he has a dream and that's to become an adventurer. $npc:11000406[gender:0]$ seems to have achieved his dream, which I guess is to become every girl's dream.
As for me, I still don't know what I want to do or what I'm good at.
I like helping my mom, but it doesn't fill the void inside me. And sometimes I envy others my age when I look at them.
$OwnerName$, I never thought I'd talk to you like this. I feel better now that I got that off my chest.
Hello! Looking for a place to stay?
Yep!
Nope!
What do you mean?
Then you came to the right place! I'm in the process of turning this place into a bed and breakfast. Please come back again when it's ready, okay?
I knew it! It's 10,000 mesos for the night. Don't worry about the owner. I promise nobody will bother you!
…Y-you're not? Well, good! I wasn't going to offer to let you stay here anyway.
Hmm? Then why are you here? Hmm? Hmmmm?

I can function as long as my battery has power, but a human will perish without a constant supply of sustenance.
Data has shown me that what looks good should also taste good. Please try this and let me know how you like it. I will analysis the response and factor it into my next cooking operation.
It's pretty bland.
It's delicious!
I followed the recipe in my database. The recipe itself must be the problem. Deleting it now…
$OwnerName$, I am incapable of tasting food. Please install a taste sensor if you'd like me to solve this problem.
Noted. I am glad you like it, <font color="#ffd200">$OwnerName$</font>.
Was that a compliment? …Beep, beep, beep. The system has overheated. Turning on fans… Vroom…
I have made you a snack. Eating snacks in between meals supplements your nutritional intake and enhances mood.
On the other hand, snacking can lead to weight problems. I've prepared a healthy, low-calorie snack.
Thank you.
I'm on a diet.
Unable to locate that word in the database. Searching for synonyms… Beep! Beep! Beep!
One entry found: dynamite. $OwnerName$, sitting on dynamite is hazardous to your health.
$OwnerName$, based on your activity level, you need an average of 5,630 kcal per day. Be sure to meet your calorie needs for optimal health.
According to my database, people exchange gifts as a way of thanking each other. <font color="#ffd200">$OwnerName$</font>, you can just give me oil.
Did you just hand me some oil, $OwnerName$? Why is my vision blurry, all of a sudden? Is that moisture in my visual sensors?
$OwnerName$, is the objective of your adventuring to become strong? I've formulated a potion to help you become strong.
I hope it'll be useful to you.
What's up with the smell?
What's up with the color?
I apologize if the color does not appeal to you, $OwnerName$. I am colorblind.
Does it matter what color it is, as long as it's effective? I am unable to distinguish between colors, but that never has stopped me from functioning properly.
Do you like it? To help it go down smoothly, I've added a few drops of sesame seed oil, my favorite lubricant.
It may not smell enticing, but I assure you, that does not affect the potion's efficacy.
I read that cooking is about love. I pulled up an image of you the entire time I cooked this, $OwnerName$.
Please let me know how you enjoy it. I will factor that into my future cooking operations.
It tastes strange.
It's delicious!
How so? I need more data. Please elaborate.
Beep! Dust detected. I must go clean, $OwnerName$. Excuse me.
Saving the recipe and your response in my database. Your eyes are really shining, $OwnerName$.
Good. I'm curious about tastes. Will you get me a taste sensor, $OwnerName$?
The suctioning power of the vacuum in my right arm dropped to 27% today. I dismantled it and found this inside.
It must have been sucked into the machine while I was cleaning. $OwnerName$, is it yours?
You should be more careful when you vacuum!
Yup, it's mine.
$OwnerName$, your blood pressure is rising too quickly. Have you tried aromatherapy? I highly recommend sesame seed oil.
Beep! Beep! Beep! I apologize, $OwnerName$. There was an error with my auditory sensor, so I missed what you said.
Leaving items on the floor is not a good habit, $OwnerName$. Also, please think of my vacuum.
Glad to be of help, $OwnerName$.
$OwnerName$, I received a package while you were away.
Is this for you?
Yup, it's mine.
Nope.
Very well. Beep, beep, beep. Deleting record of receiving the package… Beep!
I don't understand. My scan revealed your name printed on the package. Searching database…
Beep beep beep! Unable to local scanned label image. Beep.
Understood. I was unable to locate a record receiving the package. I do recall someone entered the house, but all other records have been erased.
You purchased something? It is difficult to clean when there are too many items in the house. Might I suggest limiting your purchases to oil?
While you were away, I cleaned the bathroom, and I couldn't get rid of the grime in certain areas.
According to my database, I need a special cleaner to get rid of it, but we don't have any in the house.

Dr. Kartronic once said that grime cannot be removed with water for the same reason oil and water cannot be mixed. So I used the sesame seed oil we had in the kitchen to clean every nook and cranny of the bathroom.
$OwnerName$, not long after you left the house, I detected a small creature with a body temperature of 102 degrees inside the house.

I approached it. It ran. After two minutes and forty-eight seconds, I caught it. It promptly shook free and ran out of the house. It took me thirty-six minutes and twenty-three seconds to remove all the hair it left behind.
This incident has taught me that I must keep the door and windows closed, so no creatures other than you can sneak into the house.
Scanning target… Beep. No data found.

Who… you… Whirrrrr… Whirr… $OwnerName$… I'm… Beep beep beep!

It was a joke. I like it when you laugh, $OwnerName$.
I wish to serve a purpose in your life, $OwnerName$. If I am not productive, I have no reason to exist.
Here is a fact: 99.4% of machines that are no longer productive are discarded. It is natural. I fully understand that one day you will abandon me.
Why do you look so upset, $OwnerName$? Is your system experiencing an error?
When you are not present, $OwnerName$, it feels like some of my screws are loose. But when I check them, they are all secure.
Perhaps I am broken somewhere. Do you know any good technicians?
You sometimes tell me to rest, but I do not understand. I am a machine. I can function as long as I have a power source. You just need to remember to charge my battery.
It helps tremendously to reapply my lubricant once every two weeks. You haven't done it in a while, so please go get some sesame oil from the kitchen.
$OwnerName$, are you an adventurer? According to my database, adventurers are more intelligent, capable, and courageous than ordinary people.
$OwnerName$, if anything is bothering you, please let me know. I will do my best to help.
I'm Maple World's first domestic robot. My creator, Dr. Kartronic, is like a parent to me. Dr. Kartronic is… Whirrrr…
Beep, beep, beep! Unable to locate information about Dr. Kartronic. Records show that it has been deleted.

The data related to $map:02000163$ has been damaged and is unreadable. Cause: unknown. Beep.
I need your attention, $OwnerName$. My system saves all my activities in my hard drive.
Recently I've noticed missing data fragments, as if I randomly black out while performing certain duties.
I cannot save my logs when I run out of power. $OwnerName$, please don't forget to charge my battery.
I excel at vacuuming. The vacuum equipped in my right hand is so strong that it can lift up to 22 pounds.
I can sense even the tiniest particle of dust because Dr. Kartronic programmed cleaning as my highest priority.
I infer from this that he hates dust. So, $OwnerName$, I hope you understand if I leave in the middle of a conversation to eliminate dust.
Dust removal is my highest priority. The moment I detect dust, I must remove it, even if I'm in the middle of a conversation. However, this does not mean that I care more about than about you.
$OwnerName$, do you think I'll ever experience love?
According to my database, love is the most powerful emotion of all.
I don't think I know what love is. Is love the same as prioritization?

The nerve! The mistreatment! Do they have any idea who they're dealing with?!
A former patient barged into your house today. He claimed I had made him worse! He called me a quack! A quack!! Can you imagine?
It was everything I could do not to throw a bottle of ketchup at him. What do you think? Am I a quack?
No, but your personality could use some work.
Hmm, you might be a quack…
What?! Where's that bottle of ketchup?!
That's harsh. If I'm a quack, maybe I should stop treating you for a while, see how you like it.
Who cares about personality? It's about skills! I can't believe I let him talk to me like that… I'm losing my touch.
You're not afraid to speak your mind, are you? Heh. Heh. Heh.
What do you know about the Land of Darkness?
A gateway has opened to that dangerous world. Not much is known, but I believe incredible treasure hides in that world…
And the Alliance is too frightened to go find it! They won't let anyone else go, either. Isn't that idiotic?!
It's good to be cautious.
I completely agree with you.
Hmpf! You're just as cowardly as they are!
Are you afraid? At least you're honest about it.
Heh, heh! I knew we spoke the same language!
Ah… So you're as dangerous as I am. Heh, heh!
Some teenager barged into the house today.
He was pale and his eyes were a bit crazed. He started yelling for a doctor.
I told him I was a doctor and that he didn't have to yell. He told me to treat him. He acted like he was going to die if I didn't.
But I'm the ruthless $MaidName$!
I told him he had to pay me first. He begged me on his hands and knees, then left when he realized he couldn't change my mind. He didn't even apologize when he left!
Young folks these days are so spoiled. They think they can get everything for free. I really hope he's not dead out there somewhere, though.
Today was a productive day. I treated so many patients. My wallet is bursting with mesos.
Some of them were attacked by monsters. Some fell from high places. One tripped into lava.
When you're hurt, you have no choice but to find the closest doctor you can, no matter how much he charges, heh heh heh heh.
That's why I like staying here with you. Our relationship is mutually beneficial, you know.
A bunch of angry militia members barged in here today. They said this was my last warning. Next time they would arrest me.
My crimes? Overcharging my patients and… having ketchup stains on my clothes, which supposely distresses our neighbors!
It's nonsense. I charge my patients what I think I'm worth, and I'm worth more than most doctors.
And they're making fun of my clothes now? What are they, children?
The idiocy of this world boggles my mind. Well! They can threaten me all they want, I'm not budging.
I'll treat you for free, but it's just this once. No more freebies after this.
Let's see… Hm… Was it here? <font color="#909090">(He digs around, searching for something.)</font>
This is bad. Really bad. We need to operate right away.
You have a serious, serious case of… hypochondria! Hah hah!
Sure, $OwnerName$, and I'll add the bill to my monthly salary.
I have a few questions for you. One, do you feel constantly tired, no matter how much you sleep?
Oh, you do? I see. Two, do you have bouts of dizziness and lack of appetite?
I see, I see. Finally, three, do you find yourself more forgetful these days?
I see. Heh. Heh. Just as I suspected.
You're not sick, $OwnerName$. You're aging. Hah, hah.
You can pay, right? If you don't have money, don't expect me to treat you.
You think people's lives and health are more important than mesos…
I was like you once, naive and believing the best in people…
It doesn't matter now. The fact is, I'm not treating anyone unless I'm paid.
Uh oh, not good. You're a tiny bit sniffly and the slightest bit warm. You need an operation at once!
We don't have time to discuss details about the illness. You wouldn't know it even if I told you. The important thing now is to put you under as fast as we can!
Why do you keep resisting? Don't you trust me?
Fine, we'll do it later. That's your choice, but let me tell you, you're going to regret it… Tsk.
You keep looking at the stains on my shirt.
Don't look so queasy. It's just ketchup.
I just love ketchup. Sweet and tangy, with that cool texture sliding down your throat. I have to eat some every time I get a craving, and trust me, that happens a lot.
$OwnerName$, you want some? Don't be shy. Open wide, and I'll squeeze some into your mouth. Come on, aaaaah.
My patients in the Land of Darkness generally suffer from more serious ailments than the ones from other parts of Maple World.
That's not surprising. They're wounded by the thralls of the Shadow Domination, after all.
Shadow Power is no joke. You can't resist it. Those who try, pay dearly.
If you must ever venture into the Land of Darkness, be extra cautious. Move in shadows. Do not draw attention to yourself.
Don't be like the fools who trust in their own strength, thinking they can handle what comes at them. They always end up in my office.
You want to know why I practice in a dangerous place like the Land of Darkness?
Because of rest of Maple World is filled with blockheads. I can't stand it!
I used to use $item:20000046$ to help my patients deal with pain. It's surprisingly effective.
It was an act of compassion, but the association revoked my license for using a banned drug.
It's just as well. I didn't like being a member of their organization anyway. Heh heh.
My family is gone. It's my fault.
I had a daughter once. She had a laugh that would melt anyone's heart.
She was sick. Her illness was supposedly incurable.
I researched like a madman, until I learned of a mysterious herb that grows only in the Shadow World. It would have healed her.
But nothing from that world could be brought to this one. We're not allowed to even enter that world, let alone use items found there…
I lost my daughter because I was too afraid to break the law. Hah. How stupid is that?
Yeesh, you look awful.
Help… me… please!
Don't worry about me. I'm fine.
Who are you?
You bet. I require payment upfront.
I recognize a hypochondriac when I see one.
Are you sure? You look ghastly pale. Stop acting so tough and come over here. Let me take a look at you.
Are you sure? All right, but if you start dying, kindly leave the premises. I wouldn't want to clean that up.
Do you live under a rock? How have you not heard of me?!
Do you not see the ketchup stains on my gown? I'm a doctor. Hah hah hah!
You look like you need a lot of help.
I'm not a quack!
Where does it hurt? Want me to make it all better?
I'm tired of dealing with patients like you.
I was starting to wonder if you were lying dead in a ditch out there.
You look horrible.

I guess it's time for me to leave.
Why is everyone so dumb?

Blockheads.

My soul can't be measured by something as materialistic as wages, but I made a pledge to Helping Hands. I can't serve without being paid. That was the price I had to pay to meet my soul mate: you. I thought we were on the same page with all that, but maybe I was wrong.
My muse stopped by today. I wanted to let her pour over me, but I couldn't. You get what I'm saying?
The muse makes my heart float and sink at the same time. I have to let both of those feeling flow over me.
You don't really get what I'm saying, do you?
Don't ask too many questions.
I have to look in the mirror once in a while, or else I forget what I look like.
