I've decided that today is the combination of sensitivity and specialty.
More intense than yesterday, and more thrilling than tomorrow. Or just possible, the opposite.
(Say that you feel the same way sometimes.)
(Say nothing.)
From the look on your face… Mm, I'm not going to ask. I can feel the intensity radiating off of you.
Why does it feel as if you're so far away when you're right in front of me? Every time we talk, I feel so alone.
I can be honest when I'm with you. You make me feel like a child without a care in the world. It's been a long time since I felt this way…
It's not easy to be who you are. For some reason, I feel better now. Will you tell me more about yourself?
I entrusted my soul to music a while back, in a desperate attempt to forget the anguish of life.
You should try to face your inner self sometimes. Here, take this earphone and put it in your ear.
Now, close your eyes and get lost in the darkness. There! Our souls resonated with each other! Did you feel that?
No…
Yes!
It's not your fault. It just means our relationship is not as deep as I thought it was.
Heh. You did? So did I.
Heh. Feels kind of strange, but I like it. Let's just stay like this for a while.
<font color="#909090">(He nods his head to the beat.)</font> Yeah this is it.
This was such an amazing moment. Not sure if you'd agree…?
Today it drizzled, just a bit, but it was enough to quench my heart's thirst.
I haven't felt this way for a long time… Maybe I still have some warmth left in me. I feel… hopeful.
I saw the guy next door come home in a helicopter, and that changed my whole perception of him. Interesting, huh?
Sure, I'd love to ride in a helicopter someday. Maybe my tired soul can finally take a breath, hundreds of miles above the world.
Today, I met a girl who lives in the neighborhood. She inspired me to pick up scissors for the first time in a long time. Not many folks "get" my art style, you know?
I wonder if the tears I shed after that last snip were were of joy or yearning…
That look on your face… Mm, you still don't understand me, do you? It's cool. An appreciation of true art isn't something that can be acquired. It's something you've got to be born with.
How's it going? You look like you're about to burst with excitement. What's the news?
Don't know why, but I've got a hunch today is going to be an exciting day for me, too.
Thank you for your kindness, but I don't know if I have a place for it in my heart.
Don't be upset, $OwnerName$. It's not your fault. This is a problem that only I can solve.
I appreciate that, but you don't have to keep telling me. Sometimes words mean more when they're not spoken, you hear me?
I get if you don't get it. I'm a deep guy with so many layers. Don't force yourself. We'll solve this puzzle together.
I don't mind feeling this way. I assume this is how ordinary people feel all the time.
But for me… Let's just say it'll take a while to get used to this.
When it's sunny and there's not much to do, I go out for a walk. Not to take a break, but just to look normal, like everyone else.
$OwnerName$, how does taking a walk make you feel? For me, let's just say it calms the darkness inside me.
Don't take it personally, but… I don't want to take a walk with you. I've reserved that time to spend with me, you know? So I can't share it with anybody else.
Why do I use left-handed scissors with my right hand? I'm surprised you even noticed.
You may not understand this, but I'm not the one who chooses that. When I touch someone's hair, I get a feeling deep inside, and that feeling determines which hand I use to cut with.
Come to think of it, I haven't held these scissors with my left hand for a long time. Only fate knows when I'll do that again. To be honest, right now, I'm just too tired to think about it.
Sometimes, I just like wearing earphones, without listening to anything.
I do it when I want to be left alone, so I can have some time with myself.
You don't get it, do you, $OwnerName$? It's okay. I'm used to not being understood.
Of course, I have my favorites when it comes to music. I'll play some for you when I have a chance. It'll help you understand where I get my inspiration.
$OwnerName$, do you have any siblings? I've never told anyone but… I actually have an older brother.
I left home when I was pretty young. He used to send me letters, but it's been a long, long time since the last one.
I picked this place partly because it's bustling with activity and partly because my brother mailed his last letter from somewhere around here.
Recently, I met an adventurer who I think traveled with my brother for a while. I couldn't be sure, though.
According to him, my brother is doing fine. I don't know what happened to him, but I'm hoping to rn into here one day.
Weren't you just here yesterday? You looking for the owner?
Yep!
Nope!
Who are you?
Well, then, look around. See what you can find.
Not many people come to visit. You must be really close.
Then did you come to see me? I wanted to stay on the down low, but I know it's impossible when I'm so popular.
If you want, you can stay for a little while. Just don't be alarmed if your energy starts to resonate with mine.
If you want, I can tell you, but if we're connected by the red string of fate, knowing each other's name is meaningless.
I can tell you my name. It's $MaidName$. Nothing else about me can be described in words.
Nice to meet you… should do for now.
Hey, this feels all right.
Are you also a wandering soul?
I'm sorry, but I don't think we have anything in common.
You look a little tired.
Don't say a thing if you don't want to.
What a shame…
Empty shells… are meaningless.
Yes, this goes… like this…
Good. With this, I'm complete once again.
Not now. Go back inside and sleep for a little longer.
Is this the power granted to me?
Yes, this is it!
I need time to refresh and recharge.
What is it, meow?

Take this food, meow. I went out for a stroll and picked it up next door. No one was home. It was sitting out on the kitchen counter waiting for me.
I started eating it but then remembered you, $OwnerName$. You should be thankful. I don't always share.
You stole this food!
Thank you.
Stolen? Do you forget who I am? Everything I see is rightfully mine. The minister never understood that…
If that bothers you, why are you eating it? It's a little dirty because I had to drag it all this way, but you seem content enough.
You're welcome, meow. I'll bring you something tomorrow, too.
Of course. I take care of my minions, when the mood strikes. Tomorrow, I'll take my walk through the palace.
Whoop, this reminds me…
We can snack together, meow. Go on, take some. Mm? You want to know where I get this?
When you're not home, $OwnerName$, a girl stops by to play with me and give me treats. I wasn't hungry earlier, so I saved this for you.
Girl? What girl?
You let a stranger into the house?!
Are you deaf, servant? She's not a stranger, she's my friend. Now go away for a while.
Well, you weren't here to screen our guest. What do I hire you for anyway, servant?
I never asked her name, meow. She's from Carimia Island, where she lives with grandpa. She works around here, though. She's cute, but not as cute as me!
I'm not sure. I think she also lives with a servant, like I do. She seems lonely because her servant is rarely home, too.
She visits me when she's lonely, meow. Between you and me, I don't think she's much of a cook…
You've been looking a bit ragged, so I got this for you. You don't want to know where I got it.
It's a health drink. It should perk you right up.
No, no, you take it. I insist.
Where did you get it?
You're gonna regret asking… I nabbed it from $map:2000065$ while I was in $map:2000025$. The minister drinks it, so it's got to be good.
I picked it up in $map:2000025$ $map:2000065$. Hey, my minions deserve the best.
No thank you. I had a sip and did not enjoy the flavor. But it's good for your health, so you should drink every last drop.
I'm touched, meow. Servant, I had no idea you cared so much!
But you should take it. You're the peon who pays the rent, so I need you in good health.
Meow. $OwnerName$, I've got something to tell you.
You must be hungry. Eat this, meow. I must be the only cat who worries about her minions this much.
Meow? Why are you looking at me like that?
Did you cook this?
I'm just so touched!
Don't be silly, meow. Have you ever seen a cat cooking?
I didn't cook it, meow. I picked it up next door.
Aww, you're easy. I'll bring stuff more often, then.
It's just leftovers. Don't read too much into it.
Look at this, meow. I found it under the bed while playing with some ants.
Weren't you looking for this, meow?
Ants?! Where?!
Thank you.
Don't make it a habit. It's your job to look after me, not the other way around.
You're welcome. There are other things under the bed, but I forbid you to look.
We were enjoying our time together when they suddenly stopped moving. Maybe they were sleepy after being tossed into the air and stomped on. Should I be worried about them?
They went back home, meow. It's all right. Their family is so big that I see them everywhere.
Look at this, meow! It looks like new, doesn't it? I think we can use it!
Want to know where I got it? There's a girl who drops by when you're not home. She left it here as a gift, looking totally bummed out about it.
I know just the spot for it!
Girl? What girl?
Where? Where? Oooh, I can't wait to see!
That's right. It's ours now! Let's do what we want with it!
She lives with her servant, just like I do. She's pretty cute, even with her glasses. I don't know her name, though.
Her servant must have been displeased she picked something up from the street. How rude!
She lives in the neighborhood. I only knows that she's from an island, meow.
She looked upset. I think her servant yelled at her. She said the servant called the item trash! I told her she should fire her servant, but then she started crying.
I was taking a stroll when I found something shiny, so I brought it home with me. I almost didn't see it because it was covered in dirt, meow.
It doesn't look like it's good for anything, but you can have it if you want, meow.
Thanks! I'd love more if you find more!
More! I must have more!
That's all I've got. Why are your eyes gleaming like a crazy person's?
I don't have any more. But if it's that great, I'm going to keep the next one I find.
Meow? You like it? It's not even edible… But I can bring you more next time.
$map:2000025$ is full of shiny things, meow. I'll bring more if I go there next time.
Nothing at all, meow. What could possibly happen in such a tiny house?
Unless you're interested in the cockroaches. I played with them all day.
But they suddenly stopped playing with me! If they didn't like me pulling off their legs, they should've said so.
Strange people keep barging into the house. Do you owe them money or something?
It's okay if you do. I've got it under control. I just look at them with large sparkly eyes, and they leave with a dreamy look on their faces.
Yes, I was bored! So, so bored! It's not nice to leave me alone for so long!
A friend visited today. $npcName:11000367$ from Barrota Harbor.
He brought his girlfriend, and they were all lovey dovey. Say, $OwnerName$, do you have someone you love? Why don't you introduce me sometime?
…! Did you see that? Look!! A red dot! It's moving there… and there… and back there…!
I'm gonna catch it! Catch it! Yes, come here, come to me, gotcha!
…A feather rod? I'm going to pluck out all the feathers!
Kyaah! I was so close to catching it! Servant, you're getting better at snapping your wrist! Good!
What are we playing today, meow? A ball? It's… flyinnnngggg! Come to meeeeee!
Kyaah! I got it, meow! Meow? You want me to fetch it. No! It's mine now, and I'm going to toy with it all day long!
What's this? What's inside? Let me in, let me in, let me in… I will get in!
It's a… bit snug, but it's okay. Meow, so comfy! I'm sleepy… meow… Zzz…
$OwnerName$, as my servant, there are a few things you should know about me.
First, I like dark, tight places where I can curl up. I hate open spaces and the cold. You shouldn't disturb me when I sleep inside your sock drawer.
Second, I hate loud noises, such as vacuum cleaners. Those are forbidden in this house!
Third, I love grooming myself, meow. I love to lick my hair and nails clean, but I don't like bathing.
Huh? You want to tell me a few thing about yourself too? I can already tell you'll be trouble. We've got time. You can tell me all about you later.
Haven't you heard it's rude to pry? But, if you insist on knowing more about me…
I'm from $map:2000025$. $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ loves cats. Have you ever been in the presence of her fine cat, $npc:11000708$?
$npc:11000075[gender:1]$ loves $npc:11000708$ like her own child. That's probably why it became a trend among the nobility to raise cats. Cats like me.

Life at the palace was peaceful, but $npc:11000708$ said something to me that was life-changing. She said, "$MaidName$, you should find someone who loves you as much as the Empress loves me." So I set out to do just that.
Oh, I'm not saying that person is you, $OwnerName$. Oh, no no. Let's not jump to conclusions.
$npc:11000708$ is the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$'s favorite cat. A slender body, beautiful golden hair, a shiny ribbon… And I've descended from an equally noble bloodline.

But $npc:11000708$'s beauty isn't what makes her so great, meow. The $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ relies on her for comfort. I don't want to imagine what Maple World would be like if $npc:11000708$ didn't exist…

Want to know how important $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ is to her owner? Being the Empress of Maple World is not easy, meow. $npc:11000708$ once didn't go to the bathroom for three days to stay with the Empress while she was in deep anguish.
I want to be as loyal as $npc:11000708$, but I can't not go to the bathroom for three days, mew. $OwnerName$, please make sure I never have to choose between you and the bathroom.

When I lived in the Palace, I used to look forward to the Cat Assembly. It's a meeting among the courtiers who love cats, meow. It's hosted by the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$, and the guests of honor are us cats.

At the meeting, everyone from the $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ to $npc:11000601[gender:1]$ and even the guards laugh and chat regardless of station, meow. No one mentions serious subjects like the Lapentas or the Shadow World.
It was always fun to hear what was going on in the palace. Oh, speaking of which, I remember something $npc:11000708$ told me, meow.
Everyone thinks the Empress stays in the palace all the time, working, but she goes out sometimes, meow. When she does, she disguises herself and crawls through a hole in a corner of the castle wall.
One time, she went to her hair salon in $map:52000008$… and got caught by $npcName:11000702[gender:0]$, meow!
The Empress quickly used $skill:20000011$ to scale the castle wall and run away from him, meow. Who knew she was good at $skill:20000011$? I'd love to see her use it one day.
You're a stranger, meow. I hate strangers…
(Pat her on the head.)
(Rub her belly.)
Here, kitty kitty kitty.
How dare you touch me, lowly human?!
Everyone who visits the house wants to touch me, meow. But do they think to ask first? Noooo.
Kyaawwoonngghh! Not there! Get away from me!!
Rude!!!
…Huh?
Oh jeez, this place isn't even as big as the smallest palace bathroom
Meow, where's my bed?
Kyaawwoonngghh! Who's there?
You're not my servant, meow.
Thank you for not disturbing me, meow.
You should knock before you enter, meow.
…Meow.
…Mew….
What's this, meow?
M-e-o-w.
Hmph!
Kyaawwoonngghh!
I'm taking a walk. Don't worry about me, meow.
I need to file my nails… Ooh, that wall looks perfect, meow!
I love stretching. Love, love, love it.
Mm? Are you here to see little old me?
Awww, you're here to see me.

Besides, something really great happened to me today. You wanna know? Hehe, what's it worth to you?

I don't care anyway.
C'mon! Stop teasing me or I'll… I'll cut your pay!

Heehee, so what happened was… Wait. Did you just say you don't care?! What?! Now you've made me mad!
Aw, $OwnerName$, you care that much? Hehe, don't cut my pay. I'll tell you!
I was strolling through $map:02000001$ when I bumped into $npcName:11000764[gender:1]$. She was leaving the macaroon shop. It's insane how she eats so many sweets yet stays so tiny. Anyway…
A guy approached us, gushing about he's a huge fan of the Bunnies, but then… he only asked me for an autograph! That proves it, right? I'm more popular than $npcName:11000764[gender:1]$! Teehee!
You should've seen the look on her face. It was priceless! Now you know what I'm so happy today, heehee.
Who's teasing who, huh? Cut my pay! Teehee! Yeah, right! You're so funny, $OwnerName$!
I had no idea you had such a playful side, $OwnerName$. I like it!!
Actually, something incredible happened… But it's a secret. Don't tell a soul! Promise?
<font color="#909090">(She leans in close and whispers.)</font> You know how Goldus started selling lottery tickets? The grand prize is a billion mesos! Well, I bought one and… I won!!
Can you believe it?! I won fifth place! Isn't that incredible??
What's the prize for fifth place?
Congratulations!
I don't know! I mean, it's got to be a lot, right? Isn't it exciting? I've never gotten fifth in anything in my life, not even when I was in school!
Anyway, the prize amount is, umm… it says here that it's 500 mesos. But that's how much the ticket cost…
Does that mean anyone can win fifth place? Ah, I knew it was too good to be true. But the last few days, I've been walking on a cloud, so I guess that counts for something.
Oh, I hadn't even checked. Do you want me to share some of my riches with you, heehee? Well, it says here the prize is…
Huh? 500 mesos? That's not even a fraction of what I hoped! Ugh… And here I was, planning how I would turn in my resignation… Huh? What? Forget I said anything!
Thank you, heehee! I'm so excited! There are so many things I want to buy. Oh, but what if I go overboard and it won't all fit in the house?
Aren't you worried, $OwnerName$? Once I'm rich, I won't need a job, which means I can quit and leave you all by yourself!
But don't worry, I'm not going anywhere. I'll stay with you forever and always, $OwnerName$. Heehee.
Ahhh, I feel great today! On a day like this, I can get all my dance moves perfect!
I'm going to take advantage of that to put in some extra dance practice today. You wanna watch?
Absolutely.
Shouldn't you be dusting?
Dusting? You have a chance to see my amazing dance skills and you're talking about dusting?
Wow! I don't think I've ever been so insulted in my life!
Mmm, this is a problem. I have to practice my moves, but you want me to dust…
I guess I have no choice. I have to do what you say, so I'll give up dance practice for today…
Aw, shucks. Do you mean it? Actually, people love watching me dance. They say it makes them happy.
$OwnerName$, I haven't told this to anyone, but actually… I have a fan club! Surprised?
Actually, I changed my mind. I can't dance in front of you. I haven't practiced enough! But I promise you'll be the first to see when I can put on a perfect show!
$OwnerName$, now that you say you want to watch me dance… I don't want to! Does that make me a flirt? Heehee.
But thank you for saying that. It really made my day!
Today is amazing!! I can't believe it! I've hit the jackpot, $OwnerName$!
I don't know if you remember, but I told you a while back that I'm collecting the stickers found inside Maple Bread and you laughed at me. Well…
I've been trying and trying to get the $npcName:21000302$ sticker to complete my collection! I ate sooooo many bags of bread searching for it, and today I found it!!
I'm so happy! Finally, my collection is complete!
That's quite an achievement!
Oh, that? I have like three duplicates of that one.
What?!? $OwnerName$!!! Do you know how much bread I ate… how many pounds I gained… to try to find that sticker?! And you had it all along and didn't tell me?!
I hate you so much right now, $OwnerName$. You've totally ruined my mood.
What?! But you made fun of me when I told you I was collecting the stickers! And you were secretly collecting them, too?
What a hypocrite! I can't stand that kind of behavior!
I know! I can do anything when I put my mind to it. Heehee! What should I collect next?
That's right! You should feel lucky to have a servant as great as me in your life, hee hee!
Now, where should I hang my completed collection? Hmm, maybe here. I never liked that painting anyway, never mind that it cost a million mesos…
Or maybe here, so it's the first thing you see when you enter the front door. I'd just have to throw out that vase. Hmm…
Of course I'm always happy! $OwnerName$, sing with me! It'll make you happy, too.
You are my Maple leaf… My only Maple leaf! You make me happy… When skies are gray!
<font color="#909090">(Wow, the girl is tone deaf! You can barely recognize the song, the way she sings it.)</font>
Whenever I feel even a tiny bit gloomy, I play rock paper scissors with myself. My right hand versus my left hand.
That way, no matter what happens, I win! And then I feel happy. Perfectly simple, right?
Yes! How did you know I didn't feel like working today, $OwnerName$? You know me so well!
I love how much you love playing with me, $OwnerName$! I love playing with you, too!
I'm so lucky to have such a great boss. It makes every day the best day, heehee!
Nooooo! I wish I could, but I'm swamped! Drats, I could really use a break, but I can't…
Ahh, I'm so busy, but maybe I can take a small break. How about a game of word chain?
I'll go first… "Fix"! Can you think of a word that starts with "X"? Oops, too slow! So fun! Okay, break's over!
The Bunnies are the most famous troupe in all of Maple World!
We travel all around, and thousands of people come to our shows. I feel so lucky to be a part of them!

I knew I wanted to be a Bunny since I was little. They just bring so much joy everywhere they go, and I wanted to be a part of that! It wasn't easy, but I found a way to make my dream come true, heehee.
It's not easy to join the Bunnies. We're really exclusive.
Hundreds of girls line up at our management offices each day, begging for the chance to participate in our trainee program.
If they're accepted, they have to train hard to prove themselves, and if they pass all the tests, they finally become official Bunnies. Ah, I remember those days. I was the first in my program!
Remember how I said I'd always wanted to be a Bunny? Well, I had to jump through a lot of hurdles to get to where I am today.
You see, when I was little, I was sick a lot. I could barely stay in school because I was so fatigued, and I was severely underweight.
The other kids used to make fun of me. They called me "grasshopper ghost" because my arms were so gangly and I was so pale. They would run away when they saw me, shrieking about how I was contagious.

I was nowhere near strong enough to become a Bunny. It takes a lot of stamina to perform those dances, you know. But I never gave up. I talked to a trainer to learn how to build muscle strength and to a nutritionist to learn how to eat to make my body strong. I practiced every single day.
I will never have a "perfect" body, but I have a strong body, and I've worked hard to get here. I've learned how to take of myself.

Whenever I see kids making fun of each other for being too skinny or fat or tall or short, I tell them that nobody has the perfect body and that anyone can succeed if they set their mind to it. They listen to me, because I'm a Bunny.
There's something about my past that I haven't shared with you yet. Something that happened a long time ago…
Remember how I told you I was sickly when I was younger? I found out that it wasn't natural. I had been cursed by a witch.
To this day, I still don't know why. I almost died from that curse!
But curse or no curse, I worked hard and overcame it! I'm so proud of myself for that! I heard later that maybe some hero had lifted the curse, but…
Hero or no hero, I would've broke the curse myself eventually out of sheer determination. Still, I wouldn't mind meeting that hero someday.
Hello. Hi! Who are you? What brings you here?
I'm here to see your master.
I came to check out the house.
Who are you?
Oh! In that case, welcome! Make yourself at home. So glad you're here!
Oh, goodness! Why didn't you say so earlier? Here I was, thinking you were some run-of-the-mill creep!
Isn't the house pretty? It's all thanks to my hard work! Heehee!
It's nice, but not nice enough to warrant a visit… Still, I do work really hard!
Excuse me? I asked first! How rude!
My name is $MaidName$! Nice to meet —what am I saying? Wh-who are you?!
Here comes… me!
Tada! Here I come! All eyes on me!

Welcome home! Do you know how long I've been waiting for you?

Be straight with me for a minute.
You know I'm not working for you because I like you…
So… why don't you just let me go?
Hey, your skills are top notch.
I'm… I'm not really sure…
Talking to you makes me feel like I'm losing brain cells.
Am I really stuck with you?
Ah, perfect. That's just the way I like it.
I appreciate your honesty. I may have been wrong about you.
Why are you staring at me?
I'm used to people glaring at me at the Black Market, sure, but…
I don't enjoy being gawked at by you. Please try to stop.
I can't help it…
I'm so, so sorry!
Perhaps there is such a thing as too much honesty, after all…
… Does that mean you're not going to stop?
Oh. Well, you don't have to go that far. Now things are uncomfortable…
So you won't do it anymore? Good.
Nothing I couldn't handle.
Some men in masks barged into the house, demanding I hand over everything of value.
Hmph. They won't be back.
Even in my pencil skirt, I was able to bruise them up pretty good. I'm a certified instructor in several forms of martial arts.

No need to look so shocked. In my line of work, self-defense is essential. Money makes people desperate, which can lead to crazy behavior, and I have to be able to make decisions without worrying about that.
$OwnerName$, while you were out, $npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ called once and $npcName:11000096[gender:0]$ called twice.
$npcName:11000004[gender:0]$ stated that he received new product, which he thought you might be interested in.
$npcName:11000096[gender:0]$ called because he can't get a hold of $npcName:11000106[gender:1]$ and was wondering if you knew where she was.
Later, he called back to ask my name. I guess that part isn't really relevant.
Now, excuse me. I have some goods to oversee.
$OwnerName$, you look exhausted.
It's a good thing I just made this special juice. Drink it. It'll give you an energy boost.
I whipped it up myself. Maybe we should name it.
It has a whole $npcName:21000001$ in it. How about we call it… Power Mush?
Most of the objects traded at the $map:02000216$ are rare and expensive.
Why is the $map:02000216$ such a popular place to sell? It should be obvious.
The $map:02000216$ is the only place you can trade valuable items quickly and safely.
More importantly, you can remain anonymous. We don't ask questions about where you obtained your item at the $map:02000216$. All we care about is how much it's worth.
Today was exhausting. Funny how all it takes is a little ignorance to ruin your day, isn't it? We had a new customer show up at the $map:02000216$.
He paid an exorbitant price for a cheap item without researching what he was buying.
After he realized it, he raised a real ruckus, screaming that he'd been scammed, we'd hear from his lawyer, yadda yadda.
It's not our fault he made a poor purchase. Even if we wanted to help, our policy at the $map:02000216$ is to never release the personal information of our sellers.
Even you aren't above that policy, $OwnerName$, so be careful what you purchase and sell at the $map:02000216$.
Are you trying to ask about Blackstar? I had no idea you were even aware of that organization.
Does this mean you've also heard of $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$? What exactly is it that you want to know?
$npcName:11000251[gender:0]$ is one of the $map:02000216$'s many sponsors. He was instrumental in the establishment of the market.
Do I hear suspicion in your tone? Are you trying to ruin our business relationship?
I'm perfectly aware that not everyone has a positive opinion of our business…
But no one can deny that the $map:02000216$ has helped revitalize the economy in the area.
Most of the citizens of $map:02000100$, including Mayor $npcName:11000065[gender:0]$, support us. We've made ourselves vital, and now we're unstoppable.
Ah, this is specifically covered in our contract.
You'll see in Section IV, Article 17, that for the duration of my period in your employ, you are not to pry into my personal business.
Now, if you're done trying to break the rules of our contract, I'd like to return to work.
Such persistence, $OwnerName$! What exactly do you want to know so terribly much?
My work history? My childhood? My relationship with my family?
None of that makes a bit of difference. I know who I am: one of the top traders at the $map:02000216$ and your personal secretary. Does the rest matter?
I do have a hypothetical quandary to discuss with you. I'm interested in your opinion.
Say there was a girl who grew up in the slums of $map:02000100$. An orphan, with no memory of her parents, begging and stealing and trying to survive.
Let's say one day she tried to steal a man's wallet and was caught.

To her surprise, instead of throwing her in jail, the man made a joke, admired her cleverness, then took her to his home, where he gave her clean clothes, a delicious meal, and a safe place to sleep, away from the vultures at the $map:02000100$
She was so grateful for his kindness, she became determined to pay him back in any way she could. He had changed her life.
For the next few decades, she worked tirelessly for that man. But then, one day, she learned that was he was doing was… morally abhorrent.

Since then, she's been torn, unsure whether to follow her moral inclinations or remain loyal to the man who had saved her from a life on the streets. What would you do, if you were her? Remember, I'm asking for a friend.
You seem awfully curious to find out why I took on secretarial duties.
Let's just say… I'm doing it as a favor for someone who's been like a father to me since I was a child.
I'm here to track your every move. That's all I can tell you.
As for who this man is… Heh. I don't know, why don't you try to find out? It could be someone you know.
How may I help you?
I'm here to see the owner.
I'm here to see you.
Who are you?
Did you? Strange. I don't have you in the schedule…
If that's the case, please call me to schedule an appointment first.
Interesting. If you have business with me, please come see me at the $map:02000216$ instead.
Do I look like I have time for games?

It's been a while since I had to cook. And I've never really cooked for, you know, someone special. Feels kind of nice.
Instead of MSG, I put in an extra dose of awesome. Because I'm awesome, get it?
I can't really tell what flavor you're going for.
It's delicious.
Yeah, everyone tells me my tastes are unique. Might take you some time to get used to it. Not bad, though, right?
Heh, sorry. Like I said, I don't cook much. Next time, I'll just have something delivered.
Eat up! I can always make more if you want. I mean, it might take me a while, but I don't mind.
Uh, yeah? I mean, I made it, didn't I? Of course it's good. I mean, after my last performance, I'm pretty much an artist and cooking is an art, so, you know… the math works.
I whipped this up just to see if I enjoy cooking. Have a bite?
Don't give me that look. You know I can't eat it with you. I've got gigs coming up. I've got to watch my weight.
But you already look great!
But you can just do a few extra sit-ups later!
Hey, my exercise regimen is a delicate balance. Besides, my trainer would kill me.
I know you can't see through my clothes, but you don't get as cut as I do eating whatever you want. It takes discipline.
I do, don't I? I inherited some amazing genes. <font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>
Can't stop checking me out, can you? I get it. My good looks outshine even my singing and acting skills.
My company sent me this juicer…
It's supposed to be able to juice up anything you throw in it. I had to test it out. Here, $OwnerName$, have a taste.
(Taste it.)
(Firmly decline.)
What? You're rejecting me? Somewhere, some of my fans are about to riot.
C'mon, I didn't put anything bad in it. At least, smell it! C'mere…
How is it? Tasty? This is such a great way to clear the fridge of old veggies.
Hey, you look good when you drink. Have another sip. Yeah, that's it. Now, hold it right there. Amazing!
Did I tell you I was on a cooking show a while back, $OwnerName$? I thought you might like one of the dishes, so I had them send me the recipe.
Just think! The exquisiteness of fine cuisine from the comfort of your own home. Let me feed you a bite. And… how is it?
Um, it's not my favorite…
It's delicious.
Ah, yeah. To be expected from a plebeian unaccustomed to the finer things in life. Don't worry, I'll teach you how to enjoy fine dining.
Oops. Now that I think about it, I may have skipped a step or two of the recipe…
Of course it is! It's a great recipe prepared by a great guy!
I'm glad you enjoyed it. Maybe I should have them send me all their best and most secret recipes. Wouldn't you like to try them?
I got this from a fan, but I'm not quite sure of its purpose…
Anyway, I have no use for it. Maybe you do, $OwnerName$?
Oh, no, it's too much. I can't accept that.
Thanks!
Suit yourself. I'll just keep it.
Did you just reject me, $OwnerName$? Hah, that's not really something I'm used to…
Do you even know what it is? Can you… explain how it works?
Right-o. Just don't tell anyone. I wouldn't want to upset my fans.
My agent forwarded this to me. It's from the Moms Who Love $MaidName$ fan club.
Hey, I'm just really lovable, okay? Anyway, I don't need it. You can keep it if you want.
Looks nice! Thank you!
Gross. This was meant for you.
Hey, I'm just trying to spread the love. Why is that a problem?
You don't want it? But it's nice. I'll donate it to a charity auction, I guess.
Great! I'm glad it's going to a good home. I love all my fans but I've already got too much stuff like that.
Thanks to my fans, you're getting all kinds of free goodies for your house, $OwnerName$.
I was using the vacuum to practices some poses when something strange got sucked into it. My curiosity got the best of me, so I opened it up and found this.
You shouldn't leave stuff like this just sitting around, you know.
My vacuum! Is it okay?!
Thank you.
What?! Um, I don't know?
If the vacuum did break, why don't you just get a robot vacuum?
Remember how I had to spot you for the food delivery guy last time? Well, maybe you should keep your mesos somewhere you can find it for next time.
Keep your mesos close and your $MaidName$ closer, you know. Hahaha.
Hmm, anything interesting?
Oh, I got a commercial proposal.
For an anti-dandruff shampoo, I think.
There is nothing more special than this moment right here, right now with you, $OwnerName$.
Just soak it in, $OwnerName$. This moment, free from the raving masses of fans, free to do whatever I want.
Whew, close one. Even wearing a hat, sunglasses, and even a mask, someone recognized me.
He kept following me with his camera. I had to circle the neighborhood several times before I snuck away.
Fame is stressful. You hear me, $OwnerName$?
A single word of encouragement from you, $OwnerName$, gives me more strength than the support of all the rest of my fans added together.
Let's not fight and be good to each other always.
Sometimes my heart races, and I think there's gotta be cameras hidden around the house somewhere. I just get so used to them, you know?
Why am I so fearful of a hidden camera? I'll let you figure that one out. <font color="#909090">(He smirks.)</font>
You wanna hear my secret, how I captivate my audience?
I pick one girl and stare at her throughout my performance. I tell myself, "doesn't matter if I'm the handsomest guy here tonight or not, I will make that one girl mine."
You should see the dreamy look those girls get. Because, let's face it, I'm always the handsomest guy around.
Why are you giving me that look? You know it's true!
I'm surprised you even care. Do you want to become a singer, $OwnerName$? Or do you just want to know about me?
When the going gets tough, the tough come home.
You know I'll always be here to welcome you home, don't you, $OwnerName$?
Why are you smiling? What's the good news? Then again, everyone who looks at me can't help but smile.
Some of them even forget to close their mouths and start to drool. Might be a cute look on you, $OwnerName$. Hahaha.
Don't believe the news! It's not true!
We only had dinner together once! And I haven't seen her since!
Oh. You haven't seen the news. And you don't care. Well, then.
A while back, I was practicing my singing when someone banged at the door. I guess I was a little too loud.
Still, even if it was just practice, I mean, it was me. It should've sounded amazing.
Maybe that's why she didn't yell. She just glanced around the house one time, then left.
Before I got my big break, there was this girl I liked. She wanted to be a singer, too, and we practiced together.
We were both broke, but we'd share what little food we had, practice all night, and wait for the first bus of the day together. But then, right before our debut…
She fainted in the middle of practice. They rushed her to the hospital, and we found out she was really, really sick. It was her lifelong dream to sing in front of a huge audience, but…
She died before her dream could come true. What was supposed to be our debut just became my solo debut…
Why are you giving me that suspicious look? Do you know?!
Fine, fine! I'll confess!!
I'm a fraud! A big stinkin' liar!
Of course you figured it out, $OwnerName$. I mean, we live together!
I just want you to know, I'm going to tell my fans soon, I swear. But I'll say it out loud to your first.
Ugh, this is tough! Okay… so… the height listed in my profile… it includes the two inches of the heel of my shoes, plus two thick layers of inner soles! Aah, please don't look at me differently now!!
How can I help you? Oh, let me put on my mask. That's better. Now, are you here to see the owner of this house?
Yep!
Nope!
Who are you?
Really? You're not here for… me? Are you sure? Didn't we meet once at the subway station? Or maybe it was a convenience store? You wanted my autograph, right?
Whew! I'm so, so, so glad you didn't recognize me! Huh? What? I didn't say anything!
Ah, so you're a fan? How did you find me? Haha, I can give you an autograph, but please, no pictures. I don't have my make-up on.
If you're not here for that then… Wait, wait. I got it. You're from a hidden camera show, aren't you? Hah hah, good one. All right, where's the camera?
That's a secret. It's better if you don't know. I'm sorry I sang so loudly and excellently that you couldn't help but barge in to see my beautiful face, but… well… okay, one autograph won't hurt.
Excuse me?! You… don't know? Do you live under a rock or something? Hmph.
Nice to meet you!
Hello! Are you a fan?
Ah, someone's here!
Shhh! Don't scream.
You're home awfully late, aren't you?
You're here.
I'm feeling a little under the weather…
Ugh… I can't sleep…
The lips, the teeth, the tip of the tongue. Ah ah ahhhh.
Feeling a bit starstruck, are we?
My ears itch. Someone must be talking about me.
Easy peasy.
If I do it like this…
I might be a little tired.
Spider!! …Oh, it's just a dust ball.
Ah…! I forgot about this.
Well, well…

Come to think of it, I'm forgetting something! Or… maybe not?
It's time I take control of my own life! I'm taking your advice, $OwnerName$!
I'm going to ask $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ out to eat black noodles with me! I've been in love with her forever. I'm going to tell her how I feel! Right? Should I? I should, shouldn't I?
Yes, you should!
Eh, the timing might not be quite right…
Yeah, I think so too. Girls like her don't go for guys like me, hah hah hah…
I've waited three years, what's a few more? I can wait as long as needed!
You think so? R-r-really? I mean, I do, too! Just let me catch my b-b-breath first!
You've given me the courage I needed. Deep breaths. Deeeeeep breaths. Okay, I'm ready! I'm going to do this!
I've been doing some serious reflection.
The other guards think I'm too indecisive. Not a day go by where $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ doesn't scold me.
Maybe I'm not cut out to be a guard. $OwnerName$, what do you think?
Yeah, maybe you should give up.
Are you really giving it your all, though?
Hah hah, you think so? I knew I shouldn't have joined the Royal Guard.
Hmmm, let me just… think about it.
I feel like you just punched me in the face. Thanks for the pep talk.
You're right. I'm ashamed of myself. I've been whining without even trying my best.
I've heard a strange noise outside for the past few hours. I hate ignoring it, but it's not like I can go out and check.
I can't leave the house unattended, you know? What if we get robbed? I don't want that on my head.
If you want to go investigate the noise yourself, feel free.
But just to be clear, I never asked you to, okay? I don't want that responsibility.
I wasn't sure if I should tell you, but $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ stopped by today…
He wanted to know about the recent increase in the number of adventurers fracturing bones in $map:2000118$.
Hey, I never asked anyone to do anything. If they volunteer to investigate the quakes and then trip and break some bones, how is that my fault?
He said he wanted to check out the place himself and then left for $map:2000118$. Ugh, what if $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ gets hurt too?
I've been told, if I have time to sit around and fret about things, I should do something to change them. So today, I decided to do just that! …I wonder if it was the right choice.
A salesman stopped by the house today. Usually, they get annoyed by my indecisiveness and leave, but I was determined to make a purchase today!
He said this bowl had a self-washing feature. Well… see this oil stain?
This is why I shouldn't try new things. Ugh.
I really admire Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. He's the reason the people of $map:2000001$ can sleep at night.
People often compare $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ with $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$, but I think $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is better.
It's not because I've seen them fight or anything. It's the way the Empress treats them.
$npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ always looks composed when she talks to $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$. She looks at him with unshakable trust in her eyes.
But she's different in front of $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$. She looks disconcerted and worried. No one else makes her look like that.
In other words, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ has the ability to disarm her. Get it, $OwnerName$?
Hmm, if i had a worthy rival, I'd be way stronger than I am now. Like, $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$!
Did you know there's a rivalry between $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$? Everyone in $map:2000001$ knows.
Guard Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ and Knight Captain $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$ have been best friends since they were kids.
They're both really good at fighting, too. A lot of people have high expectations of them, and everyone thinks of them as rivals.
I don't know if they'd agree, though. One second they're screaming in each others' faces, the next they're fighting enemies, side by side.
Some folks say $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$ at the armory should be my rival, but he has a long way to go. Hmph.
The Royal Guard is charged with the safely of the entire $map:2000001$ palace.
$map:2000001$ is home to the Empress and the nobility. Not a day goes by without an incident of some sort. We have long, grueling shifts.
Luckily, Captain $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ has allowed us to pick up work on the side.
The truth is, quite a number of people have filed injury claims against me, and I'm not making enough as a guard to pay them all. Just my luck, you know?
If you're asking because you're thinking of joining the Royal Guard, I suggest you reconsider.
$npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ is strict. It takes a tremendous amount of determination and effort to train under him.
As for me… Well…
When I lived in $map:2000001$, I never imagined I'd join the Royal Guard. But three years ago, my father applied for me, without telling me.
If he didn't, I'd still be living happily in $map:2000001$. Being a guard isn't so bad, I guess…
All I have to do is follow the captain's commands. I don't have to worry about making decisions.
Whenever I can't decide something, someone else comes along and decides for me. What more could I ask for?
$npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ said we could apply for different responsibilities if we wanted to. I'm getting tired of investigating the quakes in $map:2000118$, so I considered it.
I thought about applying for front gate duties in $map:2000001$, but then realized I didn't want to deal with tourists.
I also didn't want to fight on the front lines in $map:2000146$ because I don't want to get hurt.
I would love to try new things, but when I start thinking about them, I get so worried and can't make up my mind.
Hmmm, I think I'm going to have to mull this over for a week or two.
Have I told you about $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$? She works in front of $map:2000001$ $map:2000188$ to help travelers find their way.

One time, I was standing in front of $map:2000188$, unable to decide what I should eat for over an hour. Did I want black noodles or spicy noodles? Suddenly $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ showed up and handed me a bowl of black noodles.
She solved my dilemma so easily! How could I not fall in love with her right then and there? I don't know if $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ knows how I feel about her, though.
I miss $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$… I've been trying to decide for hours. Should I go to $map:2000001$ to see her?
Should I tell her my true feelings?
You see, I'm not the only one with a major crush on $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$. I think $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$ from the armory also likes her.
If $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ rejects me, it'll make things so awkward. If she doesn't reject me, things would get weird between me and $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$…
So you understand why I can't decide what to do, right?
Hmm, you look like a stranger. Oops, should I not have said that?
What do you mean?
I thought the house was empty. My mistake.
Who are you?
Think about it. If you are a stranger, you might be mad I said that. If you're not a stranger, I just offended the boss's guest.
Ummm… Give me a moment to think how I should respond. I'm not quite sure what to say…
Oh, did you? Hmm, what should I do? Let you go, or arrest you for attempted burglary? Hmm…
Breaking and entering, huh? But what should I do? Contact the royal guard or arrest you myself? Not quite sure about the protocol here. Let me think about this…
Me? Hmm, should I tell you my name? Or shouldn't I…?
I'm the man in charge of keeping the house secure! Who are you?
Hm, excuse me…
Hm, should I speak first or not?
May I ask who you are?
Hmph, how can you barge into someone else's house like this?
You're home.
Should I admit I broke a plate… or not?
Hmm… Should I speak up… or not?
Hmm… Should I work… or not?
Can I move this there… or not?
Should I go… or stay?
I think it looks okay…
But I'm still worried…
I wonder what $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$ is doing right now…
Hm, I'd better stay vigilant.

$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$… I wonder if she's eating well…
$OwnerName$, I want to ask you something. I can't stop thinking about $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. I'm worried she might think I'm bothering her.
A while ago, I was badly injured during an operation. $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ was furious! I've never seen her like that. Do you think… she hates me?
Yes.
I think it's the opposite, actually.
I see… $OwnerName$, you have no idea what it's like to be hated by someone you admire.
Ughhhh. My world… has ended…
Huh? What do you mean? You think she got angry because… she cares about me? You really think so?
So you're saying $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ was angry because she was worried about me? Ah, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$!
The Green Hoods protect the order of Maple World! But…
A while ago, I was injured during an operation, and my father has been urging me to quit ever since.
I understand he loves his daughter, but I don't want to quit. I don't want disappoint my father, either… What do I do?
Stay true to your convictions, for yourself and your father's sake.
Stop caring only about $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. Think about your parents, too!
Wow, ever heard of tact? Sheesh!
Wh-what?! Of course $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is important to me, but I'm in the Green Hoods to protect Maple World!
I knew you'd say that. You're right. I can't quit!
That's right! By protecting Maple World, I'm protecting my father. $OwnerName$, you have such sound logic!
$npcName:11000508[gender:1]$ stopped by this afternoon. She and I grew up together in $map:2000076$.
She said $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ ate nothing but a piece of bread for lunch today.
I can't believe they're neglecting her meals like that!!

So I packed a three-layered lunch box with the ingredients that I was going to use for dinner tonight and sent it back with $npcName:11000508[gender:1]$. Gosh, the Green Hoods can't do anything without me! …By the way, we'll have to skip dinner tonight.
Today, after finishing the housework, I patrolled the house and saw a stranger.
He looked suspicious, so I hid and watched… He snuck into our house! I stayed still because I wanted to catch him red-handed.
He went into the kitchen and poked around, looking for food. I couldn't wait any longer, so I pounced on him! And…
It was someone I knew: $npc:11000502[gender:0]$. He's a disgrace to his father.
He looked like he hadn't eaten for two days, so I had to give him food… I'm sorry I gave away your food. You can take it out of my pay if you want.
It's too boring to stay inside the house all day. I want to go out and exercise. $OwnerName$, want to come with me?
I want to join $map:61000006$, which takes place in $map:2000064$ every day, once in the morning and once in the evening.
It'll be fun! We'll do it together! Come on, go change into your workout gear!
Have you heard of $npc:11000002[gender:1]$ in $map:2000001$? Everyone in $map:2000076$ insists she was as beautiful as $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ in her time.
But obviously, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is way more beautiful.
Ahhh… $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$… What I wouldn't give for a chance to comb her hair every day…
$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is amazing. She leads the Green Hoods with a gentle yet firm hand.
$npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ says it's important to protect the weak and to safeguard justice. It's the reason the Green Hoods exist. She inspires responsibility and pride in all of us.
As for me, I'm more interested in protecting $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ than in protecting Maple World.
I know $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is much stronger than I am, but I'm sure she has things that she can't tell others… I want to help her in any way I can…
Uhh? What am I saying? Ah… Ah hah hah… Hah hah…
Huh? $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$? Hah hah! What about $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$?
W-wait. Did something happen to $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$? Is that it? Huh? Huh? Come on, you're killing me here. Answer me!
…Oh. You don't think $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ washed her hair today. Sheesh, what does it matter if she washed her hair or not?
Besides, $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is not a slob. She must have gotten oil on her hair while fighting. Duh!
Many of us joined the group because we admired $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. T-that was my reason, obviously.
Charismatic, a natural leader, a heart of gold, amazing combat skills, and unparalleled beauty! $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is perfect in every way.
Hey, if you think I'm infatuated with her, fine. Think whatever you want, as long as it distracts you from crushing on her yourself.
A Green Hood from $map:2000076$, that's me! Born and raised in $map:2000076$, I know everyone there as well as my own family.
Have you met $npcName:11000508[gender:1]$ in $map:2000203$ before? She's been my best friend since we were young.
That girl is so strong that she can do any man's work with no problem… Hm, I guess the same goes for me too, huh? Teehee!
That reminds me of $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$. I hope he's not being taken advantage of by anyone, wherever he is.
He's some guy I've known since I young. He's a decent fellow, but a bit naive and immature. It makes him easy prey.
I don't know why he couldn't learn from his father… $npcName:11000502[gender:0]$ is the son of Elder $npcName:11000001[gender:0]$ in $map:2000076$.
Come to think of it, rumor has it that every elder for generations has had a troublemaker son. Do you think that's true?
I thought I was going to live ordinary life, staying in peaceful $map:2000076$ for all of my days.
Meeting $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ completely changed my life. Watching a small, dainty-looking woman command a cohort of warriors touched me in a way nothing else ever has.
I'd never seen the world outside of $map:2000076$ or held a bow in my hand, but I decided to join her group, despite my father's objections.

Now that I've joined the Green Hoods, sometimes I feel sorry for $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. She was trained to be the leader of the Green Hoods since she was born, and being responsible for so many lives has to be tough.
I'd love to be there when she needs someone to talk to, but I know $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ would never show any weakness, no matter how troubled she was on the inside..
Ugh… I don't think the injury I got on that last operation ever properly healed. It's throbbing.
Do you mind putting this medicated patch on my back? I can't do it myself.
Whew, thanks. I bet you're curious how I got this injury…
I was on duty at the guard post when a group of creeps attacked. I'd never seen them before, and they used some kind of strange magic.
Ah, I'm still not good enough for $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$. I can't protect myself, let alone her…
Halt! Who goes there!
I know the owner.
Oops, wrong house.
Who are you?
You do, huh? Hm. All right, you can stay, but don't try anything stupid.
Mm, I don't think I've seen you before. Look, if you're here for the wrong reasons, I will make you regret it.
Ah, I see. Mistakes happen. You can be on your way now.
Are you lost? I'm a member of the Green Hoods, so let me know if you need help.
My name is $MaidName$. I'm a member of the Green Hoods. Now, it's your turn to identify yourself.
My name is $MaidName$, and I keep watch over this house. How may I help you?
I'm $MaidName$, a proud member of the Green Hoods!
Leave the security of your house to me!
Intruders?!
Uh? Are we under attack?
Everything's clear!
Welcome home, $male:sir,female:ma'am$! Heh heh… Is that too much?
Ah, my injury isn't getting any better…
Aw, I'm hungry…
Ugh, I put the medicine on, but it still hurts…
Maybe I can take a break now.
I'm done cleaning!
I'm worried.
All the windows are closed.
I don't see anyone suspicious around here.
I wonder what $npcName:11000015[gender:1]$ is doing right now…
Just tell me what you need!

$OwnerName$, be honest with me about something.
You hired me as your servant, and I've been loudly practicing my show host skills every single day.
Does it bother you? Please be honest.
Nah, it's entertaining.
I hate it so much.
…I see. I don't get many jobs hosting shows, and I'm terrible at keeping house. I don't know what to do…
Your honesty hurts, $OwnerName$. Sheesh.
You really think so? Then my dream has a chance at coming true, right?!
Entertaining? Me? That's the sweetest compliment anyone's ever given me in my entire life. Thank you!!
Every single day, I practice my hosting skills, but I can't help but worry sometimes.
I really want to be a great talk show host, but I'm just not sure I'll ever get my big break.
I'm not getting any younger, and you know they like to hire young. Should I just go back to working at the juice bar? What do you think?
It's not the end of the world to just stick to what you're good at.
Never, ever give up!
Yeah? Maybe I'm just not cut out for bring a host. Excuse me… I'd like to be alone for a while.
You think so? I never thought being good at something would break my heart. If only I were good at what I really, truly want to do…
…You're right. You're absolutely right! Shame on me for even considering giving up. It was a moment of weakness.
Yes! That's the spirit! I won't give up on my dreams, $OwnerName$!
Oh, our next door neighbor stopped by.
I was practicing for my show, when someone banged on the door.
I guess he thought I was too loud. He told me to keep it down so he could sleep, but I knew fate had sent him to me.
I needed someone to be the guest on my show. On my practice show.
It went great! Now I have confidence that I can run my show seamlessly, no matter how wacky the guest is.
I hope he can help again tomorrow! He looked thoroughly exhausted when he left, though…
Come to think of it, $npcName:11000012[gender:0]$ stopped by this afternoon to give me some mail.
I was hoping it was an invitation from the palace to host some grand event, but it was from $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$. He wants me to host his son's ninth birthday party.
That's not as exciting as a royal event, but beggars can't be choosers. And us twingos need to help each other, you know?
I'm going to make $npcName:11000171[gender:0]$'s son's birthday the best event ever! Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got to get practicing.
I hope I get to host something amazing soon. Like… Like… Like $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$'s wedding!
It'd be such an honor. My family would be so proud! Just the thought of it is making my pulse race!
I mean, she's not even engaged… And she can't even hold public events right now… But it would be such a fantastic, magical, beautiful event, don't you think? Ahh, I can dream, can't I?
Every show needs a special segment that captures the hearts and imagination of the masses.
…Oooh, how about this? "Special: Help $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ Find Her Man!"

I'd invite $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ to come on the show and then help her find the man of her dreams! Like, I could have her choose between $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000076[gender:0]$, and then let her keep choosing between people until she found her perfect match!
I can definitely make this work. I just need to get $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$ to agree to come on the show. All right, then! Off to the palace! I'm sure she can make time for me. La, la, laaaa!
I've been asked to prepare a special twingo show. Oooh, I get butterflies just thinking about it!
There are so many possibilities! A twingo talent show, a twingo reality show, or, oooh, maybe a twingo dance contest?
I can't make up my mind! $OwnerName$, what do you think?
Okay, $OwnerName$, let's practice for the world's greatest talk show!
Hellooooo, ladies and gentlemen! It's me, your cute and super talented host, $MaidName$!!
…Ugh, that sounds corny. It totally sets the wrong tone!
Hello, studio audience! Welcome to The $MaidName$ Show!
Our guest today is the one and only… $OwnerName$! Come on in, $OwnerName$.
So, what's the latest, $OwnerName$?
Huh? You've been busy leveling? No, no, no, $OwnerName$. What kind boring answer is that? I know this is just practice, but try to take it seriously, okay?
Practicing every day takes a toll on my vocal cords, and these babies are vital to my career.
That's why I try not to talk too much when I'm not practicing. I mean it. Please don't talk to me unless it's necessary, okay?
… … … Are you really just going to stop talking to me now? Because I asked you to? Really?
You may have wondered why I accepted a job with Helping Hands when my dream is to be a talk show host, but you don't understand.
Here, I get to practice my show-hosting skills around the clock, and I get paid for it! Also, strangers barge in all the time…
And I get to pretend they're guests on my show! A great host knows how to respond to unexpected situations with poise.
I end up interviewing them as I would if they were guests on the show. Sure, most of them try to sneak out in the middle of the interview, but I don't let them move an inch until I'm done with them.
Ahh, I wish I could host the event in $map:02000064$. I'm positive I could make it so much more exciting.
I've offered my services to the palace several times and get the same response every time:
"Thank you for your interest. That event does not require a host." I just don't get it!
Think about it! If you were in the $map:61000001$ audience, wouldn't you have fun trying to guess the winner?
But according to the palace, that's too close to gambling, which is prohibited.
Hmph. The palace is a rather old-fashioned, if you ask me.
In my younger days, I worked at a juice bar. My joy in life was listening to the customers and making their tasty drinks.
One day, one of the regulars came looking sad. He has broken up with his girlfriend a week ago and just couldn't get over it. I knew he needed a good laugh.
So I went all out. I listened to him, then I told him jokes and funny stories.
He left that night with a smile on his face, and it made me realize what I really want to do with my life.
My dream is to become Maple World's greatest show host! I have a long way to go, but I'll get there one day.
Let's give a warm welcome our first guest of the day to The $MaidName$ Show, $MyPCName$!
Uh. Hi?
What do you mean?
Get me out of here. Immediately.
Exactly! Hi! Now, tell us alllll about your interesting life!
Well, hi back! Make yourself comfy. You'll be with us for the next two hours, spilling all the juicy details of your fascinating life!
Don't be shy, now. Just be yourself! Go on, say hello to our studio audience!
No need to be confused, my friend. We're about to dive into our first segment of the day: "Juicy Details of $MyPCName$'s Personal Life"!
Oh, no. Please! I haven't had a guest on my pretend show for three hours!
Please! Even if you're busy, spare me an hour—no, thirty minutes!
From this moment on, I'm your servant.
Welcoooome to the $MaidName$ Show! Shoot, was the mic too loud?
Welcome to the $MaidName$ Show!
We've been anxiously awaiting the arrival of our special guest…
Finally! Our guest of the day has made an appearance!
I was so busy practicing I didn't hear you come in.

I should also clean the house…

Since you asked, I did see some guy clad head to toe in armor deep within the Ant Tunnel. He was all solemn and asked how I'd gotten that far. I had to stop myself from laughing. He was so pretentious!
Then he said there was a legendary $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$ in the back of the cave!
Now, I'm from $map:2000062$, so I've heard all sorts of adventure stories, but that was one of the biggest lies I've ever heard.
Who knows? It could be true!
Pssh, that guy was definitely a liar.
I know, right? He's worse than I am. Uh… I mean… Ah hah hah hah!
Totally. $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$? Pssh! If such a thing really existed, don't you think it would've destroyed the world already? Hahaha.
Do you really think so? Does that mean the guy I talked to… is the knight from all the fables?
Come to think of it, there's no explanation for the quakes, either. Hm… Is there really something going on?
I've been thinking a lot lately.
I've always wanted to be an adventurer, but I've never actually tried.
Mom says I should just take over the store. Do you think I should give up on becoming an adventurer and join the family business?
Mothers know best.
You'd give up, just like that?
They do, don't they? Ah, maybe I should just give up on my dreams…
I thought, of all people, you would encourage me to pursue my dreams! But I was wrong…
What? N-no! I haven't given up. I swear!
What am I saying? Of course I'm going to be the world's greatest adventurer!
I went to $map:02000031$ this afternoon to see if I could find books that contain clues to hidden treasure.
But… it's pointless. I can't read a book for two minutes without falling right asleep.
Every time I try, I fall asleep and wake up two hours later, totally disoriented.
At this rate, I might waste away my life sleeping before I have the chance to go on an adventure! What's wrong with me?
I was dusting the bookshelf today when I found this piece of paper. See that strange picture? Doesn't it look like a treasure map?
See? Right here. That curvy, strange-looking pattern. It's almost like it was a quick sketch, right?
Judging by the grime, it looks like a pretty old treasure map. And the shape of the picture resembles the northwest part of Victoria Island.
…Huh? This paper was just a doodle, and then used to wipe someone's nose? N-no way! You're wrong! Eek, take a closer look!
Today I tried a new recipe, and I think I just made the best food I've ever tasted in my life.
It smells good and tastes perfect. I'm thinking maybe I've discovered a new gift.
This doesn't mean I'm no longer going to be an adventurer. It's the opposite, actually. Practicing cooking is part of my plan.
You can't eat at restaurants when you're out at sea. I'm honing my cooking so I can survive any situation.
Haven't you heard? The great adventurer $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$ is also known for his cooking skills! They say it rivals that of a royal chef!
Everyone's trying to keep this hush hush, but I over heard. There's another world besides Maple World!
Personally, I think it's related to the Shadow Doors scattered around the world. There's got to be a new world beyond those doors.
Have I been through those doors? W-well… That's… Oh, right—the stove! I had a chance, but I couldn't because of the stove!
I was just about to walk through one of those doors when I remembered I forgot to turn off the stove before I left the house. My forgetfulness stopped me from exploring a new world. What a shame!
I heard something from sailors in $map:02000062$. They said if you travel south, you'll run into a dreadful sea monster.
It's not a giant squid, like you'd think. Oh no.
It's a creature with the head of a gorilla, wearing a skull mask. It has horns and flies around on giant bat wings.
I can't even picture it. But here's the thing: everyone who says they saw the monster remembers it differently. So who can say if they're telling the truth or not.
It sounds dangerous, but I'd love to see this creature with my own eyes one day. Hah hah!
There are so many different types of adventures, but I grew up in a port village, so the type that calls to me are sea adventures!
But that requires a ship and a crew, and ships are not cheap. I've been saving up for a long time, but I don't have enough to even buy the smallest boat! However, I've come up with an answer…

I'm going to form a party! $npcName:11000116[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000024[gender:1]$ have already agreed to join me! And, between you and me, I can't stop thinking about $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$…

I just so happened to overhear some folks in $map:02000069$ mention that $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$ wants to buy a ship and set sail for adventure, too! He acts like he's soooo high above me because he works at $map:02000068$, but… he can be pretty charismatic and determined when he puts his mind to it.
I can't decide if I want to ask him to join me or not. But you can't breathe a word of this to $npcName:11000019[gender:0]$, all right? You promise??
$OwnerName$, have you ever visited $map:02000068$ in $map:02000062$? Every wannabe adventurer has their heart set on joining that association.
About a month ago, I went there to apply, and the guy who worked there said I had to pass an entrance exam.
The exam is simple: just discover something no one else ever has. I built a raft right away and set sail from $map:02000062$.
I must have been on the sea for two days. I was so hungry and exhausted that I was about to give up, when lo and behold, I saw a patch of land, just off the horizon.

My heart raced! I thought I'd discovered a new land no one had ever set foot on before! But as I sailed closer, I realized… it was just $map:02000124$, which is really not all that far from $map:02000062$.

The warden intercepted my ship and held me there for a week before finally letting me return to $map:02000062$. Gosh, that's embarrassing. You're the first person I've ever told that story to, $OwnerName$.
I heard a story the other day about a kid in some village who wanted to become a pirate.
He ate some strange berries that gave him the power to stretch his body.
And he used that ability to conquer the sea and become a pirate king! Hah hah!
It's too crazy to be real, but you'd better believe I'll be poppin' every berry I see into my mouth for the rest of my life!
$npcName:11000019[gender:0]$ thinks he's better than me because he works at $map:02000068$, but hello, sitting at a desk stamping docking permits is hardly the same thing as sailing for adventure.
I don't need help from some stupid association to go on an adventure. Not when I have friends who think like I do!
Already $npcName:11000116[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000024[gender:1]$ have agreed to join me. $OwnerName$, what about you? I should probably also mention there's a 300,000 meso membership fee.
The yearning to set sail for adventure eats away at my very core!! My ultimate dream is to be the very first to set foot on a brand new continent!
I've already named my ship. Now, I just need to acquire her! Hah hah!
I can tell you the name, if you're curious, but you can't tell a soul. Okay… I'm going to name her… the Nautilus!
So until the day I meet my Nautilus, I'll work hard as your servant! Hah hah!
I must have been around eight. We had a big ol' bookshelf at home, and one of the books on the bottom shelf changed my life forever.
It was written by a great explorer, and his every word enraptured me. My heart fluttered, my eyes glazed over… I felt like I was exploring the world at his side!
I knew then and there I had to become an adventurer. Ahhh. Such a great book. It was written by $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$. Have you read it?
What?! You ran into $npcName:11000444[gender:0]$ in $map:02000062$?! Why didn't you tell me? I could've gone and gotten his autograph!
Maybe it's not too late. I'm going to go look for him! Hey, I'm busy. Stop bothering me, will you?
I'm pretty passionate about adventuring, but not as passionate as the guy in the Ant Tunnel.
I think his name is $npcName:11000145[gender:0]$. He wears really weird clothes and says he's from the future.
He did a good job with his costume… but I think he really truly believes he's from the future.
Poor guy. I feel sorry for him. He's clearly not well.
Hello. It's a perfect day to go on an adventure, isn't it?
Yep!
I don't know…
Who are you?
Yeah! We think alike! High five!
Argh, what I wouldn't give to be out on the sea right now!!
What? You are no longer allowed to go outside. Go home and lock yourself in! Right now!
Ah, so you've never experienced the thrill of adventure. What a shame!
Me? I am $MaidName$, the world's greatest adventurer… in the making. You'd better write down my name.
I am $MaidName$, first mate of this house! Hah hah hah! Doesn't that sound awesome?
Hello! Nice to meet you!
I'm happy to join you!
Mm? Who are you?
Are you lost?
Did you make a new discovery?
You look like you've been lost at sea for weeks.
Argh, what's wrong with me?!
Ahhh… I can't give up like this…
Ah… I'm sleepy…
Oh, right!
Nice!
Uhh? This isn't it.
Where can I find a treasure map?
Mwa hah hah! What a great discovery!
Mm? What's this?!
Why are humans so high maintenance?
Please! One moment, I'm talking to this zelkova.

Aha, our contract renews every time you pay me, right? That's how human contracts work? I feel like I've learned something new and fascinating about human culture, and that makes me happy!
Ah, I know. Accepting this means I accept the extension of our contract. I'm learning so much about you unusual creatures, thanks to you!
Keeping a promise made to a human is tough, but I saw it through, didn't I? I feel like I've really accomplished something great. Thanks for the experience!
Really? Hehe. I had no idea how difficult it was to be idle all day. Thank you for helping me keep my promise, $OwnerName$!
$OwnerName$, did you know our employment agreement expires soon?
Why are humans so high maintenance?

There are some things I just can't do, no matter how hard I try.

It's been $MaidPassedDay$ since our contract expired. I may live a long, long life, $OwnerName$, but I want our time together to be meaningful.
Time never stops, and it never waits for anyone.

$OwnerName$! What happened? Won't you tell me? I know something happened… I thought we were closer than that…

Did you know fairies make contracts to use magic and spells? To us, contracts are promises we make in exchange for power. Humans, it seems, mainly use contracts for things involving time and money. When I signed on with Helping Hands, I made a promise to the company about accepting a certain wage.

I would love to do you a favor without anything in return, but that would mean breaking my promise… I made a promise to Helping Hands in exchange for an opportunity to learn more about humans. I hope you can understand that, $OwnerName$.
$OwnerName$, you haven't talked to me lately. You didn't use to be like this. Oh, never mind. For a moment, I forgot you were human, hehe!
Mama taught me this! I'm good at it, hehe.
Sure! Anytime.
$OwnerName$, you're the first human I've shared so much with…
