Tell me about the criminals.
Do you have something to say to me?

Everyone's so on edge right now, but not me… In fact, I can't wait to show the rest of the world what I can do! How about we forget about everything and go blow some stuff up? I'll even help you pick out your own cannon.
I'm not afraid of anything as long as I've got my giant cannon with me. Unlike people, it'll never disappoint me. What do you say, want to become a Heavy Gunner?
Everyone's so on edge right now, but not me… in fact, I can't wait to show the rest of the world what I can do!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
This is a cannon, and it's the greatest! It can tear things up from a zillion feet away. Here, wanna see?
Hahaha! Did you think I was serious? If I spun up my cannon right now, I'd send this whole place crumbling down.
Fun is in the eye of the beholder. If you want to live a happy life, then figure out what you really want to do, and do it for the rest of your life.
Just keep trying new things until you get to something that sticks! Anything goes, as long as you don't hurt anybody. Well, it's okay if they deserve it.
I became a mercenary because a boring traditional life wasn't for me. And now I get to lug this beauty everywhere I go and blow stuff up!

I came here as some doctor's bodyguard. But I got tired of escorting him to all his stuffy events. I'm actually pretty excited about all the recent chaos. I know some people are grumpy about it, but it's an opportunity for me to take on adversaries tougher than I ever dreamed. I'm stoked!
It'll be much more fun to travel around the world, looking for worthy opponents, than protecting grouchy old dudes.
What should I do now?

If you want to take on tough serious, you need serious hardware. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ can hook you up with some sweet Heavy Gunner equipment. Go gear up and introduce yourself to the world outside with a bang!

Keep shooting stuff, and eventually you'll reach a new level. Then it'll be time to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.
Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.
<font color="#ffd200">Upgrading skills</font> requires <font color="#ffd200">Crystals</font>.

$itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.
And as for $itemPlural:40100022$… Hah, that's way out of your league.
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already a Knight. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already a Berserker. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already a Wizard. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already a Priest. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already an Archer. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already a Thief. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already an Assassin. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
What brings you here?
How's it going?
Have you got a new job? I certainly do.
Don't you think my skin has gotten a tad paler these days?
I don't get sunburned anymore.
I'm having as much fun doing this as I did being an oarsman.
But staying indoors all day gives me cabin fever sometimes.
What brings you here?

Justice is just an concept whose meaning no one can even agree on, so how important could it really be? Live free! Laws are for sheep. You've gotta take what you want, that's just the way the world works.
If you wanna win, you've gotta be strong. I can teach you how to be strong.
Justice is just an concept whose meaning no one can even agree on, so how important could it really be? Live free! Laws are for sheep. I can show you how to get what you want.
How can we live free?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
Are you serious? Have you really been so brainwashed by society that you don't know what it is anymore?
Do what you want and take what you want. That's what it means to be free. If you want it, all you need is the strength to take it.

Justice? Order? Hah! They're for sheep who can't hack it in the wild! If you want to make it in this world you've got to learn how it really works. The only path in life is the one you carve for yourself.
It's simple be a winner. This world is ruled by competition, it's eat or be eaten. Only the best win, so you've gotta try and make sure that's you.
But things don't always go the way you want. You have to know how to turn the tables on your enemy, by any means necessary.

We Thieves are the masters of anything-goes. We can move on our enemies in the blink of an eye, and we've got no problem with poison-coated knives. We do what we have to, and if someone has something we want, we take it. It's simple.
There's no such thing as right and wrong when it comes to winning. There's only you, or them.
Congratulations, $MyPCName$, and welcome to the seedy underbelly of society. Now it's time you learned our ways, from surprise attacks to poisoned blades.
What should I do now?

To take down your enemies you've gotta be fast and precise. For that, you'll need a sharp dagger. $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ should have all kinds of Thief gear. So go get yourself a shiny new blade and use it to carve your own path in life.

Stab enough things, and eventually you'll reach a new level, and that means you get to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.
Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.
<font color="#ffd200">Upgrading skills</font> requires <font color="#ffd200">Crystals</font>.

$itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently. So yeah, getting hold of them is no easy feat.
And as for $itemPlural:40100022$—well, you can figure that out on your own time.
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Knight here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Berserker here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Wizard here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Priest here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to an Archer here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Heavy Gunner here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?

If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to an Assassin here. Sure you've crossed some lines, but you're still just a cog in the machine. Just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
Ugh. This place makes me so uncomfortable. Hmm… Your eyes… I can see you're a kindred spirit… How would you like to join us and walk among the shadows?
Happiness, anger, sadness, forgiveness—emotions are just baggage that gets in the way. Your enemies don't deserve your mercy.
Ugh. This place makes me so uncomfortable. Hmm… Your eyes… I can see you're a kindred spirit… You would probably feel at home among the shadows, but you're still too weak to join us.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
My kind is more comfortable in the shadows than in the light. In my line of work, standing around out in the open can get you killed.
Watching $npc:11000043[gender:1]$ over there trying to peddle her philosophy to anybody who makes eye contact… She's all about "doing good deeds and helping the weak." Hah. It makes me wanna hurl.

She's too soft. You help the somebody who can't take care of themselves once, and they'll become reliant on you. Unless they learn how to fend for themselves, they'll never survive in this world. And maybe they don't deserve to.

Ah, a fellow walker of the shadows. If you've made it this far, you should know there's no point helping those who can't help themselves. But you're not weak, are you? Well then, ask me your question.
What should I do now?
If you want to survive in the shadows, you need to blend in $npc:11000004[gender:0]$ has some equipment that should work for you. Gear up, and never let them see you coming.

Stay alive long enough, and eventually you'll reach a new level. That's when you get to learn new skills. To see the <font color="#ffd200">skills you can learn</font>, press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> and open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>.

When you're ready to <font color="#ffd200">upgrade a skill</font>, just press <font color="#ffd200">K</font> to open the <font color="#ffd200">Skill window</font>, then press the plus sign next to the skill you'd like to improve.
Upgrading skills requires various types of crystals. One type, $itemPlural:40100001$, are available for purchase from supply merchant $npcName:11000010[gender:1]$ here in $map:02000001$.
<font color="#ffd200">Upgrading skills</font> requires <font color="#ffd200">Crystals</font>.

$itemPlural:40100001$ are what remains after polishing rough crystals, and they're distributed throughout Maple World by $map:02000051$. You can easily find them by talking to supply merchants in big cities.

Of course, some materials are rarer than others, in particular the Red, Blue, and Green Crystals. They possess so much power that they are unstable, and only <font color="#ffd200">Elite</font> or <font color="#ffd200">Boss</font> enemies will drop them, and very infrequently.
And as for $itemPlural:40100022$… You're too weak to be worrying about those.
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Knight…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Berserker…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Wizard…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Priest…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're an Archer…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Heavy Gunner…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Thief…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
What brings you here?
I'm always ready to operate at a moment's notice. Hee, hee.
I don't charge a lot for my operations. I can cut you a great deal after I cut you with my scalpel. Hah!
You look a right mess! How about I treat you? It'll only be a measly $paneltyPrice$ mesos. Don't worry, I'm a real doctor!
You don't look like you need my help right now, but you will eventually. Oh yes, trust me on this one. Bad things happen around here all the time.
What seems to be the problem?
Plastic surgery is a gift, I say!
I can transform your entire face!
Imagine your ideal face! I can make it happen…
Oooh, $MyPCName$, I'm so glad you found me. I can work miracles! Everyone says so. Now, what did you have in mind?
Show me the possibilities.
How can I help you?
Beautiful skin is all the rage, and I can make yours positively glow!
Skin is marvelous! So soft, so fleshy…
Hey, do you want me to help make your skin more luminous?
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Thinking about spicing up your look? I can give you any skin tone you like. Care to take a peek?
Yeah, let's do it!
How may I help you?
Put your trust in me, my scissors, and the wild creature within.
Trust my inner beast to save your hairstyles down to the very last strand!
A wild beast sleeps within me… a beast with perfectly styled hair.
Prepare your hair for the unimaginable. The wild beast in my soul will possess these scissors and summon your desired hairstyle from your memories.
Do it! I'm ready!
How may I help you?
I'd like to personally thank you for your patronage.
Did you have a specific style in mind?
$MyPCName$, how shall we style your hair today? Anything you like, just say the word.
Anything? Really? Well, in that case…
How may I help you?
Cosmetics will bring your look to the next level.
Some adventurers are too busy to make time for themselves. It's a real shame.
Well, no, I don't carry real tattoos. Do you know how much those hurt?
Nothing expresses the inner YOU like carefully-selected cosmetics. How'd you like to experiment with a new look?
Yep, time to accessorize!
How may I help you?
Matching colors are so predictable!
Why'd they name pigments after pigs… when ducks are the real masters of color?!
What's the hot color on Maple Island these days? Is it still red?
Did y'know? Ducks have a sharp eye for color! Least this duck does.
Being strong is important, but looking fabulous while you fight is the true key to happiness, y'know. So… wanna spruce up your gear?
Yes! I need more color in my life!
How can I help you?
But you won't be able to do anything, no matter how determined you are, when you're sick.
This is bad. More soldiers are getting wounded by the day.
This area is dangerous. Please be careful.
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
How may I help you?
Is everything all right?
Hm, you don't look wounded or ill…
You might look fine. But do you FEEL fine?
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
How may I help you?
You look like you've seen some rough days.
I treat my patients like family.
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
How may I help you?
Ah! Are you in need of my services?
You ought to take care of yourself while you're still healthy. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure!
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
Just look at that gorgeous reflection! Can you believe that's you?
How may I help you?
I've been seeing more patients these days. I wonder why…
Show me where it hurts.
I can make it all go away.
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
How can I help you?
I've been seeing more patients lately.
I miss having some spare time to myself.
I tell you, the stress of running a hospital is enough to kill you! And then your only hope for survival depends on how well you managed the hospital!
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
What kind of item would you like today?
Spin, spin!
Welcome! $npc:11000474$ is filled with <font color="#ffd200">wondrous items</font>!
Spin $npc:11000474$ for your chance to win the wondrous items! May luck be with you, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!
You get only <font color="#ffd200">one chance to spin $npc:11000474$</font>. Want to spin $npc:11000474$ again? Then <font color="#ffd200">find another hat</font>!
This might sound crazy, but if you come across a hat in a field, don't hesitate to throw yourself inside of it! You heard me!
What kind of item would you like today?
Spin, spin!
Congratulations, you're a winner! You get to draw a <font color="#ffd200">wondrous item</font>!
Come on, spin the roulette for your chance to win amazing items! May luck be with you, <font color="#ffd200">$MyPCName$</font>!
You get only <font color="#ffd200">one chance to spin $npc:11000475$</font>. Want to spin again? Then you'll have to win again!
I hope you come back and win again soon! Have a lucky journey!
<font color="#909090">(The altar has faded letters written on it.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Read the message.)</font>
Shadow World is an angry land… Where no blessing upon anyone can make any difference.
Lo, if you are one who thirsts for blood, will you absorb the wrathful energy and rid yourself of $skill:70000029$?
Lose $skill:70000029$.
Retain $skill:70000029$.
The wrathful shadows have devoured every one of your blessings and taken over your mind. Now, you see that friendship is a myth, and everyone is your enemy!
In the end, nothing can truly shield you from reality.
<font color="#909090">(Reading the words on the altar, Turka's anger is almost palpable.)</font>
And… that's another sword fresh off the grinding stone! What a beaut. This will make for one happy customer… Oh hi there, can I help you?
Hm, I'm almost out of silica sand… I'll need to get more before doing this week's welds.
I've been standing all day over a hot forge!
You just leave the enchanting to me.
And… that's another sword fresh off the grinding stone! What a beaut. This will make for one happy customer… Oh hi there, can I help you?
Can you enchant my items?
Isn't it obvious? I'm a blacksmith! The best one there is, too. Well, on this street.

The thing is that <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000076$</font> is absolutely lousy with craftsmen and women. This is the heart of the blacksmithing trade for Maple World, and that makes competition fierce. But that competition is inspiring for people like me. I learn a lot from my peers, and I relate to people who are willing to pour their heart and soul into their work.

You're not here to talk about me though, are you? You need your gear tuned up, I'm your woman. All I need are the right materials, and I'll work my magic. You know what I'm talking about, right? $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$, all produced in $map:2000051$, usually.

<font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> come from <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100024$</font>, you'll need to dismantle gear that is rated Epic or better.
People compete for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> in the <font color="#ffd200">Personal Arena</font>, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is…

By the way, Elliana got ahold of yet another strange weapon, and she's been begging me to enchant it for her. I told her such flashy, impractical weapons like that can't be enchanted, but she doesn't listen. Why can't she just accept that only items marked as "Can be Enchanted" can, well, be enchanted?
Okay, let's see the gear you want to enchant. I'm warning you now, it has to be marked with "Can be Enchanted."
Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

You didn't forget that enchanting gear requires materials, did you? The <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is available for purchase from gear merchants and supply merchants. You can get the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> by <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100024$</font>, that comes at a much higher cost. It only comes from dismantling gear that is epic or better.
Wow! This is Legendary! Where did you get it? I see gear from all over the world every day, but nothing like this. This is something truly special.
Whoa, this is a legendary item. I can't compensate you for anything that happens to such a valuable piece, so you need to be willing to assume all risk.
This has never been enchanted, not even once. You'll be very happy when you see how much better I can make it.
You've never tried to enchant this gear? Just wait till you see what I can do with it!
Never-enchanted gear? That's great. It should be really easy to enchant this gear for the first time.

This gear… Have I really failed in enchanting it 100 times? Gee. This hurts my pride. But you know what a blacksmith with real grit would do? Not give up! So let's try it again, this time with more experience and wiser minds, yeah?

But you've already tried to enchant this gear 100 times, and it's been a failure each and every time. You're going to ask me to enchant it no matter what I say, aren't you? Wow, you're stubborner than I am. All right, no guarantees it'll work, but here goes!

Have you really tried and failed to enchant this gear 1,000 times? I can't believe it! I thought I was stubborn, but I have nothing on you. Maybe all of us craftspeople on this street should give you an award for Best Customer.
Put your mind at ease. Only another earthquake could make me fail at this simple of an enchantment.

Don't worry, I could do this with one hand tied behind my back. In fact, I could do a lot of smithing one-handed if I could just find someone to be my striker! Interested? Okay, okay, I can see you just want the enchantment… let's do this, then.
This enchantment will be so easy, it would actually be more difficult to fail than to succeed! You'd be foolish to pass up on those odds, I'd say.
There's very little chance of error when the enchantment is this simple. Want me to give it a try?
Enchanting this gear will be a little tricky, but certainly not impossible. It's up to you, but I'd say the risk is well worth the potential reward.
This will be a piece of cake. Just believe in me a little!
Let's see… this gear has only been enchanted a handful of times, so I shouldn't have too much trouble with it… as long as you don't distract me!
I should be able to enchant this gear safely, as long as you don't distract me with incessant chatting or stares, so find something to occupy yourself while I'm working.
Due to previous enchantments, there's some risk if you want me to enchant this gear. But still, there's a much greater chance that I will succeed. It's up to you.

Good news! Even though this item has been enchanted multiple times, it's still pretty stable. There's a chance that the new enchantment could go wrong, but that comes with the territory. It's your call.
There's an elevated chance of failure if I enchant this item, but it's not so high to really worry me. If it doesn't worry you either, go ahead and press the Enchant button.
I'm pretty confident about this. And don't worry; if it doesn't work, you can always try again!
I'm going to give it a go, now. And hey, if I mess up, you can always try again!
This is just too easy. Check it out!
To +7, huh? Shouldn't be too hard. Hand it over!
This gear is a little delicate, but I'll use some finesse, and it should be fine.
Peachy never fails because she goes hog-wild with the materials. I'm more reasonable about it, but it means I might fail from time to time. It's a trade-off, you see.
You know, the chances of successful enchantment for this piece are lower than I'd like, but I'll do it if you want me to.

This gear is within my ability to enchant, sure. But the chance of failure is a bit high, and I'm telling you that when other blacksmiths won't, because they're not as honest. So, do what you will with that information.
I can't enchant this. I could hone my enchanting skills for the next hundred years, and I still wouldn't be able to do it. This gear is just too strong. You should be satisfied with it as it is.
I know you're the type who likes to rise to any challenge, but even you and your gear have limits. And sometimes, it's wiser to quit than to try to push things past their natural limit.
The truth about enchanting gear is that it requires both skill and luck.
Blacksmithing is tough, but fascinating. When I look into the flames, I feel like I'm God.
Sure, it'd be great if enchantments never failed. But then again, that would make us blacksmiths go broke! Ha, ha!
It worked! Told you I'm the best blacksmith on this street.
See? No problem at all!
The enchantment was successful! Here you are… nice doing business with ya!
Your materials were excellent, and the enchantment worked! A great day's work for both of us.
I told you, this is nothing! Choose me again next time!
It worked! And you deserve a lot of the credit. Your persistence made this possible.
I've succeeded in a +10 enchantment! I'm glad we went for it!
Did you see that?! The item shook a little, but I kept control over it and the enchantment was successful! That was close, but what a reward! Here's your improved item!
It worked! My skill aside, the materials you brought were truly excellent. We work well together. I hope you choose me again next time!
Uh-oh. It seems the ratio of $item:40100023$ was off. That caused some destabilization, and it decreased your gear's enchantment level by one. I'm sorry; I misjudged the carbon content in your gear.
I knew the $item:40100023$ was too unstable. Your gear's enchantment level has decreased by one. I'm sorry, but I thought I warned you…
What…? This shouldn't have happened! I can't believe it, is it because I saw a black cat on my way to work today?
Oh, the enchantment failed. It's not our fault… Whoever made this gear didn't case-harden it enough, so it's random chance whether it can tolerate enchantments.
I thought it'd be easy. What did I do wrong? I'll practice more and get better.
This has never happened before… and when I said it was going to be so easy! It must have been something random, like my hand slipping…
Hm… this gear would be quite difficult for me. I'd rather help you with some different gear, if you have any.
Ho boy, I'm busy! Busy, busy, busy… If you were hoping for my services, I just don't have the time right now. I'm working on a special order from the palace.
Can you enchant my items?
What do you do?
Isn't it obvious? I'm a blacksmith! The best one there is, too. Well, on this street.

The thing is that <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000076$</font> is absolutely lousy with craftsmen and women. This is the heart of the blacksmithing trade for Maple World, and that makes competition fierce. But that competition is inspiring for people like me. I learn a lot from my peers, and I relate to people who are willing to pour their heart and soul into their work.

You're not here to talk about me though, are you? You need your gear tuned up, I'm your woman. All I need are the right materials, and I'll work my magic. You know what I'm talking about, right? $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$, all produced in $map:2000051$, usually.

<font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> come from <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100024$</font>, you'll need to dismantle gear that is rated Epic or better.
People compete for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> in the <font color="#ffd200">Personal Arena</font>, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is…

Keep in mind that the only items you can enchant are Top, Bottom, Suit, and Weapon items at level 20 or above. That frustrates some folks, but I need a solid base to work from. Elliana found some weird weapon she wanted to enchant, but she doesn't get that there are rules to these things. I'm good, but even I have my limits!

I'd love to help you, but right now I have to focus on this special order from the palace. No exceptions! Absolutely not! You wouldn't want me to stop your order to work on someone else's, so why would you expect me to do that to the palace?
What is it?
What do you want?
One day, I'll be a hotshot adventurer, too.
Hello there!
What's that smell?
Can't you see I'm busy?

Welcome to the $map:02000124$ cruise ship!
$map:02000124$ is where the worst criminals of all get locked up. We run tours to show the free, law-abiding citizens why they should stay law-abiding.
It's <font color="#ffd200">1,000 mesos</font> to take a tour of the prison. Are you interested?
The $map:02000124$ cruise ship will depart soon!
The tour of $map:02000124$ costs 1,000 mesos. And you gotta hurry!
A cruise ship is about to depart for $map:02000124$, where the most notorious criminals are kept!
Hey there! You looking for the cruise ship to $map:02000124$?
Yep!
What is $map:02000124$?
Hey, it's <font color="#ffd200">1,000 mesos</font> to take a tour of the prison.
Looks like you're short on cash. Come on back when you've got it, because this tour is worth the money! You've never seen such suffering, such misery! It builds character.
$map:02000124$ is where the worst criminals of all get locked up. We run tours to show the free, law-abiding citizens why they should stay law-abiding.
How may I help you?
This <font color="#ffd200">Guild Lounge</font> is for members only. Did you have a question?
What are guilds?
What is the guild lounge?
A guild is an alliance of like-minded heroes. $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ encourages heroes to form guilds, so they can all benefit from each other's talents.
How does one create a guild?
The Guild Lounge is a special space for members only. It <font color="#ffd200">sells a variety of items for guild members</font>.
But even if you're in a guild, you might not be able to buy items. For that, your particular guild has to have the right.
Whether a guild has the right depends on its number of Guild Trophies. Guild Trophies are the combined Hero Trophies of everyone in the guild.
Each item sold at the Guild Lounge <font color="#ffd200">requires a different number of Guild Trophies</font>. So it's beneficial to have as many Trophies as possible at all times.
How does one create a guild?
Press <font color="#ffd200">G</font>, and a window will open where you can create a guild. Each new guild requires approval from the palace, and that costs <font color="#ffd200">5,000 mesos</font>.
If you want to enter the <font color="#ffd200">Guild Lounge</font>, then please create or join a guild.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. It's an honor. Would you like to enter the Guild Lounge?
How may I help you?
Only members can use the Guild Lounge.
I hope you enjoyed your stay. Would you like to leave the Guild Lounge now?
How may I help you?
Absolutely lovely today, isn't it?
Hm, you don't look wounded or ill…
You might look fine. But do you FEEL fine?
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
Welcome.
Welcome.
Welcome.

Civilian ships are prohibited from sailing the waters around $map:02000183$. But for the low, low price of <font color="#ffd200">4,000</font> mesos, I can smuggle you into the area. Do you want to cast off now?
I can do anything if the price is right.
Business hasn't been good lately.
Nothing passes through this harbor without passing through me, first.
Buddy, you need something?
I want to go to $map:02000183$.
No.
$map:02000183$? Sorry, no can do. Civilian ships are prohibited from sailing in those waters.
Alright then. I pretty much run the harbor, so if you need anything I can help you out. For a fee, of course.
You want to go to $map:02000183$. The only way by ship is to pay someone to smuggle you in, and that costs at least <font color="#ffd200">4,000 mesos</font>. Bring the money, will you?
Ahoy!

The Marco has a noble purpose, to transport adventurers on missions for the $map:02000068$. And lately, it's also been carrying adventurers to $map:02000183$ where they battle pirates in the eastern straits. If you're one of these adventurers, then you can board the ship for 4,000 mesos. Is that what you want to do?
May the winds favor us today!
Our last voyage was too long for my liking.
I'm so tired… the sea's a harsh mistress!
You need something?
Can I board the ship?
I'm just looking around.
The Marco only transports adventurers who are carrying out special missions in $map:02000068$. Other adventurers and ordinary civilians can't board.
Taking a break from adventuring, eh? Nice. Wish I could do that, but this dock isn't going to manage itself.
The operation of the Marco is mostly paid by the $map:02000068$, so the passengers only pay a small fare of 4,000 mesos. If you want to board, that's your price.
Ahoy!

$MyPCName$, what you did was fantastic! Now all you have to do is return to $map:02000062$ for a debriefing. It's 4,000 mesos to go back on the ship, the same fare as before. Do you want to depart for $map:02000062$ now?
This place is every bit as dangerous as I remember.
The water is too choppy. We can't set sail in this.
I hope the pirates don't come this far.
You need something?
Can I board the ship?
I'm just looking around.
The Marco only transports adventurers who are carrying out special missions in $map:02000068$. Other adventurers and ordinary civilians can't board.
This place isn't too safe. You'd better be careful.
The operation of the Marco is mostly paid by the $map:02000068$, so the passengers only pay a small fare of 4,000 mesos. If you want to board, that's your price.

Even when darkness comes, our lives and dreams continue. I am grateful to witness the oath of love.
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
No darkness or evil can subdue the power of life and love. I hope you keep that beautiful powerful forever in your heart.
Welcome to $map:84000014$, $MyPCName$.
Love sworn under the sacred Bayar Mountains will shine stronger and magnificent than anything else.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Make the most of it while in $map:84000015$.
The twinkling light blesses you, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$, welcome aboard! Today, a grand and spectacular wedding like never before will be held right here! Please look forward to the events on the wedding deck!
Greetings from MC $npc:11004711$ of $map:84000016$! Do you need my help?
음? 안녕하세요, $MyPCName$님.
궁금한점이 있으신가요? 편하게 물어봐주세요.
개인적인 질문도 괜찮냐고 묻는다.
질문을 들어봐야 확답을 드릴 수 있을 것 같아요. 궁금하신게 뭔가요?
혹시…경비병 $npcName:11000169[gender:0]$에 대해 어떻게 생각하냐고 묻는다.
$npcName:11000169[gender:0]$씨요?
그는 정말 멋진 사람이며, 모두가 좋아한다고 말한다.
아…그…그런가요? 그런데 전…
선남 선녀가 어울리는 것은 당연한일! $npcName:11000160[gender:1]$만 괜찮다면 내가 자리를 마련…
자…<font size="40">잠깐만요!</font> 잠깐만 말씀 좀 멈춰보세요.
일단…$npcName:11000169[gender:0]$씨가 누구죠?

방송국에서 인터뷰를 위해 나왔다고 말한다.

그리고 이런 내 마음도 팬들에게 전해지고 있겠지.
보기보다 속이 깊다고 말한다.

I want to end the wedding.

Once the wedding ends, the couple and all the guests will be moved out of the wedding hall. If the ceremony hasn't begun or is currently ongoing, it is better to wait until the end. If we end the wedding now, we can't go back.
If you really want to, I can end the wedding with consent of the other party. Do you want to do that?
End the wedding.
Let me think about it.
$map:84000013$ is a stunning place. Relax a little longer. Come back when you need me.
I want to start the wedding.
I miss $map:63000044$…
Harang… My hometown…
The lake on Harang is so much clearer than this…
I wonder how the weather on $map:63000044$ is today…
Tell me about $map:63000044$.
I want to see $map:63000044$ at its most pristine.
Show me $map:52000058$ when it's poisoned.
Bring me to $map:52000059$ during an eruption!
If you've ever been to $map:63000044$, then you know that it was once a peaceful haven. The water was clean and clear, the fish flourished… My beloved hometown…
I'm not sure why, but the water's become muddy and poisonous, and weird fish have started showing up. There was nothing we could do…

Then, a little later, $map:63000044$ erupted into a giant volcano! Some folks thought it was a mermaid's curse, and others claimed that it was a government plot. Personally, I think the volcano was always there, sleeping… Waiting…
Anyway, I can send you to any version of $map:63000044$ that you like. Whether you seek the pristine lake or a sea of molten lava… How can I do that? It's simple.
But it's nearly time for my nap, so I won't go into the details now. Besides, what's the point of life without a bit of mystery?
When it was clean and peaceful, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
When it was mysteriously contaminated, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
When it was covered in hot lava, huh? Well, guess what? I can send you back there if you want!
Have you ever been to $map:63000044$? It's quiet and empty… the perfect fishing spot!
How do I get there?
You can go there after you finish the fishing quest in the Maple Guide. Every fisher should visit that place at least once in their life.
Do you have any questions?
What's the Xenon System?
Why do you need guild members for your test?
What's this newfangled "virtual reality" thing?
I'm ready to get my VR on!

The Xenon System is a combat simulation conducted in virtual reality based on the premise of psychic resonance. In layman's terms, it's an array of minds working in harmony with a computer to create a virtual world.

Essentially, the computer draws on the memories of everyone connected to create a simulated world that is almost indistinguishable from reality. This simulation is the perfect place to safely run all manner of tests.
You may already be familiar with our technology's predecessor. Have you ever participated in a Chaos Raid?
I've participated before.
Nope, never.
I see! Yes, you carry yourself like someone who has overcome great trials.
It wasn't that big of a deal.
Uhh. Thank… you…?
Ah, is that so? If I was still young and lithe like you, I'd be running headfirst into danger at every opportunity. You really should take on the challenge, at least once.
Maybe I'll give it a go.
That's nice.

Ermm… In any case, we've learned a great deal by analyzing data about individuals participating in Chaos Raids, such as how shared hardships lead to team bonding, which in turn lead to greater cooperation, and greater success in battle.
However, as scientific tools, the Chaos Raid simulations are inferior. They are little more than a glorified entertainment system, if I'm being honest.
But now with the Xenon System, we can expose our guinea pi–errm, volunteers, to all sorts of situations, and conduct studies of real scientific value! It truly is a technological marvel.

The possibilities are endless! Everyone from the Royal Guard to the fire brigade can train in real-world situation without risk. Adventurers can visit places they never dreamed of. And I can finally take a vacation without ever leaving the lab! Of course, none of this would be possible without the support of our generous benefactor $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$.
Do you have any more questions?
Why do you need guild members for your test?
What's this newfangled "virtual reality" thing?
I'm ready to get my VR on!
I wanted to put together a group study with a shared history, one conducive to cooperation.
After all, the greatest achievements in history come when a group of likeminded individuals unite behind a common cause.
There's no better example of this in everyday life than the communal efforts of guilds. I thought them a fitting subject of my test.

I hear we're offering an excellent compensation package for the study, although payroll is not my department. Personally, I think it's reward enough have contributed to the advancement of science, and to try out our amazing simulation. But whatever your motives, thank you for participating!
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Xenon System?
What's this newfangled "virtual reality" thing?
I'm ready to get my VR on!
Virtual reality is a simulated experience designed to believably replicate the real world. Each curated scenario is run on a separate computer server or "Link."
Each Link consists of a unique environment with its own hand-tailored objective.
Your goal, for the purposes of the study, is to cooperate with your guild members and complete the assigned objective.

I have to warn you, our simulations still have some kinks that need working out… You may run into situations or foes that are impossible to overcome, even with your substantial abilities. At such times, you'll need to input override codes provided by the lab.

<font color="#ffd200">Override Code</font> items are sold by your <font color="#ffd200">Guild Supply Merchant</font>. I wish we could give them away for free, but these little technological wonders are incredibly sophisticated and costly to produce.

As I've said, the various Links are all still under active development. As you proceed to complete the objectives of each simulation in order, we will analyze the data we collect, and use it to fine-tune the subsequent Links.
There's still a great deal of science to be done. I hope we can depend on your ongoing contribution!
Do you have any more questions?
What's the Xenon System?
Why do you need guild members for your test?
I'm ready to get my VR on!
Wonderful. I've already booted up the system. When you're ready to access the Link, please enter one of the simulation pods.
There's no need to be nervous. Nothing in this simulation can inflict any permanent harm. That said, the study will be meaningless unless you take the scenario seriously!
Welcome. How can I help you?
Thank you for participating in our study.
Please take the simulation seriously.
The simulation has exceeded my wildest expectations!
Feel that heat? You can't beat this level of detail!
Hello in there. The simulation is stable, and it appears the test is proceeding nicely. You look a bit singed around the edges, but otherwise in good spirits.
What are you doing here?
What now?
I came to check on your progress. What do you think of my hologram? With my current avatar settings, I can observe the test without interfering.
Interfering with the results of my own test would invalidate all of the data I've collected, after all. Which would be quite silly after all the trouble I went through selecting test subjects.
Don't mind me. I'll be here observing. Just go about your business as if I weren't even here.
What now?
Erm… You don't know?

Well, I suspect I've already told you that if you hit a roadblock in the simulation, you'll need a special override code to proceed. Do you have <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font> in your possession?
I've got it right here.
Nope.
Well now… That's a bit disappointing. I'm afraid if you want to climb any higher, you'll need <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font>. You can purchase it from your Guild Supply Merchant.
It's a bit unfortunate, but unless one of your party members has the code in their possession, it might be prudent to restart this test at a later date.

Ah, excellent. Well now is the time to put it to work. Using the <font color="#ffd200">$item:20000627$</font> should alter your avatar's biometric data, transforming you—as you might have guessed—into a $npc:34000100$, which will allow you to safely reach the summit.

Once you've transformed into a $npc:34000100$, you'll be virtually impervious to the heat of the lava. However, $npc:34000100$ aren't very strong flyers, so your best recourse will be climbing from ledge to ledge. Oh! And tapping the <font color="#ffd200">X key</font> will give you a nice boost of speed.

$npcPlural:34000100$ are not overly protective of their young, so you should have no difficulty collecting their eggs. However, they are particularly ornery and aggressive in general, so I wouldn't recommend getting too close to the adults.

See that glowing circle around them? It represents their natural threat response. Step foot inside, and you'll be met with their terrible fire breath, which burns far hotter than the lava pools they call home.
The volcano's summit is their breeding ground. Your task is to reach it, and collect five eggs. Good luck up there!
I can't wait to see what will happen!
It's a wonder why this practice was banned…
The simulation is stable. Brainwaves look good. All right, let's get the ball rolling on this test!
What are you doing here?
Got any advice for completing this test?

I must admit I have a particular interest in this simulation. You see… An anonymous author from bygone days once wrote about the majesty of the $npcName:99990021$ which occurs so rarely in nature. However, the process if artificially mixing slimes to create them was legally prohibited some time ago.
Doesn't that just make your mind race? Why? What was so dangerous or terrible about trying to artificially create a $npcName:99990021$? That fabled splendor… I'd love to see it with my own two eyes.
Sooo… What should I be doing?
Come now, you know I'm not supposed to interfere with the test.
Am I supposed to make a $npcName:99990021$?
Err…!<font color="#909090"> <font size="20">Should I tell them? I can't interfere with the test… Of course they're bound to try mixing them sooner or later…</font>
…Ahem. I suppose it would be all right if I simply explain how the machinery works.

The <font color="#ffd200">color meter</font> represents how many of each color of slime have been added to the machine. If the meter for any color reaches the red, that means you've exceeded the appropriate amount of slime.

As the mass production of artificial slimes has been outlawed for some time, the blueprints for the related machinery is quite dated and they are likely a bit imprecise. This means that being a single unit over or short of the meter's limit should not impact your success.
To achieve the perfect slime ratio, you'll need to get the five color meters as close to 100% as possible.

Ah, but there's one important thing to be aware of. The slimes come in three different sizes. The larger the slime you squash, the faster the gauge fills up! Good luck achieving the perfect color ratio!
Why are you still in the Land of Darkness?
<font color="#909090" size="20">Should I tell them? I suppose they'll figure it out sooner or later… I'll just consider this a minor acceleration in the test plan.</font>
So… What am I supposed to do again?
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Yoo-hoo! Congrats!
You're the best!
You're so awesome!
I was rooting for you, $MyPCName$!
You're amazing!
You did it! Good job!
Hm…
Time is…
I can feel time being restored to order. This means there isn't much of it left for us to spend together.
What brings you to me?
Soon I'll be able to return home.
What's taking Lennon so long?
Thank goodness, he's much better now!
If $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ hadn't come to Katramus to save me, I could've been here with these people for treatment.
W-what?
Ugh… I'm still in pain…
I want to go home…
I'm not completely healed, but I'm in much better shape than I was when I first arrived. I should be able to go back to my family soon.
Mm… T-that's…
Whew… I think I can get up now.
Ooh, I can move!
Mom was right. She said anything can come true if I pray hard enough. I've prayed every day to be able to go back to her. Now I can!
How did you get here?
$npcName:11000614$, you're alive!
I'm so happy!
$npcName:11000614[gender:0]$ and I met in Katramus. I can't believe we were able to meet again here. I'm also glad that his sister is safe!
Hey! Good to see you again!
Hee hee, I'm never going to leave my brother again.
I'm not afraid of anything when I'm with my brother!
Mm? You're the one who saved me from $map:03009023$, aren't you?
That's… I want to stay with $npcName:11000614[gender:0]$. I never want to be separated from him again.
What's up?
I'm seeing lots of familiar faces today.
Even this place has good days sometimes.
I knew $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ didn't betray us!
Hmm…
The soul inside this orb… If it's left alone for too long, it'll be swallowed by the enormous darkness that is the Shadow World.
Do you know me?
I… I can't go back like this… No…
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
Would you be so kind as to help me?
Oh Valle, did you even eat?
Would she know how worried her mother is?
Valle, where have you been? Ah… I don't think I know you. I'm sorry, I haven't been myself lately. I thought you were my daughter when I heard your footsteps.
What brings you to this place?
Everything… All this is my fault…
This used to be such a beautiful garden… I was such a fool…
Did Mom send you to bring me home? I feel bad saying this, but I can't leave yet. Not until the garden is back to normal.
At last, I can finally stop the cause of the contamination!
Spin the $npc:11001120$ for just 1 $item:30000406$!
Look at all those $itemPlural:30000406$> you've got! You're sitting pretty! Why don't you invest them in a chance to spin the $npc:11001120$? Could be a wise investment, indeed!
Spin the wheel for a chance at great prizes! You know you want to.
Here's hoping Lady Luck's on your side!
To take a spin on the $npc:11001120$, you need $itemPlural:30000406$. But good news! You can get 1 $item:30000406$ in your mailbox every 20 minutes, up to 9 times a day.
If you get a $item:30000406$, don't forget to come to $map:02000064$!
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Lucky, lucky, Lucky Wheel!
May Lady Luck smile upon you!
How exciting!
Did you come to join the event? I'm sorry, but you forgot the most important thing. To spin this $npcName:11001120$, you need a $item:30000406$. Luckily, they're easy to get!
Oh good, you have a $item:30000406$! You can use $itemPlural:30000406$ to spin this here $npcName:11001120$ next to me for a chance to win great prizes. Come on, why not try it?
Welcome, $MyPCName$!
What kind of item would you like today?
$MyPCName$, thank you for joining our 100-day celebration!
Whoa, it's been 100 days already!
Did you come to join the event? I'm sorry, but you forgot the most important thing. To spin this $npcName:11001120$, you need a $item:30000406$. Luckily, they're easy to get!
Oh good, you have a $item:30000406$! You can use $itemPlural:30000406$ to spin this here $npcName:11001120$ next to me for a chance to win great prizes. Come on, why not try it?
Incredible talent.
Wow, impressive.
Good, very good!
Your skills are impressive.
I want to know about mounts.
I came to see the cars.
Mounts? I'll tell you anything you want to know. What'll it be?
What exactly are mounts?
Where can I get mounts?
How do I use my mounts?

Mounts are very convenient modes of transportation. Riding a mount is faster than running, and much more convenient too! Plus, there's a wide variety of mounts to choose from. So… which one looks good to you?

You can buy cute animal mounts from the Mount Merchant in town. I've heard some animal mounts can even swim. There's also some pretty awesome cars and bikes available for purchase on the Meret Market.
You can buy mounts with all kinds of currencies, including mesos, treva, valor tokens, and merets. But to get an extremely fast rare mount, you'll need to earn certain Trophies.

You can use a mount by double-clicking it in your inventory, or by adding it to a quickslot. Mounts perform a special action when you press the Basic Attack key while riding them. You'll have a lot of fun just checking out all the different special actions.
It's not difficult to express your feelings in a tasteful way. Do it like the cool person you are!
I have questions about emotes.
Sure, fire away!
What are emotes?
Where can I get emotes?
How do you express yourself when you're happy or sad? Just typing in chat? No, no, that's not how we do it here. That's why you've got emotes, yo.
When you're happy, laugh! Excited? Dance! Sad? Cry! There are tons of actions you can perform to express yourself to those around you, even without words. Make good use of them!
Some emotes are placed on your F1 - F12 keys by default. When you meet your friends, press F1 or F2 to greet them. If your friends are as sensible as you are, they'd greet you back in the same way!

Take a look at the right side of the Chat window for the smiley face icon. Click it to open the emote window. If you buy emotes from the Meret Market, don't forget to learn the Emotes from the Inventory window.

Got so many emotes that it's difficult to remember the hotkeys? Don't worry, I'll fill you in! You can use them by typing their commands into the Chat window. For example, if you want to use the Hello action, you can type /hello in the Chat window instead of pressing F1.
Each emote has multiple commands, so check them in the emote window and use the ones you can remember easily.
I need to ask something else.
Is there anything else you want to ask about emotes?
What are emotes?
Where can I get emotes?
How can I use emotes?
Don't think too hard, dawg. Just express yourself!
I need to ask something else.
I need to ask something else.
But there's a catch… the special actions activated by the Basic Attack key consume stamina every time they're used. But it won't be a problem as long as you use them in moderation.
I need to ask something else.
Is there anything else you want to know about mounts?
What exactly are mounts?
Where can I get mounts?
How do I use my mounts?
I need to be going.
While you're here, why don't you peruse the vehicles on display?
What brings you?
Good. I can continue with my research, assuming you can collect ores for me at this pace.
What was the project I was going to start next?
Do you have business with me?
Wow, I can see all of $map:2000270$ from here!
It's awesome being all the way up here!

Good day. My name is $npcName:11001122[gender:0]$, and I'm a member of the Wall Climbers. We're a group that supports each other as we work to climb every wall we can find. If you have a passion for climbing, we're right there with you!
You look a little different from the other Wall Climbers.
Really? How so?
Are you sure you're a Wall Climber?
…Sheesh, can't you just let it go? If you're going to keep asking stupid questions, I don't want to talk to you.
What seems to be the problem?
I'm in a hurry. I've got packages to deliver.
Argh, I'm busy, so busy!
Did you come to see me?
What do I want to study this time?
Maybe I should refine my droids…
La, la, la, la! I'm going to make even more useful machines!
Entering data…
Testing visual recognition range… No errors found.
Searching object recognition database… No errors found.
What seems to be the problem?
Running Environmental Improvement System…
Beep-beep. Collecting $map:2000270$ environmental change data…
Beep-beep. Entering air contamination increase values…
Running Security System…
Beep-beep. Running $map:2000270$ Security System…
Beep-beep. Synchronizing $map:2000270$ Sector B surveillance cameras…

$item:30001187$, $item:30001189$$pp:로,으로$ <font color="#ffd200">루미스톤 업그레이드 재료</font> 제작은 <font color="#ffd200">50레벨 이상의 모험가</font>님들만이 할 수 있습니다. 보다 성장하신 후 찾아와 주십시오.
트라이아 왕실에서 모험가님들을 위해 특별한 보급품을 준비했습니다. 하지만… $MyPCName$님은 아직 받으실 수 없겠네요. 이번에는 <font color="#ffd200">50레벨 이상</font>의 모험가님들께만 지원을 해 드리고 있거든요. 아쉽지만, 좀더 성장한 후 다시 찾아와 주세요.
트라이아 왕실에서 모험가님들을 위해 특별한 보급품을 준비했습니다. 하지만… $MyPCName$님은 아직 받으실 수 없겠네요. 이번에는 <font color="#ffd200">60레벨 이상</font>의 모험가님들께만 지원을 해 드리고 있거든요. 아쉽지만, 좀더 성장한 후 다시 찾아와 주세요.

The empress has declared that all experienced adventurers shall have access to this enchanted chest here! Not you, though. I'm afraid you're not quite experienced enough. Would you be so kind as to come back when you're level 50?
What? What is it?
Sigh… Sometimes it feels like this work will never end.
Being busy is better than being bored, but this is crazy!
What? Can't you see I'm working? Leave me alone.
D-do you want some herbs?
Sh-shush! D-did you hear that?
I think I might be hallucinating…
W-what's with those weird noises? You hear them too, r-right?
I didn't hear anything.
What?! D-don't look at me like that… I'm not crazy!
It was probably just a small animal.
Y-you think so? You'll protect me if it's something scary though, right? Hngg… Now my heart is p-pounding.
Hmm? What do you want?
Expeditions are so exciting! I love my job.
Every expedition is a new challenge, but I like it that way.
Hah. Cold, are we? Maybe you should've worn thicker clothes.
I'm not c-c-cold.
Are you kidding? I'm freezing.
Bahaha. A real tough cookie, aren't you? I'm a professional explorer, and even I get a little cold at times like this. Maybe you belong in my line of work.
You look like seasoned adventurer. I'm sure you've seen worse weather than this. So suck it up! Bahaha.
Look inside the shed.
Do you have business with me?
Ugh. I can't believe I came all this way.
I wonder if the everyone made it out okay…
I'm trapped here! There are monsters everywhere. I knew this place was dangerous, but…
Then why did you come here?
I have my reasons.
Wh-what is it?
When can we get out of this place?
I'm cold… and hungry…
Wh-what is it?
Home… I want to go home…
I can't lost count of how many days I've been here…
Wh-what is it?
Why didn't I listen to my mother before it was too late?
I miss her so much…
Huh? Do you need something?
I'm scared that if I leave this place, I'll die.
Monsters! This is all because of those blasted monsters!
Have you seen any monsters outside?
This situation has been hard on everyone. I wish there was more I could do to help…
<font size="20">Don't lose hope, Neroa. You have to stay strong!</font>
As long as I don't give up hope, all this will be behind me one day… I really wish I could believe that…
I'm selling these fine leather jackets.
The rarer the hide, the more beautiful the work!
Hmm… Where can I find some customers around here?
Hey, I've seen you hunting monsters around here before, haven't I?
Yep!
Nope!
Haha! I could tell just by looking at you! A great adventurer, surely in need of Lavoy's fine leather goods!
I'm not interested.
Don't be silly, I know a famous adventurer when I see one! A great adventurer deserves a great outfit. How many leather jackets can I put you down for?
Sorry, not interested.
Hahaha! You say that now, but you'll find no finer leatherwork around. Return to me once you've changed your mind.
What brings you to $map:02000110$?
I believe in always being prepared.
Hm… Let's see what the safety handbook says…
There's nothing more important than safety. Wouldn't you agree?
I guess, sure.

I know, right? But nobody else seems to get it! I see people come to work without their hard hats or work boots every day. Your goal should be to earn a living without killing yourself in the process!
Stupid, stupid, stupid! Where is he?
Stupid, stupid, stupid! Where is he?
Where is who?
Oh. Um. Just this guy who skateboards around here sometimes. He looks sooooo cool. I've been waiting for him.
Oh, were you guys meeting up here? Is he late? Tsk, tsk.
Um… I haven't actually officially met him yet. But that's what I've been waiting around for! I want to ask him for his name and number!
Seriously, though, a girl's got limits. I've been waiting here every day for a week, and he hasn't showed up once! Now my legs hurt. Maybe I should give up.
Aww, just wait a little longer. Never give up!
Ugh, fine, I'll give him one more day. I mean, he is, like, super hot.
(There's a placard in front of the palace.) There exists on Karkar Island two grand mansions that the Aliba Foundation has invested in. $map:02010062$ is one of them.
(There's a placard in front of the palace.) There exists on Karkar Island two grand mansions that the Aliba Foundation has invested in. $map:02010062$ is one of them.
This mansion features a wondrous garden and other amenities. Only those with the express permission of the Aliba Foundation can live here, regardless of wealth or social stature.

For a time, it became a popular tourist destination, with a cafe on the first floor and the terrace opened to the public. However, due to fans swarming the building anytime $npc:11000406[gender:0]$ visited for some much-deserved rest and relaxation, the house has now been closed to the public.
<font color="#909090">(This pleasant little pond holds a prominent position in $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$'s estate.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This pleasant little pond holds a prominent position in $npcName:11001350[gender:0]$'s estate.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The fish look like golden bladefish, a species unique to the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Their scales shimmer beautifully in the sunlight. The interplay of light brings a sense of peace to your mind…)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Maybe it's time you got some fish of your own.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You see a large ship, which looks like it drifted here long, long ago.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You see a large ship, which looks like it drifted here long, long ago.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Its name is written on the side, faded by age and the elements. "The Sea Siren," it says. Then, in smaller text, "Fairy of the seas, protect our way.")</font>
<font color="#909090">(Scattered chests litter the area, and you spy some items not native to Karkar. It must have been a merchant vessel.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Amidst the upheaval, you notice a large deformation on the side of the ship… and broken bones everywhere.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Could some terrible creature of the seas have caused all this mayhem and destruction?)</font>

(This is the directory to the $npcName:11004264$.) Welcome to $npcName:11004264$, the pride of $map:02010002$! As the biggest multiplex shopping center on Karkar Island, we have what you're looking for!

(This is the directory to the $npcName:11004264$.) Welcome to $npcName:11004264$, the pride of $map:02010002$! As the biggest multiplex shopping center on Karkar Island, we have what you're looking for!
1F Cosmetics, Accessories, General Merchandise Offering a truly premium shopping experience, with direct imports from all over Maple World.
2F Fashion, Shoes, Handbags The hottest brands from all over the world in one place.
3F Youth Fashion The latest trends, straight from the streets.
4F Sports Sportswear and supplies to help you and your family stay in shape.
5F Men's Fashion A careful curation of the best men's brands in fashion, tech, and accessories.
6F Kids, Food Court From toys to fashion, everything a kid could want. Don't forget to check out the premium restaurants, perfect for any palette.
Ugh, what a headache. My hard work! My paradise! This is a nightmare…
Ugh, what a headache. My hard work! My paradise! This is a nightmare…
Oh. Hello. Welcome to my paradise, the $map:02010058$.
What's wrong? You seem really upset.
It's not a good time to visit the $map:02010058$. We're dealing with some, ah, difficult guests at the moment.
Who are you?
Have you heard of Blackstar? The seedy group heading up all sorts of underground dealings on Maple World? Well, they arrived on Karkar not long ago, and they've taken a liking to my club…
Especially that guy with the mustache. He never told me his name, but how could I not know it's $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$?
Shouldn't loyal customers make you happy, even if they're seedy?

Sure, business is booming, but these guys are mean! One of my waiters made a tiny mistake on an order, and those thugs pulled a gun on him. Sure, they laughed and gave him a big tip in the end, but that's not the point. I still had to buy a new mop after he peed in his pants.

Listen, for me, it's about happiness, not money. I opened this joint because I was tired of being a programmer. I wanted freedom and less stress, and then this happens! I'm seriously considering closing this place and begging for my old job back.
Breathe in. Breathe out. Stare at the sea. Yes, yes, it's coming back to me now. You've taught me a valuable lesson again today, ocean.
Breathe in. Breathe out. Stare at the sea. Yes, yes, it's coming back to me now. You've taught me a valuable lesson again today, ocean.
Yes, ocean, you're right. I must start over with a heart of gratitude. I must devote myself to my training!
Hiiiii! What are you doing?
I am gazing upon the great ocean and filling my heart with peace. I thought the spirit of rock had died within me, but after discussing it with the sea, I realize it had just gone on a little break.
What happened?

My hands still tremble when I think back upon that day… It was the Maple rock festival, and thousands watched as I made a terrible mistake in the middle of my song. Since then, I've never been able to play that part right.
And the ocean is helping you with that…
Yes! Thanks to the ocean's wise advice, I am once again filled with the spirit of rock. Can't you see it shining in my eyes?
Come to my next concert, and you'll see for yourself that I've been transformed by the sea.
Welcome to $map:02010012$! I'm $npcName:11004267[gender:1]$, the spokeswoman! Or at least, I will be, when the place finally opens…
Welcome to $map:02010012$! I'm $npcName:11004267[gender:1]$, the spokeswoman! Or at least, I will be, when the place finally opens…
When is this place gonna open?
That's what I wanna know, too! I heard there's some kinda bug problem holding up the construction…

But honestly, they tell me I have the job, so shouldn't they open so I can start working? I already spent a fortune promoting myself… Anyway, remember my name, and watch as I become the best model in all Karkar!
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>

<font color="#909090">(This wonderful bridge was co-designed by the genius architect brother Opath and Oparts. The younger brother, Oparts, was in charge of the western exchange. His flair for the fabulous is evident in the bridge's flashy lights.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(There are over 100 lights in use on the West Auto Bridge, and they symbolize the glamor and promise of the big city.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This bridge connects the city to the desert of Karkar. It plays a major role in the development of the island.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This wonderful bridge was designed by the genius architect brother Opath and Oparts. The older brother, Opath, was in charge of the eastern exchange.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(He added intriguing detail and a touch of mischief to the design, including hidden magic portals and shortcuts.)</font>
Stop stomping around so loudly! You're giving me away!
Sorry. What're you up to?
Isn't it obvious? I'm observing! This data is gonna be used in an amazing research paper I'm gonna write.
Sure, but what's with the disguise?
Look around! The ecosystem here is an impossible combination of nature and machine. There's so much we don't know about this place.
Now add in my disguise, and the answer to your question should be obvious, right?
I still don't get it.
Ugh, use your brain! I'm conducting monster research! I'm in costume so they don't flee or attack. Obviously.
Now that I've answered your question, can you run along? I haven't moved from this spot for a week, and the last thing I want is for you to ruin my research!
<font color="#909090">(This squat desert plant drips with a brilliant red sap.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This squat desert plant drips with a brilliant red sap.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You're pretty sure you've seen this shade of red in the clothes and makeup worn by the people of Karkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You've seen plants like this all over Karkar, but they're especially plentiful here.)</font>
I've been duped! Everyone said this was the best vacation spot, but no one told me about the snakes!
I've been duped! Everyone said this was the best vacation spot, but no one told me about the snakes!
I knew I should've done more research. But things were so busy at work…
Is this place really that popular?
Oh, yeah, it's all the rage. Everyone talks about the treasure chests in the water, so I had to see them for myself. But… the snakes! Why are there so many snakes?
Are they poisonous?
Everyone says they're not, but I'm not so sure. I took out a second mortgage to afford this trip. I can't believe this is happening!
Forget the treasure chests… I'll be happy to get out of here alive! My vacation is ruined!!
The moonlight is nice tonight. Very beautiful, very beautiful!
The moonlight is nice tonight. Very beautiful, very beautiful!
And what brings you here tonight, human?
I'm just passing through.
Then you must visit our camp in the $map:02010033$! I'm sure they won't mind you dropping by. Probably.
The moonlight in our city is different from the moonlight out here, but no matter what, the moonlight is always beautiful!
What a wonderful, joyous day!
What a wonderful, joyous day!
What are you so happy about?
Every day is a joy! I was sent up here because I was scared of the desert monsters, and at first, I was scared of being so high up, too… But I've adjusted!
I'm overjoyed to be in such a safe place. Now I have friends and don't need to be scared of any monsters!
Ugh, this sucks. When can I get out of here?
Ugh, this sucks. When can I get out of here?
What's wrong?
Who are you, and why is that any of your business?
C'mon. Just tell me what's bothering you.
If you must know, I'm upset because I'm trapped here. There's no way out, and…
Never mind. It's not worth explaining to you. Just move along.
<font color="#909090">(Snake statues like this one can be found all over Karkar.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Snake statues like this one can be found all over Karkar.)</font>

I sssmell sssomething that doesssn't belong…
I sssmell sssomething that doesssn't belong…
A ssstranger? You mussst be fearlessss indeed to venture Nazkar unprepared.
Hi! Who are you?
A foolisssh quessstion. Tsssk. Then again, you are an ignorant fool, ssso it'sss to be expected. I watch over Nazkar!
I've watched thisss place through countlesss lifetimesss. A hundred birthsss and deathsss, and ssstill the sssight assstoundsss me.
Wow! Do sssnakes, I mean, snakes even live that long?
Sssimple human, you ssstill think I'm just another sssnake… I will give you one warning: beware up ahead!
<font color="#909090">(You feel an ominous chill as you gaze upon the dragon statue.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(You feel an ominous chill as you gaze upon the dragon statue.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(This statue was once a grand piece of architecture, proudly displaying the spirit of the dragons. However, it's been altered by darkness.)</font>
