Welcome! This is $map:02010002$, the heart of Karkar! On behalf of meerkats everywhere, I'd just like to say… Hiya!
Welcome! This is $map:02010002$, the heart of Karkar! On behalf of meerkats everywhere, I'd just like to say… Hiya!
Karkar Island is hot and dry. Drink lots of water to stay hydrated, and don't forget to slather on that sunscreen!
Hello, $MyPCName$! I'm $npcName:11001002[gender:1]$, and I'm here to talk to you about events. What would you like to know?
Who's the guy in the matching outfit?
That's my twin brother and fellow event guide. Come find us anytime you want to know about current events in Maple World. That's why we're here!
Howdy, $MyPCName$! I'm $npcName:11001003[gender:0]$. Do you want to learn more about the events we're running today?
Who's the girl in the matching outfit?

You mean $npcName:11001002[gender:1]$? That's my twin sister. She's also a dang good event guide, if you don't mind my saying. Whenever you're curious about any events in Maple World, we're the folks to talk to!
Never give up on your dreams!
My paradise! Give me back my joy!
Maybe I can help you get free!
What?
<font color="#909090">(You can sense a different sort of power beyond the crack in the wall.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's covered in a thick layer of dust. Still, the elaborate carvings are the work of a master artisan.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(As you gaze upon the sarcophagus, you're overcome by a sudden feeling of melancholy.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(For a brief moment, you swear you see something moving through the crack in the floor. Surely you imagined it…)</font>
Ah, doesn't that balance between the fierce desert and the cityscape here in $map:02010002$ revitalize you? Say, have you ever visited the $npcName:11004264$?
I don't believe I've had the pleasure.
I sure have!
That just won't do! The $npcName:11004264$ is the hottest shopping spot in the whole city! Go ahead, run along now!
Isn't it so cool? I was thinking of heading over there tonight and treating myself to a new hat!
Stay positive, and good fortune will follow! Never forget that, human!
What's wrong?
AH!! Jeez, you almost gave me a heart attack…
You aren't headed into the $dungeonTitle:20016002$, are you? I was researching the ruins there when I saw… one of "them!"
How did the temple of the divine lumarigons come to house such frightening creatures? It's enough to make a man quake in his boots.

You'll get a free cake in the mail every 20 minutes, just for having a good time in Maple World! You can receive up to 9 a day. If you get a hold of a $item:30000406$, be sure to swing by $map:02000064$!

You'll get a free cake in the mail every 20 minutes, just for having a good time in Maple World! You can receive up to 9 a day. If you get a hold of a $item:30000406$, be sure to swing by $map:02000064:$!
Hello.
If I weren't here, who else would take care of this property?
Land needs tending, just like a delicate flower.
Hello, and welcome to the Andrea Family estate. As its caretaker I would love to give you a tour, but I'm afraid I have some eggs to collect.
Uh. Hi.
I realize that this is no longer a good place to live, but…
I'm not leaving, even if all my friends do.
First the monsters start taking over the forest, and now my friends are all leaving in droves… Hmph. What do I care? I like being alone, anyway!
There's got to be a machine that can make my life easier…
Building everything by hand is just crazy.
To ensure everyone's safety $npc:11000134[gender:0]$ has decreed that only those <font color="#ffd200">Level 50 or above</font> be allowed to enter the Arena. The Chief's word is law.
Those on the cutting edge of technological research often complain about lack of funds, resources, and other material things. The only thing I lack is time… Say, how old do you think I am?
You look young-ish to me.
You look like an old geezer. 50-plus, at least.
Hmph! Flattery will get you nowhere with me. Or perhaps you need to see an eye doctor.
Close enough! There's so much I want to study, but I'm past my prime. If only there were more time…! Wait… That gives me an idea…
I've been studying artificial intelligence. Androids in particular. Do you think that my androids are capable of thinking like we do?
I don't see why not.
I don't think so.
Haha! I wasn't expecting a real answer. After all, it's a question I struggle with myself.
Hmm? You can't just say something like that and leave it at that! Then tell me, what do you think I should do to make my androids as smart as you and me?
Data isn't enough. They have to learn through experience.
Just cram them full of as much data as you can.
(Mumble inaudibly.)
Don't you think I tried that already? Well, thanks for your input in any case. As a professional in the field of android research, I'm sure I'll come up with a solution on my own.

Yes, I've thought much the same. Perhaps if I build a database based on what my androids learn from various stimuli, much as humans learn from their own experience. Thanks for your input, in any case.
What? Hmph. I really thought you had something of value to say on the topic. Next time someone asks for your opinion, you should just be honest with them.
The scientists in $map:2000270$ are known for their constant innovation. They're the reason I lug these heavy, expensive components everywhere I go.
Running database query on $MyPCName$… Zero entries found in $map:2000270$ personnel list… Creating new entry.
Hello!
I've never seen anything more impressive than these ruins.
Preserving them is my greatest priority!
Plenty of archaeologists would kill for the chance to see Ellin Ruins with their own eyes. Are you here to see the ruins yourself?
I'm not that interested in this old junk.
Oh yeah, I'm super into this stuff.
Not really. I was just wandering aimlessly.
Really? Not interested in all this history? Oh… Then maybe you've come to hunt monsters? Just look around, this place is teeming with them.
Really? You don't look like an archaeologist. Well, it's just nice to see someone interested in history. Stay as long as you like!
Ah! A classic case of wanderlust, have we? Well, regardless, please be careful not to damage the ruins… And also, try not to get horribly mauled by monsters.
Come closer! Yes, you my child.
The all-seeing eye sees all! I can tell you your destiny!
My readings are equally accurate from one day to the next!
To picture the future clearly, I must make myself one with nature. Focus your senses. The breeze carries with it the scent of flowers. The waterfall quietly roars.
I'm confused…
Mom's candy is really tasty…
Mmm… Where did she she come up with the idea for $item:30000395$?
Mmm… Do you like candy?
No. I hate candy, because I am a monster.
Whaaaat? I'm sure you'd change your mind if you tried my Mom's $item:30000395$. It's awesome!
That's nice.
(He whines pitifully) Just try a piece! I promise you'll love it. My mom also bakes cakes and pies that are crazy good. She's like a witch!
Anyone can bake.
Not like my mom! When I grow up, I'm going to be a culinary wizard, and make snacks just as good as hers.
What? If it's not urgent, come back later.
I go wherever quality weapons are found.
I'm a collector—not a vendor!
See the fortress over there? It's got to be full of all kinds of amazing stuff worth collecting. Say, would you be interested in checking it out?
I don't think there's much of value left in that abandoned fortress.
I'm a little more worried about the monsters guarding it.
<font color="#909090">(He chuckles.)</font> Well I do! It's gotta be chock full of treasure. I can tell, just by the look of it. I guess we'll see which of us is right.
No kidding. Why do you think I haven't gone inside? I wish someone would take care of them for me…
For an accurate reading, I must focus my mind and keep disruptive thoughts at bay.
Read $npcName:11001146$.

Heal Devorak!
((China Only)) Nihao! Welcome, $MyPCName$!
Nihao, $MyPCName$! I am $npcName:11003559[gender:1]$ from China!
((China Only)) How'd you end up coming here?

((China Only)) Global MapleStory 2! I came to meet the Korean adventurers in celebration of MapleStory 2's launch in China! I'm glad to be able to meet Korean adventurers for Korea's biggest holiday, Chuseok!
For such an old hotel, I suppose this place has its charm.
My cousin certainly devoted enough time and money to this place. He passed the hotel to me when he died, but I simply have no interest in running it.
Hello. How can I help you?
Welcome to our fine hotel.
Say the word, and I'll get it done.
Shall I take your bags?
But, you know…
H-hello?
I hope I can see papa again soon…
You're here! Just like you promised.
Can I help you?
I'm very discerning about the customers I sell to.
Wow, you look stronger than I am!
I just got new stock. Come take a look!
Please help me…
I don't want to die here!
I want to go home…
Please help me…
How long must I suffer…?
Sniff…
Please help me…
Somebody save me.~
This place is a nightmare… (Sobs)
Please help me…
I just want to see my family…
Am I going to spend the rest of my life here?
Please help me…
I'm going to die of old age in this place…
Please, I just want to go home!
Please help me…
I miss my family…
I can't live like this!
A special Monday deal for a special for adventurers who have $itemPlural:30000750$! What a wonderful way to start the week!
Come, come, take a look!
$itemPlural:30000750$ are given to special adventurers level 50 or higher!
The future is in our hands.
We're on alien soil. Don't let your guard down.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
I'm here, but most of my men are tied up defending Victoria Island. I hate being benched!
I am the shadow that evil fears.
My agents can't get past the insane AI that's controlling most of Kritias! I feel so… frustrated.
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
Our survey teams encountered some mechanical trees during their exploration of Kritias. Just hearing about it gives me the creeps. Who would build such a thing?
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
A strange power hangs over this place. A dark power…
당신의 패션을 완성하는 건…!!
패션의 완성은 '얼굴'이라는 거… 난 동의할 수 없어요! 패션의 완성은 '나만의 매력'이죠! 그렇지 않아요?
다른 걸 물어본다.
Spin $npc:11004317$ for just 1 $item:30001202$!
Give us 1 $item:30001202$ for a chance to spin the $npc:11004317$. How about it? Feeling lucky?

(Pay 10 $itemPlural:30001202$ for a bunch of spins in a row!)
(Pay 100 $itemPlural:30001202$ for a bunch of spins in a row!)
Wonderful! Are you ready to spin?
Here's hoping Lady Luck's on your side!
You don't have enough coins. You need 1 $itemPlural:30001202$ to spin the $npc:11004317$ once.

You need at least 1 $item:30001202$ to spin $npcName:11004317$. And you can get $itemPlural:30001202$ in your mailbox every day just for logging in! You also get bonus coins as you spend more time in Maple World. And let's not forget that many of our events also give away coins just for participating!
If you have $itemPlural:30001202$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:63000064$!
All right, let's spin it 10 times in a row! Keep your fingers crossed, $MyPCName$!
Spin number $rouletteCurrent$! Good luck!
All right, let's spin it 100 times in a row! Keep your fingers crossed, $MyPCName$!
Spin number $rouletteCurrent$! Good luck!
Welcome, welcome, to Mon Bloody Chouchou Hotel!
The Mon Bloody Chouchou Hotel is right up this path.
Please join in our spooooky Halloween celebrations!
Do you have a thirst for adventure? Then come to the Mon Bloody Chouchou Hotel and celebrate Halloween with us!
Sounds fun!
Please take the portal here to the $map:63000065$. And enjoy your stay… Mwahahaha!
How lovely!
I do so love to holiday.
Oh dear. This bag is much too small.
Tell me, what's the one thing you must never, ever forget when you travel?
Your wallet, of course.
You can't travel without a suitcase.
Oh! I suppose your wallet is important. But is it the most important? Think harder!
You can't travel without a suitcase.
That's right! All of your most important things go in your suitcase, after all. If you're looking for something, you should always check your suitcase first.
I said I wanted the best. The best!
Don't trust anything that hangs from a wall.
Gravity is a cruel mistress…

I told my son to book me a room in the empire's finest hotel, and he put me up in this dump. Lo and behold, a picture frame dropped on my head while I slept, and now I'm dead! The other ghosts will laugh me out of town when they hear about this…
There, there. It's okay.
Just be careful around anything that hangs on a wall, okay? You never know when it'll fall!
Clean clean clean…
Tidy, tidy, tidy.
Pardon me. I'm cleaning just now.
It's my job to keep this hotel clean, and I'm darn good at it! Except… there's this one thing I can't seem to tidy up!
What might that be?
Over there, in the sofa by the window. There are papers stuck in there that I can't seem to get loose. Did someone put those there on purpose?
Everything in its place.
Whatever became of that gentleman?
Let's not make a mess of things.
A guest came the other day, but I haven't seen him lately. I do hope he's having a nice visit.
Who are you talking about?
A gentleman with a large briefcase. None of the other ghosts recognized him, but it seems that he was an acquaintance of mademoiselle.
Mademoiselle?
Yes, the lady of the hotel. There were evil thoughts in her mind when she met the gentleman. A ghost has a sixth sense about these things, you know.
What do you want?
You lookin' at me?
What'sa matter? Never see a real man before?
I don't gotta answer to you. Now scram, before I get angry.
What brings you here?
I'm not here to fight, friend.
Blackstar goes where the money is! Here's some free advice: keep your nose outta things where it don't belong.
How'd you become a ghost?
I ain't your friend, pal! You think you can talk down to me 'cause I'm a ghost? Is that it?
How'd you become a ghost?
To tell the truth… I got no idea. Boss sent me here on a job, and next thing I know… Pow! Ghost.
There, there. It's okay.
I don't want your stinkin' pity! Anyway, this place ain't so bad. It's real cushy, and I got tons of books to read.
Come to think of it, there were some real important-looking papers in one of the books I read the other day. Weird, huh?
Ooh la la!
That's the stuff!
Ooh la la! Nice!
Beautiful. Stunning. A gift from the goddess!
What are you going on about?
I can't get the woman in purple out of my head! I love a woman with pep.
You mean $npc:11004289[gender:1]$?
That's the one! You'd be head-over-heels if you saw her, too. So lithe. And those executive management skills? Ooh la la!
The other ghosts say she's mean, but I think she's better than the empress herself! A woman like that makes a guy wish he'd died young, so he'd have a handsomer ghost.
I'mma scratch everything!
I'mma scratch over here!
I'mma scratch over there!
This floor is mine, mine, mine!
Now I'mma ghost, I can talk to people! How fun!
'Cause I'm inna good mood, I'mma tell you a secret! Watch the floors around here, or you're gonna fall!
What's that supposed to mean?
Your foot's gonna fall! Watch the floors! Got it?
This place is nice…
I wanna stay here forever.
I don't want any more bad things to happen!
This room's really comfy. That's why all us ghosts are here.
We don't wanna bug the living folks, though. We just wanna watch them live their lives.
Did you see what happened here?
I-I was scared, so I hid behind the chair! That guy was real busy. I bet he dropped a bunch of his stuff all over the place.
Can you see me?
You can't see me, right?
I wish you couldn't see me.
I guess living people really can see ghosts on Halloween.
Please don't ask me if I saw anything…
Did you see anything?
N-no! I don't want that woman coming after me, so the answer is no!
What seems to be the problem?
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
Everyone gets sick now and then, you know.
I can help you whenever you're hurt.
My services are available for a modest fee.
Need something?
Parkour through the big city in a thrilling game of Shanghai Crazy Runners!
상해 코인은 상해 크레이지 러너즈에서 우승한다면 얻을 수 있어요.
I'm selling a wide selection of food, outfits and other goodies from a distant land!
반가워요, $MyPCName$님!
오늘도 즐거운 하루!
이벤트 소식을 알려드려요~
안녕하세요, $MyPCName$님! <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001002[gender:1]$</font>예요~ 즐거운~ 이! 벤! 트! 정보를 알려드립니다~ 무엇이 궁금하세요?
현재 진행 중인 이벤트는 무엇이냐고 물어본다.

현재 <font color="#ffd200">공방 무료 제작 이벤트</font>와 <font color="#ffd200">건설 자재 90% 할인 이벤트</font>가 진행중이에요~! 공방 무료 제작 이벤트에는 <font color="#ffd200">무료 디자인 제작 쿠폰</font>이 필요하답니다! 쿠폰은 저희 오빠 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11500002[gender:0]$</font>에게서 구매 가능해요~!
안녕하세요, $MyPCName$님!
매일매일 즐거우려면 어떻게 해야 할까요?
이벤트에 참여해 보세요!
안녕하세요, $MyPCName$님~ <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11001003[gender:0]$</font>예요! 어떤 이벤트가 궁금해서 오셨나요?
현재 진행 중인 이벤트는 무엇이냐고 물어본다.

현재 <font color="#ffd200">공방 무료 제작 이벤트</font>와 <font color="#ffd200">건설 자재 90% 할인 이벤트</font>가 진행중이에요~! 공방 무료 제작 이벤트에는 <font color="#ffd200">무료 디자인 제작 쿠폰</font>이 필요하답니다! 쿠폰은 저 <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11500002[gender:0]$</font>에게서 구매 가능해요~!
What is it?
A genius scientist once said that the only way to teach others is to lead by example.
Become a mentor to new adventurers today!
I've got some great stuff for good mentors.
How may I help you?
I've got all kinds of goods to help mentees.
Why don't you say a word of thanks to your mentor?
I was a mentee once, too, you know.
I have to help my friends!
What should I do?
What $npcName:11001167[gender:0]$ said was true…
Agh… I have to find my friends.
Shh! Please, keep your voice down! That mage can't know I'm here!
Where in the world is he?
$npcName:11001166[gender:0]$ is always disappearing on me.
Where is that boy? He'd better not have gotten himself in trouble.
Have you seen my brother? He must be somewhere around here.
Wanna split a nice glass of milk?
I miss my mommy…
Where am I? Who am I?
Thank you for your help.
Whew, I can finally breathe easy.
I've got a bad feeling…
Oh, it's you!
It's been a while! What're you doing here?
What are you doing here?
A few days ago I sensed an unusual energy coming from this place, so I came to investigate.
Did you find anything?
Did I ever! As soon as I arrived, I felt it—that familiar aura… The traces of dragons!
There's no question about it, dragons once lived in this land! I got to thinking that maybe they were related to the dark dragons that Biset told me about.
This place is super weird…
Ahh! You scared me!
What's gotten into you?
Oh… It's only you. Phew.
This place has me on edge. Everything's so different.

It seems like I'm the only one having any trouble fitting in. $npcName:11004322[gender:0]$ is so absorbed in his search for new ingredients. And it seems like $npcName:11004321[gender:1]$ has run out of all patience for me… Sniff.
I want to be of help tracking down traces of the dragons, but I'm just so anxious. I should've just stayed home.
That's crazy! I'm sure your friends are glad to have you here.
You really think so? Thanks… That means a lot. I'm sure I can muster up the courage to keep going.
This won't do…
Huh?
Ah! It's you! How have you been?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks.
That's good to hear. So what brings you here?
I came here on an investigation.
I see, you too… Sigh.
We're here researching the dark dragons that Biset used to talk about.
How did you get here?
$npcName:11004319[gender:1]$ brought us here with her dragon power. It seems she's come a long way.

So far this new land seems like an amazing place, but some of us are having a harder time adjusting than others. $npcName:11004320[gender:0]$'s not acting like himself. Do you think you could offer him some words of encouragement?
I'll see what I can do.
Thanks! I'm counting on you!
Hm…
Hmm?
Good to see you! It's been a while.
Yeah, whatever.
What are you doing here?
$npcName:11004319[gender:1]$ dragged us here to search for dark dragons.
Really? Have you found anything?
I have actually. New ingredients.
This place is littered with ingredients Maple World has never seen before!
When I integrate them into my menu, it'll blow people's minds. You should stop by my restaurant some time.
You…
What are you doing here? Have you come to try and convince me to go home too?
Nothing like that.
…Really?
You don't look well. Are you feeling all right?
You're not the first person to say that.
Something $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ said was bothering me. I came here hoping to find answers.
Somehow $npcName:11004324[gender:0]$ figured out where I was going and came after me.
All he's done since is nag, sigh.
I'm not going to let anyone stop me from finding out what $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ told me was true.
What is she thinking?!
Sigh. Once $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ sets her mind to something, there's little hope of changing it.
What's the matter?
Oh, $MyPCName$. Fancy meeting you here.
After not seeing $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ for a few days I got worried. I asked around and found out she came here all alone. So, I dropped everything and followed her here.
I asked her what's going on, but she won't tell me anything. Maybe she doesn't think she can depend on me…
In any case, this is no place for her to be running off to alone! She needs to go home.
Breathtaking!
Ahh… It's too beautiful.
Can't you feel it? The stunning aurora in the sky… The alien wildlife… This place is filling me with creative energy!
I feel it brewing inside. I'm ready to write a smash hit song!
Since when do you write your own songs?
Forget the $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ you used to know. From this day on, I'm reborn as a guy who totally writes his own songs!
You just wait. The new and improved $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ is going to take the world by storm!
Never thought I'd wind up in a place like this…
Keep your distance, chump!
Hold on. You're one of those Sky Fortress people. Sorry, I thought you were another stalker.
Why is $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ here, anyway?
About that… Come closer, okay? I don't want to exactly shout this out.
$npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ isn't so popular these days. He's getting a little old for the gig, and there's lots of hot young talent in the idol game.
Some stars are able to keep working into their old age. But these stars can compose and write their own songs. $npcName:11004325[gender:0]$ can't do neither.
But my boy here heard about this strange new land and thought he might take a vacation to find his muse.
He wouldn't take no for an answer. Lucky for us, the president of his fan club has an in with Sky Fortress and we were able to hitch a ride.
Who's this fan club president?
I can't exactly say. Confidentiality, you see. But between you and me, she's pretty high up in the Sky Fortress food chain, if you catch my drift.
Hm…
This place is… strange.
I didn't expect to see you here.
Hey! Didn't see you there. I'm here to represent $map:02000051$.
Couldn't you have sent a diplomat?
…There were things I had to see for myself.
My father appeared to me in a dream. He said that $map:02000051$ would soon face a grave danger…
And then this place showed up. It couldn't be a coincidence, right?
More importantly, $npcName:11004328[gender:1]$ has a bad feeling about all this, and I trust her instincts.
I've never heard such a call…
I've never heard such a call…
Hey! Fancy meeting you there.
Quick question. You hear that noise?
What noise?
So, you can't hear it, either. That figures.
I keep hearing this crying sound. It's like a hurt animal… but it's no animal I've ever seen.
$npcName:11004327[gender:0]$ and I are new to this land, but I'm sure the crying isn't from a monster.
What could it be? There are so many secrets here.
I see… What a novel approach.
I see… What a novel approach.
What are you working on there?
Hm? Oh, I'm doing research on the magic of this continent!
The rumors have already spread as far as $map:02000023$ that the people of this continent practice a form of magic we've never seen.
There's no way that I would miss such a tantalizing opportunity for self-edification.
Just you wait! I'm on the verge of a groundbreaking discovery, one for the history books!
Sigh…
Sigh…
Why the long face?
$MyPCName$? It seems like I can't go anywhere without bumping into you.
When I heard about the discovery of a new continent from somewhere else, I rushed over in order to study their unique magical practices. But I'm afraid I haven't learned much.
It seems $npcName:11004329[gender:0]$ is, to the contrary, already deep into his research.
I was hoping to find something that would improve Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$'s condition.
I believe in you.
Ahem! W-well I'm not going to make any progress sitting around talking to you! Excuse me.
Those four… It can't be…
Children of the dragon… here? Am I dreaming?
(Tap her gently on the shoulder.)
Ahh! Don't sneak up on a girl like that!
Oh, it's you. I didn't expect to run into you here.
I'm busy right now. Can we talk later?
What are you doing?
It's top-secret!
Actually, you'll never believe it. Those kids raised by the last dragon master? They're here!
I heard the rumors. That's the only reason I was willing to come schlep all the way here with $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$. But it turns out they were true!
See that girl with the blonde hair, way over there? I can smell her dragon juju from here. Unless I'm imagining things…
What I would give for an interview with them! Just to hear them talk about the lumarigons…
Mm?
Hey, you!
Long time no see.
I wasn't expecting to run into you here.
What brings you here?
Well, that geezer—erm, Mr. $npcName:11004233[gender:0]$ sent me here.
The Frontier Foundation caught wind of something quite unexpected here on this continent that warranted investigation.
Traces of lapenta energy!
But I suppose you already knew that.
You should be careful. There's no telling what kinds of dangers lurk in this land.
Hello.
Hello.
My friend. It is pleasant to see your face.
This place is beautiful, is it not?
I have never before walked such a land, under such a sky… and yet it strikes me as familiar, all the same.
Perhaps I am drawing nearer to the answers I seek.
I'm sure you are!
Thank you. Your enthusiasm always lifts my spirits.
Is $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ with you?
I asked him to accompany me, but I fear our vulpine friend declined my invitation. Oh, what I might have learned if he was here to aid me…
A lack his cutting insight…
Wow…
This place has exceeded my every expectation.
To think, we're standing in a land where magic has been made to serve technology. It's almost too good to be true!
See how these magic stones have been reduced to mere tools, like the cogwheel and the level?
I must learn everything about this place…
Soon, the Resistance will dominate Maple World using the technology of Kritias!
Now, isn't this something?
I've gotta admit, I'm impressed.
This whole place is, like, the opposite of Maple World. No wonder the boss was so eager to check it out.
I didn't believe a word of it, of course. But $npcName:11004334[gender:1]$ insisted, and… Wow. Just wow.
$npcName:11003191[gender:0]$ doesn't know what he's missing!
These readings are off the chart!
Is this for real?!
Nothing happened. It's just… this place! I've never seen magic and science mashed together like this!
I need to get my hands on some of this aetherine stuff. If my calculations are right, the energy content of each of these little stones is… Well, it's explosive!
This could totally change how we think about energy!
A bit of an energy nut, aren't you?
Why wouldn't I be? This gives me an idea for a new reactor design…
Now I'm just waiting for my next big clue.
You—?!
$npcName:11004336[gender:1]$?!
Keep your voice down, Boss! $npcName:11004334[gender:1]$ is right around the corner.
Is that why you're here? To spy on the Resistance?
No way! I'm here for critical research. At least, that's what I told $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$…
Boss, there's something you need to know. I've spotted the Resistance going in and out of $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$'s office.
They're up to something. Since I didn't know when you'd come visit me again, I decided I'd check it out for myself!
This place is way too dangerous for you. Let's get you ba—
Uh, heck no! Even if I lied to my fake boss, there really is a ton of stuff for me to research here.
Anyway, you're too busy to save the world and spy on the Resistance. You need my help!
$npcName:11004336[gender:1]$… By any chance, do you… have a huge travel budget?
Say something, $npcName:11004336[gender:1]$.
Huh? What happened?
Boss! I was starting to think you didn't see me. Heh!
Spin $npc:11004728$ for just 1 $item:30001442$!
Give us 5 $itemPlural:30001442$ for a chance to spin the $npc:11004728$. How about it? Feeling lucky?
(Pay 5 $item:30001442$ for 1 spin.)
(Pay 50 $itemPlural:30001442$ for a bunch of spins in a row!)
(Pay 500 $itemPlural:30001442$ for a bunch of spins in a row!)
Wonderful! Are you ready to spin?
Here's hoping Lady Luck's on your side!
You don't have enough coins. You need 5 $itemPlural:30001442$ to spin the $npc:11004728$ once.
You need 5 $itemPlural:30001442$ to give the $npc:11004728$ a spin. Play Hide-and-Seek to get $itemPlural:30001442$!
If you have $itemPlural:30001442$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:02000064$!
All right, let's spin it 10 times in a row! Keep your fingers crossed, $MyPCName$!
Spin number $rouletteCurrent$! Good luck!
All right, let's spin it 100 times in a row! Keep your fingers crossed, $MyPCName$!
Spin number $rouletteCurrent$! Good luck!
Heal Devorak!
Heal Devorak!
Deploy the crossbows!
This crossbow is ready.
The Green Hoods are here to help!
This crossbow can pierce his armor.
This crossbow is ready.
The Green Hoods are here to help!
We're here for you, captain!
Devorak will fall!
Nothing to report, $male:sir,female:ma'am$.
I've got to stay vigilant. I'm on duty right now.
I haven't seen anyone suspicious so far.

I'm fairly new to the Green Hoods, but I've been stationed here long enough to get the lay of the land. If something happens in $map:02000057$, I'll be the first to know. But, ah, let me know if you see anything suspicious anyway.
How do you like being a member of the militia?
Well, I've learned a lot of things. Like how being a guard means learning how to think on your feet. I'm not so great at that now, but I try hard.
You rotten swine, I won't let you get away with this!
I've spent my whole life tending my farm, and those pigs managed to wreck it in a single night!
Argh! Those dastardly porkers wrecked my farm!
Do you know what it's like to see your life's work destroyed in a single day? Well I do! <b>I've lost my farm<b>! Gah! I'm so mad I can't even sleep at night.
What happened?

At first I saw them in the distance, like a tidal wave. Before I knew it, my farm was blanketed by a horde of pigs! They crashed through my farm, trampling everything, leaving only ruin! I couldn't believe my eyes…
Good day!
This place is peaceful. Too peaceful. I'm getting the itch to hit something.
I wonder how dangerous the monsters here are…
<font color="#ffd200">Yalario!</font> I love talking to new people and visiting new places. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Yala-what-io?
That doesn't sound so great for business…
Where exactly are you from?
Oh! Forgive me. Sometimes I forget that I am in a foreign land. Where I come from, 'Yalario' is the term we use when meeting someone for the first time. It means "new friend".
Hahaha! Perhaps not. Truthfully, I am interested in both. Encountering new monsters inspires me to create new products! Mine is a dangerous business, ahahaha!
I've sailed around the globe doing battle with all kinds of monsters. You'll find I am as shrewd a warrior as a merchant!
You're not afraid of monsters?

Far, far across the sea. I haven't seen a single map here which includes my homeland. I have spent half my life sailing around the world, but I had never heard of this 'Wictoria Isslind' until I set foot upon it.
Not at all. The people here make a big deal about how dangerous monsters are. But compared to back home, they are as cuddly as teddy bears. I am still hopeful that I will find a worthy challenge.
Ah, I should update my travel journal!
This place looks so different from home.
Now where did I put that journal?

Ah, a local! <font color="#ffd200">Yalario!</font> It always been my dream to explore strange new worlds, and seek out new life and new civilizations! Traveling this land has been an awesome experience.
…Ah, but I'm sure these sights seem so plain to you. Well, I hope I'll get to keep visiting new places and writing about them in my travel journal.
Yala-what-io?
I take it you like to travel?
Where exactly are you from?

New friend! This is how we greet strangers who we want to be our friends. $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ shouted it out when we first arrived in $map:02000064$, so I guess it can also be used for villages. Well, at least it can be by our captain.
Of course! Setting foot in a new land, leaving proof of your journey… There's nothing more exciting! I bet everyone in the Allicari Merchant Society would agree.

I'm from a place far, far away! On the other side of the sea. To get there from here you have to go north… no wait, south… Err, east? We sort of stumbled upon this land by accident. My homeland is beautiful, although it's much different than here.
These crates are full of supplies sold by the Allicari Merchant Society.
Ah, an adventurer! Know of any famous monsters around here? I may be a merchant, but I'm just as interested in fighting monsters as selling things. Hahaha!
Ugh…
Urgh… I don't believe it…
Ugh…
Ugh… Th-those jerks…
Ugh…
They're… too strong…
Ugh…
Ugh… I can't move…
Ugh…
Must protect… Wei Hong…
Ugh…
I-I can't believe… we were so easily beaten…
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
Hmpf, you riffraff are no match for me.
You'll regret messing with me.
So what, they stole one of our trains? Quit whining. I haven't survived the criminal underworld this long by panicking every time someone came after me!
What brings you here?
Y-you're not going to tell Wei Hong, are you?
<font color="#909090"> (Sighs)</font> I can only imagine how I'd be punished on my return.
Trying to steal a Blackstar train? They've got to be crazy!
Please help me.
I'm impressed you've made it this far!
Help…
Only those who know the true value of Trophies can appreciate the value I offer.
Trophies can be incredibly valuable, depending on their quality.
Trophies, Trophies, Trophies! I can never have enough Trophies!
What's this? What business do you have with the Trophy expert? Are you interested in Trophies?
Isn't everyone interested in Trophies?
I don't have time for useless junk like Trophies.
Ah, another Trophy connoisseur like myself! If you aspire to be an expert in Trophies like me, you'd better work hard. It'll take you a long time to become as savvy as I!
What do I get if I have a lot of Trophies?
Hmpf! Collecting Trophies is about more than just what you can get! Of course, there are precious few who collect for the sheer joy of it anymore.
In any case, I have some Trophies, and I'm always looking for more. You can never have enough Trophies, you know! If you happen to find any, I'll trade something equally valuable for them.
Do you even have something equally valuable?
Of course I do! I've got all kinds of treasures from traveling around Maple World. I can't believe you doubt me.
How dare you call my beautiful Trophies junk! Insulting my trophies is like personally insulting me, the Trophy expert! You should be ashamed of yourself for being so insulting!
All right! All right! I'm sorry! I shouldn't have called them junk.
Hmpf! I suppose I'll forgive you this time. Not everyone understands the true beauty of Trophies, after all. But don't let it happen again! Trophy experts demand respect, I tell you!
Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.
Think carefully. Your chances at enchanting this gear are pretty low. I mean, sure, you can always try again in the event of failure, but that'll cost another batch of materials.
Anything under +9 is easy. There's nothing to worry about at those levels.
I can't enchant this gear any further. It's so unstable that it could blow up the whole street if I fail. You'll need to find someone with more expertise.
I understand you want to make your gear stronger. But some things just can't be done. It's already at a level that would scare away most blacksmiths. Don't get greedy.

Yes, I remember how happy you were last time, totally ignoring all logic and tempting fate. It seemed insane, but I have to admit… it was an incredible day for me… But look, as glorious as that was, I can't enchant this item any further! By golly, I'd need another decade of practice, at the very least!
I made it +11! I gotta tell everyone I know!
Huh? Did that enchantment really succeed just now? Yes! The gear's +12 now! I'm better than I thought!
This can't be true. Did I really make it +13? Oh my… I mean, part of it is luck, but still, I think I need to increase my prices!
+14… This is unbelievable! $MyPCName$, this is the greatest achievement of my life! Congratulations! Congratulations on owning such amazing gear!
+15…? P-plus fif-fifteen? I…<font color="#909090">(THUMP! She's fainted.)</font>
I feared this would happen, and now my fears have come true. The gear can no longer be enchanted. Its enchantment level has been retained, but that's all the good news there is.
…I was afraid this would happen. My sympathies are with you.
I wish I could cast my worries into the wind…
I've reached my breaking point…
I don't know if I can keep going like this…
I wish it would all just be over…
What's wrong?
It's been one disaster after another, and I'm just too tired to fight anymore. Money is ruining my life. If I could live without it, I would've quit already.

I got transferred to another department because of an argument with the head of the broadcasting station over my program. Journalism used to be about integrity! It was about telling the truth, not just covering what makes money! I just can't do it anymore.
Grah! Writer's block, my mortal enemy!
My mind is a complete blank…
I deserve better than this…
<font color="#909090"> (He sighs.)</font> Am I really qualified to be a TV writer…? Hey, you there! Can I ask you a question?
What I want to do, of course! I would give anything to be good at what I want to be doing…
That's not it. This has been my dream job for as long as I can remember. It's just… not the job I expected. <font color="#909090">(He sighs.)</font>
I wish I could find a story my colleague $npcName:11001191[gender:1]$ would be excited to cover.
Maybe if I just smile long enough, I'll actually feel happy!
I should get some sun. I'm sure that will make me feel better.
Hehehe! This is so much fun! <font color="#C66455" size="22">Pfft… Are you kidding me? This is awful.</font> No, no. Don't say that. <font color="#909090">(…Is she arguing with herself?)</font>
W-what? I'm not crazy, you're crazy! <font color="#C66455" size="22">I didn't say anything, got it?</font> <font color="#909090">(After an awkward silence, Illuna sighs in resignation.)</font>
Hah… Hahaha! <font color="#C66455" size="22">Good, good.</font>
Sigh… I want to go home…
I should've stayed in the News department. Why did I ever move to the team for Educational programming?
I just want to go home…
This is no good. I can't get a good shot! What should I do?
What's wrong?

It's may be bright out here, but our cameras our set up inside that cave, where it's much darker. I doubt we can get any usable footage as it stands. I should've brought $npcName:11001193[gender:1]$, my supervisor…
This place is dry, hot, and unbearably loud. It is absolutely the worst.
<font color="#909090">(He makes an exaggerated show of coughing.)</font> Gah! I can't stand this smog!
My wise little owl Joanna, I miss you…
I must've been out of my mind when I agreed to come here. Hmm? And just who are you supposed to be? Wait, did my wise little owl send here?
Your what?
I'm talking about my beautiful muse! The brains behind our Educational programming, Joanna, of course. Whooo~ else?
Owls are smart. It's just a cute nickname, honey. Get over yourself.
Let's have a look at the requisition form… Are you kidding me? I'm not dealing with this right now.
Ugh… I hate remote shoots in places like this.
The Educational programming team is so demanding.
Mm.. What? Is there something you need?
Show me what you have to sell.
All right, have a looksie in my bag…

…Wait, what am I doing? I'm not some blasted shopkeep! I support the employees of the broadcasting station. Coffee, snacks, transportation, unsolicited advice. I get them whatever they need. I'm a key member of the team, so don't you forget it!
Do you think people should pursue jobs they want to do, or just ones they're good at?
I'm not sure… What do you think?
Why? Do you not like your job?
…?! Ahh! How long have you been standing there? You didn't hear what I said, did you?
Uhh… Were you just talking to yourself?
I didn't hear a thing.
But what was that with the owl thing?
How can I help you?
Shalua le mashalua.
How may I help you?
Shalua le mashalua.
Please don't interrupt me while I am praying.
Shalua le mashalua.
Shalua le mashalua… I am conducting an important rite. Please be quiet.
What's the deal with this rite?
All around the world, there exist forces of darkness which threaten the peace. Few are brave enough to confront them. And so those who do are branded heroes.

$npcName:11001201$, having attained enlightenment and seen the truth of the world, wants to help such heroes through prayer. And so, she and her successor, $npcName:11001202$, have embarked on a holy pilgrimage.

Sadly, your prejudice is not entirely unfounded. We too have heard many stories of evil Inakimos. But me, and the rest of $npcName:11001201$'s followers are not like them. Our people follow a different faith. We have walked a different path.
We understand why the rest of the world looks at us with some suspicion, but we want nothing more than to do good for the world, and to make up for the wrongs of other Inakimos.
That's great and all, but how does that help with the bad Inakimos?

We're deeply ashamed of our malevolent kin. We wish to stop their wrongdoing as badly as you. But ever since $npcName:11001201$ was exiled from their order for confronting Myuteka Rabo, they have treated us as enemies.

Besides, we cannot raise a hand against our own kind. We must help them to understand the error of their ways and guide them to righteous path. Even if it is a hopeless endeavor, we must at least try.
Exiled? What's the deal with Inakimo Karr?
$npcName:11001201$ was once the most trusted priest of Myuteka Rabo's cult. But he was not blind. He began to question Myuteka's evil ambitions, and was summarily exiled from Myuteka's order.

With a few loyal followers in tow, he set off upon a journey to learn about the world as it really was, and not as Myuteka preached. It was a perilous journey was perilous, but <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11001201$</font> persisted. In the end, he found enlightenment wrote a<font color="#ffd200">new doctrine</font> entirely of his own.

$npcName:11001201$ was devastated to learn of the evil done in the name of Myuteka Rabo's faith. And thus began our pilgrimage. We may unable to confront our kin, but we hope by atoning for their sins to one day redeem ourselves in the eyes of the world.
Thank you so much…
Can we really go home?
You… saved us?
Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!
Thank you so much…
I'll never forget this!
Thank you all!
Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!
Thank you so much…
I can never repay you…
You're my hero!
Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!
Thank you so much…
Thank you, thank you!
Bless you all!
Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!
Thank you so much…
I don't know what to say…
I never thought I'd be free again…
Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!
Thank you so much…
I am eternally grateful.
You have my deepest gratitude.
Three cheers for $MyPCName$! Three cheers for the Lumina Liberation Army!
Thank you so much…
Thank you so much…
Thank you so much…
Thank you so much…
Thank you so much…
Thank you so much…

It would be naive to think that prayer will miraculously vanquish all of the evil in the world. But there is no denying the restorative power of prayer. Such is the purpose of their pilgrimage, to empower heroes to resist evil.
I've never heard of good Inakimos.

어서오세요! $MyPCName$님! 특별한 <font color="#ffd200">이벤트 기간</font> 중 <font color="#ffd200">월요일</font>에만 구매 가능한 <font color="#ffd200">먼데이 상점</font>입니다! <font color="#ffd200">$item:30000750$</font>만 있다면 원하는 물건을 마음껏 구입할 수 있답니다!
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30000750$</font>는 어디서 구할 수 있는지 물어본다.

And… that's another sword fresh off the grinding stone! What a beaut. This will make for one happy customer… Oh hi there, can I help you?
Ah now, let me guess… You want to enchant your gear? Let's have a look, then!
Can you enchant my items?
How about we change some bonus attributes?
Tell me about your work.
Isn't it obvious? I'm a blacksmith! The best one there is, too. Well, on this street.

The thing is that <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000076$</font> is absolutely lousy with craftsmen and women. This is the heart of the blacksmithing trade for Maple World, and that makes competition fierce. But that competition is inspiring for people like me. I learn a lot from my peers, and I relate to people who are willing to pour their heart and soul into their work.

You're not here to talk about me though, are you? You need your gear tuned up, I'm your woman. All I need are the right materials, and I'll work my magic. You know what I'm talking about, right? $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$, all produced in $map:2000051$, usually.

<font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> come from <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100024$</font>, you'll need to dismantle gear that is rated Epic or better.
People compete for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> in the <font color="#ffd200">Personal Arena</font>, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is…

By the way, Elliana got ahold of yet another strange weapon, and she's been begging me to enchant it for her. I told her such flashy, impractical weapons like that can't be enchanted, but she doesn't listen. Why can't she just accept that only items marked as "Can be Enchanted" can, well, be enchanted?

That's not all! Aside from functioning as weaponry or armor, high-grade gear grants special abilities. But there's a catch: These abilities are completely random! If you would prefer gear that better suits your needs, I can help you modify it as you like.

This is a new service we blacksmiths provide, thanks to a breakthrough out of the research center in $map:02000270$. Those eggheads figured out how to refine meteoric ores into these $itemPlural:40100026$ that I can use to change the chemical properties in your gear.

Now, don't get your hopes all the way up. $itemPlural:40100026$ are tricky to work with, so I might not be able to get all the bonuses on your item to exactly what you want. I also need $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100002$, $itemPlural:40100003$, or $itemPlural:40100021$ to work with, and that's up to you to get.
We can do that! Just show me the item you want to retool. Remember, I can only work on Epic or Legendary armor and accessories at Level 50 or above.

So you want to change the bonus attributes on this gear, eh? Sounds good to me! Hey, why the anxious look on your face? If you don't like the new attributes, you can always keep the old ones, and then just try to change them again.
I understand you want to change the bonus attributes on your gear, but I can't help you if you don't have the materials, Silly! Come back when you've got the right stuff, yeah?

Okay, then! See if you like any of these new attributes. You can choose anything you like. If you don't choose anything, then the new attributes will automatically overwrite the old ones. Choose carefully!

How do you feel about the change of attributes? Overjoyed? Devastated? Ready to sue me? I hope not, ha ha! But seriously, if you're not happy, you can always try to change the attributes again. I'll be here. Just bring the materials!
Oh, wow. This gear is a little above my pay grade. Could I help you with anything less advanced?
Okay, let's see the gear you want to enchant. I'm warning you now, it has to be marked with "Can be Enchanted."
Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.

You didn't forget that enchanting gear requires materials, did you? The <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100001$</font> is available for purchase from gear merchants and supply merchants. You can get the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100023$</font> by <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for the <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100024$</font>, that comes at a much higher cost. It only comes from dismantling gear that is epic or better.
Wow! This is Legendary! Where did you get it? I see gear from all over the world every day, but nothing like this. This is something truly special.
Whoa, this is a legendary item. I can't compensate you for anything that happens to such a valuable piece, so you need to be willing to assume all risk.
This has never been enchanted, not even once. You'll be very happy when you see how much better I can make it.
You've never tried to enchant this gear? Just wait till you see what I can do with it!
Never-enchanted gear? That's great. It should be really easy to enchant this gear for the first time.

This gear… Have I really failed in enchanting it 100 times? Gee. This hurts my pride. But you know what a blacksmith with real grit would do? Not give up! So let's try it again, this time with more experience and wiser minds, yeah?

But you've already tried to enchant this gear 100 times, and it's been a failure each and every time. You're going to ask me to enchant it no matter what I say, aren't you? Wow, you're stubborner than I am. All right, no guarantees it'll work, but here goes!

Have you really tried and failed to enchant this gear 1,000 times? I can't believe it! I thought I was stubborn, but I have nothing on you. Maybe all of us craftspeople on this street should give you an award for Best Customer.
Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.
Hm, it is my expert opinion that this gear is not stable enough to be enchanted any further! You'll need to bring me different gear if you want me to help you.
I can't enchant this. I could hone my enchanting skills for the next hundred years, and I still wouldn't be able to do it. This gear is just too strong. You should be satisfied with it as it is.
I know you're the type who likes to rise to any challenge, but even you and your gear have limits. And sometimes, it's wiser to quit than to try to push things past their natural limit.
I can't enchant this gear any further. It's so unstable that it could blow up the whole street if I fail. You'll need to find someone with more expertise.
I understand you want to make your gear stronger. But some things just can't be done. It's already at a level that would scare away most blacksmiths. Don't get greedy.

Yes, I remember how happy you were last time, totally ignoring all logic and tempting fate. It seemed insane, but I have to admit… it was an incredible day for me… But look, as glorious as that was, I can't enchant this item any further! By golly, I'd need another decade of practice, at the very least!
Put your mind at ease. Only another earthquake could make me fail at this simple of an enchantment.

Don't worry, I could do this with one hand tied behind my back. In fact, I could do a lot of smithing one-handed if I could just find someone to be my striker! Interested? Okay, okay, I can see you just want the enchantment… let's do this, then.
This enchantment will be so easy, it would actually be more difficult to fail than to succeed! You'd be foolish to pass up on those odds, I'd say.
There's very little chance of error when the enchantment is this simple. Want me to give it a try?
Enchanting this gear will be a little tricky, but certainly not impossible. It's up to you, but I'd say the risk is well worth the potential reward.
This will be a piece of cake. Just believe in me a little!
Let's see… this gear has only been enchanted a handful of times, so I shouldn't have too much trouble with it… as long as you don't distract me!
I should be able to enchant this gear safely, as long as you don't distract me with incessant chatting or stares, so find something to occupy yourself while I'm working.
Due to previous enchantments, there's some risk if you want me to enchant this gear. But still, there's a much greater chance that I will succeed. It's up to you.

Good news! Even though this item has been enchanted multiple times, it's still pretty stable. There's a chance that the new enchantment could go wrong, but that comes with the territory. It's your call.
There's an elevated chance of failure if I enchant this item, but it's not so high to really worry me. If it doesn't worry you either, go ahead and press the Enchant button.
I'm pretty confident about this. And don't worry; if it doesn't work, you can always try again!
I'm going to give it a go, now. And hey, if I mess up, you can always try again!
This is just too easy. Check it out!
To +7, huh? Shouldn't be too hard. Hand it over!
This gear is a little delicate, but I'll use some finesse, and it should be fine.
The reason that Peachy never fails is because she uses lots of materials. I don't use as many, and that's why I fail sometimes. It's a trade-off, you see.
You know, the chances of successful enchantment for this piece are lower than I'd like, but I'll do it if you want me to.

This gear is within my ability to enchant, sure. But the chance of failure is a bit high, and I'm telling you that when other blacksmiths won't, because they're not as honest. So, do what you will with that information.
Think carefully. Your chances at enchanting this gear are pretty low. I mean, sure, you can always try again in the event of failure, but that'll cost another batch of materials.
Anything under +9 is easy. There's nothing to worry about at those levels.
The truth about enchanting gear is that it requires both skill and luck.
Blacksmithing is tough, but fascinating. When I look into the flames, I feel like I'm God.
Sure, it'd be great if enchantments never failed. But then again, that would make us blacksmiths go broke! Ha, ha!
It worked! Told you I'm the best blacksmith on this street.
See? No problem at all!
The enchantment was successful! Here you are… nice doing business with ya!
Your materials were excellent, and the enchantment worked! A great day's work for both of us.
I told you, this is nothing! Choose me again next time!
It worked! And you deserve a lot of the credit. Your persistence made this possible.
I've succeeded in a +10 enchantment! I'm glad we went for it!
I made it +11! I gotta tell everyone I know!
Huh? Did that enchantment really succeed just now? Yes! The gear's +12 now! I'm better than I thought!
This can't be true. Did I really make it +13? Oh my… I mean, part of it is luck, but still, I think I need to increase my prices!
+14… This is unbelievable! $MyPCName$, this is the greatest achievement of my life! Congratulations! Congratulations on owning such amazing gear!
+15…? P-plus fif-fifteen? I…<font color="#909090">(THUMP! She's fainted.)</font>
Did you see that?! The item shook a little, but I kept control over it and the enchantment was successful! That was close, but what a reward! Here's your improved item!
It worked! My skill aside, the materials you brought were truly excellent. We work well together. I hope you choose me again next time!
Uh-oh. It seems the ratio of $item:40100023$ was off. That caused some destabilization, and it decreased your gear's enchantment level by one. I'm sorry; I misjudged the carbon content in your gear.
I knew the $item:40100023$ was too unstable. Your gear's enchantment level has decreased by one. I'm sorry, but I thought I warned you…
What…? This shouldn't have happened! I can't believe it, is it because I saw a black cat on my way to work today?
Oh, the enchantment failed. It's not our fault… Whoever made this gear didn't case-harden it enough, so it's random chance whether it can tolerate enchantments.
I thought it'd be easy. What did I do wrong? I'll practice more and get better.
This has never happened before… and when I said it was going to be so easy! It must have been something random, like my hand slipping…

Ah, your gear couldn't stand up to it! It's totally wrecked! The only salvageable thing now is this <font color="#ffd200">$item:40100025$</font>. I know it's a disappointment, but maybe if you collect enough <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100025$</font>, you'll find some use for them.
I feared this would happen, and now my fears have come true. The gear can no longer be enchanted. Its enchantment level has been retained, but that's all the good news there is.
…I was afraid this would happen. My sympathies are with you.
Uh-oh, the enchantment failed. Well… the good news is that it didn't destabilize your gear! Try to look at the glass half-full!
Hm… this gear would be quite difficult for me. I'd rather help you with some different gear, if you have any.
Ho boy, I'm busy! Busy, busy, busy… If you were hoping for my services, I just don't have the time right now. I'm working on a special order from the palace.
Can you enchant my items?
What do you do?
Isn't it obvious? I'm a blacksmith! The best one there is, too. Well, on this street.

The thing is that <font color="#ffd200">$map:2000076$</font> is absolutely lousy with craftsmen and women. This is the heart of the blacksmithing trade for Maple World, and that makes competition fierce. But that competition is inspiring for people like me. I learn a lot from my peers, and I relate to people who are willing to pour their heart and soul into their work.

You're not here to talk about me though, are you? You need your gear tuned up, I'm your woman. All I need are the right materials, and I'll work my magic. You know what I'm talking about, right? $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$, all produced in $map:2000051$, usually.

<font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> come from <font color="#ffd200">dismantling</font> gear that's level 20 or higher. Just use the <font color="#ffd200">Dismantle</font> button in your inventory window. As for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100024$</font>, you'll need to dismantle gear that is rated Epic or better.
People compete for <font color="#ffd200">$itemPlural:40100023$</font> in the <font color="#ffd200">Personal Arena</font>, so you could go there. If you think you can win, that is…

Keep in mind that the only items you can enchant are Top, Bottom, Suit, and Weapon items at level 20 or above. That frustrates some folks, but I need a solid base to work from. Elliana found some weird weapon she wanted to enchant, but she doesn't get that there are rules to these things. I'm good, but even I have my limits!

I'd love to help you, but right now I have to focus on this special order from the palace. No exceptions! Absolutely not! You wouldn't want me to stop your order to work on someone else's, so why would you expect me to do that to the palace?
Let's see… Mm…?
Welcome.
Turu tuttut!
What would you like me to make for you?
What would you like me to make for you?
Hm…
Woo hoo! Fly!
Looking for something? I can get you nearly anything for the right price.
Places you can get rare items are…
Hmpf! How selfish!
Feel free to browse. I've got products you can't find anywhere else.
That's a unique accent. May I ask where you're from?
Ah, you've certainly got keen ears. You're the first to notice since I arrived.
And you arrived from… ?
Nowhere you've heard of. Just a faraway place across the ocean. Actually, have you met anyone from the Allicari Merchant Society in $map:2000064$? The people who can't stop yelling yalario!
I don't think so…
Yes.
Ah, lucky you! If you do, be careful. They can be pretty heartless.
What do you mean?
They called me a stowaway and kicked me off their ship just because I couldn't afford the fare. It's not like the ship would sink just because of one extra person. How could they be so cruel?
But if you couldn't afford the fare…
Can you believe how heartless they are? You know they called me a stowaway and kicked me off their ship just because I couldn't afford the fare? They're so mean!
But if you couldn't afford the fare…
WHAT?! You're taking their side! You're as heartless as they are!
Life is a cycle.
Everything begins from nature and returns to nature.
The cycle of life goes on and on.
There is a <font color="#ffd200">lifeforce</font> all around us. It's in the leaves and the breeze, the water, and the very earth we tread. I've always wondered from where life originates.
Any thoughts on the topic?
Well, I don't know about a direct source… But there is clearly a natural order to things. A cycle of life.
What do you mean?
Flowers, monsters, and people alike. Everything is born from nature, and returns to nature when its time is at an end. There is an endless cycle of life that keeps this world balanced.
There's one weapon I'd love to create, but I don't have the right materials.
I could forge a weapon unlike anything this world has ever seen!
With the right materials, I can make anything.

My dream is to forge a weapon unlike anything the world has ever seen. Of course, the same could be said for any other Blacksmith on $map:2000203$. But none among them have the skill to create what I have in mind.
What makes you so confident in your craft?

The quality of any weapon is determined by the materials used for its creation. But having superior materials is not enough on its own. The true test of a blacksmith is knowing how to best make use of these materials.
I happen to have mastered my family's secret technique for creating weapons of the highest caliber. I can't help but be confident! However, without the right materials, all of that is moot.
What sort of materials do you need?
I intend to imbue the weapon with magical power, such that it will never grow dull, and grant strength to its wielder. Finding a material with those kinds of properties hasn't been easy…

I've tried all kinds of crystals and objects of power, but none of them could match up to the material that I envisioned in my mind's eye. Besides, those materials had a limit to their power. They didn't last long and they were pathetically weak.
Perhaps the material I seek doesn't even exist. But it must exist somewhere… Something that generates an endless supply of power…
Nice to meet you, $MyPCName$!
Nice to meet you, $MyPCName$. Do you need help?

I soldier on and cover what they tell me, acting like there's nothing wrong. But every day I die a little inside. Someone's got to stand up to them, I know that! But if I do, they'll just replace me with another yes-man…
The after party is in full swing! Let's talk in a little bit.
Let's party!
It's showtime!
Enjoy the moment!
Let's all shout together! $npc:11004733[gender:0]$!
Wassup man~ Let's enjoy the after-party!
This is so exciting!
Dance dance dance~
Feel the lights and dance!

A big congratulations to the newly weds!
Lose yourself to the beat~!

Hey there! Let's dance for the newly weds!

Dance and celebrate! Enjoy this moment!

Dance and celebrate with the rhythm~ So fun!
Dance by the lights!
Dance and celebrate! Enjoy this moment!

This party's atmosphere is so great! Such a fun time!

Let's start dance dance stop.
Okay, we'll start when the other party agrees!

Oh, you've brought me more $item:30000419$. Allow me to extract the $item:30000420$ that lies within. Give me a moment.
(Hand over the $item:30000419$.)
Give me the $item:30000419$. I'm not sure if this will work, but it's worth a shot.

Primordial Nature, Mother of Earth, I beseech thee! Make me your conduit and return this tainted spirit to the source of all life! Aniriel zu spiritalis… Ritana vitalitas!
It worked! Here, this $item:30000420$ was inside it. I hope you'll use it for good.
Primordial Nature, Mother of Earth, I beseech thee! Make me your conduit and return this tainted spirit to the source of all life! Aniriel zu spiritalis… Ritana vitalitas!

I was so happy…
I've searched for it several times, but I can't help feel this way.
To leave without a word...
I'm so sad it has come to this…
Spin $npc:11004742$ for just 1 $item:30001446$!

Yalario! How may I help you? If merchandise is what you seek, please browse at your leisure.
Do you know anything about Cynodia ore?
Ah, I know of Cynodia ore. It is filled with mystical power and said to be able to bring balance to unstable magic.
Do you know where I can find Cynodia ore?

Hmm… I'm sorry, but they aren't something we carry. Come to think of it, $npcName:11001180[gender:1]$ or $npcName:11001181[gender:0]$ might know where to find some. Why don't you try speaking with them?
Ah, yalario! What can I do for you?
I'm looking for some $item:30000421$.
Ah, those. The smuggler called $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ sells them, but I wouldn't do business with him if I were you.
Why do you say that?
He snuck onto our vessel because he did not want to pay a simple fare. No one who does such a thing could be considered trustworthy.
Where can I find $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$ now?
Captain $npcName:11001179[gender:0]$ kicked him off the ship. Last I saw, he was running off toward $map:03000014$.
If $item:30000419$ is what you're after, you should talk to $npcName:11001210[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$. I'm sure he can help you.

Nice to meet you, $MyPCName$. Do you need help?
I want to get married.
I want to book a wedding venue.
Yeah, I would be very happy to find my other half to spend time in this beautiful world. If there is someone who has engaged with you, please come see me. We'll help book a wonderful wedding.
I want to get married.
I want to book a wedding venue.

To get married, you must propose to someone and then get engaged. Once you're engaged, meet with the wedding planner to reserve a venue in order to have your ceremony. Keep in mind that you can only be engaged for 7 days. If you don't get married within that time, your engagement will be broken off.
After you get married, you and your partner can build intimacy. Live a long and happy life together!

When you book your reservation, you will receive a reservation gift by mail. Once you get married, you will also receive a wedding gift. These gets depend on where your wedding venue is, so choose carefully. Do not worry if you change your reservation. We will send you the gift by mail.
So darn popular~ I don't think it will fade away. Although I am grateful, I cannot accept it. When you find a wonderful person who suits you, then I will help you have a lovely wedding.

Wedding venue reservations can be made through wedding planners. Talk to the wedding planner and pay for the reservation. If you're looking for more information, why not try making a reservation yourself?
Indeed, each wedding planner has a slight different speciality or recommendation. Before making a reservation, consider consulting them all.
Ask for wedding venue recommendation.

I recommend the romantic love forest $map:84000013$, and the grand wild mountain range $map:84000014$. Those are two different places. If you would like to check them out, come back once you are engaged. We offer preview tours for those who are engaged.
Nice to meet you $MyPCName$. Do you need help?
I want to book a wedding venue.
I would like a tour of the recommended venue.
Certainly. Let's get a reservation right away.
The wedding tour is a service that shows you the wedding planner's recommended venue in advance. You can take as long as you would like to help you feel out the place.
I recommend the romantic love forest $map:84000013$, and the grand wild mountain range $map:84000014$. Those are two different places.

Please tell me how to get a divorce.

Divorce happens when both married people want to terminate their wedding. If you go through with a divorce, all rewards and intimacy you have built in this relationship will be deleted. Additionally, you will not be able to propose or make wedding reservations for the next 48 hours after a divorce.

Please tell me how to get a divorce.
A consensual divorce is when both people in the marriage want to divorce quickly by agreement. Couples who have been married for more than 31 days can apply here at $map:84000002$.

If you go through with a divorce, all rewards and intimacy you have built in this relationship will be deleted. Additionally, you will not be able to propose or make wedding reservations for the next 48 hours after a divorce.
Do you wish to proceed with the divorce?
I understand the explanation. I would like to divorce.
Let me think about it more.
Your request has been confirmed. I will help file for a divorce. When the divorce has successfully been completed, you will receive a confirmation mail.
Sure. Please think it over carefully. I'll be around If you need any more help.

I was told to come to you to deal with a forced divorce

I am $npcName:11004712$, attorney of $map:84000002$. What's your business?
When can I propose to someone else?
If you want to propose to someone, you must wait 48 hours after a divorce is settled. I would advise for you to take some extra time to think about it.
Please tell me how to get a divorce.

Divorce happens when both married people want to terminate their wedding. If you go through with a divorce, all rewards and intimacy you have built in this relationship will be deleted. Additionally, you will not be able to propose or make wedding reservations for the next 48 hours after a divorce.
I am $npcName:11004713$, attorney of $map:84000002$. What's your business?
I want a forced divorce.
I want a consensual divorce
Please tell me how to get a divorce.

A forced divorce can only happen after 31 days of being married. You do not need the other party's consent, but there is a fee and a contemplation period. Be mindful of going through a divorce. The fee is not refundable once the decision is made.

If you go through with a divorce, all rewards and intimacy you have built in this relationship will be deleted. Additionally, you will not be able to propose or make wedding reservations for the next 48 hours after a divorce.

If a forced divorce is filed, the other party will be notified. If the other party agrees to the divorce within 7 days, the fee you paid will be refunded. If they do not agree, the fee won't be refunded. Once the contemplation period ends, the divorce will be finalized between both parties.
So, do you want to continue with a forced divorce? The fee for it is 1,000,000 mesos.
I understand the explanation. I would like to divorce.
Let me think about it more.

Your decision has been accepted. We'll begin filing for a forced divorce. If your application to file for a forced divorce is accepted, we will notify the other party. A confirmation mail will be sent whenever there is progress.
Sure. Please think it over carefully. I'll be around if need any more help.
If you're looking to get divorced immediately, come with the other party present and speak to $npcName:11004712$. You can visit them by going over to the room to the left.
I am $npcName:11004713$, attorney of $map:84000002$. What's your business?
I am here to agree upon the forced divorce.

If you agree to the forced divorce filing, the divorce will complete immediately. The other party will also be receiving a refund to the fee they paid for. You will not need to wait until the contemplation period is over.
I agree with the divorce.
Let me think about it more.
Your decision has been accepted. The forced divorce has been accepted by both parties. You will receive a confirmation mail when the divorce has been completed.
Sure. Please think it over carefully. I'll be around If you need any more help.
I am $npcName:11004713$, attorney of $map:84000002$. What's your business?
I am here to agree upon the forced divorce.

If you agree to the forced divorce filing, the divorce will complete immediately. The other party will also be receiving a refund to the fee they paid for. You will not need to wait until the contemplation period is over.
I am here to agree upon the forced divorce.
Let me think about it more.
Your decision has been accepted. The forced divorce has been accepted by both parties. You will receive a confirmation mail when the divorce has been completed.
Sure. Please think it over carefully. I'll be around If you need any more help.

I want to change my wedding venue reservation.
Alright. I'll help change your reservation right away.

Sure, please check the reservation information first and make a final decision. If the other party agrees to cancel, you will receive <font color="#ffd200">a free reservation coupon that allows you to book the same wedding venue tier in the future.</font>. The coupon is only valid for 30 days after you receive it, so be sure to use it before it expires. If the other party does not agree to the change, you cannot cancel the reservation.
$MyPCName$~! Come now, do you need my help?
I want to get married.
I want to book a wedding venue.
Wouldn't it be great to find your other half in this Maple World! If someone promises to marry you, come talk to me again. I'll prepare for you the most magical wedding.
I want to get married.
I want to book a wedding venue.
