See you later.
According to my research, you will indeed see me again. But it will be sooner than you think…
Hop hop!
Hi-hi! I'm $npcName:11003646$ the Bunny!
Hello there, fluffy rabbit!
Ahem. Youse the mug Schatten sent? Here's the code phrase: "The square looks at the flower twice."
Uh… What?
Hop hop!
W-wait… What did you say?
I didn't say anything, you silly goose! Run along now!
Uh…
Hop hop!
So much to do, so much mortal danger…
What's have we here? A foreigner, in a place like this?
I'm here on business.
In that case, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ must have sent you. I see she can't be bothered to visit me in person… as usual.
Uh, she tells me that you're doing very important work.
That's kind of you to say, but I know the truth. Anyway, please tell her that I said, "Parrot. Shoes. Perfume."
I'll make sure she gets the messsage.
Please remind her that us agents get lonely sometimes, would you?
What a creepy place…
Oh, $MyPCName$! What a pleasant surprise.
Have we met?
You wound me. We've talked at length, my friend! Of course, I was wearing a different face at the time…
I honestly have no idea who you are.
A pity. Anyway, you must be here about the dragon-man.
Who said anything about a dragon-man?
Don't be so transparent, my friend. I already knew why you were here from the beginning.
$npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ sent me…
Then please pass my message along to her: "Torch. Jar. Treasure chest."
All right.
I would advise you leave this place as soon as you can. It's most eerie here…
Eh heh heh.
And what brings a youngster like you here, hm?
I'm looking for someone.
Looking for someone, eh? Well, you're in luck! I know everybody here. So, who is it you're after, hm?
Oh, I think I can find them on my own.
Being tight-lipped about it, are you? $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ trains her people well.
You're with Dark Wind?
Eh heh heh! Surprised? Even us old timers can help out sometimes. Anyway, you run along and tell her, "Eyes. Alpha. Blonde hair."
Will do!
Eh heh heh!
I'll speed you along your way.
Ladies and gentlemen! Are you ready for some action-packed racing?
Today's rally has me on the edge of my seat!
Welcome! To! MapleCar Racing!
Are you joining today's race? Good luck!
Why can't we just have a normal celebration? This is ridiculous!
Have you seen my family? I… really miss them right now.
Why must the holidays always be so stressful…
Why must the holidays always be so stressful…
I must remain calm… I can resolve this… All things in their proper place…
If there's a problem, solve it! Blaming and complaining won't fix anything!
Things aren't looking so good right now… are you okay?
Yes, of course! Obviously we just need to remain calm and composed. CALM AND COMPOSED!
I hope this hasn't been too hard on poor $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$…
Is my family safe? What a stressful season this has been.
Ha, you like Bobo's red nose? Remind you of someone?
Ha, you like Bobo's red nose? Remind you of someone?
Why can't we just have a normal celebration? This is ridiculous!
This isn't… It's not at all what I wanted…
What a relief.
Thank you very much for helping us, $MyPCName$.
Oh look, $MyPCName$. Snow!
I always love snow for the holidays.
Is it so much to ask that we have a normal celebration this year?
I've got a reputation as a know-it-all, but I can't imagine why anyone would do this to our family…
I never would have imagined that thing was real…
Life is full of surprises. Case in point, that creature in our living room, celebrating with us…
So much commotion here… What's the big deal about a tree and some presents? Chill already!
What's so exciting about snow? It's just ice crystals. Nobody gets excited about an ice machine.
I doubt you understand the joys of a freshly-baked cake. And the holidays are the perfect time for perfect cakes!
I do love baking, you know. It's one of my little personal joys. And there's nothing like baking for your family over the holidays.
You know how hard I work, but even I need a break.
Working is intensely satisfying. And it also makes my rest hours that much sweeter.
I grow my own trees to decorate, you know. My commitment to the holidays cannot be questioned.
My favorite memory from my childhood is decorating our tree every year. Now that I tend the garden myself, it can be even grander.
If you're looking for a classic holiday tree, go evergreen or go home.
If you're looking for a classic holiday tree, go evergreen or go home.
You want presents? Hee hee.
You want presents? Hee hee.
Did you know? The fairfolk love sweet things. LOVE them.
Did you know? The fairfolk love sweet things. LOVE them.
Wouldn't it be something if pure white snow tasted like candy?
Wouldn't it be something if pure white snow tasted like candy?
Happy holidays!
Happy holidays!
I'll be honest, I didn't think this place was so merry until you showed up.
I'll be honest, I didn't think this place was so merry until you showed up.
You won't know love if you don't express it. Confess your love to your crush for the holidays! It's the perfect gift!
The holidays are all about looooove.
I have a pair of skates I really love… so much so that I don't want to take them out of the box.
You skate with them still inside the box? Sounds kind of dangerous.
No way! I've never even worn them! I wonder what it'd be like to skate with them… Maybe that's what love is, taking risks.
Why does everyone have to get all lovey-dovey for the holidays? It's gross for the rest of us.
Why does everyone have to get all lovey-dovey for the holidays? It's gross for the rest of us.
I will find love this winter!
I confessed my love to someone during the holidays last year…
What happened?
The very next day, he gave it away. This year, I'll give it to someone special…
Well, happy holidays!
You listen to me, find your true love before the year ends!
What kinda presents do you think Santa is bringing this year?
What kinda presents do you think Santa is bringing this year?
Do you think Santa is… real?
Seriously? You're gonna come to a festive place like this and ask THAT?
I… well…
Hey, I know the truth, but if I admit it I might get fewer presents. So yeah, go Santa!
The kids sure do love the holidays…
The kids really love the holidays…
Not just kids though. Adults love the holidays, too, don't they?
Ehh, it depends. Easier for adults to lose the spirit of the season, I think.
Well, happy holidays!
Agreed! Happy holidays! Remind everyone that this is a season for joy!

How can one land be so full of wonders?
I'm hungry. Is it safe to eat the food here? I want to know how it tastes…
This place seems so peaceful. And everyone has such strange clothes! What's that person eating? I have so many questions!
…Ah! Yalario! Are you from around here? It is nice to meet you.
Yala-what-io?
You sure have a lot of questions.
Where exactly are you from?
Hehe… Yalario is a greeting in my language. It means awaited stranger! Although, the literal translation is more like "well-groomed beard."
How could I not? Visiting a new place is so exciting! I can't wait to learn more about this land and its people.
There are so many different types of people here! You must have lots of festivals and holidays of your own. I can't wait to see them!
Mm… It is a distant land. You probably haven't heard of it. We traveled a great distance by ship to get here. Our village was not at all like this Town of Queens.
Hello, hello, hello! I'm triple happy to see you!
Don't forget to laugh! Hahaha!
Where there are people, there is money to be made.
Amazing that such a glorious city can thrive here, don't you think?
Where's the path?
It's through a mountain path northwest of $map:02000062$. The path's been closed for ages, though. Too treacherous for most folks. I'd forget about it if I were you.
Ah… What should I do?
Th-those rats!
Ah, I have to go back now…
I thought everything'd work out if I could just get into the army. Now I'm not sure I'm cut out for this…
I believe in you.

There are two ways to get divorced. To get a quick divorce, both parties must come to $map:84000002$ <font color="#ffd200">to get a consensual divorce. The other method is a <font color="#ffd200"> forced divorce </font>, where one party can apply without the consent of the other.

A consensual divorce cannot be undone once filed and must have consent from the other party. There is no contemplation period. A forced divorce does not require consent of the other party, but there is a 7-day contemplation period. Additionally, the party who applied for the divorce must pay a fee.

What's going on? Where is everyone?
Come back… I'm lonely.
And… forgive $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$. I was the one who messed up, venting my anger in my diary…
I rely on science to explain things… but how can it explain this…
You should focus on helping $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$ out here.
I'm not so sure about that, honestly.
…I guess I could get used to this.
Do you like cake?
What a ridiculous question. I love cake. And I love it so much that I cannot tolerate cakes that disappoint me.
$MyPCName$, take care of yourself this season. Happy holidays!
Ooh, an evergreen?
There's nothing quite like it! Tall, bushy, and wonderfully scented… And if you're looking for the most beautiful tree, you'd need to get a Korean fir tree.
The Korean fir tree, you say? Hmm…
It grows on Mount Halla, and it's simply divine. A shame they're becoming harder to find these days. Climate change, you know.
Never mind, I don't want it.
I want it.
$npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ do better now. $npcName:11004349[gender:0]$ is sad.

$npcName:11004349[gender:0]$'s big heart is enough.
I'll be honest, I didn't think this place was so merry until you showed up.
Did you see $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s family?
$npcName:11004345[gender:1]$? That's $npcName:11004347[gender:1]$'s daughter. She's my boss, but she's off today. You sure she's not at home?
The holidays are all about looooove.
Did you see $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s family?

I know $npcName:11004348[gender:0]$, he's $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s father. I saw him last night at the gardening club meeting. But I didn't see him today. I bet he's just at home… He mentioned wanting to decorate his holiday tree.
Why does everyone have to get all lovey-dovey for the holidays? It's gross for the rest of us.
Did you see $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$'s family?

I saw $npcName:11004346[gender:0]$ heading for $map:63000073$ early this morning. He goes there every day, you know. He's always got his face stuffed in a book, ignoring his adorable little sister $npcName:11004345[gender:1]$. I'd never let her get bored… So what's his problem?
Come visit $map:63000072$!

$map:63000072$ is bursting with joyous holiday cheer! People are happy! Fairfolk are happy! And it's SNOWING!!
Board this toy train if you want to go to $map:63000072$! Toot, toot!
The toy train is completely free because it's run by the fairfolk! We barely even know what money is! Come along to $map:63000072$!
Don't you want to taste a fairfolk cake?
You want to try this cake, right?
It's delicious! Thrilling! Mind-blowing, even!
There are many people who hunger for the fairfolk's cake. But it seems no two people have the same reaction to it! Isn't that interesting?
Some say it has no taste, others claim it's the most flavorful food they've ever eaten. Maybe it simply causes madness?
In any event, try some! Go on, eat it up!
The fairfolk's cake is so, so sweet!
No matter how much you eat, more appears!
It tastes even better the closer you get to the holidays!
The fairfolk's cake is so, so sweet!
Eat all you want, and it never never runs out! It's magic cake. That's the best part! Hee hee!

I'll catch the most fish today!

I'll catch a fish big enough to feed me all day long.

Come out, fishy fishy! It's dinnertime!
I coated my hook with chocolate. Who doesn't like chocolate?
The nerve of these fish! If they're going to eat my bait, they should have the decency to get caught!

We must protect Tria at all costs.

I'll master the skill, and then I'll make wonderful things!
I'll make you something no one else can!

I worked on it so hard…
I look forward to it.

They're pretty, but they don't fit my hands.
Maybe I should ask him to make them larger…
I wish the materials weren't so expensive…
I wonder if I can get a discount?
I can't afford these materials. I'll just have to get some on my own…
Hmph… Being single is better, anyway!
Well, I don't have anyone to give gifts…
Handicrafts are so fun that I often lose track of the time. I just wish I had someone to actually give this stuff to…
I could try engraving my name in it…
Ooh, this is fun!
I'm trying to focus here!
Welp, so much for my plans!
This isn't easy…
Sorry, but I'm not in the mood to chat.
Welcome.
Blast it…
What a pain!
I have to stop him.
Help!
How may I help you?
Shalua le mashalua.
Hm…
I have a feeling something interesting is about to happen.
More customers? Heh heh heh…
Come, come, tell me what you need. You won't be leaving empty-handed, heh heh heh…
I bet you get lots of customers.
Why the creep—er, cheery smile?
I bet you have all kinds of weird stories.
Of course, of course! I do not know why they come here, but I do so enjoy watching them skitter here and there.
Don't worry your little soul about that. You'll learn soon enough… even if you don't want to.

Enough to spend all night in the telling, and then some! So, what would you like to hear? The tale of a young monster slayer and his buxom mage companion? The story of how I've kept my youthful looks? Or… something else?
Something else! Please, something else.
Ahhh, yes… I know just the tale for a squirmy adventurer like you. Listen close, dearie…
Legend has it that when the Shadow Seed takes root, a new son will be born unto the Demon King and darkness shall swallow the world. A lovely little tale, don't you think?
You and I have different definitions of 'lovely.'
Blind little child! Lovely is in the eye of the beholder.
Bah! What do I do?
What's beyond the forest?
The grownups told me not to do it…
The grownups said not to leave the forest. But why not? What's out there? I gotta know!
You should listen to the grownups, kid.
But they never let me do anything fun! I bet there's all kinds of toys and games beyond the forest, and the grownups are keeping it all to themselves!
Yeah, that's not it.
Then maybe there's… there's just groves and groves of sweet fruit! There's got to be something out there! And I wanna see it!

I have to go to $map:2000350$…
Why is this darkness so persistent?
Agh… I'm so disappointed in myself! I can barely get anywhere in the $map:2000350$… and it's all because of those stupid $item:90000014$.
Why are you so eager to be here?
Because everything is… wrong! This spreading darkness is turning our world cold and evil. So many fairies have already fallen trying to stem the tide, and I have to do my part too!
You should leave this work to someone else.
What? You think I can't do it just 'cause I'm fairfolk? What makes you so special? Typical human arrogance!

The fairies have kept the darkness from touching Maple World since before you were in diapers. We never ask for anything in return, either. And what do we get for our troubles? The disdain of humans. Pah!
I better take a break from the forge and do some finishing. Did you see my jig or wire brush around?
Let's see…
I've been standing all day over a hot forge!
Would you like to enchant your gear?
Just a quick rap on the anvil to break off the fire scale, and this sword is done… Oh, hello. Have you come to enchant your gear?
Can you enchant my items?
Hehe. I'm a blacksmith.
I love the work that I do. There's nothing more satisfying than using my wrench to tinker with gear or banging metal into shape in front of a hot forge.
If you need to strengthen your equipment, come to me! You'll have to gather the materials: $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$.

You can get $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling level 20 or higher gear. Just use the Dismantle button in your inventory window. As for $itemPlural:40100024$, they'll only come from dismantling gear that's epic or better.
People also compete for $itemPlural:40100023$ at the Maple Arena, if that's something you're interested in.
I used to enchant low level gear for people, but we all soon realized it's just not worth it. So now, I only enchant items marked as "Can be Enchanted."
Oh! Sure thing! Select an item for me to enchant. It's got to have the "Can be Enchanted" mark on it, you hear?
I can't enchant this gear. The process to do so is too unstable. Perhaps you have a different item for me to enchant?

Oh no! You don't have all the materials you need! You can get $itemPlural:40100001$ from gear merchants and supply merchants and $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling level 20 or higher gear. $itemPlural:40100024$ are a bit more rare and only comes from dismantling gear that's epic or better. Use the Dismantle button in your inventory window to dismantle.
Legendary gear! I see so many pieces every day, but it's rare for anyone to bring me an item this precious. It will be my honor to enchant this.
What?! This is legendary gear! I haven't worked on such a precious piece in a long time. I've got butterflies in my stomach.
You picked a good piece of gear to be enchanted! Wait until you see how it turns out!
Oh! This piece has never been enchanted before. That should make it really easy for me, hehe.
This gear has never been enchanted before. Should be a cinch, then. Here goes…
Oh, dear me! Someone failed at enchanting this item 100 items?!
You've failed in enchanting this gear 100 times, and you still want to try again? Are you sure? I really wish you'd brought this to me to begin with. Oh, dear.
Oh, dear!! Someone failed in enchanting this gear 1,000 times?! How is that even possible?
I can't enchant this gear. The process to do so is too unstable. Perhaps you have a different item for me to enchant?
Easy peasy, hehe! Don't worry, you're in good hands!
Hehe, this is so straightforward, I could do it with my eyes closed. Want to see?
I think we know how this is going to turn out, hehe. Here goes!
Hmm, this shouldn't be too difficult. Shall I begin?
I'm always happy to help. All you need to do is bring the materials, hehe.
Some of the others call my enchanting skills legendary, because I never fail. I don't know, though… My way requires a lot more materials. Does that really make it better?
Low level gear doesn't require many materials to enchant.
This shouldn't be difficult.
I can guarantee success on this enchant, and it doesn't even require that many additional materials, hehe.
This piece of gear can be easily enchanted.
This shouldn't be too difficult.
This piece of gear needs more materials to enchant than before, but success is guaranteed, hehe!
You'll need a lot of materials to enchant this, but if you provide it all, success is guaranteed, hehe.
Do you have all the materials? Just remember, you're spending extra materials for a guaranteed result! I hope that motivates you, hehe.
I require a lot of materials, true… but I also never fail.
You may need to invest extra time and effort to use my services, but I never ever fail.
For my method of enchanting, you get what you put in! It costs more materials, sure, but it's guaranteed success!
Don't be intimidated by the material requirements… Think about the end result: guaranteed enchantment!
True, I ask for a lot of materials, but isn't it worth it?
I can enchant your gear as many times as you like, as long as you have all the materials.
I know other blacksmiths don't require as many materials as I do, but they fail in their work sometimes. I don't.
I know I require a lot of materials, but that's the price of quality, hehe.
My service costs more, but you get that you pay for! Bad luck never gets in my way!
I know some folks enjoy the thrill of a good deal. Just remember: my method allows me to enchant your gear with guaranteed success.
It'll be worth the material cost, I promise!
From now on, I'll need even more materials. You might want to mentally prepare yourself, hehe.
Yes, I require a lot of materials, but remember… the enchantment I offer is fail-safe.
Don't try to max out your gear's enchantment level all at once. It'd be too overwhelming.
$MyPCName$, I know it takes a lot of time and effort to gather so many materials, but once you have them, I promise to successfully enchant your gear. Hehe.
You're going to try for +14? That will take a lot of materials! I can do it, sure, but it'll be quite a bit of work, hehe.
Do you think you'll be able to gather all the materials? It's really quite a lot!
I can enchant gear as many times as you want, as long as you have enough materials. But I have to say, enchanting to +15 requires many, many materials. +14 is already very strong, isn't it?
+15… now that makes me nervous. I mean, reaching +15 has always been my dream, but it requires so very many materials. You can't possibly have all of them, can you?
I could practice enchanting for the next hundred years and still wouldn't be able to enchant this piece of gear. It's already so strong!
Challenges are what make life interesting, but some challenges can't be overcome, and this is simply one of them.
I can't enchant this gear any further. It's so unstable that it could blow up the whole street if I fail.
+15 gear really exists! Amazing! Hehe, you realize that no blacksmith in the world can enchant this piece any further, don't you? I'd be happy to help you with other pieces of gear, though.
This piece of gear is already strong. I don't think I can make it any stronger…
Enchanting gear requires precise skill and tons of practice.
Blacksmithing makes me smile. Nothing beats working over a flame!
Sure, it'd be great if enchantments never failed. But then again, that would make us blacksmiths go broke! Ha, ha!
It worked! Hehe, it always works! But it still makes me so happy every single time.
Hehe, see? I told you the enchantment would go great!
Success! Yes! Hehe. I hope you enjoyed my services!
Success! You provided lovely materials. Nicely done!
Hehehe, I'm not bad,right? See you again soon!
Hehe, nice, right? I hope we can work together again soon!
Your gear has reached +10! Hey, you've earned it with your determination and courage in taking risks!
Thank you for all your hard work, $MyPCName$!
How did you gather so many materials? Incredible!
I can't believe you gathered all of these materials. Very impressive!
I will certainly remember you, $MyPCName$. Few people could have done what you did.
Am I dreaming? Is this really happening? I always thought +15 was impossible, but we really did it!
I hope you're happy with my service, hehe! Come again!
All in a day's work, hehe.

Uh-oh. It seems the ratio of $item:40100023$ was off, and it decreased your gear's enchantment level by one. I'm sorry; I misjudged the carbon content in your gear. I'll take responsibility for this one.
I knew the $item:40100023$ was unstable, but I never thought it would decrease the gear's enchantment level… I'mso, so sorry, but at least it only decreased by one.
Um… well, the bad news is the enchantment failed. The good news is it could have been much worse.
Oh, the enchantment failed. It's not our fault… Whoever made this gear didn't case-harden it enough, so it's random chance whether it can tolerate enchantments.
Oops, I thought this would be easy…
I promise, this only happens once in a blue moon, and it's just random bad luck that it was your gear it happened to.

Aww… I was full of dread when I started, and I was right to be so. Your gear couldn't handle the pressure of the enchantment, and it got damaged. Its enchantment effects will reset in 10 days. And I'm sorry, but now it can never be enchanted again.
Oh no! This isn't good…
This item is… difficult for me. Is there a different piece I could help you with?
I'm so sorry! I'm swamped! Never been so busy in my life. I'm working on a special order, you see.
Can you enchant my items?
What do you do?
Hehe. I'm a blacksmith.
I love the work that I do. There's nothing more satisfying than using my wrench to tinker with gear or banging metal into shape in front of a hot forge.
If you need to strengthen your equipment, come to me! You'll have to gather the materials: $itemPlural:40100001$, $itemPlural:40100023$, and $itemPlural:40100024$.

You can get $itemPlural:40100023$ by dismantling level 20 or higher gear. Just use the Dismantle button in your inventory window. As for $itemPlural:40100024$, they'll only come from dismantling gear that's epic or better.
People also compete for $itemPlural:40100023$ at the Maple Arena, if that's something you're interested in.
Some customers desire for me to enchant low level gear, but it's simply not worth the time. I only enchant items marked as "Can be Enchanted."
I'd love to help you, but for now I have to focus on this special order I've got. I'll take especially good care of you if you come back later, I promise.
Ooh, how interesting!
What is this strange energy flow?
I think I can figure it out… Just need to…
Excuse me, but I'm a bit busy. Can you come back later?
What are you doing?
I'll leave you to it, then.
What am I doing…? <font color="#909090">($npcName:11001242[gender:0]$ stares at you blankly.)</font>
I doubt you could comprehend what I'm doing. My research extends far beyond the senses of ordinary people like you.
Good. For a moment there, I thought you were going to ask me some obvious questions. Now shoo! I have work to do!
Even when it is too dark to see, keep your eyes wide open. You'll find your way… eventually.
Okay. Sure. That makes sense.
What I am trying to say is that you shouldn't be here right now. I will send you to where you should be.
Please send me there again.
I've created a portal for you down there. It will take you to $map:52000076$. Next time, use the portal instead of bothering me, all right?
You've come here empty-handed. What are you talking about?
What is it?
We've got nothing but problems here.
Why have the Baaz shoveled this ordeal on my shoulders?
Acting Elder Blade… What a hassle.
This is all that old coot Arazaad's fault. He's giving me work to do from beyond the grave!
There can be no progress without sacrifice.
Even with the draft in effect, we still don't have enough soldiers.
Where in the world is $npc:11001233[gender:1]$?
$npc:11001231[gender:0]$, that rat! I'll make him pay!
$MyPCName$, if I'm not mistaken? You're that reckless student of $npc:11001244[gender:0]$'s I've heard so much about.
Ugh…
Oh, no…
We couldn't have known there'd be traps…
Ugh… I was injured by a trap, and $npc:11001244[gender:0]$ ran on ahead on his own.
Have you seen anyone out of place?
Everyone's counting on me, I can't miss even the tiniest detail.
There's something suspicious about this place…

$npc:11001231[gender:0]$ hurt dozens of us when he escaped last night. We all knew we didn't stand a chance, but what else could we do? I'm in no shape to help bring him in, but at least I can keep a lookout.
How foolish, to fear change so much.
Hm? You're awake!
How did this happen?
How did so many turn against us?
Five of the Eight Blades have betrayed us. Are we sure we can trust the remaining three?
Nothing's going my way.
What is it?
Ugh…
Ugh…
Ugh…
Catch the traitors!
Ugh…
Ugh…
Ugh…
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
What's the matter? Don't have enough to do?
Uh…
If you've got time for chit-chat, you've got time for a mission!
If you think you've got what it takes to serve the Imperial Vanguard, then prove it.
I am the shadow that evil fears.
Something on your mind, sweet stuff?
Who are the Shadow Walkers, exactly?
Tsk, tsk. You should be careful about sticking your nose in Shadow Walker business. I'd hate for something to happen to it.
Well, that's a scary thing to say.
It's for your own good. If you really want to know about us, I'll tell you… when we're a bit closer.
Uh… If you say so…
Cheer up, hon. In fact, c'mere and I'll give you a kiss on the cheek!
That's okay! I just remembered I have to… go… away.
Ha! No need to be shy!
Hey there, kitten. Looking to run missions for Dark Wind? I don't think you're ready to handle my business just yet.
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?
Why are Green Hoods here?
That's a good question! Most people think we're simple rangers and woodswomen, wandering the forests of Henesys with our bows.
But we're so much more than that! We know all about helping people and making sure they have everything they need.
There's more to keeping the peace than simply being a good fighter. You need to know how to treat a wound and provide a shoulder to cry on.
That's why we've been entrusted with support operations on Sky Fortress.
Of course, you know firsthand how good we are in a fight. Even though I'm stationed up here on the bridge, I'm just as good with my bow as Eka!
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
I'm listening.
What are the Lumiknights, exactly?
The existence of the Lumiknights may no longer be a secret, but that doesn't mean I may speak freely of what we do. In accordance to the Pact of Dantalion, my tongue is bound.
Your what is huh?
Of course, if you apply the Third Law of the Equinox, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to let slip a word or two. So long as you remember your Rites of Obfuscation, of course.
Of… of course…
You can't take these things too lightly. I once spoke the Three Devastating Truths to an insuitably prepared koborc, and it inverted into a quasi-nonsubstantiated autoform. Ha-ha!
Is that… funny…?
You don't think so? I suppose my sense of humor is more sophisticated than most.
Anyway, about the Lumiknights?

Before you can even begin to comprehend the Lumiknights, you must open your mind to the myriad possibilities of the universe. It can take years of study. Shall we begin with a light reading of the Tome of Bombastic Insensations?
You know what? Never mind.
How unfortunate. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.
You are not prepared.
The future is in our hands.
Speak. I'm listening.
Tell me about Tria's navy.
After all this time, you haven't seen the famous navy of Tria?
I suppose that's not unreasonable. Tria's navy isn't in Tria at the moment, after all.
A few months before the empress's grand court, the main fleet was dispatched to an island far away. Not even I know where the command came from.
Fa—I mean, Admiral Martini didn't even take the time to tell me about the mission. They simply set sail, leaving myself and a few petty officers to command a skeleton fleet.
They don't appear on Sky Fortress's radar, either. I'm not sure what to make of the bulk of our military vanishing at a time like this…
I wonder if he's even still alive…
I've said too much. You can trust in Tria's naval forces. The entire empire is under my personal protection.
Prove yourself to my officers, and I'll consider entrusting you with a mission for the Maple Alliance.
The future is in our hands.
What brings you here, $MyPCName$?
I want a sealed Balrog's weapon.
Any news about the weapon?

Right. You're the one who wanted to take one of $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s weapons and imbue it with his power. Give me a minute. If you have the spoils of your victory, I can imbue the weapon for you.
Take your time.
It's done. There you go.
It looks like your bag is full. Make some room, if you'd be so kind.
Well, this is awkward. You do know that you need 36 $itemPlural:30000420$ and 5 $itemPlural:30000421$, don't you? Come back when you have them.

I've asked around everywhere, but I haven't heard anything. I'll find a solution, though. It's just a matter of time. Say… do you happen to know a man named $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$? I hear he deals in $itemPlural:30000421$. You might ask him to see if he knows anything.

Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.
I need a glimmering Balrog's weapon.
How goes your research on power wavelengths?
I'm a scientist, not a magician. I can't just whisk such things out of thin air. I don't suppose you actually brought me the materials?
As it happens, I did! So, can you make it?

<font color="#909090">(He grumbles under his breath and puts together your new weapon.)</font> Here you go. I only made it because you asked so nicely. If you want it polished up, I suggest you get it to a smith right away.
What's this? Your bag's full! Why are you wasting my time when you don't even have space for a new weapon?
I need raw materials for a job like this! Say, 30 $itemPlural:30000437$ or so. And don't forget the $item:30000432$ and $item:30000433$!
It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.

It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.
Good to see you.
Hi there, $MyPCName$. I'm Zakum, but little. You can call me Little Zakum.
Where's the real Zakum?
Not happy with Little Zakum? That's fine. You can find the real deal at the Mirror Gate. Just check your Challenge Map!
Speak. I'm listening.
Tell me about Tria's navy.
After all this time, you haven't seen the famous navy of Tria?
I suppose that's not unreasonable. Tria's navy isn't in Tria at the moment, after all.
A few months before the empress's grand court, the main fleet was dispatched to an island far away. Not even I know where the command came from.
Fa—I mean, Admiral Martini didn't even take the time to tell me about the mission. They simply set sail, leaving myself and a few petty officers to command a skeleton fleet.
They don't appear on Sky Fortress's radar, either. I'm not sure what to make of the bulk of our military vanishing at a time like this…
I wonder if he's even still alive…
I've said too much. You can trust in Tria's naval forces. The entire empire is under my personal protection.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
What's the matter? Don't have enough to do?
Uh…
If you've got time for chit-chat, you've got time for a mission!
I am the shadow that evil fears.
Something on your mind, sweet stuff?
Who are the Shadow Walkers, exactly?
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?
Why are Green Hoods here?
That's a good question! Most people think we're simple rangers and woodswomen, wandering the forests of Henesys with our bows.
But we're so much more than that! We know all about helping people and making sure they have everything they need.
There's more to keeping the peace than simply being a good fighter. You need to know how to treat a wound and provide a shoulder to cry on.
That's why we've been entrusted with support operations on Sky Fortress.
Of course, you know firsthand how good we are in a fight. Even though I'm stationed up here on the bridge, I'm just as good with my bow as Eka!
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
I'm listening.
What are the Lumiknights, exactly?
The existence of the Lumiknights may no longer be a secret, but that doesn't mean I may speak freely of what we do. In accordance to the Pact of Dantalion, my tongue is bound.
Your what is huh?
Of course, if you apply the Third Law of the Equinox, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to let slip a word or two. So long as you remember your Rites of Obfuscation, of course.
Of… of course…
You can't take these things too lightly. I once spoke the Three Devastating Truths to an insuitably prepared koborc, and it inverted into a quasi-nonsubstantiated autoform. Ha-ha!
Is that… funny…?
You don't think so? I suppose my sense of humor is more sophisticated than most.
Anyway, about the Lumiknights?

Before you can even begin to comprehend the Lumiknights, you must open your mind to the myriad possibilities of the universe. It can take years of study. Shall we begin with a light reading of the Tome of Bombastic Insensations?
You know what? Never mind.
How unfortunate. Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.
Tsk, tsk. You should be careful about sticking your nose in Shadow Walker business. I'd hate for something to happen to it.
Well, that's a scary thing to say.
It's for your own good. If you really want to know about us, I'll tell you… when we're a bit closer.
Uh… If you say so…
Cheer up, hon. In fact, c'mere and I'll give you a kiss on the cheek!
That's okay! I just remembered I have to… go… away.
Ha! No need to be shy!
Remember, no longer are you some aimless adventure wandering the land, but rather a proud Knight and defender of the realm! Now, are there any questions you'd like answered?
What should I do now?
Spin $npc:11001953$ for just 1 $item:30000610$!
Give us 1 $item:30000610$ for a chance to spin $npc:11001953$. What do you say?
(Pay 1 $item:30000610$ for 1 spin.)
Spin the wheel for a chance at great prizes! You know you want to.
Here's hoping Lady Luck's on your side!
It looks like you don't have any $itemPlural:30000610$. You need at least 1 to spin $npc:11001953$!
You need at least 1 $item:30000610$ to spin $npc:11001953$. You know you can get $itemPlural:30000610$ by playing MC Kay's games, right?
If you have $itemPlural:30000610$ to burn, be sure to come to $map:02000064$!
Dark Wind gradually grows more stable, but the world is in chaos, as always.
Hey there! It's me, Little Zakum. You know, Zakum, but little. I have a gift for you!
Hey there! It's me, Little Zakum. You know, Zakum, but little. I have a gift for you, and… Hey, I already gave you a gift! You cheeky hero, you.
Oh, oh, what is it?
You've got to open it to find out! I hope you like this gift to you from me, Little Zakum.
I see you've brought me some $itemPlural:30000435$.
Can you purify them?

Well… You see, that needs some special purging magic… $npcName:11000031[gender:0]$ and the fairies think I'm too young to learn that kind of magic. They won't even let me gather $itemPlural:30000435$.

Even if I can't cast neat purifying spells, at least I can collect $itemPlural:30000435$ from adventurers like you. If I get enough flowers, maybe $npc:11000031[gender:0]$ will finally let me do the fun stuff. When he does, bring me more flowers, okay?
Do you have $itemPlural:30000437$ for me?
What exactly are $itemPlural:30000437$, anyway?
I wish I could tell you for sure, but all I've heard are unsubstantiated rumors. I'm not even sure if I need them or not. Would you mind holding onto them for now?
They may be related to the dark powers I've been studying. I'll let you know when I need $itemPlural:30000437$ to study. In the meantime, don't throw them away, okay?
I've got everything you need to take on $npc:23000090[gender:0]$.
The particle cannon is our last hope. $MyPCName$, I leave it to you!
Look alive! $npc:23000090[gender:0]$ is out there!
Ugh…
We've been ambushed…
They took $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$…
I don't actually know what $itemPlural:30000437$ are.
How disappointing! You can leave now. I'm busy, anyway.
You have questions? Bring me some $itemPlural:30000437$, and maybe we can talk.
How may I help you?
You said you wanted me to send you where $npcName:11001229[gender:0]$ went, right? Well, that would be an inn on Victoria Island, in the city of Tria. Would you like to go there now?
Wizards aren't the only ones capable of teleportation!
Rune magics are some of the most mysterious phenomena in Maple World.
Ever wish you could get somewhere instantaneously? What would you say if I told you I could use a bit of rune magic to send you wherever you want in the blink of an eye?
Please teleport me!
You won't believe it 'til it happens! Oh. Um… just a moment. Uh, it seems I don't have enough rune energy on-hand for the teleportation spell.
Hmm. You still have things left to do here anyway, don't you? Maybe you should take care of those. I'm not stalling!
What is it?
I can't believe what $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has done…
This may be the biggest challenge Terrun Calibre has ever faced.
I'm not sure $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ has the right, uhh, "temperament" for leadership.
High alert. Jeez…
It's time Pelgia dealt once and for all with the Jibricia threat.
$npc:11001246[gender:0]$ is our only hope!
Do you need something?
I still can't beleve any of the Eight Blades would betray their own…
There hasn't been a draft in almost a hundred years.
Arazaad had so many disciples, and not one of them could stop $npc:11001231[gender:0]$.
Wonder how they'll pick the new Eight Blades.
$npc:11001231[gender:0]$… I knew the Jibricia were behind this.
When all is said and done, $npc:11001230[gender:0]$ is our only hope!
What is it?
This is bad.
Hm…
Now that the draft is in place, we'd better hurry back to the fortress.
There's a lingering aura of runic magic… I must be close.
Something isn't right…
I sense… murderous intent…
$MyPCName$?! What are you doing here? You were a fool to come!
What is it?
Hmm?
We must find someone who can help us.
Tria is not a welcoming place.
Shush! You'll scare them off.
Strength will win a fight. Information will win a war.
What do you want to know?
Information is money.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has struck again…
I-I'm not… strong enough…
Have you come to see me?
Hm…
We've made little progress…
What seems to be the problem?
Hm… Wait.
What seems to be the problem?
You've got to open it to find out! But, uh, it looks like you don't have enough room in your bag. Come back when you're ready for a gift from yours truly, Little Zakum!
흐흐, 정말 흥미로운 힘이야. 위기를 기회로 바꿔볼까?
균열의 힘을 무기에 주입하면 무한한 에너지를 만들어 낼 수 있다는 사실! 한계돌파가 가능한 무기가 있는지 한번 볼까?
Was there bad blood between you and Arazard?

More like resentment. He was always bossing me around. "Practice your rune magic. Practice with your blade. Behave like a leader and set an example for the other Runeblades. Blah blah blah!" Even when $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ were there, the old man always singled me out.
Sounds like you were Arazaad's most trusted student.
W-what? No way. He was just a mean old man looking for an easy mark to pick on. Trust me, his favorite student was that jerk $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, and boy did that one come back to bite him.
Where did you hear that?
You'll be hard-pressed to find a Runeblade within Terrun Calibre that hasn't heard of you. Though lately, your name has been cropping up more and more.
What do you mean by that?

You don't know? Your teacher, $npc:11001246[gender:0]$, is one of the Eight Blades, the most magnificent warriors in all of Terrun Calibre. Learning from him is an honor, yet your approach to your studies have been a bit… unconventional. It's no wonder why there are many Runeblades who are jealous and resentful of you.
Who are the remaining three Blades?

If you can't remember that, maybe you're in worse shape than I thought… There's $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$, your teacher, $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$, the current leader of Terrun Calibre, and Vaharin, who's been missing for a pretty long while.
And the five turncoat Blades?

Well, there's my teacher and Arazaad's murderer, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, and his sworn brothers Zurile, Dalt, Kirisika, and Kahm. They're all in Jibricia and have very little love for the Pelgia sect.
Is their association with Jibricia a problem?

You really are your teacher's student, aren't you? While $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$ has always argued in favor of a strong, united Terrun Calibre, it's always seemed most Runeblades disagree with him, and this recent turn of events proves it.

The man that $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ killed was both the leader of the Pelgia sect and Terrun Calibre as a whole. While not all of the Jibricia have turned against us entirely turned against us, his actions have us teetering on the edge of civil war.
What happened?
We tracked $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and his Jibricia followers here, but they had already filled the passage with traps. I'm worried $npcName:11001244[gender:0]$ might be in danger.
What do you wa—I mean, welcome, valued customer! What kind of information can I help you with today?
What do you do here, exactly?

This $map:52000020$ exists to provide only the most reliable information handpicked by the hundreds and thousands of members of the Barrota Trading Company, Victoria Island's largest community of traveling merchants.
Okay, you've caught my attention.
Though I deeply wish to pursue $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, for now I will follow $npcName:11001246[gender:0]$'s advice and bide my time.
What advice is that?
He said I'd need another ten years' training to have a hope of defeating $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. I can't put into words how much that stings, but deep down, I know he's right.

Of course! Our information is divided into five classes for your convenience: S, A, B, C, and D. The class varies with the quality and price of the information. Class D information starts from 1,000 mesos, while Class S information is a steal at 50 million mesos.
Now, what kind of information do you want?
Class D please!
Class S! Only the best for me!
Oh, I was just browsing.
What're you, a cheapskate? Look, I don't got time for… I mean, sorry, but I don't have any appointments available!
I need to ask something else.
Absolutely! May I offer you a cup of tea? Or perhaps a moist towelette?
Actually, I just remembered I've got other things to do.
This isn't an art gallery! Is wasting my time entertaining to you?
I need to ask something else.
Which class of information would you like?
Class D please!
Class S! Only the best for me!
Oh, I was just browsing.
Wait! If you'd just give me a moment… Bah!
I'll come back later.
I'll come back later.
Yes, well, please come again! <font color="#909090">(He looks a bit crestfallen.)</font>
Ah, $MyPCName$! What a pleasant surprise.
I have a few questions to ask.
Certainly. What would you like to know?
What can you tell me about Arazaad?
What can you tell me about $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
Sigh… I'd rather not talk about him, but I suppose you need all the information you can get.
But I thought you and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ were friends.

There was a time long ago that was true, but… well, you know Terrun Calibre's history. I supposed the rift that grew between us was inevitable. The Jibricia value rune magic above all, while the Pelgia prize swordsmanship. And rather than work in harmony, they fight like children.

From an early age, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ had shown an incredible aptitude for the three elements. It wasn't long before the Jibricia took notice of him. Nor did it take long for him to climb to the top of the sect.
But how did you and $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ become friends?

He was Jibricia and I was Pelgia. And though our sects were bitterly opposed to one another, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ and I recognized in each other a kindred spirit. Our elders forbade us from meeting, but that didn't dissuade us. We had such big plans. You know, we truly believe we could find a way to end the conflict.
We would stay up all night, just talking. He was a talented warrior and the strongest of the Eight Blades. Together, I was sure we could really accomplish all the things we used to discuss…
Even with the passage of time, I still had hope. I dreamed of building a new future for Terrun Calibre with him…
Of course, my dream was destroyed when he killed Arazaad. He crossed a line from which he could never return. And now, I can't help but wonder if there was some sign I could have missed…

Arazaad was an admirable man. Not only was he the leader of our sect, Pelgia, but as Elder Blade he was the leader of all Terrun Calibre. This was a source of conflict on both sides. All Arazaad wanted was peace. Though the fighting between the two sects began with the elders, in the end it was Arazaad who took the blame.

Some called Arazaad a hypocrite, but the man was nothing short of an inspiration. Even though $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ was among the leader of our rival sect, the Jibricia, he still looked up to Arazaad.
Of course, $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ was not Arazaad's most trusted student.
Let me guess, it was you.
Ha! So often did I wish that I were. No, Arazaad's prized student was $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$.
$npcName:11001230[gender:0]$? Really? I would have never guessed.

I can't blame you, he certainly doesn't act the part. Initially, Arazaad tried to keep $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ on a tight leash. But the more defiant $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ became, the more attention he got from Arazaad.
And now he's the acting Elder Blade of Terrun Calibre. In any case, I've said more than I should have. It wouldn't be right to discuss such things without him here to share his side of the story.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Blue Stars hold.
If you find Blue Stars, please bring them to me.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Blue Stars hold.
If you find Blue Stars, please bring them to me.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Red Stars hold.
If you find Red Stars, please bring them to me.
What brings you?
I'd like to learn about the mysterious power the Red Stars hold.
If you find Red Stars, please bring them to me.
Rudolph visited $map:2000064$ to celebrate Holiday.
Heh heh heh…
Barabung! Chochakka!
Big badaboom!
Dum duum! Dootilydoo!
Won't do it.
What won't you do?
No talk. Stranger danger.
I'm not a stranger. I'm $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$ stranger! No talk.
The air here is cleaner than in $map:2000270$.
Is there nothing we can do for Dr. Maccan's allergies?
Why do people keep asking me stupid questions?
Yes? What do you want?
I heard you're Maccan's assistant.
Yes. What of it? If you want to ask why I'm still working as Dr. $npcName:11001276[gender:0]$'s assistant, save your breath.
Why are you sti— Oh.
I knew it! Some people just can't open their mouths without letting a stupid question slip out.
Ah! Ah! Ah-choo!
My allergies are terrible!
Everyone has at least one invention in them. But only real inventors, like me, have more than one.
Mm? Is there something you'd like to trade?
I heard you collect $itemPlural:40100024$.
You're pretty lucky if you find $itemPlural:40100024$, but I can't help you. I'm actually out of business. If you want to buy items, you'll have to shop elsewhere.
You're out of business?!
Why does any businessman go out of business? I'm not making enough profit.
I'll either have to start selling different products or stop selling altogether…
Shush! You'll scare them off.
Let's see…
Where was that hole? Was it here?
Sorry, but now isn't a good time. As you can see, I'm busy.
What are you up to?
I'm collecting special materials. I'm a specialist in restoring old documents, antiques, and what have you. The secretions of the $npcNamePlural:21000074$ are important in my line of work.
The Baaz watch over us all.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ has struck again…
About what just happened…
We can discuss it later.
Have I gained weight? My clothes aren't fitting right.
Sigh… If only this place didn't have such good designs.
Only the finest quality fabric for me.
What do you think will be in this year?
Feel free to look around.
It's been quite the busy day today.
How many hours until my shift ends…?
Feel free to look around.
You're welcome to try something on.
Have you checked out our clearance aisle?
Feel free to look around.
This season's fashions are so uninspired, don't you think?
This might be okay…
Do they have this in my size…?
I don't know if I can afford to shop here. Can you?
Lazy designers! These are the exact same clothes they had here yesterday. Where are the new designs?
And… Hmm… Did I forget to tune my guitar?
Ugh… My fingers are bleeding…
I hear there's a lot of top talent here for the audition. I'm a little worried…
Toot! Too-too-toot!
Ugh… I can't feel my lips…
Toot too-toot! <font color="#909090">(He mumbles something into his clarinet.)</font>
Mm, mm! La la la!
This is great. This is the best I've ever played!
Finally, I'm in my element. Don't bother me while I'm in the zone.
Why do I keep messing this part up…?
My shoulder hurts…
Are you here for the audition? You better grab your instrument and start practicing while you still can.
What instrument should I get for my darling children? Hmm…
They're more expensive than I expected…
My darling children are practically virtuosos. That's why I think it's time they learned how to play.
But I don't want to be a musician!
First, I'll learn how to play the harp. Then I'll let my hair down, and wear a flowing white gown, and spend all day plucking on the strings. I'll look so pretty!
I-I'm not… strong enough…
Ugh…
I'm not strong enough for this…
Gah! I failed to avenge Master Arazaad. Again!
You'll get your chance.
Just wait. Perhaps I'm not strong enough now, but I'll keep training. And someday, I'll rend $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ asunder!
Ugh, my throat… it feels like my last coughing fit tore it up. Ow… were you saying something?
I want to get on the same ship as <font color="#ffd200">Bomar</font>.

All civilian ships are prohibited from sailing in that direction. Just a moment, I feel a cough coming on… no, false alarm. Okay, as I was saying, civilians are banned, but… if you really want to go, I could smuggle you in for a price—Hnrghh! Hurrgh! Ow, the cough's back… Hnrrgh! Hnrgh! Ahem! You see, I'm a master smuggler—hrrgh! Hurgh! Oh, who am I kidding? I can't sound like a smooth criminal with this cough. Look, it'll be 4,000 mesos to take you there. Please just pretend I said that with some gravitas.

How about I—Hnrgh! Hnrgh!—let you on the ship in exchange for a glass of $item:20000087$? My cough's so bad I care more about that than money. That's an option if you don't want to—Hnrrgh! Hnrgh!—go to $map:2000183$ right away.
Thank you… I'd like a—Hnrgh! Hnrgh!—glass of $item:20000087$, please. $npcName:11000445[gender:1]$ mixes wonderful drinks over there on the beach. Hnrghh! Huuurrgh!
Now there's no choice left…
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$, what are you after?
I don't understand him… I really don't…
How may I help you?
The remains of their experiments are all around us.
They can't be good experiments…
You're $npcName:11001267[gender:0]$'s student, aren't you? So the rumors were wrong…
Rumors? What rumors?
W-well… No, I shouldn't. I don't want to upset you.
Don't tell me and see how upset I get!
Fair enough. They say $npcName:11001267[gender:0]$ has one critical weakness: his student.
They say his student is stubborn, arrogant, and too reckless to be trusted with any important task.
Well, I don't care what they say!
Good. You shouldn't. You're definitely a worthy student to a man of his stature.
Hmph. Unless you have something interesting to show me, just leave me alone.
I need a glimmering Balrog's weapon.
How goes your research on power wavelengths?
I'm a scientist, not a magician. I can't just whisk such things out of thin air. I don't suppose you actually brought me the materials?
As it happens, I did! So, can you make it?

<font color="#909090">(He grumbles under his breath and puts together your new weapon.)</font> Here you go. I only made it because you asked so nicely. If you want it polished up, I suggest you get it to a smith right away.
What's this? Your bag's full! Why are you wasting my time when you don't even have space for a new weapon?
I need raw materials for a job like this! Say, 30 $itemPlural:30000437$ or so. And don't forget the $item:30000450$!
It's keeping me busy. Real busy. As in, "Don't bother me if you're just want to chat" busy. So, unless you've got something real exciting for me, I don't have time for chitchat.
What brings you here, $MyPCName$?
I want a sealed Balrog's weapon.
Any news about the weapon?

Right. You're the one who wanted to take one of $npcName:23090005[gender:0]$'s weapons and imbue it with his power. Give me a minute. If you have the spoils of your victory, I can imbue the weapon for you.
Take your time.
It's done. There you go.
It looks like your bag is full. Make some room, if you'd be so kind.
Well, this is awkward. You do know that you need 36 $itemPlural:30000420$ and 5 $itemPlural:30000421$, don't you? Come back when you have them.

I've asked around everywhere, but I haven't heard anything. I'll find a solution, though. It's just a matter of time. Say… do you happen to know a man named $npcName:11001212[gender:0]$? I hear he deals in $itemPlural:30000421$. You might ask him to see if he knows anything.
Don't worry, I'll get you what you need to wet your whistle.
Maybe you don't realize this, but I'm the warden of this prison. I don't take walk-ins.
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
Who? You can't expect me to remember every rodent who comes in and out of $map:2000124$.
Trust me, you'd remember this guy.
<font color="#909090">(She listens begrudgingly as you describe $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$.)</font> As a matter of fact, I do remember him. There was something mysterious about the man.
Do you know why he was here?
Only two kinds of people come to $map:2000124$: tourists and convicts. Since he's not rotting in one of our cells, I suppose he must have been a tourist.
Get me out of here, would ya? I've got a stash on the outside. A million mesos for my freedom. What'cha say?
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
Sure I do, sure! Just help me break out, and I'll tell you all about it.
What does she look like?
She's got… hair. A real smart-looking gal. And really pretty, too.
$npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ is a man.
You were testing me? Get outta here, you rat! If you ain't gonna help me, just leave me alone!
Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
…You're one of them, aren't you?
Uh… Sure I am. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ sent me.
Quiet, or the warden will hear you! You came to see how things are coming along, is that it?
That's right.
Then talk to the supervisor. He's the one in charge here.
Of course. And the supervisor is…?
$npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. You'll need the password, of course. We change it every three days to keep the guards off our trail.
What's the latest password?
The latest password is… Shoot, what was it? Thick shadows… something. Ask one of the other guys.
I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
What's it to you? <font color="#909090">(He narrows his eyes at you.)</font>
I'm working with him.
Hm… Yeah, you don't look like no ordinary tourist. Tell him not to worry. Everything's right on schedule.
I need to see the supervisor.
Yeah, yeah, sure. That's $npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. But he won't talk to you unless you know the password.
What's the password?
Hold your horses. I wrote it down somewhere…
Here we go. "Thick shadows have been cast…" …something something… "…illuminate light…" Dang, who smudged up the password?
Sorry, $male:buddy,female:lady$. You got to get the rest from someone else.
I know all the guards, and you ain't one of them.
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
No, I don't. And I don't wanna.
Huh? You don't look like an inmate.
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
I'm busy. Scram!
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
You want to talk? Fine. But first, what's the password?
Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-five… Nine thousand nine hundred fifty-six…
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
…Nine thousand nine hundred six… Drat! You made me lose count!
I'm busy. Scram!
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
Keep your voice down. We're being watched. You're in the know?
Uh… Sure I am. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ sent me.
Can you please send me there now?
Okay. Argh, I can feel another coughing fit coming on! Leave me before you catch something!
Another tourist? Come to see all the animals in their cages?
Do you know someone named $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$?
No. Get lost.
For $npcName:11001265[gender:1]$…
I miss $map:63000012$…
The Baaz watch over us all.
I have some questions.
What would you like to ask?
How did Terrun Calibre get started?
Why are there sects in Terrun Calibre?
What are the Eight Blades?

Long ago, there lived two masters: a rune mage and a swordsman. Each was convinced that their art was the greater of the two, and so they had a duel. When they proved to be evenly matched, they decided to merge their martial arts and established Terrun Calibre to teach their new fighting style.
These were the first Runeblades, Jibritta and Pelgia. Together, they created a legacy of master warrior-mages.

They realized they could never reach true mastery of the new fighting style in their lifetime, so instead they focused on recruiting and training skilled warriors. Terrun Calibre continues that tradition to this day.
I have another question.
Every Runeblade knows the names of the first masters, Jibritta and Pelgia. But before these two founded Terrun Calibre, they already had martial arts schools of their own.

Not all of their students agreed with the vision of combining rune magic and swordsmanship. Even though these schools were united under Terrun Calibre, the original students of each tradition continued to bump heads.
Today, the Runeblades have embraced the combination of magic and martial skill, but these old factions remain—and so do the old loyalties.

The members of the Jibritta Sect believe in the superiority of a learned mind, and devote themselves to mastery of the elements. Those in the Pelgia Sect, on the other hand, value physical strength, and spend countless hours honing their bodies into a tool of blade and magic.
When $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ was the leader of the Jibritta Sect, the tension between the two factions reached a new height.
Which sect do the scouts belong to?
$npcName:11001265[gender:1]$ was one of the sixteen disciples of Arazard, which makes her a Pelgia. But most of the scouts under her are Jibritta.
But aren't the Jibritta the ones who started this mess?

No, attitudes like that did. $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$ may have led the Jibritta Sect, but not all Jibritta agree with him. I'm a Jibritta myself, and I'd like nothing more than to see him brought to justice.
I have another question.
The eight greatest Runeblades of each generation are named the Eight Blades. They represent the strength of Terrun Calibre.
So, how strong are they?
I think you know the answer to that already. Your teacher is one of them.
$npc:11001246[gender:0]$ is probably one of the five strongest Runeblades of all time. And you'd better believe that $npcName:11001230[gender:0]$ is just as strong.
So, who's the very strongest?

In terms of skill alone, it would have to be $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$. He's a genius and the best of this generation's Eight Blades. But he betrayed us, and so his genius has become Terrun Calibre's greatest shame.
I have another question.
Is there anything else you want to ask?
How did Terrun Calibre get started?
Why are there sects in Terrun Calibre?
What are the Eight Blades?
I need to be going.
May the Baaz guide you.
Hm… Wait.
Hm… Wait.
When can we go home?
You miss Calibre Island already? Don't fret, I'm sure we'll be able to return… someday.
Why can't we go back now?

Simply reaching the island requires massive amounts of rune mana, and there isn't much to be found in a place like this. Our only hope of returning is in finding all the pieces of the Wisdom of the Baaz.
Each sect has its own leader. Before Arazard was killed, he was the leader of both the Pelgias Sect and Terrun Calibre as a whole, which was unheard of.
I promise a fantastic time!
The ultimate paradise is here, just for you!
불안정하게 요동치는 힘이 나를 거세게 밀쳐낸다.
<font color="#909090">(…강한 어둠의 소용돌이 속, 희미하게 푸른 빛이 깜박거린다.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(…Although small, the blue light is faintly visible.)</font>
(Take a closer look.)
<font color="#909090">(A shadow person seems to be faintly visible in the black whirlwind.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(…The power of darkness is swirling.)</font>
(Listen closely.)
<font color="#909090">(It sounds like a small but fast gust of wind. Also sounds like someone crying.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(…As if breathing, it is a mass of darkness that feels alive.)</font>
(Touch its core.)
<font color="#909090">(When it feels like I'm about to reach it, it shrinks, and when I take my hand off, it unfolds again. Is this thing really alive?)</font>
감정을 원하시나요? 찾아온 $item:30001025$$pp:를,을$ 보여주시면 감정해 드릴 수 있어요. 수고료를 받는 만큼 감정 결과는 확실하답니다.
훗.
왜 여기 있는 거지? 진실을 확인한다고 하지 않았나?
진실을 확인하지 못했다면, 다시 다녀오라고.
진실을 확인하겠다고 말한다.
후훗, 그렇게 나오셔야지!
Ah, nice to see you!
Mm… Materials…
This mine is run by the Nerman Guild. We've got all the materials a blacksmith might need.
The future is in our hands.
Stay alert. We're in uncharted territory.
Back in my day, we knew a thing or two about duty!
Don't look so glum, Cadet. We're in a new land full of new and exciting things to eat!
I am the shadow that evil fears.
Hey there, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$. After I've racked up some shore leave, what say we take a tour of Kritias's inns and test out their bed springs?
Would you like to take on a mission for Green Hoods?
Where should I start? Local ecology? Demographics? There's so much data to collate!
It is time my order stood with the rest of the empire.
So many fantastic riddles await us in Kritias… It's exhilarating.
Welcome.
You have my full support.
What?
What is it?
Can I help you?
There's work to be done.
Need something?
The future is in our hands.
Let's get to business.
In my day, we protected the world just fine without these fancy gadgets.
Can I help you?
There's work to be done.
I am the shadow that evil fears.
What can I do for you?
All systems are operational!
How may I help you today, $male:Sir,female:Ma'am$?
Let's get to business.
…Finally, the time has come.
Let's get to business.
…Finally, the time has come.
What seems to be the problem?
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
Everyone gets sick now and then, you know.
When that happens, I can heal you.
My services are available for a modest fee.
Do you not realize that you should be somewhere else?
Yes. Send me to $map:63000050$.
Heh heh heh… Off with you!
Why are you still empty-handed?
Come, come, tell me what you need. You won't be leaving empty-handed, heh heh heh…
I bet you get lots of customers.
Why the creep—er, cheery smile?
I bet you have all kinds of weird stories.
Of course, of course! I do not know why they come here, but I do so enjoy watching them skitter here and there.
Don't worry your little soul about that. You'll learn soon enough… even if you don't want to.

Enough to spend all night in the telling, and then some! So, what would you like to hear? The tale of a young monster slayer and his buxom mage companion? The story of how I've kept my youthful looks? Or… something else?
Something else! Please, something else.
Ahhh, yes… I know just the tale for a squirmy adventurer like you. Listen close, dearie…
Legend has it that when the Shadow Seed takes root, a new son will be born unto the Demon King and darkness shall swallow the world. A lovely little tale, don't you think?
You and I have different definitions of 'lovely.'
Blind little child! Lovely is in the eye of the beholder.
Can I help you?
I'm excited for the opportunity to work with this guild!
I don't sell to just anyone.
When traveling, potions are a must.
Anyone can enjoy music any time!
You can play any musical instrument you want!
Anyone can compose music!
Let the music guide you! Ride the rhythm!
Anyone can play music if they have an instrument. How would you like to use one created by the Royal Music Academy to begin your musical adventure?
I'd love to learn to play music!
If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.
Music scores? How?

It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?
No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!
Why can't I just talk to the supervisor?
Listen, the supervisor won't even talk to me without the password. You don't stand a chance without it.
How do you know that man?
I'm working with him.
Hm… Yes, there is something special about you. What brings you here, then?
I'm here on $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$'s behalf.
He's just as impatient as the supervisor, eh? Well, if you're here on business, you better talk to him.
Who is this supervisor?
$npcName:11000651[gender:0]$. But he doesn't talk to nobody without the password. That's the rule. And, to keep things nice and secure, we change it every three days.
What's the password?
I wrote it down somewhere. Ahem. "In the middle of the shadows…" Drat! The rest got erased.
Sorry, that's all I know. You'll have to ask someone else for the rest of the password.
We call $npcName:11000651[gender:0]$ the supervisor. He's the one you oughtta be talking to, not me. But good luck getting a peep outta him without the password…
What's the password?
Haw! Like I'm gonna trust you with that info! If you don't even know the password, how can I trust you? Stoopid!
I'll be sure to mention you when I see $npcName:11001231[gender:0]$.
Bah! Fine! The password is… I forget. They change the dang thing every three days, y'know?
Do you remember any part of it?
How'd it go? Um… "Enlighten the light," I think. That's all I remember, honest!
Now get outta here, before the warden notices we been talking.
What's the password?
Haw! You don't know the password? Then we got nothing to talk about.
Hm? How may I help you?
What can you tell me about trading airships?
Oh! Well, there was some kind of new-old technological development that recently opened the skies to trade. Flying boats, what a concept!
But, from what I've heard, only a fraction of the airships going out ever come back…
What do you mean by that?
The airships vanish into… well, thin air! Once they set off for the skies, they just don't come back.
Does anyone know what happens to them?
I haven't the faintest idea. Anyway, that's all I know.
Fresh fish! We catch 'em, you buy 'em!
I have something to ask you.
Oh, all right. How can I help you, dear?
What can you tell me about trading airships?
You mean those new-fangled boats with wings? They show up in $map:02000062$ from time to time. I've gotta tell you, that's not a sight you'll soon forget.
Have you heard anything about them… disappearing?
Disappearing? Hm… The ones passing through $map:02000062$ never seem to have any trouble…
Have you seen them fly?
Well no, I've never actually seen one in flight. But I can't imagine why they'd have wings if they didn't fly!
Thanks for the information.
Let me know if you ever see one fly.
It seems like the airships traveling by sea are fine…
Uhh. Good? Now are you sure you don't want any fish?
What?
Don't talk to me.
What can you tell me about trading airships?
Airships? I don't know anything about that.
Are you sure you haven't heard ANYTHING?
Ugh, how annoying. That weird guy from earlier was asking the same questions.
I'm going to keep bothering you until you talk to me…
Ugh! Fine! There are some rumors flying around about airships going missing, but I don't remember any of the details because they were boring.
I don't even know if they're the same airships you're talking about, just that some have supposedly gone missing. There, are you happy?
Thanks. You've been a biiig help.
Don't act like we're friends now.
Oh my, $MyPCName$! What brings you here?
Do you know anything about the rumors going around?
Funny, that knight earlier asked me about the same thing. Well, I guess these days that rumor is all anyone wants to talk about.
Details, please!
It's like a giant shadow that darkens the skies. It looked like… a giant winged airship. Something about it gives me the heebie jeebies.
How come?
I don't know. It just feels ominous, like something horrible is about to happen. Disaster seems to follow anywhere that shadow is spotted!
I'm frightened.
Don't worry. I'll protect you.
Really? Thanks, $MyPCName$.
What do you want?
Have you heard the rumors going around?
For the last time, I'm not adopted! Mom says its normal for babies to come out giant and furry sometimes. If you want a real rumor, you should hear about the giant demons zipping around the sky.
Giant demons?
You didn't know? It's all anyone's talking about lately. I've heard talk that they've been kidnapping people.
Do you actually know of any victims?
Yeah, the appear like a flash of lightning. In the blink of an eye, the person next to you is gone. Just like that!
Err… No. I'm just telling you what I heard!
$MyPCName$, what brings you here?
$npcName:11003534$ sent me.
After all this time as the Guard Captain, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ still treats me like a child.
You go and tell $npcName:11003534$ that I'll do whatever's necessary to protect $npc:11000075[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$. I swore an oath, and on my life I intend to keep it.
Uh, I'm actually here to ask about the rumors going around $map:02000001$.
Ugh, not you too. These rumors are giving me a headache. I've upped security and tripled patrols to reassure the public, yet the rumors continue to spread.
And what about the truth behind the rumors?

I'll tell you the same thing I told the former captain of the Knights when he stopped by. I don't know anything! If we had any insight into the circumstances behind the rumors, the alliance would be the first to know.
The former captain?
Ah, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.
Okay.
I'm sorry I couldn't be of more help.
Today's such a beautiful day! Wouldn't you agree, friend?
Um, "friend?"
We made eye contact just now, you can't deny it. That makes us pals! Nice to meet you, friend.
Uh, hey buddy. Have you heard the rumors going around?
I sure have. Look, I wouldn't go around blabbing this to just anybody, but we're friends, right?
Best friends.
So a while back, I was taking a walk. I like going on walks to clear my head. Of course it only works if I go alone. Anyway—
Can you fast-forward to the part where stuff happens?
Right, so I was taking a nice leisurely stroll through Middleton when a giant shadow appeared in the sky!
I still can't get the image out of my head… giant wings, and these terrible muscly bodies… It was a whole flock of demons! I was terrified.
Wait, then you're the one who started the rumor!
They're not rumors! It's all true! Would I lie to my best friend?! Besides, I took a picture. Look.
Could I keep this photo? Since we're such good friends.
Sure, if it means you believe me! Take it. I don't know what I'd do if my own friend didn't believe me.
Empress's blessings, $MyPCName$! What brings you here?
I've heard a lot of rumors circulating through town.
Ah, yes, as have we. A dark aura begins to spread over Maple World once more.
Tell me what you know.
I'm afraid I have no more information than anyone else. However… I sense that the strange occurrences of late are harbingers of a greater darkness. A threat unlike any we have faced.
Please… be careful.
I've heard some unsettling rumors about $map:02000001$ lately.
Bah, you don't listen to rumor and hearsay, do you?
Well, I also have a photo…
Oh. Hm… Curious…
What can you tell me about the photo?
Hard to say, with the photograph being as blurry as it is. But I think I've seen a similar creature depicted in a tome from my family's library.
Go on…
Long ago, the goddess of light did battle with a dark being, but she was unable to destroy him. The shapes in this picture are similar to its minions.
But that's impossible. That evil was banished from this world long ago.
What else can you tell me about this "being?"
I've told you all I know. Hopefully I've answered your question. Now, if you don't mind, I have matters of state to attend to.
Do you need something?
I'm feeling good today.
You can earn everything here with talent alone.
This is no fantasy. It's real!
Where's that place you mentioned before?
You said to meet on the second floor. Where are you?
If you get to the second floor, you can earn a lot of money.
Hello. How can I help you?
Have a wonderful time.
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
What is it?
Cooking requires focus. Understand?
Cooking requires focus. Understand?
Sigh… I should have left well enough alone…
Ugh…
Ugh…
I can't stand this…
What?
How may I help you?
How may I help you?
The evil is growing…
I will lay down my life for the empress!
I command the Royal Knights of Empress $npcName:11000075[gender:1]$. Her safety is our duty.
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
Were it not for the lumarigons, we would not have defeated the Demon King. We must go to Drachenheim's aid.
$MyPCName$, what brings you to me?
$MyPCName$, please don't disappoint me. I know it's difficult, but keep up your efforts to save our world.
How may I help you look your best?
How may I help you?
$MyPCName$, what is it?
Are you here for my father?
What is it?
Hello!
Ugh, my head…
How may I help you?
Glory to the empress!
Glory to the empress!
What is it?
I've answered plenty of your questions already.
It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
What brings you to this place?
<font color="#909090">(She's already dead.)</font>
Do you need help?
Do you need help?
What's wrong?
<font color="#909090">(This is the door to Bistro Startz.)</font>
<font color="#909090">($npc:11001317[gender:1]$ must have left this note.)</font>
Mph! Out of my way!
Mph! Out of my way!
Mph! Out of my way!
No one toys with my people and gets away with it.
It's been too long since we gathered like this.
All of us here, together… It reminds me of the old days.
Sigh… I'm so glad that everyone's safe.
How may I help you?
<font color="#909090">(It's a bronze slab.)</font>
What is it?
You're here for the $item:40000023$? Please wait a moment.
(Wait several moments.)
Is this what you're looking for? It's what was written in that copy of the Wisdom of the Baaz you showed me.
That's right.
I know we wouldn't have found it without you, but please… don't lose this again. It contains valuable information regarding our legacy as Runeblades!
Sure.
Here, take it. You're lucky I transcribed an extra copy.

According to the documents we've restored, it's likely that the writings in this $item:40000023$ originated from the third volume of the Wisdom of the Baaz. If you want to complete it, you need that volume.
I do not believe you have room in your bag for this. Why not clear some space?
Hmm? Well, come back when you need my help.
Can I help you with something, $MyPCName$?
I'm looking for something.
No.
If you've come to me, then you must have a problem that only I can assist you with. Speak.
Do you have a spare $item:40000022$?
You're here for the $item:40000022$? Please wait a moment.

I know we wouldn't have found it without you, but please… don't lose this again. It contains valuable information regarding our legacy as Runeblades!

According to the documents we've restored, it's likely that the writings in this $item:40000024$ originated from the second volume of the Wisdom of the Baaz. If you want to complete it, you need that volume.
