If I'm not mistaken, you're a Runeblade—a warrior versed both in swordplay and runic magic. I'm skeptical on whether you can really master both, but it's noble of you to try. In any case, you're quite far from home. Did you have any questions I can answer?
Tell me about the Royal Guard.
Who is $npc:11000074[gender:0]$?
You've chosen to become a Runeblade? To split one's focus between two completely different arts in the midst of battle seems like a reckless strategy. Perhaps you'll prove me wrong by not dying.
Tell me about the war chief.
Tell me about Vayar Mountain.
Honestly, we don't care about politics or the empress's court. Nor do we care that you've chosen the path of the Runeblade.
What do you care about?
What caused the earthquake?
I'm afraid you cannot join the priesthood, as you've already chosen the path of the Runeblade. Nonetheless, I pray for your prosperity.
How bad was the quake?
Who is $npc:11000075[gender:1]$?
It's too bad you've decided not to join the Green Hoods. Still, we'd greatly appreciate any assistance you're willing to offer punishing those who bear ill will for the people of these lands.
Tell me about the Green Hoods.
Tell me about the criminals.
Wait, I can't teach you to be a Heavy Gunner… you're already a Runeblade. What a shame—you missed your opportunity to live a life of fun and explosions!
What's that weapon on your back?
What's there to do around here?
If you were a little more open-minded, I could teach you how to get anything you want. But I'm talking to a Runeblade here. You wouldn't know what freedom is. So just go on your merry way.
What is freedom?
Oh yeah? How can I get anything I want?
This place makes me uncomfortable. Hmm, you're a Runeblade…? I suppose that's not a bad choice.
What's making you so uncomfortable?
Is there something wrong?
<font color="#909090">(The animal moves around $npcName:11001320[gender:0]$.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The animal moves around $npcName:11001322[gender:0]$.)</font>
Anyone can enjoy music any time!
You can play any musical instrument you want!
Anyone can compose music! Even you!
Let the music guide you! Ride the rhythm!
Anyone can play music if they have an instrument. How would you like to use one created by the Royal Music Academy to begin your musical adventure?
I'd love to learn to play music!
If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.
Music scores? How?

It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?
No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!
Anyone can enjoy music any time!
You can play any musical instrument you want!
Anyone can compose music!
Music is life!
Anyone can play music if they have an instrument. How would you like to use one created by the Royal Music Academy to begin your musical adventure?
I'd love to learn to play music!
If you want to play music, just click an instrument. Isn't that easy? You can improvise or use music scores.
Music scores? How?

It's easy to use music scores. You can buy preset music scores or buy empty music scores and record music in them. It's a convenient method to play concerts from music you composed. Doesn't that sound like a blast?
No matter where you are, music is there! Take a look at the items I have for you, and give music a try!
…!!! $MyPCName$님?! 언제 탈출하신 겁니까!!!
?! 그게 아니라…
다시 독방으로 가시죠. 탈출하신 건 비밀로 해드리겠습니다.
W-wait! Time out! Let's talk.
What?
What is it?
What is it?
Welcome. How can I help you?
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
Please let me know if you decide to use the safe.
How may I help you?
You look like you've seen some rough days.
I treat my patients like family.
Oh dear, you're barely clinging to life! Would you like to pay $paneltyPrice$ mesos to get treated now?
You're looking pretty healthy to me, $MyPCName$, but if you're ever sick or wounded, I can help.
Welcome.
Is this your first time in the desert? It's beautiful…
I should look a little longer…
So many monsters…
What do I do now?
When we first came to the desert from the city, I was stunned by the beauty.
You don't miss the city?
I miss my old friends, but there's something about the desert sands under a full moon. It's terrifyingly dangerous… but undeniably beautiful.
Dangerous? How?
The sandstorms. If you aren't careful, they'll come and sweep away your loved ones.
The others say I was just dreaming, but I know it was real. One day, I'll meet them.
They have to be around here somewhere.
Holy creatures… Secretive creatures…
I must know more about them!
I know they're real. I know it!
It's peaceful out here, isn't it? Of course, it'd be more peaceful without all the monsters.
What can you tell me about the place?
Minar Desert used to be the home of the dragons, or so they say. Whether or not that's true, there are plenty of legends about this place… Such as the legend of the sacred tribe.
What sacred tribe?

Do you know about the snow leopards? There are only a few of them. The younger leopards look human, but as they grow, so does their sacred power. They grow bestial and lose the ability to speak. They're no ordinary spirits; some believe they're closer to gods.
Have you ever seen a snow leopard?
I caught a glimpse of one once. Of course, most folks think I dreamed it, but I know that's not true. I'm determined to uncover the secret of the snow leopards.
The desert hides many secrets, and I'm going to uncover them all!
Shadow energy? How…?
There's something fishy about these ruins, but I'll get to the bottom of it.
You can feel it, too, can't you? There's something wrong here. You have sharp senses for a human.
What is this strange energy?
I wouldn't get too curious about it if I were you. In fact, keep your distance unless you have some good info for me. I don't have time to answer questions for ignoramuses.
Ah! A human!
How wonderful, how wonderful!
I was right! I knew it! I was right!
This is great! Yippee!
We're not supposed to talk to strangers without the captain's approval.
I'm not a stranger. I'm just a friend you haven't met.
I'm not falling for that. Shoo!
Ah! A human!
Oh! It's real!
I knew it! I knew it!
This is great! Yahoo!
We're not supposed to talk to strangers without the captain's approval.
I'm not a stranger. I'm just a friend you haven't met.
Beat it! I'm not gonna get in trouble again!
Hm… Is this… baroque?
This baroque design is so… baroqueish.

This place is… How do I say? Full of contradictions. A rich, gorgeous facade that hides a lingering melancholy. This hotel is luxurious, but it's not for the regular people who live around it. Those people belong to a different world.
What?
I'll make you pay!
I'll teach you a lesson!
Just keep walking. I don't have time for wimps like you!
What seems to be the problem?
Urg… My head…
Boong boong, shong shong! Away!
Yesterday, 2895 guests passed on their way to $map:02010002$. Today, you are the 3527th guest.
It's getting late already.
I'm full!
How much longer must we wait?
Argh! Just deliver me…
She's been shopping all day. You'd think all that running around would be decent exercise…
Oww…
Oww… What do I do?
It took me months to decide on these.
One moment, I'm shopping on cloud nine. The next moment… I don't know if I ever want to go shopping again!
Ugh…
You scoundrels!
Take this!
Those knuckleheads! Why do they have to fight in here? They'll scare away the customers!
Sigh… May I help you?
Argh! Why are you doing this?
Grr… You're so stubborn!
Judith is usually a good girl, but she can throw a tantrum like nobody's business. All because I refused to buy her a can of her favorite drink…
Sigh… May I help you?
Wuuuuuh…
Nuh-uh! Nuh-uh!
Oh, wait…
How could I forget…?
Ugh! I don't want to go back.
I forgot to return the board I rented and road it all the way home. I don't want to go all the way back to the rental place… Maybe I should just buy one for myself.
Someday we'll have a customer who returns their board…
Uh… What happened to the other half?
Would it kill our customers to return their boards on time?
Back in my day, we'd explore the whole world on our skateboards. I even shredded over the hot desert sands… Ah, those were good times.
You have something to say to me?
I better take a break.
Will I ever pull off a kickflip?
You here to talk, or you here to skate? Heh… Good luck.
And what business do you have with a pro skater like me, hm?
Nothing like skateboarding to take your mind off things.
Only a true skateboarder understands the thrill of skateboarding!
Hey, you want to take some pro skateboarding lessons? I teach… for a small fee.
Skateboarding is harder than it looks.
Argh! Why can't I do any tricks yet?
Do I have to practice?
Why is this so hard?! I can visualize myself doing these tricks, so why can't I actually do them?!
Delicious food here! Get your delicious food!
Juicy chicken skewers with sweet-and-spicy sauce!
Sweet honey buns, get your sweet honey buns here!
Steamy pork buns! Taste the delicious pork!
All my food is made with 100% love, guaranteed. You'll like 'em so much, you won't even notice if someone drops dead right next to you! They'll change your whole outlook on life!
How may I help you?
Hm… This is more serious than I thought.
I can't do this alone!
Where are all these bugs coming from? They'll take over the skate park at this rate. Then Ludari City… and then, the world!
Sigh… This is getting tiring…
They're out of control!
I'm tired…
You can't swat a bug in the water, but you can still spray it.
I'm busy! Get to the point.
Argh! What?
Hurry! Hurry!
Sigh… I can't ever let my guard down at work. Accidents happen all the time, you know.
How old are you?
Ahem! Why do you care? I'm old enough, thank you very much.
What seems to be the problem?
I have to catch this rat!
Where is he?!
The impossible happened. Some prisoners escaped! No one has ever escaped from Alikar before! If I don't catch them, I'm through as an officer!
What brings you here?
Who's this?
Don't talk to me.
Can I help you?
It's just… too hot…
Is the air conditioner even on?
I came here to expand my business, but my partner is being completely impossible. And on top of that, the weather's too hot here and the people are too stubborn. What a terrible day…
What can I do for you?
The desert… is too hot…
My eyes have dried up.
Why would Mademoiselle Rue want to go into business with Cathy Catalina? They're polar opposites of each other. There's no way this partnership will last!
Good. Right. Perfect!
Mm-hmm. Paradise on earth!
Fan faster. Faster!
Yeeees? It's rude to barge in on someone's summer home, you know. Please remove yourself from the premises.
Sigh…
Hoo-haa! Hoo-haa!
M-my arms…
What brings you here?
This place isn't too bad.
Hm. Been too long since I really took some me time. This joint doesn't seem so bad.
Heh. This place isn't as big a dump as I thought it'd be.
State your business!
This place ain't too hot… Er, you know what I mean.
The food's bad and the music's worse.
I'm bored. May as well get out and see the sights…
Who's this?
Buncha hayseeds out here in the desert… Can't say I mind it.
Heck, it beats Kerning City.
Time to let off some steam.
Wah! You startled me!
Another beautiful day!
Maybe I'll throw another barbecue party tonight.
Uh-oh. Sandstorm!
You've been on the road a long time. I can tell. Come in and have a glass of water. It's on the house!
Sigh…
He must be waiting for me…
Madares…
I have to go back…
P-please don't talk to me. I d-don't know anything!
Let's see, what else can I do for fun around here?
How may I help you?
Toot-toot! It's time for the train to arrive!
Hm. Did it break down?
Please check the schedule on the monorail platform.
What seems to be the problem?
What seems to be the problem?
Wah! You startled me!
Sigh…
It wasn't easy to find time for this trip.
Sigh… I haven't been back home since I moved to Minar with my husband. I was so looking forward to this trip, and now the train has broken down…
Hm…
This isn't good.
It's so loud and… dirty here.
I don't care why this place is in shambles. I care that these noisy hooligans are preventing me from doing my job!
Wah! You startled me!
A good salesman can sell sand in a desert!
What to do, what to do…
Welcome! L-look, just ignore them and keep your eyes on me, okay? Eheheh…
Eager to get out of here? Try the latest model sports car from Tuning Motors. Just start the engine and leave this dump in the dust!
You called?
This is my shot!
This is it! My big break!

Mwahaha! This scene is… perfect! The height of drama, eclipsing any movie or show I've ever seen! And I'm the guy who gets to film it. This is probably going to be the greatest film of my entire career!
Hm…
No… This can't be…
Something's going on here…
What, you think a woman can't be a fight manager? Just watch. I'm going to turn Boh and every other one of my clients into world champions.
Ugh… Who's there?
Heh heh…
I'm… dizzy…
My head is spinning like a top… Or is it the world that's spinning? I feel like… I'm gonna die…
You called?
What is going on here?!
Where did they come from?
Where in the world did they come from? Of course they chose today to cause a mess. When the dust clears, it'll be us security guards who take the fall for this.
Mm? What?
Argh! The match was almost over!
What's this?
Who are these guys? Get them out of here! The match would already be over by now if they didn't ruin everything!
Hello, $MyPCName$!
안녕하세요? $MyPCName$님! 트라이아 왕실에서 모험가님들을 위해 특별한 보급품을 준비했습니다. 바로, <font color="#ffd200">젬스톤</font>과 <font color="#ffd200">루미스톤</font>을 <font color="#ffd200">업그레이드할 수 있는 재료</font>입니다.
왕실에서 공개한 특별한 상자를 이용하면, <font color="#ffd200">준비해 오신 재료</font>로 젬스톤과 루미스톤의 업그레이드 재료들을 만들 수 있어요!
어떤 재료를 준비하면 되는지 물어본다.
희귀한 재료들을 만들어내는 원리가 궁금하다고 한다.

먼저, 몬스터들을 사냥하면 얻을 수 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001187$</font>$pp:를,을$ 모아오세요. 저 앞에 있는 <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004215$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004216$</font>에 넣어 에너지 변환을 하면 젬스톤과 루미스톤의 업그레이드 재료를 얻을 수 있답니다.

그리고 에너지 변환에 성공하려면 준비할 게 하나 더 있어요. <font color="#ffd200">젬스톤</font> 업그레이드 재료를 얻으려면 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001188$</font>$pp:가,이$, <font color="#ffd200">루미스톤</font> 업그레이드 재료를 얻으려면 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001189$</font>$pp:가,이$ 필요하죠.
그건 어디서 구할 수 있는지 물어본다.
제가 <font color="#ffd200">판매</font>하고 있습니다. 왕실 마법사와 수호사제님들이 공들여 만들고 계시는 거라서 수량이 넉넉하진 않지만요…. 모든 모험가님들을 위해 구매 수량을 제한하고 있는 점, 양해해 주세요.
$npc:11000075[gender:1]$님의 명을 받은 $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$님은 왕실 보물창고에 잠들어 있던, 먼 세계로부터의 이방인이 선물했다는 이 <font color="#ffd200">두 개의 상자</font>를 활용해 세상의 몬스터들이 가진 에너지를 변환하는 방법을 고안해 내셨습니다.

이 두 개의 상자, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004215$</font>$pp:와,과$ <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004216$</font>$pp:는,은$ 물질이 가진 에너지의 성질을 변환하는 특별한 능력을 갖고 있답니다. $npc:11000601[gender:1]$님은 이 점에 집중하셨던 거죠. 몬스터들의 힘을 변환해, 모험가들이 활용할 수 있을까? 라고요.
에너지 변환 중 대량의 손실이 없다면 가능하다는 결론에 이르렀고, 몬스터의 에너지가 담긴 <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001187$</font>$pp:를,을$ 일정한 구조 안에 묶기로 했습니다. 결과물은 누구나 이용할 수 있어야 했기 때문에, 장비에 착용할 수 있는 젬스톤과 루미스톤에 힘을 더하는 재료를 만들기로 의견이 모아졌죠.
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001188$</font>$pp:와,과$ <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001189$</font>$pp:는,은$ 각각 젬스톤, 루미스톤의 에너지에 맞는 성질로 변환할 수 있도록 해주는 구조물의 역할을 한답니다. 어때요, 조금은 이해가 되시나요?
준비할 재료를 알려달라고 한다.

You must be here about this fancy chest, yes? It's enchanted to provide you with the materials you need to upgrade your gemstones.
Go ahead and give it a try. You'll need the proper reagents to open it, of course.
What reagents do I need?
I'm curious about the science behind this.
You'll want some $itemPlural:30001187$, which you can get by hunting monsters. That's the raw material that you will turn into gemstones.
To trigger the reaction, just use some $item:30001188$, and viola!
How do I get those?
Fortunately for you, I just so happen to sell them! I should warn you, though, that my supply is pretty limited. It's not easy to make, you know.

$npc:11000601[gender:1]$ discovered this chest while taking inventory of the royal reliquary. We think it was a gift to the empress from a faraway place. Anyway, it seems to turn the energy of monsters into something useful.
The $npc:11004215$, as we've taken to calling it, can convert all kinds of energy. As soon as she found it, $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$ set herself to researching the device.

To her surprise, the chest was even able to take the $item:30001187$ taken from monsters and turn it into gem dust. We agreed that it would be in everyone's best interest to make this device freely available to adventurer's like you!
Now, you will need $item:30001188$ to stabilize the process. It's simple physics, as I'm sure you know.
What materials do I need?

크리티아스 역사 책을 읽어봤는데요. 그 안에 놀라운 사실이 적혀 있었어요.
뭐가 적혀 있었는지 물어본다.
크리티아스의 정체! 그것은 바로 시간을 거슬러 나타난 신대륙. 생각만 해도 놀랍지 않나요~?
크리티아스에는 에네르라는 새로운 힘이 있다고 해요!
에네르는 사용하기에 따라서 따뜻한 생명의 에너지도, 차가운 파괴의 에너지도 된다고 해요.
중요한 것은 에네르를 사용하는 사람의 마음이겠죠. 그 사람의 마음이 선하느냐, 악하느냐에 따라서 에네르는 이로운 것이 될 수도, 아닐 수도 있겠죠.
이 땅에는 에네르가 넘쳐난다고 하네요. 그 힘이 제발 나쁜 사람들의 손에 들어가지는 않아야 할텐데 말이죠.
요는 사람의 마음이 중요하다는거죠.
우리가 이 새로운 힘을 지켜야 해요!

Sure! I provide 10 free analyses per day, out of the goodness of my heart. Even if the key is too old to be useful, you'll still get a little something.
What brings you here?
Want to catch a prize fish?
Nothing's quite as exciting as catching a prize fish!
Use bait. That'll help.
Need fishing supplies?
How may I help you?
Hello.
Another lovely sunny day—just like every day!
I love being surrounded by so much natural beauty.
On $map:02010022$, hard work is considered a sin. Got nothing to do? Then soak in the majesty that surrounds us!
We just moved here.
Can you believe it? My darling child, bitten by a snake!
I thought this place would be paradise, but it's actually a den of snakes…
We haven't even finished unpacking, and my baby is already hurt. How dreadful!
Nice to meet you.
Oh! Who could have imagined I'd find a stone like this here, of all places?
I'm glad I moved here!
Coming here for my research is probably one of the best decisions I've ever made. I bet my wife and kid are happy, too.
What is it?
Grr… This can't be!
The Blackstars can't… lose…!
We aren't some fly-by-night operation. We're the Blackstars!
Ugh… It hurts…
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
We're the cream of the crop!
The three of us make an amazing team!
We're the best!
Go away! We're on a mission!!
You're awfully excited for someone on a mission.
We aren't playing, if that's what you're trying to say! We don't get to play all day like you! We're on a very, very important training mission!!
Meh heh heh…
Prr!
Mee hee hee!
For the Meerkat Patrol!
We are as one!
Meerkats are strong!
We don't usually let our clients in here. Seeing us train and tend to our wounded makes them realize that we, too, are mortal. It's bad for the brand, see?
We like humans, of course, but we know better than to count them as friends. We once relied on our humans for happiness. That… didn't end well for us.
Anyway, now that you've seen our base, you have to promise never to tell anyone about it. Only you and your closest friends are welcome here.
One, two! One, two!
Strong body! Pree!
Strong mind! Pree pree!
You want to be strong, like the Meerkat Patrol? Then join our training!
That sounds adorable. Sign me up!
Don't underestimate us. If you cry and give up halfway through, you'll never live it down!
I can handle anything you throw at me!
Heh… I'll see to it that you run away with your tail between your legs!
We've got 53 jobs today!
Team 235, go!
Team 24, stand by!
We all trust and rely on each other in the Meerkat Patrol. You could say we're a big happy family.
What's the secret to your camaraderie?
It's all thanks to our hardworking captain. We all look up to good old Captain $npcName:11001408[gender:0]$!
Since you're here, you should say hi to him. I bet he'll have some good advice for you.
Ugh… This pain…
It hurts so much…
I feel weak…
C-can't… talk… Too… busy… pain…
Where does it hurt?
Leave me alone… you dummy… I need to rest…
Hey, I'm just trying to help!
G-go away… I don't want… your help…
I want to save you.
Maybe you've tamed me…
I can tell I'm becoming more sensitive.
It's so close, but I can't reach it. It comes to me in the night and vanishes at dawn.
The more I lean into the sunlight, the more I hide in the moonlight. But then, it all drifts apart. I can't continue this way…
What on earth are you talking about?
Huh…? Shoo! You wouldn't understand.
Sigh…
Hmm…
Strange…
I heard you talk!
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ tilts his head.)</font>
Maybe I'm hearing things…
…Heh. <font color="#909090">(Did $npcName:11001431[gender:0]$ just giggle…?)</font>
I don't even have enough energy left to talk…
Ah… Why…?
Ugh… I feel too weak…
How may I help you?
Welcome. How can I help you?
Need a safe place for your items and mesos?
Please let me know if you decide to use the safe.
Please put your money right here. Thank you.
No loose change. Bills only. Thank you.
Hey, this is my turf!
Don't you know who my brother is?
Let's get to work.
If I hold something in my hand, it'll look like I'm working…
Why won't that beggar get out of here?
We have a saying in the construction industry: safety first. That means that it's none of my business if you do something stupid and get hurt!
Stop bothering me.
I like the foreman's boots.
Wonder how much they cost…
You like my safety helmet? Two stripes from front to back is the latest fashion.
This must be the place.
Hm… Gulp…
I'm not afraid. I'm not afraid…
Shhh! Don't tell my mom I'm here!
Pass me by and you'll have a hundred years of bad luck.
Isn't my house grand? It protects me from the pouring rain and the beating sun!
Don't ignore me! Don't you dare ignore me!

Nice place, right? If you lived here, you'd never have to worry about getting caught out in the rain or snow. I was going to keep it for myself, but make your best offer and this house could be yours!
What is it?
What is it?
Ah-ah-ah-achoo! So much salt in the air! It tickles my nose, but I love the taste. Is there something I can do for you?
I want to go to Karkar Island.
In that case, you'll want a ride in my Lumiwind. She's my greatest invention! Her design is inspired by the extinct dragons who once soared the skies, the lumarigons. Do you want to ride?
Yes.
I'll come back later.
All right, bon voyage!
No rush. The Lumiwind will always be right here.
Is there something I can do for you?
I want to go to <font color="#ffd200">Victoria Island</font>.
A-ha, you came to board the Lumiwind! Perfect timing… we're nearly done with maintenance. Did you want to depart right away?
Yes.
I'll come back later.
All right, bon voyage!
Huh? So you don't want to fly? Okay. Well, let me know if you change your mind.
Let me know if I can help.
My head hurts and my shoulders ache…
And… so do my knees…
And my ankles…
I've been getting terrible joint pain lately. Normally that'd mean there's a storm brewing, but it doesn't rain here. Very strange.
There's a rumor that all the ailments that have struck the town lately are from an ancient curse.
What kind of curse?
Never mind. I shouldn't have mentioned it to an outsider in the first place. If you'll excuse me, I need to gather herbs for my arthritis.
What shall I cook today?
I could make some soup.
Haven't found any good meat in a while…
Beautiful day, isn't it? On days like this, I love to pack a lunch and go on a picnic.
Do you like rainbow trout soup? I cook it with my own blend of spices. Everyone says it's the best soup in town.
I'll be the judge of that!
Ha! All right. Come over to my house sometime, and I'll cook it for you!
Enjoy life!
What I wouldn't give for a rain… of mesos!
$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ doesn't care about money. Fool.
I have this friend named $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$. She has a house, but she practically lives out in the desert…
She had a chance to get a good job in $map:02010002$, but she let it slip through her fingers. She could've been enjoying the finer things in life by now…
She's always talking about ruins and secrets. Why does she let such silly nonsense weigh her down? She tried to tell me about it, but honestly, it's so boring I forgot it already…
She's gone, again.
I hope she at least remembers to feed herself.
My daughter, $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$, is always lost in thought. What could keep her so preoccupied all day long?
She used to be such a clever girl. Even the people in $map:02010002$ heard about her genius.
But instead of going out and making something of herself, she came back to this small town. I'm happy to have her here, but I can't help but feel that she's wasting her talent…
Ugh… My skin is burning…
But I have to ignore it…
I have to protect $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$…
Our parents didn't want us, so why do you care?
They left us. Said we were cursed. I don't want to talk about it.
It's my job to keep $npcName:11001392[gender:1]$ safe now. She's all the family I've got.
I think brother is sick. He tries to keep me safe, but he's…
Where are your parents?
I don't know where mom and dad are. Brother knows, but he won't tell me.
What brings you?
What on earth are you doing?
I have a bad feeling about this…
W-what?
W-what's that?
Gulp!
Mwa hah hah!
Tell me about her.
Am I missing something?
I'll figure it out. I'm sure I will.
The ruins… These diseases… They all broke out around… No, the timeline doesn't fit.
What are you mumbling about?
Ah, yes? Can I help you?
You look like you've got a lot on your mind.
Yes, you're right. I'm trying to figure some things out. And you're interrupting me.
Oops! I didn't mean to.
Good.
Hm… This place is quiet, just as I thought.
Is there nothing more thrilling than the search for knowledge?
I like quiet places. Real quiet places.
Why's that?
I've got my reasons.
Such as…?
I like quiet places because then I don't have to deal with nosy people like you. But I guess it's time for me to look for a new quiet place.
$npcName:11001392[gender:1]$! I'm sorry! Please… Please, say something!
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001392[gender:1]$ opens and closes her mouth slowly, a blank look in her eyes.)</font>
This is all my fault…
Hm? Who are you?
$npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ wants this slab translated.
Oh, yes, I remember her. Clever girl. It didn't even occur to her that I might not be able to translate this.
You can't do it?
I didn't say that! Child's play, mere child's play. Now be quiet while I work…
Yes… Mm-hmm… Now, that is interesting.
What is?!
Be quiet, you! Your jabbering is distracting.
(Make an exaggerated lip-zipping motion.)
Yes, I see. This will be quite helpful… I've got something for you. Wait just a while longer.
(Wait several moments.)
If I do this, then… Is the formula off? Then I should try this, and…
It is done! I don't know who made this slab, but it contained the answer to a new formula I've been trying to perfect.
This record describes a method for stimulating the nerves and triggering a transformation in the body. I reverse-engineered the method to create a restorative tincture!
Yes, and?
So impertinent! I was just getting to the good part. In short…
I've created a potion that can alleviate the ailments that $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$ told me about. Note that I am being most humble here. When I say alleviate, I mean completely cure.
Thank you.
Take this to $npcName:11001396[gender:1]$. And tell her she's welcome.
Is there anything else you need?
No.
Good, good. You may leave.
$male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I'm $npcName:11004459[gender:0]$, in charge of logistics!
$male:Sir,female:Ma'am$! I'm $npcName:11004459[gender:0]$, in charge of logistics!
We could never have put a base like this together so quickly without Sky Fortress.
How did you manage this, anyway?
As soon as this mission began, Cat Sith started sending me data on the base's construction plans and materials.
I'm happy to report that not a single brick went to waste in constructing this place!
What's Cat Sith?
What does Cat Sith mean?
I'm surprised you haven't been briefed. It's the new shipboard AI. It's able to scour data from the Sky Fortress's memory banks and learn on its own.
The captain came up with the AI design and the tactical officer did all of the programming. I admit, I'm a little intimidated by their genius.
You'd have to ask the captain, since she's the one who named it. I imagine it has something to do with cats. Just a hunch.
All clear!
All clear!
I'm a little nervous about this place, but this is a chance to set myself apart from the other guards!
All's well!
All's well!
Two months out from retirement, and I get assigned here. Just my luck.
Forget justice and duty! I want to go home!
Stick with it, soldier!
No way. I don't have what it takes to be a hero! I just want to go hide under my bunk!
Don't tell Condor about this, by the way. If he hears I've been talking like this, I'm done for!
All clear!
All clear!
We're doing our best to keep $map:02020041$ safe!
All… is… well!
All… is… well!
I've been trying to get in this platoon for ages. They finally give me the transfer, and the whole platoon is shipped out to this crazy place. Man…
Chin up, sad guard.
Hearing those words from your mouth fills me with hope. Thank you, $MyPCName$! I'll fight my hardest!
These enemies won't quit…
Wave after wave. It's too much!
Huh? You don't look like a refugee.
Huh? You don't look like a refugee.
I have come from the distant land of Maple World.
Never heard of it. Look, just keep your head down and try not to get caught in the crossfire.
Don't they know when to quit?
I'm sick of this never-ending battle…
Who goes there? Enemy?!
Who goes there? Enemy?!
Hm? Your clothes are strange, but you look like you can hold your own. You ever consider a career in freedom fighting?
Sorry, but I've got other obligations.
Tch… What a waste of talent. Well, if you change your mind, it's not like we can afford to be picky…
I'm so hungry…
Our rations are late…
All's we—Huh?! You're an outlander!
All's we—Huh?! You're an outlander!
I'm worried about $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$. He's got his heart set on joining the rebellion…
I'm worried about $npcName:11004472[gender:0]$. He's got his heart set on joining the rebellion…
What's his story?
$npcName:11004472[gender:0]$'s family was expelled from Tairen during one of the purges, so they signed on with the freedom fighters. Then… they went missing.
Ever since then, he spends all his time exercising so that he can join the fight and save his family.
That's so sad!
I hope he never has to see the battlefield. We told him he could be a freedom fighter if he trained hard enough, but it was really to keep him from running off and getting himself killed.
And now I have to spend my free time babysitting him… Hey, you look free. Mind watching him for an hour or two?
I'm actually really busy!
Hmph. You don't look like it. Oh well! I'd probably get in trouble if I left him with a stranger, anyway.
This is a placeholder line.
This is a placeholder line.
This is a placeholder line.
This is a placeholder line.
Who would want to play in this chaos?
This disaster has to end sometime.
That little cretin wants to go out and play…
That little cretin wants to go out and play…
Where did that troublemaker get off to…?
It's past dinnertime…
That snot-nosed brat went out to play and still hasn't come back.
This is no time to play. There's a war going on out there! Ugh, what would our parents say?
Lalala!
Huh? Who're you?
Huh? Who're you?
Wait, aren't you $MyPCName$? Wow! It really is you, in the flesh!
Stop. You're making me blush.
What, afraid of a little fame? How lame. This must be why they say you should never meet your heroes.
No way something that big can fly…
Hey, do you see that huge ship? I'm not imagining it, am I?
Hey, do you see that huge ship? I'm not imagining it, am I?
It's so big… How can something that big float up in the sky like that?
Didn't you ride Sky Fortress to get here?
Sure, but I couldn't exactly tell how big it is from the inside. Seeing it now, away from the buildings in Tria… It's unreal!
Do you know? How does it fly like that?
$npcName:24100101$ would tell you it's the power of science.
$npcName:24100101$? Is that the name of one of the Sky Fortress big wigs? She sounds intimidating…
So this is Kritias, the land of opportunity.
Here's my chance to get a mansion of my own…
You here for the big land grab?
You here for the big land grab?
$map:02020041$ is the first city in the new world. This place is gonna be a hotbed of development once we kick the other riffraff off this continent!
Sure, it seems like a shaky investment now, but just you wait! Any land you buy here today will be worth ten times as much a year from now!
I'll die if I have to eat one more ration pack!
I just want to taste something good for once…
Sigh… I'm sick of these ration packs they have us all eating. I miss the gourmet restaurants of Tria!
They didn't warn us that Kritias doesn't have any proper eateries. What's a foodie supposed to do in a place like this?
I would kill for a bowl of blue mushroom slime soup in cornelian cherry sauce…
Ugh, talking about it just makes it worse! I'm going to be too hungry to sleep tonight…
Eee! Blake!
Blake's so handsome!
Eee! It's him! It's really him!
Eee! It's him! It's really him!
Ugh! What are you?
Don't jump out at me like that. When I saw your ugly mug, I thought you were some kind of freaky monster.
Rude!
Don't take it personally, uggo. Everyone is hideous compared to Blake!
You need to get your eyes checked.
A normie like you will never understand! Blake is beauty. Blake is the future!
Just wait. Soon, everyone in Kritias will bow before Blake's handsomeness!
Blake's so handsome!
Look here!
But how do they make it float?
This could change energy production throughout Maple World.
Oh! You startled me.
Oh! You startled me.
I'm here to study aetherine. We're really just scratching the surface when it comes to possible applications!
What have you learned so far?
Well, aetherine can make objects spontaneously levitate for almost no energy expenditure. I've measured the amount of aetherine in the floating buildings here, and there's very, very little.
Our own levitation technology requires massive amounts of energy to work. If we can switch to aetherine, it will be a technological revolution!
Of course, I don't know how any of it works. But I will. Oh yes, I will…
Is this really alive?
I've never seen anything like this before.
Yikes! You startled me. I… I didn't really expect another person to just walk up to me in a place like this.
Yikes! You startled me. I… I didn't really expect another person to just walk up to me in a place like this.
See this tree? I thought it was some kind of mechane at first. But all of my tests show that this is, in fact, a living plant.
Those cogwheels are actually leaves. Eventually they'll fall off and the tree will grow new ones. I'm still trying to wrap my head around the ecosystem here…
If my report is convincing enough, maybe Dr. $npcName:11004492[gender:0]$ will authorize a permanent research camp here.
What an amazing facility…
How was this made?
Hm? I didn't expect to see anyone outside the safety of the outpost.
Hm? I didn't expect to see anyone outside the safety of the outpost.
What are you doing here?
Oh, well I was sent out to look for aetherine samples, but I found this weird machine. I'm pretty sure it's related to aetherine somehow, but I haven't quite worked it out.
It's weak, but that ring is drawing aetherine power into its center. I took some initial scans, and I think it's actually capable of storing vast amounts of the stuff.
That's strange.
Isn't it? But I have theories!
Based on the data I've collected so far, I have two ideas. Either this device is gathering aetherine and transporting it somewhere…
Or it's a dimensional portal that's connected to a place far, far away.
What kind of people live here, that they can make all this wild technology?
I'm not ready for this…
Exploring a new continent…
Hello! I'll be helping you explore Kritias. Nice to meet you.
Hello! I'll be helping you explore Kritias. Nice to meet you.
When do you start?
St-st-st-start? Soon! Really soon! Yeah…
There's lots and lots of preparation to do. So that's what I'm doing… Preparing! Yep. Gotta prepare before you can go out into the wilderness…
It's okay to be scared.
I'm not scared! I'm c-cautious, okay? This is an important j-j-j-job. I'm definitely not stalling!
Must keep exploring…
Just need to find my opening…
Keep quiet! Stay down! It's over if the enemy spots us!
Keep quiet! Stay down! It's over if the enemy spots us!
Something wrong?
Something wrong? Is something wrong?! Look at the chaos out here! I came here to discover new lands, not risk my life!
That so-called Daemon Army ambushed me, so I ran away… only to find myself in the middle of a Tairen raid!
At this rate, I'll get tombstoned before I discovery anything worthwhile. If you really want to help, then get rid of those bad guys for me!
It's definitely worth looking into…
Such a unique shape…
Those clothes… You're from Maple World, like me! You must be the first friendly face I've seen in days.
Those clothes… You're from Maple World, like me! You must be the first friendly face I've seen in days.
How's the research going?
It's going… slowly. I can't stop thinking about this machine here…
In design, it resembles the noblest of tools, the humble drill. You can see why I've become obsessed with it.
But this is no ordinary drill, if it even is a drill at all. It seems like it can absorb energy of a certain wavelength. The same wavelength that aetherine resonates at, in fact.
Perhaps it is used to mine for aetherine, then transmit the energy somehow? That's my hypothesis, at any rate.
I want to go back to Tria…
How long must I stay here?
Hey, you're from Maple World, right?
Hey, you're from Maple World, right?
Is something wrong?
Everything's wrong! I loathe field work. Everything around here wants to tombstone me. And it's been days since I had a proper bath! This assignment must be a sick joke on the part of my boss.
I miss my lab in Tria. I hope this mission ends soon…
Cheer up!
I hadn't thought of it that way. Thank you. You cheer up, too!
Look at the size of it…
Where is all of this aetherine is going?
Ah, the hero of Sky Fortress! You have many fans, you know.
Ah, the hero of Sky Fortress! You have many fans, you know.
Stop. You're making me blush.
Don't let it get to your head. You'll get sloppy.
Anyway, this looks to be some kind of aetherine mine. There must be a huge deposit of the stuff under here.
That would explain why there are so many enemy forces marshaled here. They want the aetherine.
I think we ought to put our hat in the ring, so I sent a request for reinforcements. I'm trying to estimate the size of the aetherine deposit before they get here…
Such scope…
This is beyond imagination.
I'm so glad your here! I needed to share this with someone.
I'm so glad your here! I needed to share this with someone.
Oh? What is it?
Look at that structure up ahead. Really look at it. You can use my telescope if you like.
Yeah, that's… um… something.
The whole thing is made of some kind of porous material, and it's soaked in aetherine like a sponge!
The cylinder at the center looks like it draws aetherine directly from the ground. I think. I'm not exactly sure how it works…
I think this terminal is connected somehow. I haven't managed to get it to do anything yet, though.
The signs are clear…
I'm certain of it…
Oh, hello. You must be here for my report. I'm afraid it's not very good…
Oh, hello. You must be here for my report. I'm afraid it's not very good…
Something wrong?
I'm looking into the soil contamination that started spreading around here not too long ago.
What do you know about the mechanical monster that roams this area?
I know all about it!
Not a whole lot.
Really? You must not read the crew newsletter. Our efforts to explore Kritias have been hindered by this giant robotic worm. We call it Gigantica.
Wherever Gigantica appears, the soil becomes tainted. We've actually had to abandon a camp because the toxins got so bad!
That's why I'm needed. If I can analyze the contamination, we may be able to counteract it—or, at the very least, predict where Gigantica will go next.
Then you're aware of how big a problem Gigantica is for us.
Wherever Gigantica appears, the soil becomes tainted. We've actually had to abandoned a camp because the toxins got so bad!
That's why I'm needed. If I can analyze the contamination, we may be able to counteract it—or, at the very least, predict where Gigantica will go next.
Astonishing!
To think that such technology exists…
Hm? Oh, you're that $male:fellow,female:lady$ from Sky Fortress!
Hm? Oh, you're that $male:fellow,female:lady$ from Sky Fortress!
Here to admire the architecture? It's breathtaking, isn't it?
Not really.
Balderdash! Surely even a hardened adventurer like you is moved by such grandeur. There's nothing like this in all of Maple World!
Why, this building is a testament to the power of science. Even though I'm standing here, I feel as if I'm witnessing some impossible dream.
Dr. $npcName:11004499[gender:0]$ will be over the moon when he sees this!
Such grand scale…
I never imagined such a place…
Shh! Quiet! They'll hear us!
Shh! Quiet! They'll hear us!
I stumbled upon this place quite by accident. I never imagined there might be a large robot factory here.
See there? The robots are made without any intervention from human factory workers. And with such speed, no less! This explains the endless forces that the Tairen army has managed to field.
Should I blow this place up, then?
I'm afraid this is but one small corner of the whole facility. What's more, if any part of the factory is destroyed, it's repaired automatically within minutes.

Any attempt to destroy this place would fail to put any sizable dent in their production capabilities. It would, however, mark our presence on Kritias as a clear threat. A threat that they would feel compelled to wipe out.
Instead of striking out blindly, we need to understand the full scope of this facility… and what it will take to destroy it once and for all.
Do you hear that?
It's almost like a chorus…
Ah, $MyPCName$! I'm here researching the plants of Kritias.
Ah, $MyPCName$! I'm here researching the plants of Kritias.
What have you learned?
So much! All of the plants in Kritias have at least a little bit of aetherine in them.
And the plants react to each other's aetherine. It seems like they use the aetherine to communicate with each other!
So what… talking plants?
Not precisely, but the idea of plants being able to communicate with each other isn't exactly new. The ecosystem in Kritias may be the most concrete evidence we've ever seen.
The plants are all giving off the same aetherine wavelength. It's almost as if they're singing a chorus!
Hm… Aetherine in living creatures…
What, exactly, IS this aetherine?
I'm here researching the fish of Kritias.
I'm here researching the fish of Kritias.
What have you learned?
Every fish I've caught has had trace amounts of aetherine in their systems. The amount might be related to their place in the food chain…
If I were to cook and eat one of these fish, would the aetherine stay in my system? Until I figure this out, we're going to be reliant on food rations delivered from the mainland.
Terrible…
How can this be?
This place was a dense forest when we first got here…
This place was a dense forest when we first got here…
What happened?
We set up camp just a day after the Daemon Army arrived. This is all that's left of the forest. The stream is totally dead now, too.
We've seen this kind of rapid transformation before. In the Land of Darkness…
As the Daemon Army expands, this massive die-off of nature will follow.
Is this the power of aetherine?
Even gravity is nothing to it…
The gravity, erm, situation in this place is fascinating. Why, these huge structures look as though they might simply float away.
The gravity, erm, situation in this place is fascinating. Why, these huge structures look as though they might simply float away.
How's the research going?
It's early to say, but I think this could lead to a second energy revolution.
Think about it. The vast majority of Sky Fortress's power generation goes into keeping it in the air. How might we use that power if we had aetherine to lift the ship aloft, instead?
Aetherine's all over the place…
I suppose it isn't toxic, after all.
Ah! You're that $male:fellow,female:lady$, from Sky Fortress. Are you here to ask about my research?
Ah! You're that $male:fellow,female:lady$, from Sky Fortress. Are you here to ask about my research?
Sure. Tell me about it.
Since we arrived in Kritias, I've been looking into the connection between the local wildlife and this miraculous "aetherine" substance.
No matter how big or small, every creature I've sampled has some amount of aetherine in it.
Hm. Amazing…
For life to survive here…
I'm part of the team researching the fish of Kritias.
I'm part of the team researching the fish of Kritias.
The water here is highly toxic. Just a sip would tombstone an ordinary person. But see in there? Fish.
How is that possible?
I can't say anything conclusively just yet, but I think the aetherine in their bodies somehow protects them from the poison.
Did the fish here evolve to use the aetherine to neutralize the poison?
Interesting…
Are our cultures connected somehow…?
Who's there? Oh, you're that… that $MyPCName$ hero!
Who's there? Oh, you're that… that $MyPCName$ hero!
What are you doing here?
I'm the foremost cultural anthropologist of Sky Fortress, here to study the cultures of Kritias. And I feel I've already made a great discovery!
I've uncovered some ancient writings here, and the motifs and archetypes on display are similar to those in ancient Victoria Island literature. Uncannily so.
That seems a little unlikely.
It begs the question: do our cultures share the same root? Of course, the higher-ups will only accept evidence that our culture came first, and that Kritias copied us…
How elaborate!
Incredible…
Hmm…? Have we met?
Hmm…? Have we met?
I came here on Sky Fortress.
Oh, you're that famous hero! An honor to meet you.
I'm part of the architectural research team. Take a look at this structure here! Incredible, isn't it? I've never seen such an elaborate design.
Each brick and pillar fits perfectly. I've never seen something like this before.
All of the buildings I've examined since we got here has been like this. I only wish I could see how they pulled this off!
I can't hear you! Louder!
You! Stand up straight!
You here to enlist? Fall in line, Recruit!
You here to enlist? Fall in line, Recruit!
I'm not your recruit.
Is that so? Hmph. You have the look of a washed-up loser. Join my troop and I'll have you back on your feet in no time!
We need all the help we can get to fight Tairen. We'll even take folks wearing… whatever that's supposed to be. You sure you don't want to sign on with us?
I'll think about it…
Whenever and wherever, we're ready!
Erm… What do I do?
Wh-what do I do in this situation…?
I shouldn't have done that…
Ugh… He's the champ for a reason…
If he'd gone all-out…
What happened to you?

Vasara Chen happened… He's the champion of the underground fighting circuit, and the son of Wei Hong. You know, the mob boss of Blackstar? He promised… promised that if I beat him, Blackstar would leave me alone…
Th-this…
This doesn't add up… Ugh…
I'll get to the bottom of this…
If nobody stands up to injustice, then we all suffer.
Just because others turn a blind eye, that doesn't mean that we should. If something is wrong, then we must work to make it right.
Otherwise, it all becomes a vicious cycle. People like us need to act or nothing will ever change.
D-dad…
This is harder on dad than it is on me…
I can get through this…
Dad's a thoughtful and affection man, if you get to know him.
There's more to him than he lets on. <font color="#909090">(There are tears in her eyes.)</font>
Are you okay?
I'll be okay…
All right. Let's take a look.
Is there anything good…?
Do you need something?
If I don't have it, then it probably doesn't exist. I'm also interested in buying rare and unusual pieces.
Take a look! I'm sure something will catch your fancy.
Just one day without trouble. That's all I want.
Hoodlums… Robbers… Pickpockets…
I'm too busy to think!
I've got more cases on my plate than I could ever solve in a single lifetime.
Sure, I'm happy that $map:02010002$ is growing. But does the crime have to grow with it? Our prison is bursting at the seams!
This isn't police work. It's war! But somebody's got to protect the city, right?
All's well, $male:sir,female:ma'am$!
Never let your guard down!
I've never been this far from home before. I miss my family…
My friends envied me for getting to go on this trip. I was excited, too. But the day before I left, I was already feeling homesick.
You're amazing, you know that? You've been far from home even longer than I have, and it doesn't show. I've got to work to be as strong as you someday!
All's well, $male:sir,female:ma'am$!
Never let your guard down!
No matter how long these missions get, the guard is impervious to fatigue! <font color="#909090">(There are deep bags under his eyes.)</font>
Okay, I admit, I'm a tiny bit tired. I just haven't gotten used to my new quarters. I miss… Well, I have my reasons for being tired, okay?
Such as…?
Please don't ask. I… I don't want to get into it.
It's a wonderful day!
Being here by myself is weird.
I wonder what my teammates are up to now…
Yeah? You never see a meerkat before?
I don't know what you want, but I'm not telling you anything unless you speak, first!
Why does it matter who goes first?
It's one of the rules of Meerkat Patrol. So there!
Tsk, tsk. Hmph!
Complaints, complaints, complaints. Always complaints!
Impetuous rascals!
I'm sick of the constant questions! Even if I told them the answers, they wouldn't remember them, the dopes!
It sounds like you don't actually know the answers.
Why you! It'll take more than that to shake their faith in me. Do I look like an easy mark to you?
No.
Maybe you don't know how this works, but you're supposed to trade intel with me, not question my credibility. Well, forget you!
I! Am! Happy!
I love gramps.
I love the village!
People are always asking me if I'm okay living with my gramps. Well, I am!
I don't care if you think he's a screaming old fart. If you ask me, he's a great man!
Your grandpa isn't popular, is he?
They're just jealous of how great he is! Gramps talks loud so people can hear him clearly. Isn't that nice?
Please protect us…
Please save them…
Destiny, hear us…
I cannot see you, but I know you by voice, scent, and soul.
Your soul is pure. Maybe you can do it…
May you be blessed with good vibes.
Where is he?
Our patience will be rewarded…
In times like this, we need faith…
The greatest threat is the one we do not see. We need divine guidance to find our path.
We humans are weak and hopeless, but we have a will that is stronger than steel.
The divine recognizes this and guides our hand. Remember that, and you will never know fear.
Ah… Why can't I simply forget my useless memories? Being able to remember everything is a curse!
I like it when everyone's gathered like this.
My restaurant suffered while I was taking care of my guys…
Will Mika ever learn to take care of herself?
You saved us all, but I'm not going to thank you twice.
Maybe I'll treat you to a meal.
Where are you hiding?
I can't find you! I give up!
I was playing hide-and-seek with my friends, but I just can't find them!
I was playing hide-and-seek with my friends, but I just can't find them!
Where did you go?! I give up! Please come out!
What is it?
Don't trust everything you see.
How did I end up like this?
Don't you want the power of the Devil Tree?
Betrayal is the quickest path to death.
You'll regret messing with me.
You're better than I thought. I never forget a debt… or a grudge. $MyPCName$…
What brings you here?
What should I tell $npcName:11001460[gender:0]$?
Those weren't ordinary train robbers.
Nothing is more precious than the ruins and artifacts that our ancestors have left behind. Today, I'm especially proud to be an archaeologist!
M-m-must stay calm. I'm n-n-not scared…
Blake is so… bedazzling! Don't you think so, too?
Blake is so… bedazzling! Don't you think so, too?
Bedazzling. Sure. Let's say yes.
It's like we're witnessing history. The day Blake set foot in the new world!
Wanna join the new Blake Fan Club—Kritias Branch? I've got the paperwork right here!
Oh no, something urgent just came up. Bye.
Really? Shoot… Well, come back soon, before we fill up!
Kabo! I will heal you.
Move! You're in the way of the healing!
Don't interrupt Kabo's treatment!
That snot-nosed brat went out to play and still hasn't come back.
Hm… Something's missing.
What am I missing here…?
I'm thinking up ways to bring prosperity to $map:02010036$. If you want to chat, talk to someone else.
This place could be a good investment…
A little TLC, and it'll flip for a profit.
If you're thinking of investing in $map:02010036$, you're too late… friend. I was here first.
$map:02010063$ has potential.
Just need to make sure everything goes according to plan…
If the development project is a success, it'll bring wealth and fame to $map:02010063$.
I can see so far with my telescope!
Say… Where'd my teammates go?
After that red sandstorm, a weird ruin popped out from the dunes. I can't wait to see what kind of secrets it holds!
Sigh… Why did I even come here?
Is it time to change professions…?
A high salary is good, but there are other important factors when choosing a job. Comfort, for instance. And safety… I've made a terrible mistake…
What's wrong?
Where do I begin?! How about the fact that I can't get out of this death trap!
I hate heights…
I want down. Now!
I need to climb down sooner or later, but I'm worried that they are still down there.
Who's they?
Those robots! They were supposed to help us develop the desert, but they all went crazy!
All clear!
Identify yourself!
Identify yourself!
Whoa, there. I'm a friend!
Hey, you're that outlander. I read a report on you.
Sorry if I seem on edge. Not all of the outlanders have been as… helpful as you.
We! Will! Win!
Give me victory, or give me tombstone!
I know your face. Road in on that primitive flying boat, didn't you?
I know your face. Road in on that primitive flying boat, didn't you?
That's right.
Hmph. You did good work in Richmonde, I'll give you that.
All clear.
I haven't seen you before. You that outlander everyone's talking about?
I haven't seen you before. You that outlander everyone's talking about?
Anyway, watch yourself out there. Our enemy won't hesitate to shoot you down.
Zzz… Zzz…
Zzz… Zzz…
Zzz… N-no… I can't eat another bite…
Zzz… N-no… I can't eat another bite…
Hello there!
Aaaah! Don't hurt me! I-I mean… I'm awake. I'm awake!
When will this battle end?
Look what we have here. It's about time they sent us some reinforcements.
Look what we have here. It's about time they sent us some reinforcements.
I'm not your reinforcements.
Tch… Figures. We don't have the numbers to hold this position for right now. Y'know, give a leshy a gun and I'd let it stand guard. That's how desperate we are!
They have to let up some time…
I'm getting sick of this.
What're you, a tourist? You wanna get tombstoned? This is a warzone! Not that $map:02020030$ is any better…
What're you, a tourist? You wanna get tombstoned? This is a warzone! Not that $map:02020030$ is any better…
When's my relief coming?
I need to get off my feet…
Ugh… I'm ready to pass out on my feet…
Ugh… I'm ready to pass out on my feet…
AAAAH! Ugh, you startled me.
Waiting for orders…
Hey, you're that outlander!
Hey, you're that outlander!
This is the hub of all of our mobile forces, by land and air. But ever since the enemy pushed to our doorstep, we haven't been able to secure a supply line for the life of us.
One shot, one KO!
My bullets always hit their mark!
My bullets always hit their mark!
This is bad…
We'll be eating shoe leather at this rate…
We'll be eating shoe leather at this rate…

With all the land routes cut off, we've been relying on air drops for supplies. We don't have the spare planes to keep that up forever, though. If something doesn't happen soon, the fortress will fall.
We don't have enough fuel for our cars. We don't have enough ammo for our weapons. We just don't have enough…
We don't have enough fuel for our cars. We don't have enough ammo for our weapons. We just don't have enough…
Hey, you aren't carrying any aetherine on you, are you? Ugh, as if it'd just fall into our laps like that…
Remember what the empress told you!
I haven't been in $map:02000001$ for a long, long time. The air is… dustier than I remember.
No wonder the empress was in such a hurry to see me. It's always something…
The empress has great faith in you, $MyPCName$. Do not disappoint her.
What's with the quiet act?
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11001407[gender:0]$ stares at you without saying a word.)</font>
I don't think you have enough space in your bag. Lighten your load first.
Order now or get a face full of burning oil. Your choice.
You can return the necklace… later, and in person!
Okay, I admit it. You're a good person. I can't always be right, you know. Anyway, thank you for the help.
I hope the Blackstars leave me alone this time… I don't want a rematch with Vasara Chen…
There's nothing here.
I don't see any ghosts.
Hey there! I'm investigating rumors of a ghost dressed in black.
Hey there! I'm investigating rumors of a ghost dressed in black.
Did you say gh-gh-gh-ghost?!
Yes! There have been lots of sightings of this so-called black-garbed ghost around here.
Apparently it wanders around, mumbling something about sacrificing a soul to obtain great power…
It's right around this time that most of the witnesses run for their lives, so that's all I have to go on. Well, that, and…
There's something else?
Yes! I think there was something about… summoning a many-armed god?
It can't be…
You know what that means?
I'm sure it's nothing.
I'll let you know if I learn anything else. This investigation is just getting started!
We've just barely prepared our ship for $map:02000062$. For just <font color="#ffd200">100 mesos</font>, you can catch a boat to $map:02000062$ right away... Would you like to leave right now?
In the meantime, let's spend some time and collect some fare money from the villagers on the way back as well. By the way, the boat fare is <font color="#ffd200">100 mesos</font>.
No.
We've just barely prepared our ship for $map:02000062$. The fare is only <font color="#ffd200">100 mesos</font>... Looks like you're short on money. I can't give you a boat ride for free.
Maple World is a collection of continents floating in a vast, endless ocean. The biggest continent of all is <font color="#ffd200">Victoria Island</font>.

<font color="#ffd200">Victoria Island</font> consists of the capital city of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000001$</font>, where <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11000075[gender:1]$</font>'s palace stands, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000076$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000023$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000051$</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02000100$</font>. Each of these areas has developed its own unique culture.

In my time, a great many young people left their homes on Maple Island and traveled across the vast oceans, dreaming of adventures and new challenges that awaited them on <font color="#ffd200">Victoria Island</font>. I was like that too when I was a kid... Heh heh heh. Come to think of it, I haven't left this cabin for a long time.

Many years have passed and the world has probably changed a lot. It would be better for you to go and see it for yourself rather than to listen to this old man. Is there any story other you would like to hear ?
Yes.
Yes.
Yes.
